40000082.name: Spectral Steed Whistle
40000082.hint: Received from Melina after resting at a Site of Grace beyond the tutorial area.

40002468.name: Armorer's Cookbook [1]
40002468.hint: Can be found in a Kaiden Sellsword camp North-East of the Agheel Lake North Site of Grace in Limgrave.

800029CC.name: Ash of War: Stamp (Sweep)
800029CC.hint: Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab located at the beaches of Western Limgrave. From where the Giant Land Octopus and Land Octopus enemies are, check the east side of the shore and you'll see some pillars on the beach. You'll notice multiple glowing prints moving around the pillars. Attack it at the right time just when it's about to approach you to reveal the scarab. Elden Ring.

1005A67C.name: Aristocrat Boots
1005A67C.hint: Dropped by Noble Sorcerers seen in larger groups of Wandering Noble enemies that wander the roads of most areas.  An early spot to farm them is the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan on the road west of Waypoint Ruins.  A group of three can be easily farmed in Kingsrealm Ruins near the Road to the Manor site of grace. Turning around from where Iji's workstation is, they are just beyond the gate that was formerly an Illusory Wall.

1005A550.name: Aristocrat Headband
1005A550.hint: Rare chance to drop from Noble Sorcerers, seen in larger groups of Wandering Noble enemies that wander the roads of most areas.  A group of three can be easily farmed in Kingsrealm Ruins near the Road to the Manor site of grace. Turning around from where Iji's workstation is, they are just beyond the gate that was formerly an Illusory Wall.

1019F1CC.name: Godrick Soldier Greaves
1019F1CC.hint: Gatefront Ruins, dropped by Godrick Soldier patrolling the outpost

1005A5B4.name: Aristocrat Garb
1005A5B4.hint: Dropped by Noble Sorcerers seen in larger groups of Wandering Noble enemies that wander the roads of most areas.  An early spot to farm them is the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan on the road west of Waypoint Ruins.  A group of three can be easily farmed in Kingsrealm Ruins near the Road to the Manor site of grace. Turning around from where Iji's workstation is, they are just beyond the gate that was formerly an Illusory Wall.

8000EA60.name: Ash of War: Determination
8000EA60.hint: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab on the path at the bridge north of Agheel Lake. Elden Ring.

01F78A40.name: Glintstone Staff
01F78A40.hint: Starting Equipment for the Prisoner Class  Has a chance to be dropped by Noble Sorcerers at Caria Manor.  Drops from a lone Noble Sorcerer, south of the Waypoint Ruins (and west of a small collection of graves). Behind the large broken tower ruin where the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan starts it's journey. (map co-ordinates are:  -194.50781 : 113.69531 )  Early game, you can farm for this on the noble sorcerers Northeast of the Agheel Lake South grace in southern Limgrave. From where you enter Limgrave, head Southeast and look for some stones you can use as steps to drop down without dying, they'll be close to the border of the lake. Cut around the bottom of the lake, avoiding the patrolling mercenary, and then cut Southeast across the field toward the road. You should see a the Agheel Lake South grace point on a little shelf below the road. From the grace, there are at least 4 noble sorcerers nearby, but 2 are easy to reach. Wait for the mercenary patrolling the road to ride by, then head across the road and left until you're climbing the slope. One sorcerer & retinue will be coming down this slope from the camp above. After killing them, turn around, and there is another sorcerer & retinue traveling down the road. You may want to wait for the mercenary to pass again, because he takes actual effort to fight (whereas the sorcerers have bad eyesight and go down quickly). Once you've killed and looted both groups, head back to the grace to rest, because it's a rare enough drop that it'll probably take you many resets to get.

1019F168.name: Godrick Soldier Gauntlets
1019F168.hint: Gatefront Ruins, dropped by Godrick Soldiers patrolling the outpost

1019F104.name: Tree-and-Beast Surcoat
1019F104.hint: Gatefront Ruins, dropped by Godrick Soldiers patrolling the outpost.

1019F0A0.name: Godrick Soldier Helm
1019F0A0.hint: Gatefront Ruins, dropped by Godrick Soldiers patrolling the outpost.

1005F49C.name: Old Aristocrat Shoes
1005F49C.hint: All pieces of the Old Aristocrat Set are dropped by the Old Noble enemies, often found within larger groups of Wandering Nobles wandering the roads of most areas. The banner they hold makes them easily distinguishable from other Wandering Nobles.  There are two Old Nobles within the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan north of the Agheel Lake South site of grace.

1005F3D4.name: Old Aristocrat Gown
1005F3D4.hint: All pieces of the Old Aristocrat Set are dropped by the Old Noble enemies, often found within larger groups of Wandering Nobles wandering the roads of most areas. The banner they hold makes them easily distinguishable from other Wandering Nobles.  There are two Old Nobles within the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan north of the Agheel Lake South site of grace.  Altus Plateau - There are Old Nobles to the left of Goldmask's Bridge.

1005CCC4.name: Aristocrat Coat
1005CCC4.hint: The Aristocrat Coat drops from Soldier Nobles that can be found wandering the roads of most areas.       Four Soldier Nobles can be found among the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan to the west of Waypoint Ruins, north of the Lake Agheel South site of grace.    A Soldier Noble can be found northwest of the Debate Parlor Site of Grace, guarding the stairs up to two Glintstone Sorcerers.

1010EFF0.name: Octopus Head
1010EFF0.hint: The Octopus Head Helm can be obtained by killing Land Octopuses (Not to be confused with Giant Land Octopuses).        Twelve Land Octopuses can be found South of Saintsbridge Site of Grace , in a small lake close to Iron Fist Alexander's first encounter.      A few Land Octopuses can be found South-West of the Temple Quarter Site of Grace in Liurnia of the Lakes.     North of the Siofra River Bank Site of Grace, near the large pillar on the map, there are several Giant Land Octopuses, and many of the smaller Land Octopuses.

1005F370.name: Old Aristocrat Cowl
1005F370.hint: All pieces of the Old Aristocrat Set are dropped by the Old Noble enemies, often found within larger groups of Wandering Nobles wandering the roads of most areas. The banner they hold makes them easily distinguishable from other Wandering Nobles.   Church of Vows - Three Old Nobles can be found close to the Site of Grace; one to the north, two to the east.  Agheel Lake South - Head north from the Site of Grace. There is one Old Noble on the path, and two more further north, with the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan.  Altus Plateau - One Old Noble can be found very close by the Rampartside Path Site of Grace.

1005CC60.name: Aristocrat Hat
1005CC60.hint: The Aristocrat Hat drops from Soldier Nobles that can be found wandering the roads of most areas.       Four Soldier Nobles can be found among the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan to the west of Waypoint Ruins, north of the Lake Agheel South site of grace.     A Soldier Noble can be found northwest of the Debate Parlor Site of Grace in Raya Lucaria Academy, guarding the stairs up to two Glintstone Sorcerers.

80002A94.name: Ash of War: Repeating Thrust
80002A94.hint: Dropped by the Night's Cavalry roaming the bridge near Agheel Lake North at night. Elden Ring.

800051A4.name: Ash of War: Gravitas
800051A4.hint: Looted from a Lesser Alabaster Lord that uses the skill as one of its attacks when it fights. You can find the enemy roaming by the beach side at the stone arch that has a bonfire near the Seaside Ruins Site of Grace in south of Limgrave. From the site of grace, simply jump all the way to the beachside using your mount and defeat the enemy. Elden Ring.

01D9C910.name: Sun Realm Shield
01D9C910.hint: Drops from Skeletal Swordsmen.  A good place to farm this is to head a short way east from Hermit Merchant's Shack in Altus Plateau, a Sword & Shield skeleton will crawl out of the ground.  2 Skeletons spawn on the road between Saintsbridge and Summonwater Village Outskirts Graces.  Another good place to farm is the Church of the Plague in Caelid. There's seven of them that spawn close to each other. Head north for 3 in the graveyard, then north to the arched root for 2 more, then north to another arched for another 2.

012211D0.name: Grave Scythe
012211D0.hint: Dropped from Skeleton Mages around the game world.       Three of them can be found at the Graveyard west from the Lake-Facing Cliffs site

80002C88.name: Ash of War: Unsheathe
80002C88.hint: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the water in the South East portion of Agheel Lake, North West of the Agheel Lake South Site of Grace. Elden Ring.

002206F0.name: Noble's Slender Sword
002206F0.hint: Dropped by Wandering Nobles around Limgrave.       Can be farmed from the group of Wandering Nobles among the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan to the west of Waypoint Ruins, north of Agheel Lake South Site of Grace.      Dropped by Wandering Nobles in Raya Lucaria Academy.       Can be farmed from the large group of nobles that appear to the north of the Debate Parlor Site of Grace in Raya Lucaria Academy. Leave the boss room and go up the stairs into a large courtyard. To the left there are two nobles picking weeds, and many more up the stairs near them, in front of two Glintstone Sorcerers. Each Wandering Noble has a chance to drop the sword.      Dropped by Wandering Nobles in Caelid, in the graveyard directly south of the Caelid Highway South Site of Grace.  Go to the Church of Pilgrimage site of grace and move down the road leading to the church. There's a noble with this sword amongthe other nobles that can be farmed.

01DD4B80.name: Beast Crest Heater Shield
01DD4B80.hint: Inside a chest at a camp along the road west of the Saintsbridge site of grace in east Stormhill, protected by Godrick Foot Soldiers, Godrick Soldiers, and a Godrick Knight.

004D35A0.name: Noble's Estoc
004D35A0.hint: Dropped by Wandering Nobles in Limgrave, Raya Lucaria Academy and Altus Plateau, who wear feathered caps and coats.       Four can be found among the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan to the west of Waypoint Ruins and Waypoint Ruins Cellar Site of Grace.    One can be found northwest of the Debate Parlor Site of Grace, guarding the stairs up to two Glintstone Sorcerers.    One can be found immediately south of the Rampartside Path Site of Grace, digging by the cliffside.

006B6C00.name: Bandit's Curved Sword
006B6C00.hint: Bandit's Curved Sword can be dropped by the Skeletal Bandits in Limgrave & Altus Plateau       One of these Skeletal Bandits can be farmed easily just next to the Church of Pilgrimage Site of Grace    Dropped by a Skeletal Bandit just next to the Hermit Merchant Shack Site of Grace      Get the Sacred Blade Ash of War from the Third Church of Marika, put it on any weapon, and the skill one shots the skeleton at the Church of Pilgrimage. Easy farming even at the lowest levels.

005BDBA0.name: Great Epee
005BDBA0.hint: Go due east from the Agheel Lake South site of grace, and up the hill with gravestones. It's in a chest near two Kaiden Sellswords. It's next to the green and yellow banner, in front of the right most yellow canopy tent.

001F20C0.name: Lordsworn's Straight Sword
001F20C0.hint: May be dropped by Godrick Soldier in Gatefront Ruins.  Can be dropped by the headless, undead Soldier at Fourth Church of Marika.  The earliest and easiest grinding spot for this is the Gatefront Ruins, not just for this sword, but all of the weapons that the soldiers use excluding their spear.

00A87500.name: Warpick
00A87500.hint: Godrick Soldiers wielding a Warpick have a chance to drop this item.       two can be found hiding in bushes by the last enemy up the hill west from the gatefront site of grace    another three can be found at the Gatefront Ruins      Mausoleum Soldiers wielding a Warpick have a chance to drop this item.

01ECDBE0.name: Lordsworn's Shield
01ECDBE0.hint: Drops from Godrick Soldiers wielding it at Gatefront Ruins.

01DB0190.name: Brass Shield
01DB0190.hint: Dropped by Godrick Soldiers seen to be carrying it. (In 231 kills, 2 dropped. Approx. 0.8%)  Dropped by Raya Lucaria Soldiers seen to be carrying it.  An easy early location to farm begins at the “Gatefront” Site of Grace in the western part of main Limgrave, just north of the forest and just before Stormgate. Once you spawn in, turn around to face south east. There will be four Brass Shield carrying Godrick Soldiers in the Gatefront Ruins area that should be relatively easy to farm. Two are in a small fenced in area to the right of the road. One is on the road, carrying a horn. The last one is sitting next to a fire nearby.   Nearly all the Raya Lucaria Soldiers who are gathered outside Raya Lucaria Academy are carrying one, making it a good place to farm for it if you missed getting it earlier.

40002134.name: Crafting Kit
40002134.hint: Can be purchased from Merchant Kalé for  300 Runes. Kalé is located in: Limgrave, Church of Elleh.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Kale's Bell Bearing

40002208.name: Note: Waypoint Ruins
40002208.hint: You can buy Note (Waypoint Ruins) at the Merchant located in Church of Elleh.Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Kale's Bell Bearing

40002346.name: Finger Snap
40002346.hint: Given by Merchant Kale when asked about the howling at Mistwood Ruins

40002454.name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [1]
40002454.hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [1]  Can be purchased from Merchant Kalé for 500 Runes. Kalé is located in: Limgrave, Church of Elleh.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Kale's Bell Bearing.

40002491.name: Missionary's Cookbook [1]
40002491.hint: Can be purchased from Merchant Kalé for 1000 Runes. Kalé is located in: Limgrave, Church of Elleh.  Can be found at Church of Elleh  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Kale's Bell Bearing

1010C944.name: Chain Armor
1010C944.hint: Can be found at Church of Elleh, purchased from Merchant Kalé. It costs 1500 Runes.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Kale's Bell Bearing

4000245F.name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [2]
4000245F.hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [2]  Can be purchased from Merchant Kalé for 500 Runes. Kalé is located in: Limgrave, Church of Elleh.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Kale's Bell Bearing

1010C9A8.name: Gauntlets
1010C9A8.hint: Can be found at Church of Elleh, purchased from Merchant Kalé. It costs  1000 Runes.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Kale's Bell Bearing

1010CA0C.name: Chain Leggings
1010CA0C.hint: Can be found at Church of Elleh, purchased from Merchant Kalé. It costs  1000 Runes.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Kale's Bell Bearing

400021FE.name: Note: Flask of Wondrous Physick
400021FE.hint: You can buy Note: Flask of Wondrous Physick from the Merchant at Church of Elleh.  Found at the Third Church of Marika Site of Grace along Flask of Wondrous Physickk.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Kale's Bell Bearing

016E3600.name: Torch
016E3600.hint: Can be purchased from Kale in the Church of Elleh for  200 Runes.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Kale's Bell Bearing

1010C8E0.name: Chain Coif
1010C8E0.hint: Can be found at Church of Elleh, purchased from Merchant Kalé. It costs 1000 Runes.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Kale's Bell Bearing

40038A40.name: Lone Wolf Ashes
40038A40.hint: Given to players by Renna at the Church of Elleh in Limgrave. Return to the Church after getting the ability to summon your Spectral Steed Whistle from Melina. You will find Renna sitting by the ruins of the church.  If the player missed the opportunity of encountering Renna at the Church of Elleh in Limgrave, the Lone Wolf Ashes and the  Spirit Calling Bell can be purchased from the Twin Maiden Husks in the Roundtable Hold.

400007F8.name: Telescope
400007F8.hint: Can be purchased from Merchant Kalé for 500 Runes. Kalé is located in: Limgrave, Church of Elleh.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Kale's Bell Bearing.

40001FDE.name: Spirit Calling Bell
40001FDE.hint: Given to players by Renna at the Church of Elleh in Limgrave. Return to the church after acquiring the ability to summon your Spectral Steed Whistle from Melina. You will find Renna sitting by the ruins at night time.  If you do not get the Spirit Calling Bell from Renna, she will eventually stop appearing at the Church of Elleh. However, you can try waiting until nightfall at the Church, then open the map and Travel to Stormhill Shack then Travel back and then she should be there again. Otherwise, you can buy the bell for 100 runes, as well as the Lone Wolf Ashes from the Twin Maiden Husks in the Roundtable Hold.

01DC8830.name: Large Leather Shield
01DC8830.hint: Starting Equipment piece for the Hero Class.  Purchase from Merchant Kale for 600 Runes at the Church of Elleh in Limgrave.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Kale's Bell Bearing

0113E100.name: Golden Halberd
0113E100.hint: Drops from the Tree Sentinel in Limgrave.

40002205.name: Note: Land Squirts
40002205.hint: Sold by the Nomadic Merchant West Limgrave for  200 Runes.

40002469.name: Armorer's Cookbook [2]
40002469.hint: Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant for  600 Runes. He is located south-east of Coastal Cave.

400021FF.name: Note: Stonedigger Trolls
400021FF.hint: Sold by the Nomadic Merchant West Limgrave for  400 Runes.

40001FE1.name: Sewing Needle
40001FE1.hint: Dropped by Demi-Human Chief, located in Coastal Cave, western Limgrave.

1009770C.name: Prophet Trousers
1009770C.hint: Starting Equipment for the Prophet Class.  Can be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for  1,000 Runes.

40001FE3.name: Tailoring Tools
40001FE3.hint: Obtained by defeating the Demi-Human Chief boss. This boss can be found in the Coastal Cave in western Limgrave.

02625A00.name: Shortbow
02625A00.hint: Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class  Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant for 600 Runes. He is located south-east of Coastal Cave.  Chance to drop from bow-wielding Marionette Soldiers

01CB9840.name: Iron Roundshield
01CB9840.hint: Starting equipment for the Bloody Wolf Class  Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant for  900 Runes. He is located south-east of Coastal Cave. .

01CA38B0.name: Rickety Shield
01CA38B0.hint: Starting equipment for the Prophet class.  Dropped by Demi-Humans that wield it.

006ACFC0.name: Falchion
006ACFC0.hint: Potential drop from falchion-wielding Demi-Humans.       A good spot to farm is under the large ruin, below where Kenneth Haight can first be found, just north of the Mistwood Outskirts Grace.

00A7FFD0.name: Club
00A7FFD0.hint: Default starting equipment for the Wretch  Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant for  600 Runes. He is located south-east of Coastal Cave.  Drops from Demi-Humans.

001ED2A0.name: Broadsword
001ED2A0.hint: Starting Equipment for the Confessor Class  Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant for  1800 Runes. He is located south-east of Coastal Cave.

00A8EA30.name: Spiked Club
00A8EA30.hint: The Spiked Club weapon can be found at the following location:.  Drops from large Demi-Humans that wield it  Can be farmed from the large Demi-Human right outside the entrance of Volcano Cave.  Also drops from the large Demi-Human just below the ledge at the beginning of Coastal Cave.

200013BA.name: Assassin's Crimson Dagger
200013BA.hint: Can be found inside the Deathtouched Catacombs, dropped by the Black Knife Assassin.

8000EB8C.name: Ash of War: Golden Vow
8000EB8C.hint: Limgrave: dropped by a mounted Godrick Knight on the cliff southwest above the Deathtouched Catacombs when defeated. He's at the east side hill of the Limgrave colosseum.

02719C40.name: Longbow
02719C40.hint: Starting equipment for the Samurai Class  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold for  1200 Runes.  Can be dropped by Skeletal Archers in catacombs or dungeons.

00895440.name: Uchigatana
00895440.hint: Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class.  It can be found inside the Deathtouched Catacombs in Stormhill, Limgrave. You need to turn the lever down in order to unlock the door of one of the previous halls. You will find the Uchigatana on a dead body hanging over the edge of the platform.

006CF2A0.name: Scimitar
006CF2A0.hint: Starting Equipment for the Warrior Class  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold for  600 Runes.  Can be dropped by Scimitar-wielding Skeletons found in various dungeons such as Deathtouched Catacombs.

01CAFC00.name: Scripture Wooden Shield
01CAFC00.hint: The Scripture Wooden Shield Shield can be found at the following location  Starting Equipment for the Astrologer Class.  Dropped by Skeletons who wield it or who wield an Iron Roundshield. They will be holding a Scimitar in their other hand.       2 of them can be found at the start of Auriza Hero's Grave, in the first safe spot on the right while going down the first slope.    2 can be found at the beginning of Deathtouched Catacombs, 1 before the first set of stairs and 1 afterward around the corner. (Note: The skeleton model holds an Iron Roundshield, but will drop the Scripture Wooden Shield.)

010450A0.name: Lance
010450A0.hint: On top of the northwestern ruin structure in a camp with Foot Soldiers, Godrick Soldiers, and a Godrick Knight, located southwest of the Deathtouched Catacombs. Jump off the nearby cliff to reach the top.

101CFDE0.name: Ash-of-War Scarab
101CFDE0.hint: The Ash-of-War Scarab Helm can be found at Stormveil Castle: Behind the waygate on the Limgrave Tower Bridge that takes you to the Divine Tower of Limgrave on a broken section of the bridge. Do not take the waygate after the golems, and instead drop down behind it to access this item and a Soft Cotton.

101D01C8.name: Incantation Scarab
101D01C8.hint: Need to examine the Homing Instinct Painting at Artist's Shack first. The Incantation Scarab can be found Southwest of the Dragon-Burnt Ruins, there will be a gravestone with a ghost sitting in front of it. Interact with the ghost, and it will drop the Incantation Scarab.

00989680.name: Twinblade
00989680.hint: Is inside a chest, in the underground cellar, surrounded by four intact walls, just entering Dragon-Burnt Ruins. (Not the one with the rats. The one whose entrance is in the southeast building, which you can get inside using Torrent.).

007A8730.name: Bloodhound's Fang
007A8730.hint: Dropped by the Bloodhound Knight Darriwil, in Limgrave.

00B71B00.name: Large Club
00B71B00.hint: On the lowest cliff south of the Forlorn Hound Evergaol, near a spiritspring.

40002456.name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [6]
40002456.hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [6]  Located in Fort Haight, can be looted from the dead body in the room at the top of the main stone stairs.

40002470.name: Armorer's Cookbook [3]
40002470.hint: Where to find Armorer's Cookbook [3]  Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant in East Limgrave for  2000 Runes.

400024A7.name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [5]
400024A7.hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [5]  Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant in East Limgrave, the Mistwood for  1500 Runes.

80004FB0.name: Ash of War: Bloody Slash
80004FB0.hint: Dropped by a Godrick Knight fought at the top of the ramparts of Fort Haight. Elden Ring.

1006B6C0.name: Pumpkin Helm
1006B6C0.hint: Saintsbridge, Limgrave   Fort Haight   Castle Morne  Raya Lucaria Academy  Redmane Castle  Altus Plateau - By a grave marker overlooking the cliffs northeast of the Bridge of Iniquity Site of Grace.  Mt Gelmir, east of First Mt. Gelmir Campsite and south of Corpse-Stench Shack.

00D5EDA0.name: Hand Axe
00D5EDA0.hint: Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant in East Limgrave for  600 Runes.

01CB2310.name: Riveted Wooden Shield
01CB2310.hint: The Riveted Wooden Shield Shield can be found at the following location  A starting equipment piece for the Warrior Class  Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant in East Limgrave for  600 Runes.

01DA8C60.name: Blue-Gold Kite Shield
01DA8C60.hint: Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant in East Limgrave for  1000 Runes.

20000410.name: Erdtree's Favor
20000410.hint: Base talisman:  Fringefolk Hero's Grave: To get there, use two Stonesword Keys on the double Imp Keystone next to the Stranded Graveyard Site of Grace. This will lead to a mini-dungeon with traps. Head down until you see the path narrow on both sides and drop drown at the edge to get access to the secret area. Proceed past the imps and a fire trap to find the item resting at an altar. Two Grafted Scions wait hanging above, so be sure to avoid them when they land and grab it really quickly.  +1 Variant: Subterranean Shunning-Grounds: Can be found in a chest, in the boss room after the boss fight with Mohg, the Omen. You do not have to defeat Mohg to loot the chest. You can acquire this mid-fight.Video Location  +2 Variant: Leyndell, Ashen Capital: Found on top of a branch jutting out of the ground in a large courtyard, guarded by three Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirits. Fast travel to the Forbidden Lands Site of Grace, and take the elevator back up to the city. Exit the west door, then fight past a knight and few soldiers, and continue down the stairs, then take the large wooden elevator down. You will arrive at a landing overlooking the courtyard, where the beasts and this talisman is located. You can avoid the beasts by hugging the left wall.  Video Location

40031128.name: Banished Knight Oleg Ashes
40031128.hint: In Fringefolk Hero's Grave: To get there, use 2 Stonesword Keys on the double Imp Keystone next to the Stranded Graveyard  Site of Grace. This will lead to a mini dungeon with traps. You will need to avoid a crusher by walking into side alcoves as you descend. There will also be ghost swordsmen and archers.  At the end of this, you will fight an Ulcerated Tree Spirit boss. The boss will drop this spirit summon and a Golden Seed.

029020C0.name: Soldier's Crossbow
029020C0.hint: The Soldier's Crossbow weapon can be found at the following location:   Drops from Foot Soldiers that wield them.  Drops from Exile Soldiers that wield them.  In Limgrave, the best place to farm this is directly east of the Deathtouched Catacombs site of grace to the crucibles, where there is a Godrick Soldier with a Lordsworn's Shield and a spear and a small group of Godrick Foot Soldiers including two with these crossbows.

028153B0.name: Erdtree Greatbow
028153B0.hint: Killing the chariot in Fringefolk Hero's Grave (requires two Stonesword Keys to access.).  Follow the path to where you get the Erdtree's Favor talisman, but walk off the edge before you reach the bridge, there is a platform there, then jump off again. You'll find some stairs that lead to an elevator, take the elevator up. Be careful of the dragon knight shade on the far left. once he's dealt with, go to where he was, and look to the right, there are 3 large pots suspended by 3 ropes on the ceiling. In order to get the bow, you have to kill the chariot by dropping one of the pots on it as it rolls by. I used the longbow, and timed it by 1 Mississippi after it makes contact with the wall closest to you.

101BEC70.name: Foot Soldier Cap
101BEC70.hint: Dropped by Godrick Foot Soldiers found throughout Limgrave.

00D5C690.name: Forked Hatchet
00D5C690.hint: Dropped by Imps using this weapon.

02080500.name: Dragon Communion Seal
02080500.hint: Can be found at Fringefolk Hero's Grave, right under the beginning of the game. To get there, use two Stonesword Keys on the double Imp Keystone next to the Stranded Graveyard Site of Grace, and progress down the tunnel with the mechanized chariot until the path splits and you can go either up or down. Go up until you reach the end of the tunnel, and inside the small room is a Banished Knight that once killed will give you the item.

101BECD4.name: Chain-Draped Tabard
101BECD4.hint: There's a chance for it to drop from Godrick Foot Soldiers.  Some areas where you can find groups of Godrick Foot Soldiers are:       Near Tower of Return, Weeping Peninsula.    Throughout Limgrave.

10108A60.name: Imp Head (Wolf)
10108A60.hint: Drops from Forked Greatsword wielding Wolf-Headed Imps in Catacombs  Minor Erdtree Catacombs: Body laying over a sarcophagus. A quick way to reach it is taking the lift at the beginning of the dungeon down, sending it back up, then dropping down into the room below. From there, head down the rot filled hallway and take the first right. Go straight and in the next room climb up the ladder on the right. The body with the helmet will be straight ahead at the end of the hallway.

000F4240.name: Dagger
000F4240.hint: Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold for  400 Runes.   Can be dropped by Highwaymen and different types of Foot Soldiers.       Multiple soldiers can be encountered early in the game at the camp east of Warmaster's Shack.

10107AC0.name: Imp Head (Cat)
10107AC0.hint: Rare drop from Imps.  Farming: from the Impaler's Catacombs site of grace, run to the imp at the bottom of the stairs, and after killing this one, run back up and kill the one near the top which is now done climbing; you are close to the grace again.

20000834.name: Arrow's Reach Talisman
20000834.hint: From the Stormhill Shack Site of Grace in Limgrave, travel southeast to Stormhill Evergaol. There's a tower nearby, toward the north-east. Dispatch the guards inside, enter the doorway, and open the chest on the left side of the room for the talisman.

40002198.name: Map (Limgrave, West)
40002198.hint: Looted from a pillar in Gatefront Ruins, just south from Stormgate. Elden Ring.

101B02D8.name: Godrick Knight Gauntlets

4000218E.name: Whetstone Knife
4000218E.hint: Found in the southeastern area of Gatefront Ruins. There is a set of stairs leading to a small room underground where a treasure chest can be found. Inside the chest is the Whetstone Knife and Ash of War: Storm Stomp.

8000C418.name: Ash of War: Storm Stomp
8000C418.hint: Found in the southeastern area of Gatefront Ruins. There is a set of stairs that leads to a small room underground where a treasure chest can be found. Inside the chest is the Ash of War: Storm Stomp and Whetstone Knife key item. Elden Ring.

1019F104.name: Tree-and-Beast Surcoat
1019F104.hint: Gatefront Ruins, dropped by Godrick Soldiers patrolling the outpost.

101B0274.name: Godrick Knight Armor

101B033C.name: Godrick Knight Greaves

1019F0A0.name: Godrick Soldier Helm

101B0210.name: Godrick Knight Helm
101B0210.hint: Gatefront Ruins: Dropped by the heavy Godrick Knight patrolling the outpost.  Fort Haight: Chance to drop from the Godrick Knight atop the fort walls.

002E3BF0.name: Lordsworn's Greatsword
002E3BF0.hint: The Lordsworn's Greatsword can be looted from a chest in the back of a Carriage, located along the western road leading out of Gatefront Ruins.

00C68450.name: Flail
00C68450.hint: It can be found in a chest in the back of the eastern Carriage, defended by a group of soldiers, near the Gatefront Ruins.  Dropped by Brother Corhyn, along with his Corhyn's Bell Bearing, and Corhyn's Robe, after finding him in Leyndell, Ashen Capital at the end of Goldmask's questline. Exhaust his dialogue, reload the area, and the items are found where he once was.       If you offered Corhyn the Tonic of Forgetfulness at the bridge near the Stargazer's Ruins, he will still be there after reaching Ashen Leyndell. Reload the area and collect the items from where he once was.    If you've entered Crumbling Farum Azula without solving the Law of Regression puzzle of Goldmask's questline, these items are found wherever you've last found Corhyn, be it in the Roundtable Hold or in Altus Plateau.    These items are also obtained by killing Corhyn.

001F20C0.name: Lordsworn's Straight Sword
001F20C0.hint: May be dropped by Godrick Soldier in Gatefront Ruins.  Can be dropped by the headless, undead Soldier at Fourth Church of Marika.  The earliest and easiest grinding spot for this is the Gatefront Ruins, not just for this sword, but all of the weapons that the soldiers use excluding their spear.

00A87500.name: Warpick
00A87500.hint: Godrick Soldiers wielding a Warpick have a chance to drop this item.       two can be found hiding in bushes by the last enemy up the hill west from the gatefront site of grace    another three can be found at the Gatefront Ruins      Mausoleum Soldiers wielding a Warpick have a chance to drop this item.

01EC66B0.name: Gilded Greatshield
01EC66B0.hint: Drops from the Godrick Knights who wield it. One is at the Gatefront Ruins.

002E6300.name: Knight's Greatsword
002E6300.hint: Dropped by most enemies in the knight archetype such as:       Godrick Knights (throughout Limgrave)    Cuckoo Knights (throughout Liurnia of the Lakes)    Mausoleum Knight    Leyndell Knights (throughout the Altus Plateau, especially in Leyndell, Royal Capital)      An easy-to-farm spectral knight that drops this weapon can be found just outside the Black Knife Catacombs in Liurnia of the Lakes.  Sell Value:   200  Base drop rate is 4% (at 100 Discovery)  Other notes and player tips go here

01ECDBE0.name: Lordsworn's Shield
01ECDBE0.hint: Drops from Godrick Soldiers wielding it at Gatefront Ruins.

00F4E750.name: Partisan
00F4E750.hint: Dropped by the heavy Godrick Knight in Fort Haight.       Very low drop rate, but it is a confirmed drop.      Dropped by the Redmane Knight in Fort Gael.  Dropped by Cuckoo Knights by East Raya Lucaria Gate  Dropped by Leyndell Knights in Leyndell, Royal Capital  Dropped by Mausoleum Knights on horseback in Deeproot Depths

01DB0190.name: Brass Shield
01DB0190.hint: Dropped by Godrick Soldiers seen to be carrying it. (In 231 kills, 2 dropped. Approx. 0.8%)  Dropped by Raya Lucaria Soldiers seen to be carrying it.  An easy early location to farm begins at the “Gatefront” Site of Grace in the western part of main Limgrave, just north of the forest and just before Stormgate. Once you spawn in, turn around to face south east. There will be four Brass Shield carrying Godrick Soldiers in the Gatefront Ruins area that should be relatively easy to farm. Two are in a small fenced in area to the right of the road. One is on the road, carrying a horn. The last one is sitting next to a fire nearby.   Nearly all the Raya Lucaria Soldiers who are gathered outside Raya Lucaria Academy are carrying one, making it a good place to farm for it if you missed getting it earlier.

20000FB4.name: Flamedrake Talisman
20000FB4.hint: Base talisman: Dropped by the Beastman of Farum Azula in Groveside Cave in Limgrave.  +1 Variation: Found at Leyndell Royal Capital, head up the elevator leading towards the Grand Lift of Rold, on the ground against a column.  +2 Variation: Dropped by the Beastman of Farum Azula in Dragonbarrow Cave in eastern Dragonbarrow.

006B44F0.name: Shamshir
006B44F0.hint: On a body located at the bottom of Highroad Cave, on a platform after the waterfall section, being feasted on by Giant Bats.

2000083E.name: Blue Dancer Charm
2000083E.hint: Dropped by the Guardian Golem boss in the Highroad Cave.

2000088E.name: Roar Medallion
2000088E.hint: Dropped by the Stonedigger Troll, located in the Limgrave Tunnels. He is found at the end of the dungeon.

00B93DE0.name: Pickaxe
00B93DE0.hint: Dropped by Miners  Fastest farming route is going to the Limgrave Tunnels, go to the second tunnel that leads to boss that's behind the first elevator shaft. There's a Stakes of Marika nearby. Kill the five Miners in the tunnel then jump down the elevator shaft and die. Respawn at the Stake to reset the Miners. Rinse and repeat. Make sure you pick up your runes between each suicide.

40002AF9.name: Greenspill Crystal Tear
40002AF9.hint: Mistwood: Found on an altar next to the Minor Erdtree in Mistwood along with the Spiked Cracked Tear.

8000C5A8.name: Ash of War: Ground Slam

40002B06.name: Spiked Cracked Tear
40002B06.hint: Found on an altar next to the Minor Erdtree in Mistwood along with the Greenspill Crystal Tear.

400024A4.name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [4]

40002472.name: Armorer's Cookbook [6]

40000898.name: Prattling Pate Hello

02810590.name: Golem Greatbow
02810590.hint: The Golem Greatbow has a chance to drop from any Golem archer. The Golem Greatbow does not drop from Golems with halberds.  One can be found on the Limgrave Tower Bridge in Stormhill, which can be accessed from Stormveil Castle. Two halberd Golems are also found on the bridge.  Two can be found on the path towards the colosseum in Caelid. This location is only accessible via a lift in the Siofra River that takes the player to the Deep Siofra Well.       These two Golem archers fire magic-imbued explosive arrows and are also the only source of Golem's Magic Arrow.      One can be found next to the top of the Grand Lift of Dectus, in the Altus Plateau. It is accompanied by a single halberd Golem.       If the Grand Lift of Dectus is activated after finding both halves of the Dectus Medallion, the Golems guarding the lift will be non-hostile until the the player initiates combat. (needs confirmation, not sure if the game checks for possession of the medallion or usage of the lift)       One can be found outside the entrance of Castle Morne, at the southern tip of the Weeping Peninsula.  Two can be found in the north-eastern section of the Capital Outskirts, on the hill approaching the northern entrance to Leyndell Royal Capital (Legacy Dungeon).  One can be found in the Mountaintops of the Giants, guarding the tall and narrow path north.

80002AF8.name: Ash of War: Wild Strikes

20000884.name: Claw Talisman
20000884.hint: Located at Stormveil Castle, on a corpse situated on a watchtower.Go to the Rampart Tower Site of Grace and exit the door that leads outside.Look right, and jump down onto the rooftop where there's a destroyed pillar.Jump on the pillar, climb up it, and then jump onto the small ledge nearest it.You'll be on a platform of sorts; follow it around the edge of the building, and as you turn the corner you'll see a ladder.Reaching it will be your goal, however note that there are three enemies standing to your left waiting to ambush you from a raised platform, and a fourth "playing dead" to your right.With them defeated, climb the ladder in front of you. Upon reaching the top, you'll see several birds, and in the right corner, a corpse.Loot the corpse to receive the Claw Talisman.

20000898.name: Curved Sword Talisman
20000898.hint: By Stormveil Cliffside Site of Grace in Stormveil Castle: Go up the stairs on the side of the castle, and up to the third floor of the wine cellar. Enter the door on the eastern wall to find a dark room with a Banished Knight, as well as a chest with this talisman.

40001388.name: Rancorcall
