40002457.name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [10]
40002457.hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [10]  On a dead body in Stormveil Castle.       From Rampart Tower (Site of Grace), head out the north door. Jump to the roof immediately visible to the east. (This likely requires a running start).    Head east across the rooftop, and at the fallen column, jump over the wall and onto the roof to the east.    Turn left from the roof and follow the right ledge, then jump down to next walkway, and down again the level with the 2 enemies (optional combat) standing facing away from you..    Proceed north and cross the bridge. The recipe is on the corpse directly ahead, hunched over a platform and guarded by 2 weak enemies.    Video Location

40002459.name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [7]
40002459.hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [7]It's found at the very edge of the collapsed bridge next of Stormveil Castle, crossing it from Stormhill. Held by a dead man sitting there. There's no big risk to fall as there is ground below and the fall is non-lethal.

4000234C.name: Dozing Cross-Legged
4000234C.hint: Obtained by interacting with a corpse on a roof in Stormveil Castle near the Rampart Tower site of grace Video Location

10030E6C.name: Banished Knight Greaves
10030E6C.hint: Location: Stormveil Castle  Chance for it to be looted off the Banished Knight enemies that you've killed.  Dropped from the wandering Banished Knight at Cathedral of Dragon Communion

029020C0.name: Soldier's Crossbow
029020C0.hint: The Soldier's Crossbow weapon can be found at the following location:   Drops from Foot Soldiers that wield them.  Drops from Exile Soldiers that wield them.  In Limgrave, the best place to farm this is directly east of the Deathtouched Catacombs site of grace to the crucibles, where there is a Godrick Soldier with a Lordsworn's Shield and a spear and a small group of Godrick Foot Soldiers including two with these crossbows.

4000230A.name: Iron Whetblade
4000230A.hint: Location: Stormveil Castle. See it on the Elden Ring.  Can be looted off a corpse that can be found in the large armory room, through the north-western door in the hall with the Grafted Scion.       You will need to use the Stonesword Key on the imp statue to dispel the white fog that's blocking the doorway.      Video Location

100E3198.name: Bandit Manchettes
100E3198.hint: Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class  Gatekeeper Gostoc will sell it after entering Stormveil Castle, but before killing Godrick the Grafted. After that, you will have to kill him for his Bell Bearing.   Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after offering Gostoc's Bell Bearing

10030E08.name: Banished Knight Gauntlets
10030E08.hint: Dropped from the Banished Knights in Stormveil Castle.  Dropped from the wandering Banished Knight at Cathedral of Dragon Communion

02915940.name: Arbalest
02915940.hint: In Stormveil Castle, On a rampart past the courtyard filled with Exile Soldiers. Once underneath the gate (which the Arbalest is on), run up the left rocky outcrop, jump across the gap and head right to the rampart.   Video Location

100E31FC.name: Bandit Boots
100E31FC.hint: Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class  Can be purchased from Gatekeeper Gostoc, or from the Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after offering Gostoc's Bell Bearing

100C5D3C.name: Commoner's Shoes
100C5D3C.hint: Dropped by Commoner enemies found in Stormveil Castle, Leyndell, Royal Capital, and other areas of the map.

1002E630.name: Exile Hood
1002E630.hint: Drops from Exile Soldiers.  Video Location Export

101BEC70.name: Foot Soldier Cap
101BEC70.hint: Dropped by Godrick Foot Soldiers found throughout Limgrave.

100C63E0.name: Commoner's Simple Garb
100C63E0.hint: Location: Stormveil Castle.  Located on a corpse on the balcony just outside the Gateside Chamber site of grace.

40000BE0.name: Mimic's Veil
40000BE0.hint: Location: Stormveil Castle.  Located on the second floor of the fortress of the Grafted Scion. Inside the room that looks like an assembly room, there is a Banished Knight. You'll find it inside the chest of the same room. The chest is on the podium.  The nearest checkpoint is the Rampart Tower site of grace. From this site, turn back and take the lift on the left to get back to the room we're you fought the Grafted Scion. Go across this room, take a right up the stairs. The chest will be in the next room.   Video Location for the image below,

80002FA8.name: Ash of War: Storm Assault
80002FA8.hint: Stormveil Castle: Starting from the Rampart Tower grace, exit onto the ramparts where the war hawks and explosive barrels are. At the tower on the west side where the second war hawk holding an explosive barrel is, jump up onto the battlements on the north side. There is a corpse visible with an item (Marred Wooden Shield). Jumping down to the walls beneath will allow the player to get to the shield. Jumping down further will land the player on a ledge that will collapse, causing them to fall far below into some bushes. A Silver Teardrop Scarab holds the Ash of War..

10030D40.name: Banished Knight Helm
10030D40.hint: Dropped by the wandering Banished Knight at Cathedral of Dragon Communion (Altered, Red hood), and the one standing by the cliff, to the west.

20000FBE.name: Boltdrake Talisman
20000FBE.hint: Located at Stormveil Castle.  When you reach the main castle grounds where you fight the Lion Guardian, head inside the room with the armored statues, and through the arch doorway, to reach the Limgrave Tower Bridge Site of Grace. Specifically, you'll find the on a body that you can loot, just at the top of the first set of stairs, resting against a pillar on the left side.   Boltdrake Talisman +1: This more-powerful variant of the Boltdrake Talisman can be found in a storage shed inside the Old Altus Tunnel dungeon.   Boltdrake Talisman +2: Found on a corpse hanging off an opening in a tall tower south of the Dragon Temple Rooftop Site of Grace. Reaching this area is a bit complex:       You will first need to head southeast to the large plaza guarded by a stationary Farum Azula Dragon, which is constantly raining red lightning all around the area.    From here, look northeast, then drop down a series of cliffs to the east to reach the opening at the bottom of a large building.    Follow the linear path here to a balcony with a ladder leading up to a terrace. Mind the Banished Knights patrolling the area.    Directly in front of the ladder is a lift building; to your left is a chest with the Dragon Towershield. Take the lift up to a series of slopes leading to a hallway underneath the same bridge you crossed to get to the southeast plaza.    The passage ahead has a Crucible Knight fighting a couple of Beastmen. Fight your way through the hallway (or just run past the enemies) to reach a ladder at the end.    Climb up the ladder to reach an open window where the corpse holding the talisman can be found.      Boltdrake Talisman +2 Video Location, Crumbling Farum Azula

8000558C.name: Ash of War: Carian Greatsword
8000558C.hint: Sold by Sorcerer Rogier at Stormveil Castle or the Roundtable Hold for 2,500 .  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Rogier's Bell Bearing.

1002E75C.name: Exile Greaves
1002E75C.hint: Drop from Exile Soldiers.  Video Location Example

100C5C74.name: Commoner's Garb
100C5C74.hint: Dropped by Commoner enemies found in Stormveil Castle, Leyndell, Royal Capital, and other areas of the map.

0206F390.name: Godslayer's Seal
0206F390.hint: The Godslayer's Seal weapon can be found at Stormveil Castle  Location: Stormveil Castle  Nearest Site of Grace: Rampart Tower    From the Rampart Tower grace, take the elevator down to the feasting hall where the Grafted Scion was roaming. Exit into the courtyard with all of the waiting archers. Make a hard left into a small stairway that goes underground. You'll find a room that is guarded by four Rats, and ahead is a doorway that is blocked by a white fog. To dispel the fog, you will need to use a Stonesword Key on the Imp Statue. You'll find a stockroom on the other side; the room has a treasure chest containing the seal.  Video Location

101BECD4.name: Chain-Draped Tabard
101BECD4.hint: There's a chance for it to drop from Godrick Foot Soldiers.  Some areas where you can find groups of Godrick Foot Soldiers are:       Near Tower of Return, Weeping Peninsula.    Throughout Limgrave.

000FB770.name: Miséricorde
000FB770.hint: Location: Stormveil Castle.       Can be looted off a corpse that can be found in the large armory room, next to the fortress of the Grafted Scion.    You will need to use the Stonesword Key on the imp statue to dispel the white fog that's blocking the doorway.    Video Location

100E351C.name: Bandit Garb
100E351C.hint: Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class  Gatekeeper Gostoc will sell it after entering Stormveil Castle, but before killing Godrick the Grafted.   Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after offering Gostoc's Bell Bearing.

8000300C.name: Ash of War: Stormcaller
8000300C.hint: Stormveil Castle: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the northern section of the castle, past the courtyard and just before the Secluded Cell Site of Grace.  Video Location

00222E00.name: Warhawk's Talon
00222E00.hint: Can be found in Stormveil Castle as drop by defeating Warhawks. There are four immediately out the door from the Rampart Tower grace. Video Location

40001D56.name: Aspects of the Crucible: Horns
40001D56.hint: Dropped by Crucible Knight found in Stormveil Castle directly below the Ramparts. Once you reach the walkway where the three Warhawks are located, head to the first left turn you see. It should be a dead end. Once you reach this dead end jump down, and keep heading down until you find a collapsible cliff. The Crucible Knight should be waiting for you by a ruined archway. Video Location  For players having difficulty defeating the Crucible Knight, there is a way to cheese him by using the elevator in the building behind the archway he comes from. Wait for the knight to pass by and sneak behind him towards the elevator. Step on the pressure plate and then quickly hop off. Go back to the knight and lure him towards the elevator. Walk around the shaft opening until he falls in.

200004A6.name: Prince of Death's Pustule
200004A6.hint: Can be located at Stormveil Castle.  Nearest Site of Grace: Liftside Chamber.  Looted off a corpse that can be found at the pit of the castle's crypt. The body can be found next to a giant face that is structured from roots. It is guarded by an Ulcerated Tree Spirit.

00F55C80.name: Torchpole
00F55C80.hint: Players can obtain the Torchpole by killing the Stormveil Castle courtyard guards.        One enemy dropping this weapon can be found close to Stormveil Cliffside Site of Grace, just up the wooden stairs along the wall. Although tempting, it is not recommended that you use projectile weapons/ranged attacks from the Site of Grace to kill this enemy from afar, as upon death the soldier may fall off the edge.

10030DA4.name: Banished Knight Armor
10030DA4.hint: Chance to drop from two specific spectral Banished Knights located in Castle Sol that can be seen wearing the unaltered cloaked armor.    The northern one can be easily farmed by starting from the Castle Sol Rooftop site of grace and running south to the elevator. The Banished Knight can be shot with ranged weapons from here causing it to teleport to the player. The same can be achieved by shooting an arrow through the arrow slit in the grace platform (west side), although the knight doesn't always teleport when shooting him from this spot.  The southern one can be reached from the Church of the Eclipse site of grace by exiting through the church to the left, turning right outside, and heading up the ladder to the catwalks. After following the catwalk past the exile soldier and around the small tower, the Banished Knight can be found just past the ladder leading down. It is recommended that the player jump onto the lower roof next to the catwalk and tower, and bait the red-eyed Banished Knight into teleporting onto the small wooden catwalk extension of the roof; then the player can roll or jump to the walkway the Banished Knight was just standing on. The Banished Knight will slowly walk towards the player, then fall to its death onto the ground below, saving the player a good deal of trouble. Then the player walk down the walkway and make their way over to the loot, which will be in a corner, behind a tombstone.   Dropped from all other Banished Knights. They can be found in Stormveil Castle, Cathedral of Dragon Communion, Crumbling Farum Azula, and Castle Sol.

01C9C380.name: Buckler
01C9C380.hint: Starting equipment for the Bandit Class  Sold by Gatekeeper Gostoc at Stormveil Castle for 1,500  Runes after opening the main gate.   Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after offering Gostoc's Bell Bearing

01406F40.name: Caestus
01406F40.hint: Can be purchased from Gatekeeper Gostoc after obtaining the Rusty Key or defeating Godrick the Grafted   If Gostoc was killed, it can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after offering Gostoc's Bell Bearing.

00E556F0.name: Crescent Moon Axe
00E556F0.hint: Users can get it in Stormveil Castle as drop from axe-wielding Exile Soldiers.

001F47D0.name: Weathered Straight Sword
001F47D0.hint: Dropped from Commoner enemies in any area.  Near the Secluded Cell grace in Stormveil castle, there is a room full of 10 commoners above the Living Jars that all carry the weapon. Probably the earliest (and most convenient) farming spot to get both the armor set and weapon. Takes around 20-30 seconds to navigate to the room although you won't have to worry about enemies on the way. The room can be cleared quickly (~15-20 seconds if you can one-shot them) as they are all near each other. Teleport back to the Secluded Cell grace and repeat.   Video Location

002EFF40.name: Banished Knight's Greatsword
002EFF40.hint: Chance for it to be looted off the Banished Knight enemies that you've killed.

01131DB0.name: Banished Knight's Halberd
01131DB0.hint: Location: Stormveil Castle.  Chance for it to be looted off the Banished Knight enemies that you've killed.       Farming guide available on the Banished Knight article.      Edgar the Revenger drops a Banished Knight's Halberd upgraded to +8 with the Spinning Strikes Ash of War installed, upon his defeat at Castle Morne or the Revenger's Shack.

000F4240.name: Dagger
000F4240.hint: Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold for  400 Runes.   Can be dropped by Highwaymen and different types of Foot Soldiers.       Multiple soldiers can be encountered early in the game at the camp east of Warmaster's Shack.

00D72620.name: Highland Axe
00D72620.hint: Location: Stormveil Castle. Video Location  Looted off a corpse inside the fortress of the Grafted Scion. The body can be found resting under the large painting that's at the center of the room.

00F44B10.name: Spear
00F44B10.hint: A +7 version drops from Patches in Murkwater Cave if he is killed after pleading for mercy.  Can drop from Exile Soldiers that wield it in Stormveil Castle. Near the Rampart Tower Site of Grace, up the wooden stairs is a farmable Castle Guard with a spear.

80002EE0.name: Ash of War: Spinning Weapon
80002EE0.hint: Sold by Sorcerer Rogier at Stormveil Castle or the Roundtable Hold for 1,000 . Elden Ring.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Rogier's Bell Bearing

01DD2470.name: Hawk Crest Wooden Shield
01DD2470.hint: Location: Stormveil Castle.  Can be looted off a corpse that can be found in the large armory room, next to the large room with the Grafted Scion.  You will need to use the Stonesword Key on the imp statue to dispel the white fog that's blocking the doorway.  Video Location

01EB2E30.name: Manor Towershield
01EB2E30.hint: Stormveil Castle: From the Secluded Cell site of grace, backtrack to the west and up the ramp where the Living Jars are and turn around towards the wooden platform. At the end of the platform, jump onto the ledge on the wall and follow it to the right towards some archways. Past the archways, enter the storage room on the right and head up the stairs to a walkway above. Head to the left towards a larger storage room full of Commoners. You can find the shield under the second set of stairs in this room.  Video Location

01D97AF0.name: Banished Knight's Shield
01D97AF0.hint: Chance for it to be looted off of a Banished Knight wielding one of these shields.       Farming guide available on the Banished Knight Page.

80004F4C.name: Ash of War: Glintstone Pebble
80004F4C.hint: Sold by Sorcerer Rogier at Stormveil Castle or the Roundtable Hold for 1,500 .  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Rogier's Bell Bearing.

00E508D0.name: Warped Axe
00E508D0.hint: Has a chance to drop from Omens  wielding this weapon. (4.00% chance)  Can drop from the Omen in the Cliffbottom Catacombs.  Can drop from the Omens near the "Abandoned Coffin" Site of Grace on the Altus Plateau.       An easy way to farm here is to pop a Silver-Pickled Fowl Foot and approach the first axe Omen by advancing Northeast between the coffin carriages. Clear that first mob who tries to jump on you, run back rest, and do it again as many times as you can before the Item Discovery effect wears off.      Two Omens wielding this axe can be found near the Underground Roadside Site of Grace in Subterranean Shunning-Grounds.

00BA0130.name: Brick Hammer
00BA0130.hint: Loated at Stormveil Castle.  In the Wine Cellar - Use the Rusty Key to access the ladder behind a locked wooden door to reach the top floor of the Wine Cellar. Climb the ladder and go right. Hop across the floor until you reach the outside rafters, and follow them. Found on a corpse hanging over a ledge leading back into the Wine Cellar.  Video Location

01D92CD0.name: Marred Leather Shield
01D92CD0.hint: Located at Stormveil Castle. Video Location  Take the secret back entrance that Gatekeeper Gostoc recommends. From the overlooking area where you'll find the Stormveil Cliffside Site of Grace. Head up the slope on the right and jump on the wooden path and steps that goes to the top. Just before reaching the top of the platform, you'll find another corpse, midway of the steps, that you can pillage to find this shield.

01ECB4D0.name: Wooden Greatshield
01ECB4D0.hint: Location: Stormveil Castle.  Looted off a corpse that's on the guardhouse of the heavily guarded courtyard. The nearest checkpoint is the Liftside Chamber site of grace  Video Location

007AFC60.name: Omen Cleaver
007AFC60.hint: Has a chance to drop from Omen enemies wielding it. (4.00% chance)  You can find one at the heavily guarded courtyard in Stormveil Castle. The nearest checkpoint is the Liftside Chamber site of grace.  If the dog is interfering with your farming attempts, equip Beast-Repellent Torch to deal with it.

014FB180.name: Hookclaws
014FB180.hint: Located at Stormveil Castle. Video Location  Take the secret back entrance of the castle as mentioned by Gatekeeper Gostoc.  You'll find it by looting it off a corpse found at the first level of the wine cellar. The body is resting against the left side corner of the wall.

01D953E0.name: Marred Wooden Shield
01D953E0.hint: Stormveil Castle: From the Rampart Tower site of grace, exit onto the walkway with explosive barrels and War Hawks. Kill the War Hawk sitting on the western tower and then drop down the edge onto a ledge below. Follow the ledge north and jump down to the broken pillar below to find the shield. Video Location

00F53570.name: Pike
00F53570.hint: Location: Stormveil Castle.  Can be looted off a corpse that's lying on the heavily guarded courtyard. The nearest checkpoint is the Liftside Chamber site of grace

40002331.name: Strength!
40002331.hint: Can be found on a ledge in the Stranded Graveyard, past the Soldier of Godrick boss

20000FC8.name: Haligdrake Talisman
20000FC8.hint: Travel to the Seaside Ruins Site of Grace. Walk south a short distance along the edge of the cliff (just past the crumbling archway). Look down toward the beach below and look for the windstream. Hop on Torrent and simply walk off the edge. Travel north until you see a small cave opening in the cliff face.  Travel to the The First Step Site of Grace. and make your way down the cliff to the east (should lead to an area with bats and crucifixes). Continue south east towards a bunch of crumbling pillars. Line yourself up with the pillar that is standing on the beach. Then, run or walk off of the edge of the cliff and land on a small ledge on said pillar (do not jump as you will be blocked by the ledge at the same level as the cliff). Then, safely hop down to the beach and the entrance to the cave is on the bottom of the cliff. Haligdrake Talisman +1:  Leyndell Catacombs: Found on a corpse next to a Lesser Spirit-caller Snail. From the Leyndell Catacombs site of grace, head up the elevator in the southeast to find a room with 3 spirit crossbowmen. Look under the arch next to the stairs for an illusory wall. Hit it to dispel the illusion, and then hit the wall on the left to dispel another illusion. The corpse and snail are found in here.Haligdrake Talisman +2: Looted off a body in Mohgwyn Palace, found in a small cluster of graves near a watchful Giant Crow perched up high.

40033C20.name: Skeletal Militiaman Ashes
40033C20.hint: Where to Find Skeletal Militiaman Ashes   Obtained when defeating the Tibia Mariner Field Boss in Summonwater Village.

400024CC.name: Fevor's Cookbook [1]
400024CC.hint: Found on a corpse (sitting upright) in the graveyard on a plateau southeast from Summonwater Village Outskirts Site of Grace in Limgrave. Use the horizontal gravestones directly south of Summonwater Village to descend. Alternatively, from the Mistwood Outskirts Site of of Grace go northeast and ascend to the plateau using the large piece of ruin.

2000047E.name: Green Turtle Talisman
2000047E.hint: Summonwater Village. In an underground area on the eastern outskirts of the village. Entering the area requires a Stonesword Key.

40002AFB.name: Crimson Crystal Tear (2)
40002AFB.hint: In front of the statue in Third Church of Marika.  Found on an altar guarded by enemies at the base of the Minor Erdtree in Capital Outskirts.

80004E84.name: Ash of War: Sacred Blade
80004E84.hint: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab North of the Third Church of Marika. Its location is next to a Spiritspring.

80002774.name: Ash of War: Impaling Thrust
80002774.hint: Sold by Knight Bernahl at the Warmaster's Shack for 1,000 . Elden Ring.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Bernahl's Bell Bearing

80002968.name: Ash of War: Stamp (Upward Cut)
80002968.hint: Sold by Knight Bernahl at the Warmaster's Shack for 1,500 . Elden Ring.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Bernahl's Bell Bearing.

80005208.name: Ash of War: Storm Blade
80005208.hint: Sold by Knight Bernahl at the Warmaster's Shack for 1,800 . Elden Ring.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Bernahl's Bell Bearing.

80011170.name: Ash of War: Endure
80011170.hint: Sold by Knight Bernahl at the Warmaster's Shack for 600 . Elden Ring.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Bernahl's Bell Bearing.

80013880.name: Ash of War: Quickstep
80013880.hint: Sold by Knight Bernahl at the Warmaster's Shack for 800 . Elden Ring.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Bernahl's Bell Bearing.

800050DC.name: Ash of War: Eruption
800050DC.hint: Sold by Knight Bernahl in Volcano Manor for 8000 . Elden Ring.

8000C47C.name: Ash of War: Kick
8000C47C.hint: Sold by Knight Bernahl at the Warmaster's Shack for 800 . Elden Ring.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Bernahl's Bell Bearing

8000FE4C.name: Ash of War: War Cry
8000FE4C.hint: Sold by Knight Bernahl at the Warmaster's Shack for 800 . Elden Ring.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Bernahl's Bell Bearing.

8000EB28.name: Ash of War: Assassin's Gambit
8000EB28.hint: Sold by Knight Bernahl in Volcano Manor for 6500 . Note that you will need to fulfill the first contract at Volcano Manor to have access to Knight Bernahl's shop. Elden Ring.

800078B4.name: Ash of War: No Skill
800078B4.hint: Sold by Knight Bernahl at the Warmaster's Shack for 600 . Elden Ring.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Bernahl's Bell Bearing

8000283C.name: Ash of War: Spinning Slash
8000283C.hint: Sold by Knight Bernahl at the Warmaster's Shack for 1,200 .  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold, after giving them Bernahl's Bell Bearing.

20000FF0.name: Blue-Feathered Branchsword
20000FF0.hint: Stormhill (Limgrave, Nighttime only): Drops from a Deathbird east of the Warmaster's Shack near collapsed structure with Rune Fragments and Sanctuary Stones on it. Deathbirds only spawn at night.

400022F1.name: Bone Peddler's Bell Bearing
400022F1.hint: Dropped by the Bell Bearing Hunter Boss invasion in Warmaster's Shack, Stormhill (Limgrave). This invasion only triggers at night.

40001158.name: Carian Slicer
40001158.hint: After giving the Royal House Scroll to Miriel Pastor of Vows, Sorceress Sellen, or Preceptor Seluvis, the spell can be purchased for  1,500 Runes.

40001176.name: Scholar's Shield
40001176.hint: Can be purchased from Sorceress Sellen for  2,500 Runes. Sellen is located in Limgrave: Waypoint Ruins.

40002339.name: Nod In Thought
40002339.hint: Given by Sorceress Sellen if you agree to become her apprentice

40000FD2.name: Star Shower
40000FD2.hint: The spell can be purchased for 10,000 Runes after you deliver the Conspectus Scroll to Miriel Pastor of Vows, Sorceress Sellen, or Preceptor Seluvis.

400010CC.name: Glintblade Phalanx
400010CC.hint: The spell can be purchased for  2,500 Runes, after giving the Royal House Scroll to Miriel Pastor of Vows, Sorceress Sellen, or Preceptor Seluvis.  The Ash of War: Glintblade Phalanx is obtained by defeating Godrick the Grafted in Stormveil Castle and speaking to Rogier in Roundtable Hold. It's on his Rapier. Simply slot another Ashes of War there or select it and Remove Enchantment to free it up to use on a different Weapon.

40000FA1.name: Great Glintstone Shard
40000FA1.hint: The spell can be purchased for 2,000 Runes after you deliver the Academy Scroll to Miriel Pastor of Vows, Sorceress Sellen, or Preceptor Seluvis.

40000FDC.name: Crystal Barrage
40000FDC.hint: Can be purchased from Sorceress Sellen for  1,500 Runes. Sellen is located in Limgrave: Waypoint Ruins.

40000FBE.name: Shard Spiral
40000FBE.hint: Available for purchase from the Sorcery Instruction of Sorceress Sellen for 8000 after progressing through her questline and choosing to side with her.

00E4E1C0.name: Greataxe
00E4E1C0.hint: Inside the chest in the Carriage pulled by two Trolls and followed by a caravan of Wandering Nobles in Limgrave, west of Waypoint Ruins.

40000FAA.name: Swift Glintstone Shard
40000FAA.hint: The spell can be purchased for 600 Runes after you deliver the Academy Scroll to Miriel Pastor of Vows, Sorceress Sellen, or Preceptor Seluvis.

40000FE6.name: Glintstone Arc
40000FE6.hint: Starting Item for the Astrologer  Can be purchased from Sorceress Sellen for  1,500 Runes. Sellen is located in Limgrave: Waypoint Ruins.  Can be purchased from Thops at the Church of Irith  1,500 Runes.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Thops's Bell Bearing.

40000FB4.name: Glintstone Cometshard
40000FB4.hint: The spell can be purchased for 12,000 Runes after you deliver the Conspectus Scroll to Miriel Pastor of Vows, Sorceress Sellen, or Preceptor Seluvis.

40000FC8.name: Glintstone Stars
40000FC8.hint: Can be purchased from Sorceress Sellen for  3000 Runes.  Can be purchased from Gowry for  3000 Runes after completing his quest line.

4000116C.name: Scholar's Armament
4000116C.hint: Can be purchased from Sorceress Sellen for  3,000 Runes. Sellen is located in Limgrave: Waypoint Ruins

40000FA0.name: Glintstone Pebble
40000FA0.hint: Starting Spell for the Astrologer  Can be purchased from Sorceress Sellen for  1,000 Runes at the Limgrave: Waypoint Ruins.  Can be purchased from Thops at the Church of Irith for  1,000 Runes.  Can be purchased from the Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold for 1,000 Runes, after giving them Thops's Bell Bearing.

40001950.name: Divine Fortification
40001950.hint: Weeping Peninsula: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab atop a collapsed ruins structure immediately southwest of Tombsward Ruins. Elden Ring Interactive

40002204.name: Note: Demi-human Mobs
40002204.hint: Sold by Nomadic Merchant Castle Morne Rampart for 500  Runes.  Video Location

101A8D44.name: Mausoleum Surcoat
101A8D44.hint: Mausoleum Soldier Set pieces drop from Mausoleum Soldiers. They can be found patrolling areas around some of the Wandering Mausoleums.  An easy spot to farm this set is east of the East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes. Several groups of 3 or 4 Mausoleum Soldiers are patrolling around this Wandering Mausoleum.

029095F0.name: Heavy Crossbow
029095F0.hint: Drops from any Godrick Soldier, Raya Lucaria Soldier, Radahn Soldier, Mausoleum Soldier, Leyndell Soldier, or Haligtree Soldier that wields it.

10009D08.name: Iron Gauntlets
10009D08.hint: Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for  1500 Runes.  Video Location

80009D08.name: Ash of War: Mighty Shot
80009D08.hint: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab on a road in the east of the Weeping Peninsula. This is the main road you take from Limgrave. Video Link

101A8E0C.name: Mausoleum Greaves
101A8E0C.hint: Mausoleum Soldier Set pieces drop from Mausoleum Soldiers. They can be found patrolling areas around some of the Wandering Mausoleums.  An easy spot to farm this set is east of the East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes. Several groups of 3 or 4 Mausoleum Soldiers are patrolling around this Wandering Mausoleum.

101A8DA8.name: Mausoleum Gauntlets
101A8DA8.hint: Mausoleum Soldier Set pieces drop from Mausoleum Soldiers. They can be found patrolling areas around some of the Wandering Mausoleums.  An easy spot to farm this set is east of the East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes. Several groups of 3 or 4 Mausoleum Soldiers are patrolling around this Wandering Mausoleum.

10009C40.name: Iron Helmet
10009C40.hint: Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for  1,500 Runes.

40001B08.name: Lightning Strike
40001B08.hint: Weeping Peninsula: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found in a crevasse separating the landmass containing the Minor Erdtree from the eastern side of the peninsula. The scarab is found in the Southern section of the crevasse, South of the entrance to Morne Tunnel, surrounded by Giant Bats and a constant beat of lightning strikes from above. There are stone platforms on either cliffsides you can use to descend safely. See it on the Elden Ring Interactive.

40001C34.name: Poison Mist
40001C34.hint: Weeping Peninsula: Dropped by a teleporting Teardrop Scarab in a forested area southeast of the Castle Morne Rampart site of grace. and north of the poison swamp.

02906EE0.name: Light Crossbow
02906EE0.hint: Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for  1500 Runes. Video Location

200003E8.name: Crimson Amber Medallion
200003E8.hint: Base Talisman: Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for  1,500 Runes.   +1 Variant: Found in Volcano Manor. Go to the Prison Town Church Site of Grace, go out and through the little town as if you were progressing through the manor as normal, and use a Stonesword Key to go through the fog gate. An Abductor Virgin is there, but you can easily run up the stairs to the level above, where the talisman is on a dead body. Video Location  +2 Variant, SPOILER WARNING: Can be found just southwest of the Leyndell, Ashen Capital Site of Grace,  by dropping down the open sewer grate to the beam below. Video Location

002DC6C0.name: Bastard Sword
002DC6C0.hint: Purchased from the Nomadic Merchant at the Castle Morne Rampart Site of Grace, on the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for  3,000 Runes. Video Location

10009D6C.name: Leather Trousers
10009D6C.hint: Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for  1,500 Runes..

00D63BC0.name: Iron Cleaver
00D63BC0.hint: Castle Morne. Dropped by the Misbegotten creatures using this weapon.  Leyndell, Royal Capital: Chance to drop from the Misbegotten enemies that can be found at behind the big door.  To farm easily: go to Castle Morne and unlock "Behind the Castle" Grace. Warp here. Run west , drop down rocks then off castle. There are 3 sleeping on that ledge and one more in the room to your right with the prisoner spirit. Easy backstabs, farm without any fighting

00E5A510.name: Longhaft Axe
00E5A510.hint: Rare drop from Misbegotten wielding it.  There is an easy to kill one at Castle Morne in Weeping Peninsula. From Beside the Rampart Gaol site of grace, cross the bridge and will be on the left sleeping.  Can be farmed efficiently from two Misbegotten by heading to the farm down the stairs and north from the Windmill Village site of grace.  Can also be dropped by the same enemy in Cave of the Forlorn, south of the minor Erdtree in the Consecrated Snowfield.

10009CA4.name: Scale Armor
10009CA4.hint: Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for  2400 Runes.   Video Location

02628110.name: Misbegotten Shortbow
02628110.hint: Can drop from flying Misbegotten enemies in Castle Morne and Morne Tunnel in Weeping Peninsula.

01CAD4F0.name: Red Thorn Roundshield
01CAD4F0.hint: Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class  Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for  600 Runes. Video Location

00A89C10.name: Morning Star
00A89C10.hint: Weeping Peninsula: Found in a chest inside a broken Carriage just a bit south of the bridge from Limgrave. Video of the location of the item

001F20C0.name: Lordsworn's Straight Sword
001F20C0.hint: May be dropped by Godrick Soldier in Gatefront Ruins.  Can be dropped by the headless, undead Soldier at Fourth Church of Marika.  The earliest and easiest grinding spot for this is the Gatefront Ruins, not just for this sword, but all of the weapons that the soldiers use excluding their spear.

01DA1730.name: Round Shield
01DA1730.hint: Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for  1000 Runes..  Video Location

01DB28A0.name: Great Turtle Shell
01DB28A0.hint: Weeping Peninsula: From the Castle Morne Rampart Site of Grace, look towards the east to find a Spiritspring and use Torrent to jump from it towards the roof a tower section of the ramparts. The shield can be found on a corpse atop this tower.

01DB0190.name: Brass Shield
01DB0190.hint: Dropped by Godrick Soldiers seen to be carrying it. (In 231 kills, 2 dropped. Approx. 0.8%)  Dropped by Raya Lucaria Soldiers seen to be carrying it.  An easy early location to farm begins at the “Gatefront” Site of Grace in the western part of main Limgrave, just north of the forest and just before Stormgate. Once you spawn in, turn around to face south east. There will be four Brass Shield carrying Godrick Soldiers in the Gatefront Ruins area that should be relatively easy to farm. Two are in a small fenced in area to the right of the road. One is on the road, carrying a horn. The last one is sitting next to a fire nearby.   Nearly all the Raya Lucaria Soldiers who are gathered outside Raya Lucaria Academy are carrying one, making it a good place to farm for it if you missed getting it earlier.

01DCFD60.name: Flame Crest Wooden Shield
01DCFD60.hint: Ailing Village in the Weeping Peninsula. Found on a corpse inside a small shack on the north side of the village.

001F47D0.name: Weathered Straight Sword
001F47D0.hint: Dropped from Commoner enemies in any area.  Near the Secluded Cell grace in Stormveil castle, there is a room full of 10 commoners above the Living Jars that all carry the weapon. Probably the earliest (and most convenient) farming spot to get both the armor set and weapon. Takes around 20-30 seconds to navigate to the room although you won't have to worry about enemies on the way. The room can be cleared quickly (~15-20 seconds if you can one-shot them) as they are all near each other. Teleport back to the Secluded Cell grace and repeat.   Video Location

40002199.name: Map (Weeping Peninsula)
40002199.hint: The map for Weeping Peninsula is found by following the main road south from the Bridge of Sacrifice, past the Castle Morne Rampart site of Grace. Elden Ring. Video Location

40001C8E.name: The Flame of Frenzy
40001C8E.hint: Callu Baptismal Church in the Weeping Peninsula. Found on a corpse by a pillar on the left side of the church. See it on the Elden Ring Interactive.

40039DC8.name: Warhawk Ashes
40039DC8.hint: Where to Find Warhawk Ashes  Rewarded upon finding the location Prophecy Painting depicts. The location is north of the Church of Pilgrimage at the northern tip of Weeping Peninsula. (The Area in the South).

01CBBF50.name: Gilded Iron Shield
01CBBF50.hint: The Gilded Iron Shield Shield can be found at the following location  Church of Pilgrimage in Weeping Peninsula. Found on a corpse sitting on a grave outside the church and to the west.

40000FFA.name: Crystal Burst
40000FFA.hint: Drops from the Demi-Human Queen mini-boss in the Demi-Human Forest Ruins on the Weeping Peninsula.

01F874A0.name: Demi-Human Queen's Staff
01F874A0.hint: Dropped by the Demi-Human Queen in Weeping Peninsula - Demi-Human Forest Ruins.

01CA38B0.name: Rickety Shield
01CA38B0.hint: Starting equipment for the Prophet class.  Dropped by Demi-Humans that wield it.

006ACFC0.name: Falchion
006ACFC0.hint: Potential drop from falchion-wielding Demi-Humans.       A good spot to farm is under the large ruin, below where Kenneth Haight can first be found, just north of the Mistwood Outskirts Grace.

00A7FFD0.name: Club
00A7FFD0.hint: Default starting equipment for the Wretch  Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant for  600 Runes. He is located south-east of Coastal Cave.  Drops from Demi-Humans.

00A8EA30.name: Spiked Club
00A8EA30.hint: The Spiked Club weapon can be found at the following location:.  Drops from large Demi-Humans that wield it  Can be farmed from the large Demi-Human right outside the entrance of Volcano Cave.  Also drops from the large Demi-Human just below the ledge at the beginning of Coastal Cave.

01DB9DD0.name: Shield of the Guilty
01DB9DD0.hint: In the cellar area of the Demi-Human Forest Ruins on the Weeping Peninsula, before the main building with the Demi-Human Queen mini-boss. You will need to jump over a wall to access the stairs leading into the cellar.

20000FAA.name: Spelldrake Talisman
20000FAA.hint: Base talisman: Acquired by defeating Runebear at the end of the Earthbore Cave in the Weeping Peninsula.  Spelldrake Talisman +1: Sellia, Town of Sorcery: Found in a small room in the northwest section of town, right under the balcony containing the Staff of Loss. This room is initially sealed by a barrier that can be dispelled by lighting a brazier atop a tower in the southwest of town.  Spelldrake Talisman +2: Found in the secret catacombs underneath the Hidden Path to the Haligtree by turning right just before the Stray Mimic Tear's boss door, following the corridor up and taking the lift. The talisman can be found on a corpse in an alcove at the top. See the location's page for details on how to get to the catacombs.

029020C0.name: Soldier's Crossbow
029020C0.hint: The Soldier's Crossbow weapon can be found at the following location:   Drops from Foot Soldiers that wield them.  Drops from Exile Soldiers that wield them.  In Limgrave, the best place to farm this is directly east of the Deathtouched Catacombs site of grace to the crucibles, where there is a Godrick Soldier with a Lordsworn's Shield and a spear and a small group of Godrick Foot Soldiers including two with these crossbows.

101BEC70.name: Foot Soldier Cap
101BEC70.hint: Dropped by Godrick Foot Soldiers found throughout Limgrave.

029F6300.name: Hand Ballista
029F6300.hint: At the top of the Forest Lookout Tower, south west of the Bridge of Sacrifice on the Weeping Peninsula.

101BECD4.name: Chain-Draped Tabard
101BECD4.hint: There's a chance for it to drop from Godrick Foot Soldiers.  Some areas where you can find groups of Godrick Foot Soldiers are:       Near Tower of Return, Weeping Peninsula.    Throughout Limgrave.

000F4240.name: Dagger
000F4240.hint: Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold for  400 Runes.   Can be dropped by Highwaymen and different types of Foot Soldiers.       Multiple soldiers can be encountered early in the game at the camp east of Warmaster's Shack.

40039210.name: Demi-Human Ashes
40039210.hint: Where to Find Demi-Human Ashes  Dropped by Erdtree Burial Watchdog found within the Impaler's Catacombs, located in the Weeping Peninsula.

4000089C.name: Prattling Pate Please Help
4000089C.hint: Prattling Pate "Please help" can be found within Impaler's Catacombs near the coast in the North East section of the Weeping Peninsula.  Prattling Pate "Hello"  Prattling Pate "Thank you"  Prattling Pate "Apologies"  Prattling Pate "Wonderful"  Prattling Pate "Let's get to it"  Prattling Pate "You're beautiful"  Prattling Pate "My Beloved"

00D5C690.name: Forked Hatchet
00D5C690.hint: Dropped by Imps using this weapon.

10108A60.name: Imp Head (Wolf)
10108A60.hint: Drops from Forked Greatsword wielding Wolf-Headed Imps in Catacombs  Minor Erdtree Catacombs: Body laying over a sarcophagus. A quick way to reach it is taking the lift at the beginning of the dungeon down, sending it back up, then dropping down into the room below. From there, head down the rot filled hallway and take the first right. Go straight and in the next room climb up the ladder on the right. The body with the helmet will be straight ahead at the end of the hallway.

10107AC0.name: Imp Head (Cat)
10107AC0.hint: Rare drop from Imps.  Farming: from the Impaler's Catacombs site of grace, run to the imp at the bottom of the stairs, and after killing this one, run back up and kill the one near the top which is now done climbing; you are close to the grace again.

40000816.name: Lantern
40000816.hint: Can be purchased from the Isolated Merchant in Weeping Peninsula for  1800 Runes.   Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for   1800 Runes.

40002200.name: Note: Wandering Mausoleum
40002200.hint: The note can be bought at Isolated Merchant Weeping Peninsula for 600  Runes.

003DA540.name: Zweihander
003DA540.hint: Can be purchased from the Isolated Merchant for  3,500 Runes. He can be found in his shack at the very west of the Weeping Peninsula.

10050910.name: Guardian Mask
10050910.hint: Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.       An area dense with Guardians can be found by starting at the Dragonbarrow Fork site of grace, and working your way uphill towards the Minor Erdtree. Guardians are encountered in small groups and more come up from the ground, making it a good place to farm the set.    Chance it drops from one of the multiple Erdtree Guardians at the minor tree in Weeping Peninsula.

100509D8.name: Guardian Bracers
100509D8.hint: Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.       An area dense with Guardians can be found by starting at the Dragonbarrow Fork site of grace, and working your way uphill towards the Minor Erdtree. Guardians are encountered in small groups and more come up from the ground, making it a good place to farm the set.    Chance it drops from one of the multiple Erdtree Guardians at the minor tree in Weeping Peninsula.

10050A3C.name: Guardian Greaves
10050A3C.hint: Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.       An area dense with Guardians can be found starting at the Dragonbarrow Fork site of grace, and working your way uphill towards the Minor Erdtree. Guardians are encountered in small groups and more come up from the ground, making it a good place to farm the set.    Chance it drops from one of the multiple Erdtree Guardians at the minor tree in Weeping Peninsula.

40002B01.name: Crimsonburst Crystal Tear
40002B01.hint: Weeping Peninsula beneath the Minor Erdtree: Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar boss upon defeat.

10050D5C.name: Guardian Garb
10050D5C.hint: Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.  An area dense with Guardians can be found by starting at the Dragonbarrow Fork site of grace, and working your way uphill towards the Minor Erdtree. Guardians are encountered in small groups and more come up from the ground, making it a good place to farm the set.  Chance it drops from one of the multiple Erdtree Guardians at the minor tree in Weeping Peninsula.

40002B00.name: Opaline Bubbletear
40002B00.hint: Weeping Peninsula, beneath the Minor Erdtree: Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar boss upon defeat.

00116520.name: Bloodstained Dagger
00116520.hint: Rare drop from Demi-Human Chiefs       There is a Demi-Human Chief sleeping before the wooden bridge leading to the Minor Erdtree in the weeping peninsula.    There are 2 of them close to each other in the Hermit Village. A quick way to farm is going to Primeval Sorcerer Azur grace, hugging the wall while going south and there will be one of them isolated. Kill that one and there is one immediately to the side away from the wall.

01145630.name: Guardian's Swordspear
01145630.hint: Dropped by Erdtree Guardians.  A good place to farm this is around Minor Erdtree Church in Altus Plateau. There are 6 guardians around the church.

00D63BC0.name: Iron Cleaver
00D63BC0.hint: Castle Morne. Dropped by the Misbegotten creatures using this weapon.  Leyndell, Royal Capital: Chance to drop from the Misbegotten enemies that can be found at behind the big door.  To farm easily: go to Castle Morne and unlock "Behind the Castle" Grace. Warp here. Run west , drop down rocks then off castle. There are 3 sleeping on that ledge and one more in the room to your right with the prisoner spirit. Easy backstabs, farm without any fighting

00E5A510.name: Longhaft Axe
00E5A510.hint: Rare drop from Misbegotten wielding it.  There is an easy to kill one at Castle Morne in Weeping Peninsula. From Beside the Rampart Gaol site of grace, cross the bridge and will be on the left sleeping.  Can be farmed efficiently from two Misbegotten by heading to the farm down the stairs and north from the Windmill Village site of grace.  Can also be dropped by the same enemy in Cave of the Forlorn, south of the minor Erdtree in the Consecrated Snowfield.

02628110.name: Misbegotten Shortbow
02628110.hint: Can drop from flying Misbegotten enemies in Castle Morne and Morne Tunnel in Weeping Peninsula.

00E5CC20.name: Rusted Anchor
00E5CC20.hint: Drops from the Scaly Misbegotten boss in Morne Tunnel.

00B93DE0.name: Pickaxe
00B93DE0.hint: Dropped by Miners  Fastest farming route is going to the Limgrave Tunnels, go to the second tunnel that leads to boss that's behind the first elevator shaft. There's a Stakes of Marika nearby. Kill the five Miners in the tunnel then jump down the elevator shaft and die. Respawn at the Stake to reset the Miners. Rinse and repeat. Make sure you pick up your runes between each suicide.

40000899.name: Prattling Pate Thank you
40000899.hint: Prattling Pate "Thank You" can be found inside the Tombsward Catacombs, on a corpse at the end of the main path, past the flame-throwing pillar.   Prattling Pate "Hello"  Prattling Pate "Apologies"  Prattling Pate "Wonderful"  Prattling Pate "Please help"  Prattling Pate "Let's get to it"  Prattling Pate "You're beautiful"  Prattling Pate "My Beloved"

00D5C690.name: Forked Hatchet
00D5C690.hint: Dropped by Imps using this weapon.

4000247F.name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [9]
4000247F.hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [9]  Found inside Tombsward Catacombs in Weeping Peninsula. Sealed behind an Imp Statue barrier. Requires a Stonesword Key to break the seal.

02719C40.name: Longbow
02719C40.hint: Starting equipment for the Samurai Class  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold for  1200 Runes.  Can be dropped by Skeletal Archers in catacombs or dungeons.

10108A60.name: Imp Head (Wolf)
10108A60.hint: Drops from Forked Greatsword wielding Wolf-Headed Imps in Catacombs  Minor Erdtree Catacombs: Body laying over a sarcophagus. A quick way to reach it is taking the lift at the beginning of the dungeon down, sending it back up, then dropping down into the room below. From there, head down the rot filled hallway and take the first right. Go straight and in the next room climb up the ladder on the right. The body with the helmet will be straight ahead at the end of the hallway.

4003EFD0.name: Lhutel the Headless
4003EFD0.hint: Dropped by the Cemetery Shade at the Tombsward Catacombs.

006CF2A0.name: Scimitar
006CF2A0.hint: Starting Equipment for the Warrior Class  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold for  600 Runes.  Can be dropped by Scimitar-wielding Skeletons found in various dungeons such as Deathtouched Catacombs.

10107AC0.name: Imp Head (Cat)
10107AC0.hint: Rare drop from Imps.  Farming: from the Impaler's Catacombs site of grace, run to the imp at the bottom of the stairs, and after killing this one, run back up and kill the one near the top which is now done climbing; you are close to the grace again.

01DDC0B0.name: Eclipse Crest Heater Shield
01DDC0B0.hint: Found on a stone platform attached to the cliffside southwest of the Tombsward Catacombs Site of Grace, northwest of the minor Erdtree in Weeping Penninsula. Can be reached by dropping down from the area above the Tombsward Catacombs.

01CAFC00.name: Scripture Wooden Shield
01CAFC00.hint: The Scripture Wooden Shield Shield can be found at the following location  Starting Equipment for the Astrologer Class.  Dropped by Skeletons who wield it or who wield an Iron Roundshield. They will be holding a Scimitar in their other hand.       2 of them can be found at the start of Auriza Hero's Grave, in the first safe spot on the right while going down the first slope.    2 can be found at the beginning of Deathtouched Catacombs, 1 before the first set of stairs and 1 afterward around the corner. (Note: The skeleton model holds an Iron Roundshield, but will drop the Scripture Wooden Shield.)

006D19B0.name: Grossmesser
006D19B0.hint: A possible drop from Skeletons that wield the weapon. For example, this weapon can be dropped by Skeletons in Tombsward Catacombs. The Skeletons that may drop a Grossmesser do not use a shield or a bow, and can be recognized by their rolling move.

400024AC.name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [8]
400024AC.hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [8]  Can be looted off a corpse found inside Tombsward Cave.

200003FC.name: Viridian Amber Medallion
200003FC.hint: Base talisman: Tombsward Cave, a small dungeon in the Weeping Peninsula: Located southeast of the Fourth Church of Marika. The medallion is obtained after defeating the boss, Miranda the Blighted Bloom.+1 Variant: Altus Plateau, south of the Outer Wall Battleground Site of Grace: You will hear Margit whisper, "I see you, Tarnished..."  to you before appearing on the road. Defeat him again and it will drop.  +2 Variant: Miquella's Haligtree: The closest site of grace is the Haligtree Town Plaza. Go south towards the roof with a dead body on it. For reference, the dead body is two stories above the talisman. Continue southeast, and jump down once. Jump across the gap, and then do an immediate 180 turn and make a running jump into the building below. It'll be in a chest guarded by Scarlet Rot Zombies. Video location

10035B60.name: Page Hood
10035B60.hint: Three are found part way down the stairs from the Royal Moongazing Grounds site of grace in Caria Manor.  They are scattered throughout Leyndell, Royal Capital.  Tombsward Ruins Underground  Gelmir Hero's Grave

10035C8C.name: Page Trousers
10035C8C.hint: Three are easily found behind the Royal Moongazing Grounds site of grace in Caria Manor.  They are scattered throughout Leyndell, Royal Capital  Tombsward Ruins Underground  Gelmir Hero's Grave

10035BC4.name: Page Garb
10035BC4.hint: Three are easily found behind the Royal Moongazing Grounds site of grace in Caria Manor.  They are scattered throughout Leyndell, Royal Capital  Tombsward Ruins Underground.

0262A820.name: Red Branch Shortbow
0262A820.hint: Leyndell Royal Capital: Drops from a Page on the study, past the group of Oracle Envoys.  Tombsward Ruins: Drops from the 2 Pages in the underground area.  Royal Moongazing Ground: Drops from the 3 Pages in the stairs east from the site of grace

0122D520.name: Winged Scythe
0122D520.hint: Tombsward Ruins: In the center of the ruins, there is a set of stairs leading underground into a dark hall with a door to a small room at the end. The scythe is inside a chest in the small room.

029020C0.name: Soldier's Crossbow
029020C0.hint: The Soldier's Crossbow weapon can be found at the following location:   Drops from Foot Soldiers that wield them.  Drops from Exile Soldiers that wield them. 101BEC70.name: Foot Soldier Cap
101BEC70.hint: Dropped by Godrick Foot Soldiers found throughout Limgrave.

101BECD4.hint: There's a chance for it to drop from Godrick Foot Soldiers.  Some areas where you can find groups of Godrick Foot Soldiers are:       Near Tower of Return, Weeping Peninsula.    Throughout Limgrave.

2000041A.name: Radagon's Scarseal
2000041A.hint: Drops from the boss of Weeping Evergaol, the Ancient Hero of Zamor, in the Weeping Peninsula.

20000848.name: Twinblade Talisman

There is a tower section of the walls in the westernmost corner. Climb up the ladder and go around the tower to find a chest where the talisman can be found.

80007594.name: Ash of War: Barricade Shield
80007594.hint: Dropped by Night's Cavalry at Weeping Peninsula. Elden Ring.

1019F1CC.hint: Gatefront Ruins, dropped by Godrick Soldier patrolling the outpost

1019F104.hint: Gatefront Ruins, dropped by Godrick Soldiers patrolling the outpost.
