There are 3 sleeping on that ledge and one more in the room to your right with the prisoner spirit. Easy backstabs, farm without any fighting

016E8420.name: Steel-Wire Torch
016E8420.hint: Castle Morne. Found on a corpse at the end of a narrow path at the top level of the north side of the castle. Guarded by two Misbegotten.

02810590.name: Golem Greatbow
02810590.hint: The Golem Greatbow has a chance to drop from any Golem archer. The Golem Greatbow does not drop from Golems with halberds.  One can be found on the Limgrave Tower Bridge in Stormhill, which can be accessed from Stormveil Castle. Two halberd Golems are also found on the bridge.  Two can be found on the path towards the colosseum in Caelid. This location is only accessible via a lift in the Siofra River that takes the player to the Deep Siofra Well.       These two Golem archers fire magic-imbued explosive arrows and are also the only source of Golem's Magic Arrow.      One can be found next to the top of the Grand Lift of Dectus, in the Altus Plateau. It is accompanied by a single halberd Golem.       If the Grand Lift of Dectus is activated after finding both halves of the Dectus Medallion, the Golems guarding the lift will be non-hostile until the the player initiates combat. (needs confirmation, not sure if the game checks for possession of the medallion or usage of the lift)       One can be found outside the entrance of Castle Morne, at the southern tip of the Weeping Peninsula.  Two can be found in the north-eastern section of the Capital Outskirts, on the hill approaching the northern entrance to Leyndell Royal Capital (Legacy Dungeon).  One can be found in the Mountaintops of the Giants, guarding the tall and narrow path north.

00E5A510.name: Longhaft Axe
00E5A510.hint: Rare drop from Misbegotten wielding it.  There is an easy to kill one at Castle Morne in Weeping Peninsula. From Beside the Rampart Gaol site of grace, cross the bridge and will be on the left sleeping.  Can be farmed efficiently from two Misbegotten by heading to the farm down the stairs and north from the Windmill Village site of grace.  Can also be dropped by the same enemy in Cave of the Forlorn, south of the minor Erdtree in the Consecrated Snowfield.

101BECD4.name: Chain-Draped Tabard
101BECD4.hint: There's a chance for it to drop from Godrick Foot Soldiers.  Some areas where you can find groups of Godrick Foot Soldiers are:       Near Tower of Return, Weeping Peninsula.    Throughout Limgrave.

1006B6C0.name: Pumpkin Helm
1006B6C0.hint: Saintsbridge, Limgrave   Fort Haight   Castle Morne  Raya Lucaria Academy  Redmane Castle  Altus Plateau - By a grave marker overlooking the cliffs northeast of the Bridge of Iniquity Site of Grace.  Mt Gelmir, east of First Mt. Gelmir Campsite and south of Corpse-Stench Shack.

02628110.name: Misbegotten Shortbow
02628110.hint: Can drop from flying Misbegotten enemies in Castle Morne and Morne Tunnel in Weeping Peninsula.

003085E0.name: Claymore
003085E0.hint: Castle Morne: From the main courtyard entrance, hug the right wall and go past the burning corpses with Misbegotten surrounding them. You may aggro one or two along the way. This path leads to the entrance to the building in the north. The sword can be found in a chest to the left just as you enter this building. Video Location

000F4240.name: Dagger
000F4240.hint: Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold for  400 Runes.   Can be dropped by Highwaymen and different types of Foot Soldiers.       Multiple soldiers can be encountered early in the game at the camp east of Warmaster's Shack.

00D74D30.name: Sacrificial Axe
00D74D30.hint: Weeping Peninsula (Nighttime only): Dropped by Deathbird that spawns north from Castle Morne.

001F20C0.name: Lordsworn's Straight Sword
001F20C0.hint: May be dropped by Godrick Soldier in Gatefront Ruins.  Can be dropped by the headless, undead Soldier at Fourth Church of Marika.  The earliest and easiest grinding spot for this is the Gatefront Ruins, not just for this sword, but all of the weapons that the soldiers use excluding their spear.

00A87500.name: Warpick
00A87500.hint: Godrick Soldiers wielding a Warpick have a chance to drop this item.       two can be found hiding in bushes by the last enemy up the hill west from the gatefront site of grace    another three can be found at the Gatefront Ruins      Mausoleum Soldiers wielding a Warpick have a chance to drop this item.

01ECDBE0.name: Lordsworn's Shield
01ECDBE0.hint: Drops from Godrick Soldiers wielding it at Gatefront Ruins.

01312D00.name: Whip
01312D00.hint: Found in Castle Morne near the Rampart Gaol Site of Grace  The building is first accessed by walking atop the western wall of the castle. Look to the left for a building with a blue roof. Jump onto this roof and then jump down to the cliffs below. Follow the cliffs southeast until you return to a section of the castle with a big square opening. Descend into the opening by landing on the wooden beams. There is a corpse with a Smithing Stone [2] on one of the beams and there are several Rats and a Misbegotten at the ground level. The corpse with the whip is sitting against a wall. Video Location

00C65D40.name: Nightrider Flail
00C65D40.hint: Dropped by Night's Cavalry at Weeping Peninsula.

0160C880.name: Golem's Halberd
0160C880.hint: Possible drop from a Golem wielding this weapon, the earliest respawning one being at Limgrave Tower Bridge Site of Grace.

01DB0190.name: Brass Shield
01DB0190.hint: Dropped by Godrick Soldiers seen to be carrying it. (In 231 kills, 2 dropped. Approx. 0.8%)  Dropped by Raya Lucaria Soldiers seen to be carrying it.  An easy early location to farm begins at the “Gatefront” Site of Grace in the western part of main Limgrave, just north of the forest and just before Stormgate. Once you spawn in, turn around to face south east. There will be four Brass Shield carrying Godrick Soldiers in the Gatefront Ruins area that should be relatively easy to farm. Two are in a small fenced in area to the right of the road. One is on the road, carrying a horn. The last one is sitting next to a fire nearby.   Nearly all the Raya Lucaria Soldiers who are gathered outside Raya Lucaria Academy are carrying one, making it a good place to farm for it if you missed getting it earlier.

100CD140.name: Marionette Soldier Helm
100CD140.hint: Various places in Liurnia of the Lakes, including Raya Lucaria Academy, Academy Gate Town, and Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel. They can also be found in the Witchbane Ruins on the Weeping Peninsula, and on Mt. Gelmir.

100CD1A4.name: Marionette Soldier Armor
100CD1A4.hint: Various places in Liurnia of the Lakes, including Raya Lucaria Academy, Academy Gate Town, and Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel. They can also be found in the Witchbane Ruins on the Weeping Peninsula, and on Mt. Gelmir.

02625A00.name: Shortbow
02625A00.hint: Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class  Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant for 600 Runes. He is located south-east of Coastal Cave.  Chance to drop from bow-wielding Marionette Soldiers

400011F8.name: Ambush Shard
400011F8.hint: Weeping Peninsula: Found on a corpse in the underground jail of the Witchbane Ruins. Elden Ring Interactive

00F646E0.name: Spiked Spear
00F646E0.hint: Chance to drop from 1 spear-wielding Marionette Soldier just outside of Witchbane Ruins.  Chance to drop from the 6 spear-wielding Marionette Soldiers around the Converted Tower.       Two patrolling the woods to the south of the tower.    One patrols northwest of the tower.    Two patrolling slope north of the tower.    One standing northeast of the tower, further down the slope from the previous two.

10055730.name: Fire Monk Hood
10055730.hint: Pieces of the Fire Monk Set are dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintops of the Giants.

10055794.name: Fire Monk Armor
10055794.hint: Pieces of the Fire Monk Set are dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintops of the Giants.

20000488.name: Stalwart Horn Charm
20000488.hint: Base talisman: Uld Palace Ruins in northeastern Liurnia of the Lakes: Go to the Mausoleum Compound and head north up the incline, then turn West as soon as you pass the horizontal rocks to your left. Proceed forward to the large vertical rock formation. There will be a smaller vertical rock formation on your right. Walk around the larger formation counter-clockwise until you see a hole in the wall. Go through it and you will find the talisman on a corpse to your left overhanging a cliff.+1 variant: Can be found in the southwestern area of Consecrated Snowfield, southeast of Yelough Anix Tunnel entrance. Alternatively, go straight southwest from the Inner Consecrated Snowfield Site of Grace. It is located on a corpse slumped over a log, and is guarded by Ancestral Follower and Ancestral Follower Shaman whose singing can be heard once you are nearby.

40000816.name: Lantern
40000816.hint: Can be purchased from the Isolated Merchant in Weeping Peninsula for  1800 Runes.   Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for   1800 Runes.

40001162.name: Carian Piercer
40001162.hint: Caria Manor: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in an area behind the gardens, to the east. Video Location

40001389.name: Ancient Death Rancor
40001389.hint: Dropped by the Death Rite Bird in Liurnia of the Lakes, to the east of Raya Lucaria Academy at night, south of the Gate Town North site of grace.

4000246A.name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [11]
4000246A.hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [11]  Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for  1500 Runes.

4000219B.name: Map (Liurnia, East)
4000219B.hint: Found in the south of the swampy lake, in the middle by a monument with enlightened texts on it, in Liurnia of the Lakes. See it on the Elden Ring.

1005A67C.name: Aristocrat Boots
1005A67C.hint: Dropped by Noble Sorcerers seen in larger groups of Wandering Noble enemies that wander the roads of most areas.  An early spot to farm them is the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan on the road west of Waypoint Ruins.  A group of three can be easily farmed in Kingsrealm Ruins near the Road to the Manor site of grace. Turning around from where Iji's workstation is, they are just beyond the gate that was formerly an Illusory Wall.

1005A550.name: Aristocrat Headband
1005A550.hint: Rare chance to drop from Noble Sorcerers, seen in larger groups of Wandering Noble enemies that wander the roads of most areas.  A group of three can be easily farmed in Kingsrealm Ruins near the Road to the Manor site of grace. Turning around from where Iji's workstation is, they are just beyond the gate that was formerly an Illusory Wall.

1005A5B4.name: Aristocrat Garb
1005A5B4.hint: Dropped by Noble Sorcerers seen in larger groups of Wandering Noble enemies that wander the roads of most areas.  An early spot to farm them is the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan on the road west of Waypoint Ruins.  A group of three can be easily farmed in Kingsrealm Ruins near the Road to the Manor site of grace. Turning around from where Iji's workstation is, they are just beyond the gate that was formerly an Illusory Wall.

01F78A40.name: Glintstone Staff
01F78A40.hint: Starting Equipment for the Prisoner Class  Has a chance to be dropped by Noble Sorcerers at Caria Manor.  Drops from a lone Noble Sorcerer, south of the Waypoint Ruins (and west of a small collection of graves). Behind the large broken tower ruin where the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan starts it's journey. (map co-ordinates are:  -194.50781 : 113.69531 )  Early game, you can farm for this on the noble sorcerers Northeast of the Agheel Lake South grace in southern Limgrave. From where you enter Limgrave, head Southeast and look for some stones you can use as steps to drop down without dying, they'll be close to the border of the lake. Cut around the bottom of the lake, avoiding the patrolling mercenary, and then cut Southeast across the field toward the road. You should see a the Agheel Lake South grace point on a little shelf below the road. From the grace, there are at least 4 noble sorcerers nearby, but 2 are easy to reach. Wait for the mercenary patrolling the road to ride by, then head across the road and left until you're climbing the slope. One sorcerer & retinue will be coming down this slope from the camp above. After killing them, turn around, and there is another sorcerer & retinue traveling down the road. You may want to wait for the mercenary to pass again, because he takes actual effort to fight (whereas the sorcerers have bad eyesight and go down quickly). Once you've killed and looted both groups, head back to the grace to rest, because it's a rare enough drop that it'll probably take you many resets to get.

10099E1C.name: Astrologer Trousers
10099E1C.hint: Starting Equipment for the Astrologer Class.  Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for   1000 Runes.

4003B920.name: Land Squirt Ashes
4003B920.hint: Where to Find Land Squirt Ashes  Found at a grave with several groups of land squirts nearby on the east shore of Liurnia Lake. To reach it, start at the Gate Town Bridge site of grace, and travel north along the shore.

100557F8.name: Fire Monk Gauntlets
100557F8.hint: Pieces of the Fire Monk Set are dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintops of the Giants.

10099CF0.name: Astrologer Hood
10099CF0.hint: Starting Equipment for the Astrologer Class  Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for   1000 Runes.

4000219D.name: Map (Liurnia, West)
4000219D.hint: On a monolith in the open field northeast of the North Liurnia Lake Shore Site of Grace in northern Liurnia.

10099DB8.name: Astrologer Gloves
10099DB8.hint: Starting Equipment for the Astrologer Class.  Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for   1000 Runes.

002143A0.name: Carian Knight's Sword
002143A0.hint: Liurnia of the Lakes: Found in a chest in the back of a Carriage being pulled by two Trolls in the northwest of the lake.

80004EE8.name: Ash of War: Ice Spear
80004EE8.hint: Liurnia of the Lakes: Dropped by a Night's Cavalry boss patrolling near the broken Gate Town Bridge on the eastern landmass.

1005F49C.name: Old Aristocrat Shoes
1005F49C.hint: All pieces of the Old Aristocrat Set are dropped by the Old Noble enemies, often found within larger groups of Wandering Nobles wandering the roads of most areas. The banner they hold makes them easily distinguishable from other Wandering Nobles.  There are two Old Nobles within the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan north of the Agheel Lake South site of grace.

1005585C.name: Fire Monk Greaves
1005585C.hint: Pieces of the Fire Monk Set are dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintops of the Giants.

8000FDE8.name: Ash of War: Barbaric Roar
8000FDE8.hint: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in Ravine-Veiled Village, found by going as far northeast as possible in Lake of Liurnia (near but not accessible from Grand Lift of Dectus).From the Ravine-Veiled Village Site of Grace, go down the stairs and follow the ravine northward. The scarab will be at the end, guarded by 3 Giant Bats.

1005F3D4.name: Old Aristocrat Gown
1005F3D4.hint: All pieces of the Old Aristocrat Set are dropped by the Old Noble enemies, often found within larger groups of Wandering Nobles wandering the roads of most areas. The banner they hold makes them easily distinguishable from other Wandering Nobles.  There are two Old Nobles within the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan north of the Agheel Lake South site of grace.  Altus Plateau - There are Old Nobles to the left of Goldmask's Bridge.

1005CCC4.name: Aristocrat Coat
1005CCC4.hint: The Aristocrat Coat drops from Soldier Nobles that can be found wandering the roads of most areas.       Four Soldier Nobles can be found among the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan to the west of Waypoint Ruins, north of the Lake Agheel South site of grace.    A Soldier Noble can be found northwest of the Debate Parlor Site of Grace, guarding the stairs up to two Glintstone Sorcerers.

200007F8.name: Red-Feathered Branchsword
200007F8.hint: By Scenic Isle Site of Grace in Liurnia of the Lakes: Drops from a Deathbird that spawns at night directly to the north-east, near the collapsed structure.

10099D54.name: Astrologer Robe
10099D54.hint: Starting Equipment for the Astrologer Class  Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for   1500 Runes.

1005F370.name: Old Aristocrat Cowl
1005F370.hint: All pieces of the Old Aristocrat Set are dropped by the Old Noble enemies, often found within larger groups of Wandering Nobles wandering the roads of most areas. The banner they hold makes them easily distinguishable from other Wandering Nobles.   Church of Vows - Three Old Nobles can be found close to the Site of Grace; one to the north, two to the east.  Agheel Lake South - Head north from the Site of Grace. There is one Old Noble on the path, and two more further north, with the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan.  Altus Plateau - One Old Noble can be found very close by the Rampartside Path Site of Grace.

1005CC60.name: Aristocrat Hat
1005CC60.hint: The Aristocrat Hat drops from Soldier Nobles that can be found wandering the roads of most areas.       Four Soldier Nobles can be found among the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan to the west of Waypoint Ruins, north of the Lake Agheel South site of grace.     A Soldier Noble can be found northwest of the Debate Parlor Site of Grace in Raya Lucaria Academy, guarding the stairs up to two Glintstone Sorcerers.

8000C3B4.name: Ash of War: Hoarfrost Stomp
8000C3B4.hint: Liurnia of the Lakes: Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab found roaming the shallow body of water southeast of Caria Manor. Look for its glowing footprints and attack as they move towards you.

01F98610.name: Astrologer's Staff
01F98610.hint: Starting equipment for the Astrologer Class.  Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for   800 Runes.

01140810.name: Glaive
01140810.hint: Dropped by Skeletons wielding it. There is one on the road leading up from Sellia Backstreets Site of Grace.       An easy farming spot can be found just a few steps east from the Church of Vows, the skeleton spawns on the right.

012211D0.name: Grave Scythe
012211D0.hint: Dropped from Skeleton Mages around the game world.       Three of them can be found at the Graveyard west from the Lake-Facing Cliffs site

800111D4.name: Ash of War: Vow of the Indomitable
800111D4.hint: Liurnia of the Lakes: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab, in the Southeast poisonous swamp area of the map, south from the Folly on the Lake Site of Grace. The scarab is located in the center of an island, near an opening in the rocky overpass.

002206F0.name: Noble's Slender Sword
002206F0.hint: Dropped by Wandering Nobles around Limgrave.       Can be farmed from the group of Wandering Nobles among the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan to the west of Waypoint Ruins, north of Agheel Lake South Site of Grace.      Dropped by Wandering Nobles in Raya Lucaria Academy.       Can be farmed from the large group of nobles that appear to the north of the Debate Parlor Site of Grace in Raya Lucaria Academy. Leave the boss room and go up the stairs into a large courtyard. To the left there are two nobles picking weeds, and many more up the stairs near them, in front of two Glintstone Sorcerers. Each Wandering Noble has a chance to drop the sword.      Dropped by Wandering Nobles in Caelid, in the graveyard directly south of the Caelid Highway South Site of Grace.  Go to the Church of Pilgrimage site of grace and move down the road leading to the church. There's a noble with this sword amongthe other nobles that can be farmed.

00A84DF0.name: Curved Club
00A84DF0.hint: This weapon can be looted from the club and shield Albinaurics found at Academy Gate Town grace.       A group of Albinaurics wielding Curved Clubs can be found on a fallen bridge section east of this grace, in the direction of the Gate Town Bridge grace. Two of those sitting on the bridge section have the Curved Club and there's another patrolling in a pair further ahead.

00B85380.name: Curved Great Club
00B85380.hint: This weapon can be looted from the larger of the Second-Generation Albinaurics found across Liurnia of the Lakes (the gray frog like creatures). There are a number of them located around the Temple Quarter making it an easy spot to farm.

01D905C0.name: Kite Shield
01D905C0.hint: Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for   1000 Runes

00A93850.name: Monk's Flamemace
00A93850.hint: Drops from Monk enemies wielding it in Liurnia of the Lakes and Mountaintops of the Giants.       A bunch of them are patrolling around Guardian's Garrison      There's one immediately to the left of the Grace in the Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave.

010477B0.name: Treespear
010477B0.hint: Found on a Carriage at the edge of the collapsed bridge. From Liurnia Highway South Site of Grace, follow the road southeast.

004D35A0.name: Noble's Estoc
004D35A0.hint: Dropped by Wandering Nobles in Limgrave, Raya Lucaria Academy and Altus Plateau, who wear feathered caps and coats.       Four can be found among the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan to the west of Waypoint Ruins and Waypoint Ruins Cellar Site of Grace.    One can be found northwest of the Debate Parlor Site of Grace, guarding the stairs up to two Glintstone Sorcerers.    One can be found immediately south of the Rampartside Path Site of Grace, digging by the cliffside.

004C4B40.name: Estoc
004C4B40.hint: Starting Equipment for the Prisoner Class.  Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for   3000 Runes.   Can be purchased from Patches at the Scenic Isle Site of Grace for  3000 Runes.

00E61A40.name: Executioner's Greataxe
00E61A40.hint: Can be dropped by Skeletons using this weapon.  The Church of Irith Graveyard.       From the Lake-Facing Cliffs  site of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes, head west from the Church of Irith. Follow the cliff until you reach the top where you will find a small graveyard with two Skeletons hanging from a tree. Getting closer will spawn a Skeleton wielding the Executioner's Greataxe to the right of the monument with the Warming Stone in a small grave patch.      The graveyard above Sellia.       From the Church of the Plague (in Caelid, East of Sellia), go north-east, following the coast until you see one of the old man statues (which point to dungeons), slightly further north-east you will see a narrow crevice between some fallen stone arches. A Skeleton wielding the Executioner's Greataxe spawns in this crevice. Beware that having Crepus's Vial equipped will prevent the skeleton from spawning, even when riding Torrent.      The graveyard above Academy Gate Town.       From Gate Town North site of grace, head south and a little east to a graveyard near a large tree. Specific location of the Skeleton wielding the Executioner's Greataxe is due east from the South Raya Lucaria Gate site of grace.

01D9A200.name: Albinauric Shield
01D9A200.hint: Drops from Albinaurics wielding this shield. There are three on top of the church northwest of the Academy Gate Town Site of Grace.

01CCA9B0.name: Spiralhorn Shield
01CCA9B0.hint: The Spiralhorn Shield Shield can be found at the following location  Uld Palace Ruins in northeast Liurnia of the Lakes: From the Ruined Labyrinth Site of Grace, head north towards the Walking Mausoleum in the lower lake of the Mausoleum Compound. Turn left along the lake shore, heading uphill. The shield is found off a nearby corpse.

40001022.name: Terra Magica
40001022.hint: Requires completion of the Academy Crystal Cave dungeon and taking the elevator behind the Crystalians bosses. This leads to a tower inside the academy, on the top of which a chest containing the spell can be found.

100CAB5C.name: Sorcerer Leggings
100CAB5C.hint: They are dropped by Glintstone Sorcerers and Twinsage Sorcerers in Raya Lucaria Academy.

01F82680.name: Crystal Staff
01F82680.hint: Academy Crystal Cave. The Staff is behind an illusory wall in the room right before the boss gate. The wall is to the left of the stone archway that leads to a side-room nearby. Screenshot here.

100CAAF8.name: Sorcerer Manchettes
100CAAF8.hint: They are dropped by Glintstone Sorcerers and Twinsage Sorcerers in Raya Lucaria Academy.

4000119E.name: Crystal Release
4000119E.hint: Dropped by the Crystalians at the Academy Crystal Cave

100CAA94.name: Raya Lucarian Robe
100CAA94.hint: The Raya Lucarian Robe Chest Armor can be dropped by Glintstone Sorcerers in Raya Lucaria Academy.  Video Location

01FA9780.name: Academy Glintstone Staff
01FA9780.hint: Looted from Thops's body.       You must give him the Academy Glintstone Key first.    Once he has it, fast travel to the Schoolhouse Classroom site of grace of Raya Lucaria Academy, you'll find him dead outside the room. Go outside and turn right, you'll find him, sitting in a chair.    He also drops this if you kill him, instead of giving the key.      Alternatively, it has a chance to be dropped by any of the Glintstone Sorcerers inside Raya Lucaria Academy.

80002904.name: Ash of War: Charge Forth
80002904.hint: Location: Liurnia of the Lakes  Nearest Site of Grace: Academy Gate Town  Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab that is attached to a ceiling under a bridge west-northwest of the Academy Gate Town Site of Grace, above some Land Squirts and near a Giant Crab in the Academy Gate Town. Recommended to manually aim with a bow, as it cannot be locked on to. Elden Ring.

100CD140.name: Marionette Soldier Helm
100CD140.hint: Various places in Liurnia of the Lakes, including Raya Lucaria Academy, Academy Gate Town, and Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel. They can also be found in the Witchbane Ruins on the Weeping Peninsula, and on Mt. Gelmir.

100CD1A4.name: Marionette Soldier Armor
100CD1A4.hint: Various places in Liurnia of the Lakes, including Raya Lucaria Academy, Academy Gate Town, and Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel. They can also be found in the Witchbane Ruins on the Weeping Peninsula, and on Mt. Gelmir.

101A1878.name: Raya Lucarian Gauntlets
101A1878.hint: Can be dropped by Raya Lucaria Soldier  Easily farmed from the Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Caria Manor after the Manor Lower Level site of grace.

4000219C.name: Map (Liurnia, North)
4000219C.hint: You can find the Liurnia North Map at the South Entrance to the Academy Gate Town, by the flooded roads leading to the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

101A1814.name: Cuckoo Surcoat
101A1814.hint: Drops from Raya Lucarian Soldiers  Easily farmed from the Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Caria Manor after the Manor Lower Level site of grace.

4000247C.name: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [4]
4000247C.hint: Where to find Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [4]  From the Academy Gate Town Site of Grace, head northwest and look for a sunken church building with enemies on the roof. The chest is located inside a tower that you can jump inside.  On the map, it is right next to the Academy Gate Town map icon on the left/west.

101A17B0.name: Raya Lucarian Helm
101A17B0.hint: The Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Caria Manor drop all pieces of the Raya Lucarian Soldier Set. They are easily farmed on the ramparts after the Manor Lower Level site of grace. Video Location

101A18DC.name: Raya Lucarian Greaves
101A18DC.hint: Dropped by Raya Lucarian Soldiers  Easily farmed from the Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Caria Manor after the Manor Lower Level site of grace.

02625A00.name: Shortbow
02625A00.hint: Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class  Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant for 600 Runes. He is located south-east of Coastal Cave.  Chance to drop from bow-wielding Marionette Soldiers

10102D04.name: Dirty Chainmail
10102D04.hint: Dropped by the Second Generation Albinaurics that are visibly wearing the chest piece.  An easily farmable group of 6 is located near the Academy Gate Town site of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes. Head northwest from the site of grace until you reach an L-shaped building with a small tower at the corner. There will be 2 on the left sloped roof, 2 near the tower and 2 immediately upon jumping off the North side of the building.

00A84DF0.name: Curved Club
00A84DF0.hint: This weapon can be looted from the club and shield Albinaurics found at Academy Gate Town grace.       A group of Albinaurics wielding Curved Clubs can be found on a fallen bridge section east of this grace, in the direction of the Gate Town Bridge grace. Two of those sitting on the bridge section have the Curved Club and there's another patrolling in a pair further ahead.

011392E0.name: Ripple Crescent Halberd
011392E0.hint: Has a low chance to drop from Albinaurics that wields it, found in Academy Gate Town       A group of three Albinaurics who wield this weapon can be found at the first ruin to the east of the Fallen Ruins of the Lake Site of Grace in Liurnia           Two Albinaurics can be found sitting at the southern end of the ruin. One can be found standing on top of the ruin.            Drops fairly quickly near the Palace Approach Ledge-Road grace. Just past the shoreline, there is a tree with half a dozen or so enemies carrying this halberd.

01DB0190.name: Brass Shield
01DB0190.hint: Dropped by Godrick Soldiers seen to be carrying it. (In 231 kills, 2 dropped. Approx. 0.8%)  Dropped by Raya Lucaria Soldiers seen to be carrying it.  An easy early location to farm begins at the “Gatefront” Site of Grace in the western part of main Limgrave, just north of the forest and just before Stormgate. Once you spawn in, turn around to face south east. There will be four Brass Shield carrying Godrick Soldiers in the Gatefront Ruins area that should be relatively easy to farm. Two are in a small fenced in area to the right of the road. One is on the road, carrying a horn. The last one is sitting next to a fire nearby.   Nearly all the Raya Lucaria Soldiers who are gathered outside Raya Lucaria Academy are carrying one, making it a good place to farm for it if you missed getting it earlier.

02810590.name: Golem Greatbow
02810590.hint: The Golem Greatbow has a chance to drop from any Golem archer. The Golem Greatbow does not drop from Golems with halberds.  One can be found on the Limgrave Tower Bridge in Stormhill, which can be accessed from Stormveil Castle. Two halberd Golems are also found on the bridge.  Two can be found on the path towards the colosseum in Caelid. This location is only accessible via a lift in the Siofra River that takes the player to the Deep Siofra Well.       These two Golem archers fire magic-imbued explosive arrows and are also the only source of Golem's Magic Arrow.      One can be found next to the top of the Grand Lift of Dectus, in the Altus Plateau. It is accompanied by a single halberd Golem.       If the Grand Lift of Dectus is activated after finding both halves of the Dectus Medallion, the Golems guarding the lift will be non-hostile until the the player initiates combat. (needs confirmation, not sure if the game checks for possession of the medallion or usage of the lift)       One can be found outside the entrance of Castle Morne, at the southern tip of the Weeping Peninsula.  Two can be found in the north-eastern section of the Capital Outskirts, on the hill approaching the northern entrance to Leyndell Royal Capital (Legacy Dungeon).  One can be found in the Mountaintops of the Giants, guarding the tall and narrow path north.

0160C880.name: Golem's Halberd
0160C880.hint: Possible drop from a Golem wielding this weapon, the earliest respawning one being at Limgrave Tower Bridge Site of Grace.

40001324.name: Briars of Sin

Cross the natural stone bridge, there will be by a group of Burning Slugs close to the sorcerer.. If you see only 2 slugs and no sorcerer, just head west to the other side of the large rocks. The sorcerer is located just south of the encampment.

40034008.name: Skeletal Bandit Ashes

80002D50.hint: Previously dropped by the lone wandering Troll Knight (no longer as of 1.03.02).  Dropped by area boss in northern Liurnia, Night's Cavalry, between Bellum Church and East Raya Lucaria Gate sites of grace. Only appears at night.

01EC1890.name: Cuckoo Greatshield
01EC1890.hint: Chance to drop from any Cuckoo Knight wielding the greatshield       Farming route (click for image): If you farm this route in reverse coming from Bellum Church, you can snipe the sitting Cuckoo Knight first and ignore the other mobs. By the time you kill the last Cuckoo Knight you should have enough distance between you and the other mobs to go out of combat. If you start from the East Raya Lucaria Gate Site of Grace and kill the sitting Cuckoo Knight last, you'll have to either run back to the site of grace, kill all the surrounding mobs or use your Memory of Grace, since being in combat will prevent you from fast traveling.    Alternative route (click for image): Start in the Bellum Church and head east. While behind the ruin (Point 1), summon your spirit ash. Go around to the front, and immediately kill the caster standing on the ruin (just to make the fight less annoying). Kill the Cuckoo Knight  and two other mobs (Point 2); while fighting, a farther mob will sound a horn. This will summon a horseback Knight. While fighting the horseback Knight, another will come around during their standard patrol. After these three have been killed, head south-west and then east to go up the hill to Point 3. A solo Knight will be here. After killing, refill on HP/FP and jump down the ruins and follow the path to Point 4. Summon your ashes again to fight the group on the road, including a Knight. While fighting this group, you may attract the attention of the Knight on the north-west side of the road. If not, head up to kill them, then cross the road to kill the final one. This path will net you 7 Cuckoo Knight kills in around 2 minutes.

From the room with the falling blades, stand on top of one after it drops to be lifted up, giving you access to a hallway heading south. From here, carefully drop down the wooden platforms and you should reach a graveyard area with some jar warriors, drop down a few more ledges, and you should see this Ash on a corpse lying on top of an archway. Video Location

The ghost disappears as soon as you touch it and the Juvenile Scholar Cap will appear on the ground along with a Juvenile Scholar Robe and 1 x Larval Tear.

80002E18.name: Ash of War: Loretta's Slash

0020A760.name: Sword of Night and Flame
0020A760.hint: The Sword of Night and Flame weapon can be found in Caria Manor in a locked room behind the gardens in the east side of the manor.Begin at the Manor Lower Level site of grace and proceed east across the rooftops, being wary of any spirit soldiers that may appear. From the first intersection, head north and continue down the pathway until the next junction is reached.At this next junction, face north and continue for a few steps.Looking down over the edge of the walkway (around halfway through to the next junction), you should see a platform containing a ladder. This is your goal -- see image below. You can jump from the walkway down onto the upper roof, then down again to reach the platform where the ladder is.Once you've descended the ladder, there will be a chest containing the sword next to a chair near the center of the room. Video Location

40001AF4.hint: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Dragon Cult Prayerbook which is dropped by a Leyndell Knight patrolling south of Artist's Shack.

4000191E.name: Blessing's Boon
4000191E.hint: Can be purchased from Miriel, Pastor of Vows at the Church of Vows for  4,000 Runes.

4000114E.name: Carian Greatsword

40001A4A.name: Law of Regression
40001A4A.hint: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows, after giving either the Golden Order Principia prayerbook.

400017D4.name: Giantsflame Take Thee
400017D4.hint: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving them the Giant's Prayerbook.  Cost:  13,000 Runes.

4000186A.name: Black Flame Blade
4000186A.hint: This incantation is unlocked for purchase after giving a Godskin Prayerbook to Brother Corhyn or  Miriel, Pastor of Vows.   Location: Stormveil Castle  Nearest Site of Grace: Liftside Chamber  From the arch doorway exiting to the courtyard, head straight into the area with all the enemies and hug the right side and you'll see a set of stairs that goes underground.  You'll find a room that is guarded by four Giant Rats, and ahead, is a doorway that is blocked by a white fog. To dispel this, you will need to use a Stonesword Key on the Imp Statue. You'll find a stock room upon unlocking the doorway, which has a treasure chest holding the Godskin Prayerbook, and another chest holding the Godslayer's Seal.

40038658.name: Kaiden Sellsword Ashes
40038658.hint: Where to Find Kaiden Sellsword Ashes:   Drops from Erdtree Burial Watchdog in Cliffbottom Catacombs.

4000089B.name: Prattling Pate Wonderful
4000089B.hint: Prattling Pate "Wonderful" can be found in Cliffbottom Catacombs, in the tunnel area surrounding the room that players fall down in to advance.   Prattling Pate "Hello"  Prattling Pate "Thank you"  Prattling Pate "Apologies"  Prattling Pate "Please help"  Prattling Pate "Let's get to it"  Prattling Pate "You're beautiful"  Prattling Pate "My Beloved"

40035B60.name: Page Ashes
40035B60.hint: Where to Find Page Ashes  Can be found in Cliffbottom Catacombs, on the tomb being watched by an Omen in the final room of the catacomb after climbing up the ladder.

00D5C690.name: Forked Hatchet
00D5C690.hint: Dropped by Imps using this weapon.

10107EA8.name: Imp Head (Fanged)
10107EA8.hint: Rare drop from Imps with the same head. Can be found at Cliffbottom Catacombs and Wyndham Catacombs.   Best place to farm is probably Wynham Catacombs. Kill the boss (allows fast travel back to grace).Go down elevator, send elevator back up, go to next room, kill 2 imps, go to next room, kill 2 imps, fast travel back to grace. Repeat.

10108A60.name: Imp Head (Wolf)
10108A60.hint: Drops from Forked Greatsword wielding Wolf-Headed Imps in Catacombs  Minor Erdtree Catacombs: Body laying over a sarcophagus. A quick way to reach it is taking the lift at the beginning of the dungeon down, sending it back up, then dropping down into the room below. From there, head down the rot filled hallway and take the first right. Go straight and in the next room climb up the ladder on the right. The body with the helmet will be straight ahead at the end of the hallway.

1013D620.name: Nox Mirrorhelm
1013D620.hint: Cliffbottom Catacombs: In the sealed room, accessible by using a Stonesword Key at the Imp Statue.

00E508D0.name: Warped Axe
00E508D0.hint: Has a chance to drop from Omens  wielding this weapon. (4.00% chance)  Can drop from the Omen in the Cliffbottom Catacombs.  Can drop from the Omens near the "Abandoned Coffin" Site of Grace on the Altus Plateau.       An easy way to farm here is to pop a Silver-Pickled Fowl Foot and approach the first axe Omen by advancing Northeast between the coffin carriages. Clear that first mob who tries to jump on you, run back rest, and do it again as many times as you can before the Item Discovery effect wears off.      Two Omens wielding this axe can be found near the Underground Roadside Site of Grace in Subterranean Shunning-Grounds.

10107AC0.name: Imp Head (Cat)
10107AC0.hint: Rare drop from Imps.  Farming: from the Impaler's Catacombs site of grace, run to the imp at the bottom of the stairs, and after killing this one, run back up and kill the one near the top which is now done climbing; you are close to the grace again.

007AFC60.name: Omen Cleaver
007AFC60.hint: Has a chance to drop from Omen enemies wielding it. (4.00% chance)  You can find one at the heavily guarded courtyard in Stormveil Castle. The nearest checkpoint is the Liftside Chamber site of grace.  If the dog is interfering with your farming attempts, equip Beast-Repellent Torch to deal with it.

0121EAC0.name: Scythe
0121EAC0.hint: Cliffbottom Catacombs: Found near the end of the catacombs, in the room after the stairs that head upwards, guarded by three imps and a floor trap.

40001018.name: Gavel of Haima
40001018.hint: Can be found in the chest at the top of the Converted Fringe Tower in the Liurnia of the Lakes region. It requires the Erudition gesture to unlock: Give Thops the Academy Glintstone Key (Used to gain access to Converted Towers)

40000FF0.name: Cannon of Haima
40000FF0.hint: Can be found in the chest at the top of the Converted Fringe Tower in the northeast of the Liurnia of the Lakes region Elden Ring Interactive.

00F646E0.name: Spiked Spear
00F646E0.hint: Chance to drop from 1 spear-wielding Marionette Soldier just outside of Witchbane Ruins.  Chance to drop from the 6 spear-wielding Marionette Soldiers around the Converted Tower.       Two patrolling the woods to the south of the tower.    One patrols northwest of the tower.    Two patrolling slope north of the tower.    One standing northeast of the tower, further down the slope from the previous two.

400010CE.name: Greatblade Phalanx
400010CE.hint: Cuckoo's Evergaol: Dropped by Bols, Carian Knight upon defeat.

10081650.name: Godskin Noble Hood
10081650.hint: Defeat the Godskin Noble found on the bridge that connects the study hall to the Divine Tower of Liurnia.

20000438.name: Stargazer Heirloom
20000438.hint: Found on a body lying at the top of the Divine Tower of Liurnia.  You will need the Carian Inverted Statue in order to obtain this talisman.  Video Location

100816B4.name: Godskin Noble Robe
100816B4.hint: Defeat the Godskin Noble found on the bridge that connects the study hall to the Divine Tower of Liurnia.

4000220C.name: Note: The Lord of Frenzied Flame
4000220C.hint: This note can be looted from a corpse found within Frenzied Flame Village.Approach the village from the Northern entrance and locate a corpse lying against a corner of the wall to the left as you enter.Sold here as shown with the Video Location

400024E0.name: Frenzied's Cookbook [1]
400024E0.hint: Found on a body in one of the houses of the Frenzied Flame Village in Liurnia of the Lakes.

200017A2.name: Shabriri's Woe
200017A2.hint: Can be found on a body sitting atop the south-facing steps of a building in Frenzied Flame Village. The building is in the far northwest.

001F47D0.name: Weathered Straight Sword
001F47D0.hint: Dropped from Commoner enemies in any area.  Near the Secluded Cell grace in Stormveil castle, there is a room full of 10 commoners above the Living Jars that all carry the weapon. Probably the earliest (and most convenient) farming spot to get both the armor set and weapon. Takes around 20-30 seconds to navigate to the room although you won't have to worry about enemies on the way. The room can be cleared quickly (~15-20 seconds if you can one-shot them) as they are all near each other. Teleport back to the Secluded Cell grace and repeat.   Video Location

40001CA2.name: Howl of Shabriri
40001CA2.hint: Found in a chest on the second level of the Frenzy-Flaming Tower.       From the Grand Lift of Dectus grace site, move South through a mountain path and follow the path. You will come upon a small incline going towards a tall stone tower, use the nearby rocks as cover from the flaming orb above the tower as you make your way towards it. Take a left to climb onto a set of rocks, to your left will be the tower with some small rats and a large rat at the base. Climb 2 ladders and turn around to see a chest containing the Howl of Shabriri incantation.

001F47D0.name: Weathered Straight Sword
001F47D0.hint: Dropped from Commoner enemies in any area.  Near the Secluded Cell grace in Stormveil castle, there is a room full of 10 commoners above the Living Jars that all carry the weapon. Probably the earliest (and most convenient) farming spot to get both the armor set and weapon. Takes around 20-30 seconds to navigate to the room although you won't have to worry about enemies on the way. The room can be cleared quickly (~15-20 seconds if you can one-shot them) as they are all near each other. Teleport back to the Secluded Cell grace and repeat.   Video Location

101B29E8.name: Cuckoo Knight Gauntlets
101B29E8.hint: Dropped from Cuckoo Knights. Four can be found along the road headed northeast of the East Raya Lucaria Gate site of grace.

101B2984.name: Cuckoo Knight Armor
101B2984.hint: Dropped from Cuckoo Knights.  Three Cuckoo Knights are patrolling close to the East Raya Lucaria Gate site of grace, go north-west and jump off the rock elevation to a lower platform. Immediately go right, there is the first one, kill it and ride on straight to come across the second knight. After that one head straight to the nearest road on your map and there is the third one.

101B2A4C.name: Cuckoo Knight Greaves
101B2A4C.hint: Dropped from Cuckoo Knights. Four can be found along the road headed northeast from the East Raya Lucaria Gate site of grace.

101B2920.name: Cuckoo Knight Helm
101B2920.hint: Dropped from Cuckoo Knights. Four can be found along the road headed northeast of the East Raya Lucaria Gate site of grace.

01EC1890.name: Cuckoo Greatshield
01EC1890.hint: Chance to drop from any Cuckoo Knight wielding the greatshield       Farming route (click for image): If you farm this route in reverse coming from Bellum Church, you can snipe the sitting Cuckoo Knight first and ignore the other mobs. By the time you kill the last Cuckoo Knight you should have enough distance between you and the other mobs to go out of combat. If you start from the East Raya Lucaria Gate Site of Grace and kill the sitting Cuckoo Knight last, you'll have to either run back to the site of grace, kill all the surrounding mobs or use your Memory of Grace, since being in combat will prevent you from fast traveling.    Alternative route (click for image): Start in the Bellum Church and head east. While behind the ruin (Point 1), summon your spirit ash. Go around to the front, and immediately kill the caster standing on the ruin (just to make the fight less annoying). Kill the Cuckoo Knight  and two other mobs (Point 2); while fighting, a farther mob will sound a horn. This will summon a horseback Knight. While fighting the horseback Knight, another will come around during their standard patrol. After these three have been killed, head south-west and then east to go up the hill to Point 3. A solo Knight will be here. After killing, refill on HP/FP and jump down the ruins and follow the path to Point 4. Summon your ashes again to fight the group on the road, including a Knight. While fighting this group, you may attract the attention of the Knight on the north-west side of the road. If not, head up to kill them, then cross the road to kill the final one. This path will net you 7 Cuckoo Knight kills in around 2 minutes.

00B80560.name: Great Mace
00B80560.hint: Inside a chest located in the camp with several trebuchets, outside the Grand Lift of Dectus.

002E6300.name: Knight's Greatsword
002E6300.hint: Dropped by most enemies in the knight archetype such as:       Godrick Knights (throughout Limgrave)    Cuckoo Knights (throughout Liurnia of the Lakes)    Mausoleum Knight    Leyndell Knights (throughout the Altus Plateau, especially in Leyndell, Royal Capital)      An easy-to-farm spectral knight that drops this weapon can be found just outside the Black Knife Catacombs in Liurnia of the Lakes.  Sell Value:   200  Base drop rate is 4% (at 100 Discovery)  Other notes and player tips go here

00F4E750.name: Partisan
00F4E750.hint: Dropped by the heavy Godrick Knight in Fort Haight.       Very low drop rate, but it is a confirmed drop.      Dropped by the Redmane Knight in Fort Gael.  Dropped by Cuckoo Knights by East Raya Lucaria Gate  Dropped by Leyndell Knights in Leyndell, Royal Capital  Dropped by Mausoleum Knights on horseback in Deeproot Depths

40002484.name: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [3]
40002484.hint: Where to find Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [3]  Highway Lookout Tower in eastern Liurnia. Found in a chest inside the tower.

100CAB5C.name: Sorcerer Leggings
100CAB5C.hint: They are dropped by Glintstone Sorcerers and Twinsage Sorcerers in Raya Lucaria Academy.

100CAAF8.name: Sorcerer Manchettes

100CAA94.name: Raya Lucarian Robe

01FA2250.name: Carian Glintblade Staff
01FA2250.hint: Highway Lookout Tower in eastern Liurnia: Found on the top floor.

01FA9780.name: Academy Glintstone Staff
01FA9780.hint: Looted from Thops's body.       You must give him the Academy Glintstone Key first.    Once he has it, fast travel to the Schoolhouse Classroom site of grace of Raya Lucaria Academy, you'll find him dead outside the room. Go outside and turn right, you'll find him, sitting in a chair.    He also drops this if you kill him, instead of giving the key.      Alternatively, it has a chance to be dropped by any of the Glintstone Sorcerers inside Raya Lucaria Academy.

0112F6A0.name: Lucerne
0112F6A0.hint: Southeast of Highway Lookout Tower in eastern Liurnia of the Lakes, it's found in the battlefield between phantoms and knights, near where the armored giant spawns. From Liurnia Highway North Site of Grace, ride a short ways north. Break some carts to reveal the treasure.

20001784.name: Carian Filigreed Crest
20001784.hint: Purchased from War Counselor Iji as part of Blaidd's questline.        After killing the Bloodhound Knight Darriwil for Blaidd, the player can tell War Counselor Iji that Blaidd sent them. Iji will then stock the item.    Becomes available to purchase from War Counselor Iji after talking to Ranni and her servants at Ranni's Rise for the the first time.      Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after offering Iji's Bell Bearing

004D0E90.name: Frozen Needle
004D0E90.hint: Kingsrealm Ruins: Found in a chest inside a small room at the end of the underground area in the northeast. Requires defeating of the Royal Revenant boss in order to access the room.

2000080C.name: Spear Talisman
2000080C.hint: Found in a chest inside Lakeside Crystal Cave, near a demi-human campfire.

200003F2.name: Cerulean Amber Medallion
200003F2.hint: Base Talisman: Lakeside Crystal Cave: After defeating the Bloodhound Knight.  +1 Variant: Castle Sol: Found on a corpse hanging by a wooden ledge above the southern walls of the castle. This area is accessed by climbing a ladder behind the church in the southeast and following the walls west. Beware the very powerful dual sword knight guarding the area. He can teleport behind you and perform long combos.  +2 Variant: Lunar Estate Ruins: Found in a treasure chest in an underground room northwest of the ruins. Look for an Imp Statue pressed up against the wall. This requires one Stonesword Key. The stairs are also concealed by an illusory floor. Simply hit the floor next to the Imp Statue to reveal the stairs.

0010A1D0.name: Great Knife
0010A1D0.hint: Starting equipment for the Bandit class.  Rare drop from Demi-Humans wielding this weapon.       Craftman's Shack: four Demi-Humans hiding in a flock of sheep north of the Site of Grace.     Lakeside Crystal Cave: one Demi-Human hiding in a bush at the start of the dungeon.

40002481.name: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [2]
40002481.hint: Where to find Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [2]Found in a corpse just by the Laskyar Ruins Site of Grace.

40000C08.name: Wraith Calling Bell
40000C08.hint: Liurnia of the Lakes: Found in a chest in an underground room in the Laskyar Ruins. The steps leading down can be found in the northwest section.

200003F4.name: Cerulean Amber Medallion +2
200003F4.hint: Base Talisman: Lakeside Crystal Cave: After defeating the Bloodhound Knight.  +1 Variant: Castle Sol: Found on a corpse hanging by a wooden ledge above the southern walls of the castle. This area is accessed by climbing a ladder behind the church in the southeast and following the walls west. Beware the very powerful dual sword knight guarding the area. He can teleport behind you and perform long combos.  +2 Variant: Lunar Estate Ruins: Found in a treasure chest in an underground room northwest of the ruins. Look for an Imp Statue pressed up against the wall. This requires one Stonesword Key. The stairs are also concealed by an illusory floor. Simply hit the floor next to the Imp Statue to reveal the stairs.

400017DE.name: Flame of the Fell God
400017DE.hint: Liurnia of the Lakes: Dropped by Adan, Thief of Fire upon defeat. Elden Ring Interactive

80003070.name: Ash of War: Sword Dance
80003070.hint: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found near the Minor Erdtree in southwest Liurnia, below the cliffs leading to a path where several jellyfish are located. Elden Ring.

40002AFC.name: Cerulean Crystal Tear (1)
40002AFC.hint: One dropped by the Erdtree Avatar that resides in Liurnia of the Lakes.  One dropped by the Erdtree Avatar guarding the Minor Erdtree (Mountaintops East).

40002B08.name: Ruptured Crystal Tear (1)
40002B08.hint: Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar that resides in Liurnia of the Lakes.  Dropped by the Putrid Avatar at the Minor Erdtree in the Consecrated Snowfield, east of Ordina, Liturgical Town.

40002B16.name: Lightning-Shrouding Cracked Tear
40002B16.hint: Dropped by Erdtree Avatar in Minor Erdtree (Liurnia Northeast) in Northeastern Liurnia of the Lakes. Elden Ring Interactive

40002B15.name: Magic-Shrouding Cracked Tear
40002B15.hint: Dropped by Erdtree Avatar in Minor Erdtree (Liurnia Northeast) in Northeastern Liurnia of the Lakes, east of the Mausoleum Compound Site of Grace.

40002B17.hint: Dropped by Erdtree Avatar in Minor Erdtree (Liurnia Northeast) in Northeastern Liurnia of the Lakes. Elden Ring Interactive

20000442.name: Two Fingers Heirloom
20000442.hint: Can be found in the basement of the Purified Ruins in Southeast Liurnia of the Lakes, whose entrance is hidden under some boards, in a chest.

101BED38.name: Foot Soldier Gauntlets
101BED38.hint: Dropped by only Godrick Foot Soldiers. Defeat a Godrick Foot Soldier to gain a chance to obtain this item. Godrick Foot Soldiers can be found throughout Limgrave.

101A1878.name: Raya Lucarian Gauntlets
101A1878.hint: Can be dropped by Raya Lucaria Soldier  Easily farmed from the Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Caria Manor after the Manor Lower Level site of grace.

101A1814.name: Cuckoo Surcoat
101A1814.hint: Drops from Raya Lucarian Soldiers  Easily farmed from the Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Caria Manor after the Manor Lower Level site of grace.

101BED9C.name: Foot Soldier Greaves
101BED9C.hint: Dropped by only Godrick Foot Soldiers. Defeat a Godrick Foot Soldier to gain a chance to obtain this item. Godrick Foot Soldiers can be found throughout Limgrave.

101A17B0.name: Raya Lucarian Helm
101A17B0.hint: The Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Caria Manor drop all pieces of the Raya Lucarian Soldier Set. They are easily farmed on the ramparts after the Manor Lower Level site of grace. Video Location

101C13E4.name: Foot Soldier Tabard
101C13E4.hint: They can drop from Raya Lucaria Foot Soldiers, found in Liurnia.

101C1380.name: Foot Soldier Helmet
101C1380.hint: Dropped by Raya Lucaria Foot Soldiers in Liurnia.

101A18DC.name: Raya Lucarian Greaves
101A18DC.hint: Dropped by Raya Lucarian Soldiers  Easily farmed from the Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Caria Manor after the Manor Lower Level site of grace.

01DB0190.name: Brass Shield
01DB0190.hint: Dropped by Godrick Soldiers seen to be carrying it. (In 231 kills, 2 dropped. Approx. 0.8%)  Dropped by Raya Lucaria Soldiers seen to be carrying it.  An easy early location to farm begins at the “Gatefront” Site of Grace in the western part of main Limgrave, just north of the forest and just before Stormgate. Once you spawn in, turn around to face south east. There will be four Brass Shield carrying Godrick Soldiers in the Gatefront Ruins area that should be relatively easy to farm. Two are in a small fenced in area to the right of the road. One is on the road, carrying a horn. The last one is sitting next to a fire nearby.   Nearly all the Raya Lucaria Soldiers who are gathered outside Raya Lucaria Academy are carrying one, making it a good place to farm for it if you missed getting it earlier.

20001798.name: Longtail Cat Talisman
20001798.hint: Past the graveyard section of Raya Lucaria Academy, simply ride the lift down. Looted off a corpse that can be found at the bottom section of the large rotating lift.  Nearest Site of Grace: Schoolhouse Classroom.

40001194.name: Shattering Crystal
40001194.hint: Looted off a corpse on the second floor, west side, of the Church of the Cuckoo in Raya Lucaria Academy. The only way to reach this is going through the broken glass window of the church via the rooftops.

40001270.name: Gravity Well
40001270.hint: Map Coordinates  Location: Raya Lucaria Academy  Nearest Site of Grace: Church of the Cuckoo or Schoolhouse Classroom  Dropped by the Lesser Alabaster Lord that appears from a gravity portal. The section is near the graveyard and the large rotating lift of Raya Lucaria Academy.  Video Location

40002207.name: Note: Revenants
40002207.hint: Purchased from Isolated Merchant Raya Lucaria for 1200  Runes.  Sold here as shown with the Video Location

80005848.name: Ash of War: Spectral Lance
80005848.hint: Location: Raya Lucaria Academy  Nearest Site of Grace: Church of the Cuckoo  Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the large graveyard east of the Church of the Cuckoo site of grace. From the site of grace, exit east into the graveyard and head northeast to find a wooden bridge. Just past the bridge, head slightly southeast towards the cliff edge behind a cluster of gravestones. There should be a lower path you can jump down onto and the scarab should be in view at this point.  Video Location

80007530.name: Ash of War: Shield Bash
80007530.hint: Liurnia of the Lakes: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab on the island below the broken bridge connecting Raya Lucaria Academy and East Raya Lucaria Gate.         From the East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace, head northeast, up the slight rise. The scarab is right at the top of this rise, only a few seconds travel from the grace.

4000234F.name: Balled Up
4000234F.hint: Obtained from Rennala after rebirthing for the first time

400024CE.name: Fevor's Cookbook [2]
400024CE.hint: Purchased from an Isolated Merchant  on the east path after entering the Academy of Raya Lucaria for 3500 Runes. Elden Ring Interactive  To get here: from the Main Academy Gate grace, head east down an overgrown bridge inhabited by a pack of wolves. The merchant will be a ways down.  Sold here as shown with the Video Location

100CD140.name: Marionette Soldier Helm
100CD140.hint: Various places in Liurnia of the Lakes, including Raya Lucaria Academy, Academy Gate Town, and Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel. They can also be found in the Witchbane Ruins on the Weeping Peninsula, and on Mt. Gelmir.

100CAA30.name: Twinsage Glintstone Crown
100CAA30.hint: Found at Raya Lucaria Academy  From the Church of the Cuckoo Site of Grace, if you've unlocked the ladder to the second floor, climb it and then head east onto the balcony, climb down, and kill the Crystallized Crab by the corner of the scaffolding.  From the Debate Parlor Site of Grace, you can reach the rooftops leading to the floor above the Church of the Cuckoo through the courtyard. Turn west as you exit the debate parlor, climb the broken stairs, and jump off the west side of the balcony to a staircase below. Head down the stairs to unlock a shortcut, then back up and off the south edge of the balcony onto the rooftops.  Video Location

4000220B.name: Note: Frenzied Flame Village
4000220B.hint: Purchased from Isolated Merchant Raya Lucaria for 1200  Runes. Video Location

100F436C.name: Battlemage Legwraps
100F436C.hint: This piece is dropped by Battlemage enemies.  The entire Battlemage Set drops from a particular Battlemage enemy, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge.

100EF54C.name: Carian Knight Greaves
100EF54C.hint: You can find the Carian Knight Set in Raya Lucaria Academy  To find the Carian Knight Set, you will need to fast travel back to the Church of the Cuckoo site and head to the graveyard section, specifically where the large rotating lift is. On the right side of the gate's entrance, look down as you are hugging the wall to find a platform that you can drop to. Walk on the narrow path and you'll notice a group of Glintstone Zombies worshipping a statue, simply kill the enemies and pick up the glowing item next to the statue to receive the set.

100CD1A4.name: Marionette Soldier Armor
100CD1A4.hint: Various places in Liurnia of the Lakes, including Raya Lucaria Academy, Academy Gate Town, and Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel. They can also be found in the Witchbane Ruins on the Weeping Peninsula, and on Mt. Gelmir.

100CAB5C.name: Sorcerer Leggings
100CAB5C.hint: They are dropped by Glintstone Sorcerers and Twinsage Sorcerers in Raya Lucaria Academy.

4000247E.name: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [5]
4000247E.hint: Where to find Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [5]  Map Coordinates  Location: Raya Lucaria Academy  Nearest Site of Grace: Schoolhouse Classroom  Looted from a treasure chest inside a room. From the Schoolhouse Classroom site of Raya Lucaria Academy, go to the hallway, turn left. Video Location

02910B20.name: Full Moon Crossbow
02910B20.hint: The Full Moon Crossbow weapon can be found in a bell tower, along the Raya Lucaria Academy rooftops.  First, head to the area with the rooftops:       From the Debate Parlor Site of Grace, head out into the courtyard to the north. Go up the destroyed staircase to the northwest and then up another set of stairs northward to where the two sorcerers are. Jump over the railing to the west. Go up the stairs and around the corner. Jump over the railing to the south to land on some rooftops.      After reaching the rooftops, climb up the ladder on a building to the southwest to reach a bridge with a Glintstone Sorcerer and three Avionette Soldiers. Behind them is a bell tower where the chest containing the Full Moon Crossbow is located.  The entrance to the bell tower is on a lower level which requires taking a path around on the rooftops. First, go past the bell tower and drop down two levels. From there, perform a running jump across a gap to reach another section of rooftops to the west.  After making the jump, follow the roofs south past the Marionette Soldiers to enter the bell tower. Climb up the ladder inside to find a chest with the Full Moon Crossbow.    On the first roof you drop down to after crossing the bridge (with the sorcerer and three Avionette Soldiers), there will be a spike that you can jump on:  After jumping on top of that spike, jump onto the gargoyle protruding from the wall to the west.  From there, jump to the roof where there is a body holding an item (a Smithing Stone [4]).  Facing west, you can perform a running jump to cross the gap and land on the rooftops below.  Video Location

101B9F7C.name: Mausoleum Knight Greaves
101B9F7C.hint: Mausoleum Knight Set pieces can be farmed from the Mausoleum Knights, typically found in Liurnia of the Lakes. The easiest one to farm is directly outside the Black Knife Catacombs entrance, which can be reset quickly with the site of grace.  Other possible locations include:       Near the Weeping Peninsula Walking Mausoleum.

100A39F8.name: Warrior Gauntlets
100A39F8.hint: A starting equipment piece for the Warrior Class  Purchasable from Isolated Merchant (Raya Lucaria).   Sold here as shown with the Video Location

4000230D.name: Glintstone Whetblade
4000230D.hint: Location: Raya Lucaria Academy  Nearest Site of Grace: Debate Parlor  Looted off a corpse that is hanging on the fence of an office balcony. From the Debate Parlor Site of Grace, head out to the fountain of the academy's courtyard, go west and head up the slope. The office is in front of the group of kneeling Noble Zombies.  Video Location

100A3A5C.name: Warrior Greaves
100A3A5C.hint: A starting equipment piece for the Warrior Class  Purchasable from Isolated Merchant (Raya Lucaria).   Sold here as shown with the Video Location

400372D0.name: Avionette Soldier Ashes
400372D0.hint: Where to Find Avionette Soldier Ashes  Located on a corpse after taking the rotating lift down in Raya Lucaria Academy. From the Schoolhouse Classroom site of grace, go back outside to the large lift and ride it down. Face north and jump off the lift early onto a rocky platform. There will be an an enemy ambush waiting near the ashes.   Video Location

100A3930.name: Blue Cloth Cowl
100A3930.hint: Starting Equipment for the Warrior Class  Purchasable from Isolated Merchant (Raya Lucaria).

100EF4E8.name: Carian Knight Gauntlets
100EF4E8.hint: You can find the Carian Knight Set in Raya Lucaria Academy  To find the Carian Knight Set, you will need to fast travel back to the Church of the Cuckoo site and head to the graveyard section, specifically where the large rotating lift is. On the right side of the gate's entrance, look down as you are hugging the wall to find a platform that you can drop to. Walk on the narrow path and you'll notice a group of Glintstone Zombies worshipping a statue, simply kill the enemies and pick up the glowing item next to the statue to receive the set.

100CF850.name: Marionette Soldier Birdhelm
100CF850.hint: The Marionette Soldier Birdhelm Helm is dropped from Avionette Soldiers  Two can be found just next to the Sellia Under-Stair Site of Grace. One is on top of some small ruins and another on top of a branch north from grace.  Several of them are located in Altus Tunnel.

10035C8C.name: Page Trousers
10035C8C.hint: Three are easily found behind the Royal Moongazing Grounds site of grace in Caria Manor.  They are scattered throughout Leyndell, Royal Capital  Tombsward Ruins Underground  Gelmir Hero's Grave

100CB200.name: Lazuli Glintstone Crown
100CB200.hint: Found at Raya Lucaria Academy.  Closest Site of Grace: Debate Parlor.  From the Site of Grace, go North. Upon reaching the courtyard, turn left and climb the ruined staircase, then climb the second staircase where 2 mages are shooting at you. When you reach the door, turn left and jump over the railing - behind you is a mage and a shortcut 1-way door. Climb the stairs and turn left, then jump over the railing again. Follow the roof and climb the ladder. After the mage ahead of you, turn right and follow the path until you see a lower roof top. Jump on it, then jump again on the second one. Turn left and go to the edge, there's a gap. Jump it and follow the roof forward and to the right. You will enter a tower with a wooden floor and a hole in it. There are wooden platforms to drop down. The Crystallized Crab is on one of these platforms. Look for the Crystallized Crab inside the hole and kill it, and it will reward you with the crown.

101B9EB4.name: Mausoleum Knight Armor
101B9EB4.hint: Typically found in Liurnia of the Lakes. The easiest one to farm is directly outside the Black Knife Catacombs entrance, which can be reset quickly with the site of grace.  Near the Walking Mausoleum in Weeping Peninsula.

400318F8.name: Fanged Imp Ashes
400318F8.hint: Where to Find Fanged Imp Ashes  You can select Fanged Imp Ashes as Keepsake during Character Creation  It can be purchased from the Isolated Merchant for 2000 Runes. He can be found by traveling to the Main Academy Gate site of grace and following the elevated road east, past the seal and several wolves.   Sold here as shown with the Video Location

100F42A4.name: Battlemage Robe
100F42A4.hint: This piece is dropped by a Battlemage.  The entire Battlemage Set drops from a particular Battlemage enemy, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge.

40036EE8.name: Marionette Soldier Ashes
40036EE8.hint: Where to Find Marionette Soldier Ashes  Location: Raya Lucaria Academy  Nearest Site of Grace: Church of the Cuckoo  When you reach the graveyard section, as you cross the other side of the bridge, make a hard left and drop down to find a path that curves to where the Marionette Soldiers are, kill the two soldiers and then loot the corpse that is hanging by the ledge to find this item.  Video Location

101B9F18.name: Mausoleum Knight Gauntlets
101B9F18.hint: Mausoleum Knight Set pieces can be farmed from the Mausoleum Knights, typically found in Liurnia of the Lakes. The easiest one to farm is directly outside the Black Knife Catacombs entrance, which can be reset quickly with the site of grace.  Other possible locations include:       Near the Weeping Peninsula Walking Mausoleum.

100F4240.name: Haima Glintstone Crown
100F4240.hint: The entire Battlemage Set drops from a particular Battlemage, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge.

101E5D70.name: High Page Hood
101E5D70.hint: The High Page Hood and High Page Clothes can be farmed from High Pages.  The earliest one that can be found is in Raya Lucaria Academy. From the Church of the Cuckoo site, enter the church and take the shortcut ladder up. On the other side of the room is a long hallway with a High Page at the end.  They can also be found in Leyndell, Royal Capital in various buildings.

100F4308.name: Battlemage Manchettes
100F4308.hint: This piece is dropped by Battlemage enemies.  The entire Battlemage Set drops from a particular Battlemage enemy, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge.

20000BB8.name: Graven-School Talisman
20000BB8.hint: At Raya Lucaria Academy, from the Debate Parlor site of grace, head west and turn right before going down the stairs. You should see an empty bookshelf in front of you. Hit it to dispel the illusory wall, then follow the path. Go up the ladder (after picking up Comet from the chest and the Stonesword Key from behind the altar), head east, jump over the railing, and drop down through a hole. Drop down once more to find yourself in a room with many Living Jars; the talisman is next to the crystals. The door to the right leads back to the room below the one you started in, containing multiple Glintstone Sorcerers and a Giant Living Jar.

100A3994.name: Blue Cloth Vest
100A3994.hint: Starting Equipment for the Warrior Class  Purchasable from Isolated Merchant (Raya Lucaria).   Sold here as shown with the Video Location

100CAAF8.name: Sorcerer Manchettes
100CAAF8.hint: They are dropped by Glintstone Sorcerers and Twinsage Sorcerers in Raya Lucaria Academy.

101D05B0.name: Glintstone Scarab
101D05B0.hint: Location: Raya Lucaria Academy  Nearest Site of Grace: Raya Lucaria Grand Library  Found inside a chest. From the garden section where you encountered the hostile NPC Moongrum Carian Knight, go through the gate to the South into the small balcony area with the Glintstone Sorcerer and Wandering Nobles, follow the eastern wall and jump over the balcony railing onto the small ledge outcropping. Follow the path into the nearby alcove, and then climb the ladder. The chest is inside the room at the top of the ladder, guarded by 3 Glintstone Sorcerers and a Lesser Mad Pumpkin Head.  Video Location

100EF484.name: Carian Knight Armor
100EF484.hint: You can find the Carian Knight Set in Raya Lucaria Academy  To find the Carian Knight Set, you will need to fast travel back to the Church of the Cuckoo site and head to the graveyard section, specifically where the large rotating lift is. On the right side of the gate's entrance, look down as you are hugging the wall to find a platform that you can drop to. Walk on the narrow path and you'll notice a group of Glintstone Zombies worshipping a statue, simply kill the enemies and pick up the glowing item next to the statue to receive the set.  Or, travel to Schoolhouse Classroom, go back to the rotating lift and drop down on the lift platform twice to reach the Alabaster Lord's spawn point. Then just follow the guide as above.

101E5DD4.name: High Page Clothes
101E5DD4.hint: The High Page Hood and High Page Clothes can be farmed from High Pages.  The earliest one that can be found is in Raya Lucaria Academy. From the Church of the Cuckoo site, enter the church and take the shortcut ladder up. On the other side of the room is a long hallway with a High Page at the end.  They can also be found in Leyndell, Royal Capital in various buildings. Best place to farm for High Page Clothes/Hood is the West Capital Rampart in Leyndell. Head south from grace and drop down the 2nd stairway you see. There is a high page right underneath the stairs, hiding in the corner. Easy farm near the grace.

100CAA94.name: Raya Lucarian Robe
100CAA94.hint: The Raya Lucarian Robe Chest Armor can be dropped by Glintstone Sorcerers in Raya Lucaria Academy.  Video Location

100EF420.name: Carian Knight Helm
100EF420.hint: You can find the Carian Knight Set in Raya Lucaria Academy.  To find the Carian Knight Set, you will need to fast travel back to the Church of the Cuckoo site and head to the graveyard section, specifically where the large rotating lift is. On the right side of the gate's entrance, look down as you are hugging the wall to find a platform that you can drop to. Walk on the narrow path and you'll notice a group of Glintstone Zombies worshipping a statue, simply kill the enemies and pick up the glowing item next to the statue to receive the set.

02625A00.name: Shortbow
02625A00.hint: Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class  Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant for 600 Runes. He is located south-east of Coastal Cave.  Chance to drop from bow-wielding Marionette Soldiers

100CAE18.name: Olivinus Glintstone Crown
100CAE18.hint: Found at Raya Lucaria Academy  Closest Site of Grace: Schoolhouse Classroom  Looted off a corpse that is on a narrow path. From the site of grace, go to the hallway and towards the room on the left. You'll find an illusory wall in front of the lootable corpse in the said room.  Go to the balcony and jump over the fence on the left. Follow the path that circles back to the entrance of the Schoolhouse Classroom site of grace. Along the narrow path is where you'll find the corpse.  Video Location

01CB4A20.name: Blue-White Wooden Shield
01CB4A20.hint: The Blue-White Wooden Shield Shield can be found at the following location  Can be found on the outskirts of the buildings, heading to Raya Lucaria Academy. Elden Ring Here

1006B6C0.name: Pumpkin Helm
1006B6C0.hint: Saintsbridge, Limgrave   Fort Haight   Castle Morne  Raya Lucaria Academy  Redmane Castle  Altus Plateau - By a grave marker overlooking the cliffs northeast of the Bridge of Iniquity Site of Grace.  Mt Gelmir, east of First Mt. Gelmir Campsite and south of Corpse-Stench Shack.

00A9FBA0.name: Stone Club
00A9FBA0.hint: Chance of being dropped by the Battlemages:       Two can be found in Miquella's Haligtree going back from Haligtree Promenade Site of Grace after defeating Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree (both can be backstabbed and won't aggro at the same time).    One in the graveyard in front of Sellia Hideaway.    One before the Fog wall in Academy Crystal Cave.

101EF9B0.name: Lazuli Robe
101EF9B0.hint: Chance to drop from Lazuli Sorcerers in Raya Lucaria Academy.  A single Lazuli Sorcerer can be found at the Schoolhouse Classroom site of grace.

40000FB5.name: Comet
40000FB5.hint: Found in Raya Lucaria through an Illusory Wall just before the Site of Grace at Debate Parlor. It can be identified as the bookshelf without books on it.  Video Location

100CB5E8.name: Karolos Glintstone Crown
100CB5E8.hint: Can be found at Raya Lucaria Academy  Looted off a Crystallized Crab located at the west side corner of the academy's courtyard.  Closest Site of Grace: Debate Parlor  Video Location

00225510.name: Lazuli Glintstone Sword
00225510.hint: Chance to drop from the Lazuli Sorcerers found in most areas of Raya Lucaria Academy or Caria Manor.       A good place to farm is directly south of the Schoolhouse Classroom Site of Grace. He is very close to the grace.

01FA9780.name: Academy Glintstone Staff
01FA9780.hint: Looted from Thops's body.       You must give him the Academy Glintstone Key first.    Once he has it, fast travel to the Schoolhouse Classroom site of grace of Raya Lucaria Academy, you'll find him dead outside the room. Go outside and turn right, you'll find him, sitting in a chair.    He also drops this if you kill him, instead of giving the key.      Alternatively, it has a chance to be dropped by any of the Glintstone Sorcerers inside Raya Lucaria Academy.

01FB0CB0.name: Azur's Glintstone Staff
01FB0CB0.hint: Location: Raya Lucaria Academy   Assuming you have unlocked all the shortcuts, specifically the ladder on the second floor of the Church of the Cuckoo site, fast travel to the said site and climb up the ladder. Be alert here since the upper level is guarded by a Glintstone Sorcerer and two Lazuli Sorcerers. Head towards the east side and you'll see an arch doorway at the end.  Defeat the High Page guarding the entrance on the other side of the runway, you'll find the weapon on the ground, next to the crystal formation with the inactive School of Graven Mages in it at the center of the room.  Video Location

20000BFE.name: Radagon Icon
20000BFE.hint: In Raya Lucaria Academy, the talisman is found inside a treasure chest on the second floor near the Debate Parlor Site of Grace. From the Site of Grace, head north into the courtyard.Make two hard rights, hugging the building's wall, and then jump over the fence -- you should see a ladder in front of you.Climb up the ladder and head through the broken glass window.The treasure chest is in the north section.

01DBEBF0.name: Carian Knight's Shield
01DBEBF0.hint: Looted from Moongrum, the Carian Knight at Raya Lucaria Academy after defeating the enemy.  Video Location

002E6300.name: Knight's Greatsword
002E6300.hint: Dropped by most enemies in the knight archetype such as:       Godrick Knights (throughout Limgrave)    Cuckoo Knights (throughout Liurnia of the Lakes)    Mausoleum Knight    Leyndell Knights (throughout the Altus Plateau, especially in Leyndell, Royal Capital)      An easy-to-farm spectral knight that drops this weapon can be found just outside the Black Knife Catacombs in Liurnia of the Lakes.  Sell Value:   200  Base drop rate is 4% (at 100 Discovery)  Other notes and player tips go here

01EBF180.name: Eclipse Crest Greatshield
01EBF180.hint: Chance to drop from Mausoleum Knights wielding it in Liurnia of the Lakes   Better farmed from the Knight in front of Black Knife Catacombs.

40001004.name: Shatter Earth
40001004.hint: Found on a corpse in the second-to-last level of the Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel, inside an opening in the north.

100CD140.name: Marionette Soldier Helm
100CD140.hint: Various places in Liurnia of the Lakes, including Raya Lucaria Academy, Academy Gate Town, and Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel. They can also be found in the Witchbane Ruins on the Weeping Peninsula, and on Mt. Gelmir.

100F436C.name: Battlemage Legwraps
