100F42A4.name: Battlemage Robe
100F42A4.hint: This piece is dropped by a Battlemage.  The entire Battlemage Set drops from a particular Battlemage enemy, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge.

00100590.name: Crystal Knife
00100590.hint: Found in a chest inside the Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel, in a storage area three levels down, guarded by Marionettes.

100F4240.name: Haima Glintstone Crown
100F4240.hint: The entire Battlemage Set drops from a particular Battlemage, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge.

100F4308.name: Battlemage Manchettes
100F4308.hint: This piece is dropped by Battlemage enemies.  The entire Battlemage Set drops from a particular Battlemage enemy, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge.

02625A00.name: Shortbow
02625A00.hint: Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class  Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant for 600 Runes. He is located south-east of Coastal Cave.  Chance to drop from bow-wielding Marionette Soldiers

00A9FBA0.name: Stone Club
00A9FBA0.hint: Chance of being dropped by the Battlemages:       Two can be found in Miquella's Haligtree going back from Haligtree Promenade Site of Grace after defeating Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree (both can be backstabbed and won't aggro at the same time).    One in the graveyard in front of Sellia Hideaway.    One before the Fog wall in Academy Crystal Cave.

01F95F00.name: Digger's Staff
01F95F00.hint: Dropped by the Glintstone Miner enemy in the Sellia Crystal Tunnel.       Note: If you enter this area via the teleport trap in the Dragon-Burnt Ruins, you cannot leave it until fighting or sneaking your way out entirely.      Drops from Stonediggers at Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel in Liurnia of the Lakes Region.

100F6A7C.name: Snow Witch Skirt
100F6A7C.hint: Found in a chest on the upper floor of Renna's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.  Video Location

100F69B4.name: Snow Witch Robe
100F69B4.hint: Found in a chest on the upper floor of Renna's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.  Video Location

100F6950.name: Snow Witch Hat
100F6950.hint: Found in a chest on the upper floor of Renna's Rise during the course of Ranni's questline.  Video Location

80002B5C.name: Ash of War: Spinning Strikes
80002B5C.hint: When killed either at Castle Morne, or when he invades  at the Revenger's Shack, Edgar drops a Banished Knight's Halberd +8 with the Spinning Strikes Ash of War attached. The ash of war can be extracted from the weapon.

01131DB0.name: Banished Knight's Halberd
01131DB0.hint: Location: Stormveil Castle.  Chance for it to be looted off the Banished Knight enemies that you've killed.       Farming guide available on the Banished Knight article.      Edgar the Revenger drops a Banished Knight's Halberd upgraded to +8 with the Spinning Strikes Ash of War installed, upon his defeat at Castle Morne or the Revenger's Shack.

40030D40.name: Black Knife Tiche
40030D40.hint: Dropped by Alecto, Black Knife Ringleader upon defeat at the Ringleader's Evergaol in southwestern Liurnia.

40035390.name: Glintstone Sorcerer Ashes
40035390.hint: Where to Find Glintstone Sorcerer Ashes   Defeat the Spirit-Caller Snail at the Road's End Catacombs.

4003D478.name: Raya Lucaria Soldier Ashes
4003D478.hint: Where to Find Raya Lucaria Soldier Ashes  Found inside a chest at the end of Road's End Catacombs. Have to hit the final wall, to dispell it and be able to move on. Beware of the many Fanged Imps at the final room.

00D5C690.name: Forked Hatchet
00D5C690.hint: Dropped by Imps using this weapon.

015F1AD0.name: Watchdog's Staff
015F1AD0.hint: Located in Road's End Catacombs in Liurnia of the Lakes        From the lever, travel down both flights of stairs. Turn around, and hit an illusory wall that gets you to a hidden room that's underneath the grassy platform between both flights of stairs. The Staff is picked up from the corpse in this hidden room.

002DEDD0.name: Forked Greatsword
002DEDD0.hint: Dropped by the imps using this weapon. The best place to farm it is Road's End Catacombs, as the very first imp there, a few yards from the grace, has this sword.        Can also be dropped by imps using this weapon in Minor Erdtree Catacombs.

10108A60.name: Imp Head (Wolf)
10108A60.hint: Drops from Forked Greatsword wielding Wolf-Headed Imps in Catacombs  Minor Erdtree Catacombs: Body laying over a sarcophagus. A quick way to reach it is taking the lift at the beginning of the dungeon down, sending it back up, then dropping down into the room below. From there, head down the rot filled hallway and take the first right. Go straight and in the next room climb up the ladder on the right. The body with the helmet will be straight ahead at the end of the hallway.

10107AC0.name: Imp Head (Cat)
10107AC0.hint: Rare drop from Imps.  Farming: from the Impaler's Catacombs site of grace, run to the imp at the bottom of the stairs, and after killing this one, run back up and kill the one near the top which is now done climbing; you are close to the grace again.

4000245A.name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [12]
4000245A.hint: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [12] can be found at Rose Church, along the southern walls.

400018B0.name: Bloodflame Blade
400018B0.hint: Liurnia of the Lakes: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the marshes northwest to Rose Church, southwest of the lake.

4000125C.name: Meteorite
4000125C.hint: Royal Grave Evergaol: Dropped by the Onyx Lord upon defeat.

10022344.name: Bull-Goat Armor
10022344.hint: Can be found after killing Patches' assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Great Horned Tragoth.

10066904.name: Vulgar Militia Armor
10066904.hint: Around the Bestial Sanctum and Farum Greatbridge sites of grace.

10066968.name: Vulgar Militia Gauntlets
10066968.hint: Around the Bestial Sanctum and Farum Greatbridge sites of grace.

40002330.name: Casual Greeting
40002330.hint: Obtained after summoning Great Horned Tragoth before the boss fight Magma Wyrm Makar or within Starscourge Radahn arenaHas a vocal performance: "Hey!"

1002240C.name: Bull-Goat Greaves
1002240C.hint: Can be found after killing ">Patches' assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Great Horned Tragoth. Elden Ring Interactive

100222E0.name: Bull-Goat Helm
100222E0.hint: Can be found after killing Patches' assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Great Horned Tragoth.

100669CC.name: Vulgar Militia Greaves
100669CC.hint: Around the Bestial Sanctum and Farum Greatbridge sites of grace.

100223A8.name: Bull-Goat Gauntlets
100223A8.hint: Can be found after killing Patches' assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Great Horned Tragoth.

100668A0.name: Vulgar Militia Helm
100668A0.hint: Around the Bestial Sanctum and Farum Greatbridge sites of grace.

006C7D70.name: Serpent-God's Curved Sword
006C7D70.hint: Can be found at Ruin-Strewn Precipice. From the Ruin-Strewn Precipice Overlook Grace, take the elevator down to end up behind the two singing bats. Traversing northward takes you to a ladder, and the sword is behind the Land Octopus.

0114A450.name: Vulgar Militia Shotel
0114A450.hint: Rare drop form Vulgar Militiamen.       The road from the Farum Greatbridge to the Bestial Sanctum has several that can be easily farmed on horseback.

007AAE40.name: Magma Wyrm's Scalesword
007AAE40.hint: Drops from Magma Wyrm Makar in Ruin-Strewn Precipice in northern Liurnia of the Lakes.

00B93DE0.name: Pickaxe
00B93DE0.hint: Dropped by Miners  Fastest farming route is going to the Limgrave Tunnels, go to the second tunnel that leads to boss that's behind the first elevator shaft. There's a Stakes of Marika nearby. Kill the five Miners in the tunnel then jump down the elevator shaft and die. Respawn at the Stake to reset the Miners. Rinse and repeat. Make sure you pick up your runes between each suicide.

0113B9F0.name: Vulgar Militia Saw
0113B9F0.hint: Dropped by enemies wielding this weapon near the Bestial Sanctum in Greyoll's Dragonbarrow.       Example farming route

800058AC.name: Ash of War: Chilling Mist
800058AC.hint: Three Sisters: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the ruins south of Renna's Rise.

10029810.name: Black Wolf Mask
10029810.hint: This mask can be found on top of the wall behind Seluvis's Rise. It can be reached by running and jumping up the crumbling part of the wall near the entrance to the tower.  Video Location

10069014.name: Sage Robe
10069014.hint: Can be found in Stillwater Cave - Liurnia of the Lakes, just ahead and below the Lake Facing Cliffs, it's all sitting on a poison submerged corpse near the entrance, guarded by Giant Bats that will attack you when you take it.

20000820.name: Winged Sword Insignia
20000820.hint: Stillwater Cave: Dropped by the Cleanrot Knight boss upon defeat.

100690DC.name: Sage Trousers
100690DC.hint: Can be found in Stillwater Cave - Liurnia of the Lakes, just ahead and below the Lake Facing Cliffs, it's all sitting on a poison submerged corpse near the entrance, guarded by an Giant Bats that will attack you when you take it. Elden Ring Interactive

10068FB0.name: Sage Hood
10068FB0.hint: Can be found in Stillwater Cave in Liurnia of the Lakes, just ahead of and below the Lake Facing Cliffs. It's sitting on a poison-submerged corpse near the entrance, guarded by Giant Bats that will attack you when you take it.

01140810.name: Glaive
01140810.hint: Dropped by Skeletons wielding it. There is one on the road leading up from Sellia Backstreets Site of Grace.       An easy farming spot can be found just a few steps east from the Church of Vows, the skeleton spawns on the right.

012211D0.name: Grave Scythe
012211D0.hint: Dropped from Skeleton Mages around the game world.       Three of them can be found at the Graveyard west from the Lake-Facing Cliffs site

00D6D800.name: Icerind Hatchet
00D6D800.hint: Can be found at Temple Quarter, southeast of the Site of Grace, in a chest located inside the ruined bell tower, adjacent to a ring of flowers.

20000FD2.name: Pearldrake Talisman
20000FD2.hint: Base talisman: Can be found beyond the lowest ("Crumbling Lands") waygate of the Four Belfries. Go through the waygate, then jump down to the north, then jump down to the east (and if you can, use ranged attacks to kill the two beastmen below), then jump down again, then jump down (to the north) one more time.  +1 Variation: Can be found in Wyndham Ruins in the Mt. Gelmir region. The talisman is found inside a chest at the end of the area sealed by an Imp Statue; a Stonesword Key is required.   +2 Variation: Can be found in Miquella's Haligtree. Travel to the Haligtree Town Site of Grace and exit through the northwestern door. Then climb the ladder and turn around to jump southeast across the gap. The talisman will be located on a corpse at the base of a statue, guarded by a Misbegotten Warrior. Video Location

00C6F980.name: Chainlink Flail
00C6F980.hint: Chance to drop from Lesser Mad Pumpkin Heads wielding this weapon.       The Pumpkin Head in the encampment north of the Foot of the Four Belfries Site of Grace carries it.           From the Foot of the Four Belfries grace, line the center of your compass to the first notch right of North. Go straight until you reach a rockface that ascends upwards. Follow the rockface until you see a spiked wooden barricade to your left. The Pumpkin Head enemy will be just on the other side. Using this path you can fight him without alerting any of the other enemies and also land a preemptive attack from behind for a quicker farm.          One can be found Southwest from the Road of Iniquity Side Path site of grace. Continuing southwest, you will find a second one sitting on a ledge overlooking The Shaded Castle.      A Pumpkin Head wielding one can also be found just outside of Fort Haight and can drop it, but he will no longer spawn if the fort is cleared.

10030DA4.name: Banished Knight Armor
10030DA4.hint: Chance to drop from two specific spectral Banished Knights located in Castle Sol that can be seen wearing the unaltered cloaked armor.    The northern one can be easily farmed by starting from the Castle Sol Rooftop site of grace and running south to the elevator. The Banished Knight can be shot with ranged weapons from here causing it to teleport to the player. The same can be achieved by shooting an arrow through the arrow slit in the grace platform (west side), although the knight doesn't always teleport when shooting him from this spot.  The southern one can be reached from the Church of the Eclipse site of grace by exiting through the church to the left, turning right outside, and heading up the ladder to the catwalks. After following the catwalk past the exile soldier and around the small tower, the Banished Knight can be found just past the ladder leading down. It is recommended that the player jump onto the lower roof next to the catwalk and tower, and bait the red-eyed Banished Knight into teleporting onto the small wooden catwalk extension of the roof; then the player can roll or jump to the walkway the Banished Knight was just standing on. The Banished Knight will slowly walk towards the player, then fall to its death onto the ground below, saving the player a good deal of trouble. Then the player walk down the walkway and make their way over to the loot, which will be in a corner, behind a tombstone.   Dropped from all other Banished Knights. They can be found in Stormveil Castle, Cathedral of Dragon Communion, Crumbling Farum Azula, and Castle Sol.

00216AB0.name: Sword of St. Trina
00216AB0.hint: In the Forsaken Ruins, near the Rotview Balcony Site of Grace, behind an Imp Seal requiring one Stonesword Key.  This weapon is very easy to get at a very low-level as a sorcerer. With just 18 int, rock sling, and ideally the meteorite staff, you can stand on the balcony near the site of grace and attack the crows. The first hit will knock them to the ground, and then you can just fling rocks at them until they die and they will be completely unable to attack you since they can't reach you. Once you've killed the two that matter, you can go down the cliff on the left and get to the area very easily and safely.

0021DFE0.name: Regalia of Eochaid
0021DFE0.hint: Can get this early with precise jumps on the cliffs near Third Church of Marika by the beach.  Falling from the top of the cliff also works.  Going through the Gaol Cave is the intended route.   Credit to anonymous comment below for the following: I'll try and better explain what the writers meant by “precise jumps on the cliffs”. Go to the Third Church of Marika and face Southeast. Ride your horse until the cliff meets the water. The cliff side here should have a more red hue to it than the rest of the stone typically found in Limgrave. If you’re facing the wall due East you’ll notice a cragged vertical line where one part of the cliff face is protruding from another. Double jump on Torrent while following that and you should now be riding up the cliff face. Now turn your camera to face Northeast, you’ll notice what appears to be an arrowhead of grey stone forming a flat surface among the red-hued cliff. Jump there. Turn the camera South. While it doesn’t look feasible, sprint jump with torrent towards the protrusion across the before mentioned cragged vertical line. When you land, quickly double jump (facing East) to get on top of the ledge. You’ll notice above you several steps in the cliff face just slightly to the right- climb those. Then, jump due North onto the final platform. You will now be above the cliff and able to drop down.

40002473.name: Armorer's Cookbook [5]

Through a door in the southwest, past a room with an assassin enemy is an outdoors area with a ladder and a door to the right. The cookbook is in the room to the right. Please note that the doors in Redmane Castle open only after defeating the Misbegotten Warrior & Crucible Knight bosses. Video Location

80005398.name: Ash of War: Flaming Strike
80005398.hint: Redmane Castle, dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in a small graveyard along the south cliffside behind the castle. From the front gate, hug right along the cliff towards the ballista, going up and past the vampire bats. There will be a small gap in the cliff that must be jumped across to get to the graveyard.   From the Chamber Outside the Plaza site of grace, head south. Make your way through the barricades and head down the stairs to the SW (there is a transporter on them). Go past the tree with hanged men and make a south up a few short stairways into the castle. Go up the stairway inside and head outside again to the south. Either a) Make a left and turn right/south to enter the castle again, taking out any resting soldiers if need be. On the left side at the other end of the room is a door which opens up into the graveyard area (only openable from this side).OR b) instead of making a left, continue eastward, go up the ladder, make a right and go up some stairs, turn west, then south after the castle turret, and move onto a wooden ramp curving counterclockwise around the turret. Go down the ladder here to enter the graveyard. The door in the above method can be seen to the west, up several flights of wooden stairs.  Video Location

02817AC0.hint: Chance to drop from Redmane Knight in Fort Gael. .  Chance to drop from a Leyndell Knight wielding it in Altus Plateau, near the Altus Highway Junction Site of Grace.  From chest at the Highway Lookout Tower (Altus Plateau) to the north of the Divine Capital.

101B786C.name: Redmane Knight Greaves
101B786C.hint: Chance to drop from Redmane Knight in Fort Gael.

101A65D0.name: Radahn Soldier Helm
101A65D0.hint: Easily found in large numbers around Fort Gael.

101B77A4.name: Redmane Knight Armor
101B77A4.hint: Chance to drop from Redmane Knight in Fort Gael.  Chance to drop from Redmane Knight at a small camp southwest of the Smoldering Wall site of grace.

101C61A0.name: Foot Soldier Helm
101C61A0.hint: It can be farmed at Caelid. Starting from the grace Chamber Outside the Plaza in Redmane Castle, go south and there will be four Radahn Foot Soldiers wearing the helm.

101B7740.name: Redmane Knight Helm
101B7740.hint: Chance to drop from Redmane Knight in Fort Gael.  Chance to drop from the horse-mounted Redmane Knight west of the Impassible Greatbridge, past the warring soldiers and dogs.

4000230B.name: Red-Hot Whetblade
4000230B.hint: When the Radahn Festival is inactive, travel to the Chamber Outside the Plaza site of grace. Once there, head out to the three flamethrower enemies and take a right. You should be face to face with another flamethrower. Go past them and towards the tower. An Iron Maiden will attack you as you're heading towards it. Once inside you'll find the whetblade and another enemy. Video Location

003E4180.name: Ruins Greatsword
003E4180.hint: Ruins Greatsword can be acquried by defeating Misbegotten Warrior + Crucible Knight at Redmane Castle Plaza. This boss fight is only accessible before the festival OR after defeating Starscourge Radahn and exhausting Witch-Hunter Jerren's subsequent dialogue. Video Location

01EBCA70.name: Redmane Greatshield
01EBCA70.hint: Dropped by Redmane Knights in Caelid. Video Location       Can drop from the horseback Redmane Knight found northwest of the Impassable Greatbridge Site of Grace. Follow the nearby cliff edge past the sword monument, drop down the small ledge, then continue west a short distance.    Can drop from the Redmane Knight sitting outside to the west of Redmane Castle, next to the large wooden tower.    Can drop from the Redmane Knight archer defending the front of Fort Gael as well as the Redmane Knight in the northeastern corner of the upper area of Fort Gael.    Can drop from the Redmane Knight in the upper northeastern part of Redmane Castle, across a small wooden bridge.

002E6300.name: Knight's Greatsword
002E6300.hint: Dropped by most enemies in the knight archetype such as:       Godrick Knights (throughout Limgrave)    Cuckoo Knights (throughout Liurnia of the Lakes)    Mausoleum Knight    Leyndell Knights (throughout the Altus Plateau, especially in Leyndell, Royal Capital)      An easy-to-farm spectral knight that drops this weapon can be found just outside the Black Knife Catacombs in Liurnia of the Lakes.  Sell Value:   200  Base drop rate is 4% (at 100 Discovery)  Other notes and player tips go here

002E8A10.name: Flamberge
002E8A10.hint: Redmane Castle: up on the rampart, guarded by a Pumpkin Head.Cannot be obtained while Radahn Festival is ongoing. Either get it before the festival starts or after defeating Starscourge Radahn. Video Location

00F4E750.name: Partisan
00F4E750.hint: Dropped by the heavy Godrick Knight in Fort Haight.       Very low drop rate, but it is a confirmed drop.      Dropped by the Redmane Knight in Fort Gael.  Dropped by Cuckoo Knights by East Raya Lucaria Gate  Dropped by Leyndell Knights in Leyndell, Royal Capital  Dropped by Mausoleum Knights on horseback in Deeproot Depths

400022FB.name: Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing [1]
400022FB.hint: Sellia Crystal Tunnel: Dropped by the Fallingstar Beast upon defeat.

20000BE0.name: Faithful Canvas Talisman
20000BE0.hint: Sellia Crystal Tunnel. Located on a corpse guarded by two Lesser Kindred of Rot.

0112CF90.name: Pest's Glaive
0112CF90.hint: Drops from Lesser Kindred of Rot (Pests).       Two  can be easily farmed in front of the Church of the Plague.    Eleven can be found inside the Grand Cloister.

4000100E.name: Rock Blaster
4000100E.hint: Sellia Crystal Tunnel: Found in a chest inside a storage shed in the upper levels of the main cavern.

01F95F00.name: Digger's Staff
01F95F00.hint: Dropped by the Glintstone Miner enemy in the Sellia Crystal Tunnel.       Note: If you enter this area via the teleport trap in the Dragon-Burnt Ruins, you cannot leave it until fighting or sneaking your way out entirely.      Drops from Stonediggers at Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel in Liurnia of the Lakes Region.

00B93DE0.name: Pickaxe
00B93DE0.hint: Dropped by Miners  Fastest farming route is going to the Limgrave Tunnels, go to the second tunnel that leads to boss that's behind the first elevator shaft. There's a Stakes of Marika nearby. Kill the five Miners in the tunnel then jump down the elevator shaft and die. Respawn at the Stake to reset the Miners. Rinse and repeat. Make sure you pick up your runes between each suicide.

40035F48.name: Battlemage Hugues
40035F48.hint: From the Dragonbarrow West Site of Grace, follow the crevasse east and then south. At the end of the cliffside, you'll find Sellia Evergaol which holds Battlemage Hugues.

100F436C.name: Battlemage Legwraps
100F436C.hint: This piece is dropped by Battlemage enemies.  The entire Battlemage Set drops from a particular Battlemage enemy, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge.

40032C80.name: Crystalian Ashes
40032C80.hint: Where to Find Crystalian Ashes  Sellia Hideaway: Once you reach the first large room, walk across to the other end of the room, staying on the top level. You'll soon enter a tunnel with a Stake of Marika in it. As soon as you reach the end of this tunnel, hug the right wall closely, and you'll pass 3 giant purple crystals on your left almost immediately. Walk up the third crystal, drop to another crystal facing south, then drop to a third crystal facing south-southwest. This crystal leads to a tunnel in the far wall. In that tunnel is a drop that leads directly into the room with the chest containing these ashes, protected by 3 sorcerers.  The entrance to Sellia Hideaway is located north of the Church of the Plague site of grace. Look for a small graveyard with a sorcerer wielding a staff and club. Behind the headstone where that sorcerer spawns there is an illusionary wall that hides the entrance to the dungeon.

100F42A4.name: Battlemage Robe
100F42A4.hint: This piece is dropped by a Battlemage.  The entire Battlemage Set drops from a particular Battlemage enemy, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge.

100F4240.name: Haima Glintstone Crown
100F4240.hint: The entire Battlemage Set drops from a particular Battlemage, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge.

100F4308.name: Battlemage Manchettes
100F4308.hint: This piece is dropped by Battlemage enemies.  The entire Battlemage Set drops from a particular Battlemage enemy, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge.

400011A8.name: Crystal Torrent
400011A8.hint: Caelid: Dropped by Putrid Crystalians boss (Ringblade, Spear & Scepter) in Sellia Hideaway. See it on the Elden Ring Map

00F47220.name: Crystal Spear
00F47220.hint: Can be found inside Sellia Hideaway. From the Stake of Marika, head towards the boss while hugging the right wall. When you reach a body with an item (Preserving Boluses), hit the bare wall to the left of it to reveal a room containing a chest with the Crystal Spear.

00A9FBA0.name: Stone Club
00A9FBA0.hint: Chance of being dropped by the Battlemages:       Two can be found in Miquella's Haligtree going back from Haligtree Promenade Site of Grace after defeating Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree (both can be backstabbed and won't aggro at the same time).    One in the graveyard in front of Sellia Hideaway.    One before the Fog wall in Academy Crystal Cave.

4000107C.name: Stars of Ruin
4000107C.hint: Caelid: Given by Master Lusat when interacted with inside the Sellia Hideaway behind an arcane ward in the second pit. Requires the Sellian Sealbreaker to get through arcane ward (Acquired during Sorceress Sellen Questline). Elden Ring

01140810.name: Glaive
01140810.hint: Dropped by Skeletons wielding it. There is one on the road leading up from Sellia Backstreets Site of Grace.       An easy farming spot can be found just a few steps east from the Church of Vows, the skeleton spawns on the right.

012211D0.name: Grave Scythe
012211D0.hint: Dropped from Skeleton Mages around the game world.       Three of them can be found at the Graveyard west from the Lake-Facing Cliffs site

100CF850.name: Marionette Soldier Birdhelm
100CF850.hint: The Marionette Soldier Birdhelm Helm is dropped from Avionette Soldiers  Two can be found just next to the Sellia Under-Stair Site of Grace. One is on top of some small ruins and another on top of a branch north from grace.  Several of them are located in Altus Tunnel.

100CF850.name: Marionette Soldier Birdhelm
100CF850.hint: The Marionette Soldier Birdhelm Helm is dropped from Avionette Soldiers  Two can be found just next to the Sellia Under-Stair Site of Grace. One is on top of some small ruins and another on top of a branch north from grace.  Several of them are located in Altus Tunnel.

400395F8.name: Rotten Stray Ashes
400395F8.hint: Where to Find Rotten Stray Ashes  Found north of Sellia Under-Stair Site of Grace inside a building with a corpse and a rotten dog nearby.

01FBD000.name: Staff of Loss
01FBD000.hint: Sellia, Town of Sorcery: Found on a corpse leaning over a building's balcony in the west. Accessible by jumping across the rooftops. See the Sellia page for details on how to get it.

20000FAB.name: Spelldrake Talisman +1
20000FAB.hint: Base talisman: Acquired by defeating Runebear at the end of the Earthbore Cave in the Weeping Peninsula.  Spelldrake Talisman +1: Sellia, Town of Sorcery: Found in a small room in the northwest section of town, right under the balcony containing the Staff of Loss. This room is initially sealed by a barrier that can be dispelled by lighting a brazier atop a tower in the southwest of town.  Spelldrake Talisman +2: Found in the secret catacombs underneath the Hidden Path to the Haligtree by turning right just before the Stray Mimic Tear's boss door, following the corridor up and taking the lift. The talisman can be found on a corpse in an alcove at the top. See the location's page for details on how to get to the catacombs.

4000120C.name: Night Comet
4000120C.hint: Sellia, Town of Sorcery: Found in a chest in the central section of town. This location is initially sealed by a barrier that can be dispelled by lighting a brazier atop a tower in the southwest of town.

101D4C00.name: Cerulean Tear Scarab
101D4C00.hint: Sella, Town of Sorcery: Found on a corpse on top of a roof in the northeast section of town. Accessible by jumping across the rooftops. See the Sellia page for details on how to get it.

001FBD00.name: Nox Flowing Sword
001FBD00.hint: Sellia, Town of Sorcery: Dropped by the Nox Swordstress & Nox Priest boss duo upon defeat.

80002BC0.name: Ash of War: Double Slash
80002BC0.hint: Sellia, Town of Sorcery: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found high above on a very large root in the western end of town. Accessible by jumping across the rooftops. See the Sellia page for details on how to get it.

01FB33C0.name: Lusat's Glintstone Staff
01FB33C0.hint: Sellia, Town of Sorcery: Found in a chest north of the Nox Swordstress & Nox Priest boss duo's chamber after defeating them.

40002495.name: Missionary's Cookbook [3]
40002495.hint: Where to find Missionary's Cookbook [3]  Cookbook item. Found on one of the two corpses in the Smoldering Church.

400024AB.name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [14]
400024AB.hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [14]  Found on one of the two corpses in the Smoldering Church.

200007EE.name: Sacred Scorpion Charm
200007EE.hint: Dropped by NPC invader Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater when defeated in her first invasion spot in front of Smoldering Church, Caelid.

10018704.name: Perfumer's Traveling Garb
10018704.hint: Found in a corpse in one of the corners of the buildings within Street of Sages Ruins, in Caelid's Swamp area, alongside the entire Perfumer Traveler's Set.

10018768.name: Traveler's Gloves
10018768.hint: Found in a corpse in one of the corners of the buildings within Street of Sages Ruins, in Caelid's Swamp area, alongside the entire Perfumer Traveler's Set.

40001266.name: Rock Sling
40001266.hint: Found in a chest in an underground cellar just north of the Street of Sages Ruins. It is surrounded by Servants of Rot, but otherwise is free to be picked up.

100187CC.name: Traveler's Slops
100187CC.hint: Found in a corpse in one of the corners of the buildings within Street of Sages Ruins, in Caelid's Swamp area, alongside the entire Perfumer Traveler's Set.

100186A0.name: Traveler's Hat
100186A0.hint: Found in a corpse in one of the corners of the buildings within Street of Sages Ruins, in Caelid's Swamp area, alongside the entire Perfumer Traveler's Set.

01FB5AD0.name: Meteorite Staff
01FB5AD0.hint: Aeonia Swamp in Caelid: In the southwestern building of the Street of Sages Ruins. The staff is on a corpse hanging from a ledge in a small room with poison flowers and a rune. It's not in the room under the staircase.

4000122A.name: Eternal Darkness
4000122A.hint: Found on a corpse inside of the Swamp Lookout Tower's jail cell in Caelid. From the Church of the Plague, go south and cross the Sellia Gateway, and then follow the road north to the tower.

10053020.name: Cleanrot Helm
10053020.hint: Drops from Lesser Cleanrot Knights, found at Inner Aeonia and Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

10053084.name: Cleanrot Armor
10053084.hint: Drops from Lesser Cleanrot Knights in Inner Aeonia, Caelid.

80005910.name: Ash of War: Poisonous Mist
80005910.hint: Dropped by a teardrop scarab at the southwest section of the Aeonia Swamp in Caelid..       This teardrop scarab can teleport a  short distance if the player gets too close. If available, apply appropriate measures to kill it from range.

100530E8.name: Cleanrot Gauntlets
100530E8.hint: Drops from Lesser Cleanrot Knights, found at Inner Aeonia and Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

800056B8.name: Ash of War: Sacred Ring of Light
800056B8.hint: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found in the Aeonian Swamps in Caelid, east from the Heart of Aeonia site of grace. Elden Ring.

1005314C.name: Cleanrot Greaves
1005314C.hint: Dropped by Lesser Cleanrot Knight enemies. Found in places such as: Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs and Miquella's Haligtree  Can be found at Inner Aeonia

40001C3E.name: Poison Armament
40001C3E.hint: Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab roaming the northeast section Aeonia Swamp in eastern Caelid. Watch for the glowing footprints, figure out its pattern then get in front of it and attack as the prints approach you.

00F4C040.name: Cleanrot Spear
00F4C040.hint: Drops from the spear wielding Lesser Cleanrot Knights just south of the Heart of Aeonia by Commander O'Neil (very low drop rate).  It can also drop from the ghostly Cleanrot Knights in the War-Dead Catacombs.  Drops from the spear wielding Cleanrot Knights in Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree. Closest is directly outside the "Prayer Room" Site of Grace (very low drop rate).

012238E0.name: Halo Scythe
012238E0.hint: Drops from Scythe-wielding Lesser Cleanrot Knights just south of the Heart of Aeonia near Commander O'Neil (rare drop)  there are two different types of Cleanrot Knights near the Heart of Aeonia. The ones already patrolling the area are wielding Halo Scythes and the ones that rise up from the waters are wielding Cleanrot Spears, each weapon only drops from its respective knight type, so only farm the ones you need.  Drops from the Scythe-wielding Lesser Cleanrot Knight in Elphael Brace of the Haligtree.

011344C0.name: Commander's Standard
011344C0.hint: Dropped by Commander O'Neil upon his defeat. He can be found in eastern Caelid, in a clearing within Aeonia Swamp.

004C7250.name: Cleanrot Knight's Sword
004C7250.hint: Drops from most Lesser Cleanrot Knights.  The single Cleanrot Knight outside the Prayer Room Site of Grace in Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree is a convenient location for farming.  For a farming spot much earlier in the game, starting at the Inner Aeonia Site of Grace, head South through the roots and there will be a Cleanrot Knight amidst several Aoenian Butterflies

40001271.name: Collapsing Stars
40001271.hint: Looted from a chest located at the War-Dead Catacombs. In the initial room with the enemies fighting each other, drop down to the lower level filled with scarlet rot and look for the chest, it will be in the center of the floor of the West most wall.   This catacomb is located in the northmost edge of Starscourge Radahn arena after beating him, just south of Lenne's Rise.

4003DC48.name: Radahn Soldier Ashes
4003DC48.hint: Where to Find Radahn Soldier Ashes   Found in the War-Dead Catacombs at the northern tip of Radahn's arena. Go up the stairs to the back right of the first room and go left. Past the archer at the end of the hall turn right, turning right again at the end of that hall past the greatsword knight. Jump through the window to the right near the end of this hall. Go left up the stairs and the ashes will be in a room in front of you behind a knight.

4003EBE8.name: Redmane Knight Ogha Ashes
4003EBE8.hint: Where to Find Redmane Knight Ogha   Dropped by the Putrid Tree Spirit in the War-Dead Catacombs located in eastern Caelid. To find the entrance of the catacombs, travel to the site of grace that appears after defeating Starscourge Radahn and proceed to head north by north east until you have reached the upper most corner of the area, where the watershore meets the cliffside. You'll be able to see the small door along the cliffside.

20001004.name: Greatshield Talisman
20001004.hint: Found in a Carriage chest, east of the Erdtree-Gazing Hill site of grace. Watch out for the three fire-arrow balistae guarding the carriage.

20001770.name: Crepus's Vial
20001770.hint: Dropped by Rileigh the Idle, the enemy you kill during the second assassination task in the Volcano Manor questline.  Video Location

40002201.name: Note: Unseen Assassins
40002201.hint: Sold by the Nomadic Merchant West Altus Plateau for 2000  Runes.

80005140.name: Ash of War: Prayerful Strike
80005140.hint: Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab leaving glowing footprints under the short rocky tunnel on the lake next to the western entrance to Leyndell, Royal Capital. Figure out the pattern of the prints and position yourself to attack as they approach you.

80005780.name: Ash of War: Blood Blade
80005780.hint: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in Altus Plateau, northeast of Erdtree-Gazing Hill, flying above a pond with trees. Elden Ring.

100EAA4C.name: Ruler's Robe
100EAA4C.hint: The Ruler's Robe Chest Armor can be found on a corpse laying face-down on a Carriage northeast of the Abandoned Coffin site of grace in west Altus Plateau, alongside the Ruler's Mask.

101B5094.name: Leyndell Knight Armor
101B5094.hint: Chance to drop from Leyndell Knights encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital

101B5030.name: Leyndell Knight Helm
101B5030.hint: Chance to drop from Leyndell Knights encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

400021FD.name: Note: Imp Shades
400021FD.hint: Sold by the Nomadic Merchant West Altus Plateau for 1200  Runes.

400018C4.name: Protection of the Erdtree
400018C4.hint: Dropped by an incantation scarab found on a stone platform slightly east of Goldmask's first location, in Altus Plateau.

400024B9.name: Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [2]
400024B9.hint: Where to find Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [2]  Can be purchased from a Merchant that is next to the Forest-Spanning Great bridge site of grace.

02817AC0.name: Greatbow
02817AC0.hint: Chance to drop from Redmane Knight in Fort Gael. .  Chance to drop from a Leyndell Knight wielding it in Altus Plateau, near the Altus Highway Junction Site of Grace.  From chest at the Highway Lookout Tower (Altus Plateau) to the north of the Divine Capital.

8000EBF0.name: Ash of War: Sacred Order
8000EBF0.hint: Ash Of War: Sacred Order is dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in Altus Plateau, North-West of the Abandoned Coffin Site Of Grace.

100EA9E8.name: Ruler's Mask
100EA9E8.hint: The Ruler's Mask Helm can be found on a corpse laying face-down on a Carriage northeast of the Abandoned Coffin site of grace in west Altus Plateau, alongside the Ruler's Robe.

101B50F8.name: Leyndell Knight Gauntlets
101B50F8.hint: Chance to drop from Leyndell Knights encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

200003FD.name: Viridian Amber Medallion +1
200003FD.hint: Base talisman: Tombsward Cave, a small dungeon in the Weeping Peninsula: Located southeast of the Fourth Church of Marika. The medallion is obtained after defeating the boss, Miranda the Blighted Bloom.+1 Variant: Altus Plateau, south of the Outer Wall Battleground Site of Grace: You will hear Margit whisper, "I see you, Tarnished..."  to you before appearing on the road. Defeat him again and it will drop.  +2 Variant: Miquella's Haligtree: The closest site of grace is the Haligtree Town Plaza. Go south towards the roof with a dead body on it. For reference, the dead body is two stories above the talisman. Continue southeast, and jump down once. Jump across the gap, and then do an immediate 180 turn and make a running jump into the building below. It'll be in a chest guarded by Scarlet Rot Zombies. Video location

4000219E.name: Map (Altus Plateau)
4000219E.hint: Map (Altus Plateau) can be obtained north of the Altus Highway Junction site of grace.

8000EC54.name: Ash of War: Shared Order
8000EC54.hint: Ash Of War: Shared Order is dropped by a Night's Cavalry in Altus Plateau, next to the Altus Highway Junction Site Of Grace.

1010D114.name: Tree Surcoat
1010D114.hint: The Tree Surcoat Chest Armor can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant West Altus Plateau for 3500 Runes.

01EC3FA0.name: Golden Greatshield
01EC3FA0.hint: Drops from Leyndell Knights using the shield on their model (bow wielding knights who switch to the shield for close combat will not drop it). Most of which can be found in and around Leyndell, Royal Capital. One can be found south of the Artist's Shack in Liurnia of the Lakes, this is the earliest available version of that enemy. The droprate for the shield (or anything other the guaranteed Dragon Cult Prayerbook), however, seems to be lower than on the capital knights.

800052D0.name: Ash of War: Earthshaker
800052D0.hint: From the Altus Highway Junction Grace. Go due South until you can clearly see the road. As you face South, there should be a square pattern in the road. Ahead or to your left there will be a very small dust cloud in the road. This is the scarab. It does not make noise or leave glowing prints on the ground like others.  Earthshaker can be obtained killing a stationary invisible scarab just South of Altus Highway Junction (found near a statue at the first intersection, you can hear it and see a little cloud of dust moving, note: not a scarab that leaves a light trail).  The Scarab is present at any time, but easier to see at night. Using a skill/spell like Glintblade Phalanx may help, as it can target and kill the scarab automatically, if you get close enough.  See it on the Elden Ring Map.

0262CF30.name: Harp Bow
0262CF30.hint: Acquired by solving the Champion's Song Painting, found in The Shaded Castle.

01DA3E40.name: Scorpion Kite Shield
01DA3E40.hint: Sold by Merchant by Forest-Spanning Great Bridge Site of Grace in Altus Plateau.

01DD7290.name: Red Crest Heater Shield
01DD7290.hint: Altus Plateau: Sold by Nomadic Merchant that sits near the Forest-Spanning Greatbridge Site of Grace for  2500 Runes.

01EB5540.name: Crossed-Tree Towershield
01EB5540.hint: The Crossed-Tree Towershield Shield can purchased from the Nomadic Merchant West Altus Plateau, for a total of  3800 Runes.

0160A170.name: Giant-Crusher
0160A170.hint: Can be found in a chest in the back of a Carriage directly to the south of Outer Wall Phantom Tree site of grace.

003D7E30.name: Troll's Golden Sword
003D7E30.hint: In a chest on a Carriage, which can be found east of the Erdtree-Gazing-Hill Site of Grace.

01E98080.name: Erdtree Greatshield
01E98080.hint: Can be acquired by Killing Tree Sentinel Duo.   Tree Sentinel Duo is a Foe Boss found in Altus Plateau, guarding the doors to the the Outer Wall Phantom Tree grace. You must defeat both Tree Sentinels to earn this shield.

002E6300.name: Knight's Greatsword
002E6300.hint: Dropped by most enemies in the knight archetype such as:       Godrick Knights (throughout Limgrave)    Cuckoo Knights (throughout Liurnia of the Lakes)    Mausoleum Knight    Leyndell Knights (throughout the Altus Plateau, especially in Leyndell, Royal Capital)      An easy-to-farm spectral knight that drops this weapon can be found just outside the Black Knife Catacombs in Liurnia of the Lakes.  Sell Value:   200  Base drop rate is 4% (at 100 Discovery)  Other notes and player tips go here

00B9DA20.name: Great Stars
00B9DA20.hint: On a guarded Carriage being towed by two Trolls in Altus Plateau, travelling on the road southwest of the Road of Iniquity Side Path Site of Grace.   Dropped by Magnus the Beast Claw upon defeat.  Video location

00F4E750.name: Partisan
00F4E750.hint: Dropped by the heavy Godrick Knight in Fort Haight.       Very low drop rate, but it is a confirmed drop.      Dropped by the Redmane Knight in Fort Gael.  Dropped by Cuckoo Knights by East Raya Lucaria Gate  Dropped by Leyndell Knights in Leyndell, Royal Capital  Dropped by Mausoleum Knights on horseback in Deeproot Depths

20000407.name: Arsenal Charm +1
20000407.hint: Given by Nepheli Loux, who's at the Roundtable Hold.  Her initial location is inside a room near the Secluded Cell Site of Grace in Stormveil Castle. It's near the golden fog door that leads to Godrick the Grafted. When you find her, you must exhaust her dialogue so that she tells you that you can call her via a summoning sign to help you battle Godrick.  Nepheli moves to the Roundtable Hold after defeating Godrick, and you can find her at the northeast side, inside the library. Simply speak to her and she'll give you the talisman.   Altus Tunnel: In the second cavern, head through the tunnel in the south to find a wooden balcony overlooking a pit. Drop down on the left side to an overgrown root below. Follow the root going upwards to reach an upper balcony above where you can loot the talisman from a corpse.

400022FC.name: Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing [2]
400022FC.hint: Acquired from the boss duo of  Crystalian (Spear) & Crystalian (Ringblade) in the Altus Tunnel.

01F95F00.name: Digger's Staff
01F95F00.hint: Dropped by the Glintstone Miner enemy in the Sellia Crystal Tunnel.       Note: If you enter this area via the teleport trap in the Dragon-Burnt Ruins, you cannot leave it until fighting or sneaking your way out entirely.      Drops from Stonediggers at Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel in Liurnia of the Lakes Region.

80011238.name: Ash of War: Holy Ground
80011238.hint: Obtained inside the Auriza Hero's Grave by destroying three specific Chariots.  Doing this involves quite a few steps:

1008B358.name: Crucible Gauntlets
1008B358.hint: The whole Crucible Axe Set is dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis.  The whole set is found in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind a Boss: Crucible Knight Siluria.

10041F14.name: Tree Sentinel Armor

10041FDC.name: Tree Sentinel Greaves

10041EB0.name: Tree Sentinel Helm

4003B150.hint: Auriza Hero's Grave: In the large Chariot Hall where two Chariots are running almost side by side with a short delay between them, head all the way down to the large pit behind some pillars. Looking down, you can find several wooden beams you can drop down onto. Navigate your way across the beams, heading north to find a hidden area on the right with a statue. Head into the corridor behind the statue and to the right to access a small room where a corpse holding the ashes can be found.

1008B3BC.name: Crucible Greaves
1008B3BC.hint: The whole Crucible Axe Set is dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis.  The whole set is found in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind a Boss: Crucible Knight Siluria.

001F95F0.name: Golden Epitaph

20000FE6.name: Crucible Feather Talisman
20000FE6.hint: Found on a corpse inside the Auriza Hero's Grave :

01CAFC00.name: Scripture Wooden Shield

Dropped by Skeletons who wield it or who wield an Iron Roundshield. They will be holding a Scimitar in their other hand.       2 of them can be found at the start of Auriza Hero's Grave, in the first safe spot on the right while going down the first slope.    2 can be found at the beginning of Deathtouched Catacombs, 1 before the first set of stairs and 1 afterward around the corner. (Note: The skeleton model holds an Iron Roundshield, but will drop the Scripture Wooden Shield.)

100C3CD0.name: Blue Festive Hood
100C3CD0.hint: Dropped by the blue clothed dancers in Dominula, Windmill Village.

00F50E60.name: Celebrant's Rib-Rake

00B916D0.name: Celebrant's Skull
00B916D0.hint: Altus Plateau: On a corpse sitting at the end of a somewhat hidden path along the cliff, accessible by passing the windmill directly north of the Windmill Village site of grace.

00D689E0.name: Celebrant's Cleaver
00D689E0.hint: Possible drop from celebrating enemies that wield it, in Dominula, Windmill village.   Go south from the 'Windmill Heights' site of grace, eventually there are four ladies, two sitting, two dancing, three carry the cleaver.

40001EDC.name: Fire's Deadly Sin
40001EDC.hint: Acquire the Flightless Bird Painting from Fortified Manor, Leyndell, Royal Capital.  Then go southeast of Windmill Heights, directly East of where is says Dominula, Windmill Village on the map. You'll see a ghost in a chair who will drop it after disappearing.

00102CA0.name: Celebrant's Sickle
00102CA0.hint: Rare drop from the Celebrants wielding it at the Windmill Village.       These enemies are easily recognizable by their blue coats. Two are found in the large group midway between the Windmill Village and Windmill Heights Sites of Grace. These enemies are passive until provoked, and in addition to the weapon have a chance to drop Human Bone Shards and Golden Runes [3], so farming them can be both easy and lucrative. This group also contains two Celebrants who can drop Celebrant's Rib-Rake.

0098BD90.name: Godskin Peeler
0098BD90.hint: Dropped by Godskin Apostle at Windmill Village, Altus Plateau.

100B4B68.name: Noble's Gloves

100B4BCC.name: Noble's Trousers
100B4BCC.hint: The Noble's Trousers along with other pieces of the Noble's Set can be found at East Windmill Pasture, Altus Plateau, in a burning pile of corpses surrounded by a circle of dancing Celebrants.

100B4B04.name: Noble's Traveling Garb
100B4B04.hint: The Noble's Traveling Garb along with other pieces of the Noble's Set can be found at East Windmill Pasture, Altus Plateau, in a burning pile of corpses surrounded by a circle of dancing Celebrants.

00990BB0.name: Twinned Knight Swords

100B4E88.name: Navy Hood

100F42A4.name: Battlemage Robe

00A9FBA0.name: Stone Club

One in the graveyard in front of Sellia Hideaway.    One before the Fog wall in Academy Crystal Cave.

20000C12.name: Godfrey Icon

400022F3.name: Medicine Peddler's Bell Bearing

100975E0.name: Prophet Blindfold
100975E0.hint: Starting Equipment for the Prophet Class.  Can be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for  1,000 Runes.

1009770C.name: Prophet Trousers

100EAE34.name: Upper-Class Robe
100EAE34.hint: Can be found at Leyndell, Royal Capital, at the end of the passageway where you fight a few Perfumers.  Can be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for  2,400 Runes.

016F4770.name: Sentry's Torch
016F4770.hint: Can be bought from Hermit Merchant in Hermit Merchant's Shack for  7,000 Runes.

10097E14.name: Prophet Robe
10097E14.hint: Starting Equipment for the Prophet Class.  Can be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for  1,500 Runes.

01E89620.name: Distinguished Greatshield
01E89620.hint: Location go here.   Can be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for  5,500 Runes.

20000870.name: Lord of Blood's Exultation
20000870.hint: Drops from Esgar, Priest of Blood in Leyndell Catacombs.  Video Location

20000FDC.name: Crucible Scale Talisman
20000FDC.hint: Altus Plateau: Inside Leyndell Catacombs, Subterranean Shunning-Grounds, under Leyndell. From the Underground Roadside site of grace, turn left and climb down the ladder on the right into a room full of imps and pipes. On the pipe at the right end from where you enter, you can drop down onto another pipe then down below onto the ground with two Giant Crayfish and the Mohg's Shackle. One door leads into the Leyndell Catacomb site of grace. From the Leyndell Catacombs site of grace, head into the catacomb until you find a room with the flame-blowing stone imp column. Make your way into the room with the column, and hit it to make it rise up or lower down, then ride it up into a room with an Omen. The talisman is at the altar table behind it.  Video Location

20000FC9.name: Haligdrake Talisman +1
20000FC9.hint: Travel to the Seaside Ruins Site of Grace. Walk south a short distance along the edge of the cliff (just past the crumbling archway). Look down toward the beach below and look for the windstream. Hop on Torrent and simply walk off the edge. Travel north until you see a small cave opening in the cliff face.  Travel to the The First Step Site of Grace. and make your way down the cliff to the east (should lead to an area with bats and crucifixes). Continue south east towards a bunch of crumbling pillars. Line yourself up with the pillar that is standing on the beach. Then, run or walk off of the edge of the cliff and land on a small ledge on said pillar (do not jump as you will be blocked by the ledge at the same level as the cliff). Then, safely hop down to the beach and the entrance to the cave is on the bottom of the cliff. Haligdrake Talisman +1:  Leyndell Catacombs: Found on a corpse next to a Lesser Spirit-caller Snail. From the Leyndell Catacombs site of grace, head up the elevator in the southeast to find a room with 3 spirit crossbowmen. Look under the arch next to the stairs for an illusory wall. Hit it to dispel the illusion, and then hit the wall on the left to dispel another illusion. The corpse and snail are found in here.Haligdrake Talisman +2: Looted off a body in Mohgwyn Palace, found in a small cluster of graves near a watchful Giant Crow perched up high.

10027100.name: Guilty Hood
10027100.hint: Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for  500 Runes.  Can be found on a corpse in the sewers north of Avenue Balcony site in Leyndell Royal Capital.  Video Location

10050974.name: Guardian Garb (Full Bloom)
10050974.hint: Drops from the Guardians with large flowers found near the Erdtree Sanctuary site of grace, in Leyndell Royal Capital.  Does NOT currently drop from the blooming Guardians near the Minor Erdtree Church.

10108678.name: Imp Head (Corpse)
10108678.hint: Leyndell, Royal Capital: From the East Capital Rampart site of grace  take the stair to the west and head south, jump down to the right over the golden roofs, and then down again, beware the enemies, there are two dark passages that head east take the left one, you may collect the Golden Rune (9), jump down to the left and there will be a corpse sitting there with the item on it.   Alternatively, start at the Avenue Balcony site of grace and take the stair to the southeast, onto the main road running through the city. Follow the road northeast until you reach the large door at the eastern edge of the city and turn right, then head south along the wall until you reach the item.  Video Location

80005460.name: Ash of War: Thunderbolt
80005460.hint: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in Leyndell, Royal Capital. From the Avenue Balcony site of Grace, head down the stairs and pass through the gate, follow the railings on the left side up to the sleeping Commoner, from which the Teardrop Scarab should be visible down below.  This can not be obtained in Leyndell, Ashen Capital.  Video Location

4000233E.name: By My Sword
4000233E.hint: Found in the Fortified Manor in Leyndell Royal Capital Video Location

1001D588.name: Alberich's Bracers
1001D588.hint: The entire Alberich's Set can be found in the main hall of the Fortified manor in Leyndell, Royal Capital, near the Fortified Manor, first floor Site of Grace.

101A3EC0.name: Leyndell Soldier Helm
101A3EC0.hint: This helm and other pieces of the Leyndell Soldier Set can be looted as drops from the Leyndell Soldiers scattered around Altus Plateau, and Leyndell, Royal Capital.

1009C464.name: Lionel's Armor
1009C464.hint: Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

Both of these enemies have a chance to drop all three pieces.

029020C0.name: Soldier's Crossbow

In Limgrave, the best place to farm this is directly east of the Deathtouched Catacombs site of grace to the crucibles, where there is a Godrick Soldier with a Lordsworn's Shield and a spear and a small group of Godrick Foot Soldiers including two with these crossbows.

100D2028.name: Raging Wolf Gauntlets
100D2028.hint: Leyndell, Royal Capital. After obtaining the second to last letter from Volcano Manor, you will be sent to assist Knight Bernahl with assassinating Vargram the Raging Wolf and Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm. On successful invasion, you will receive the full Raging Wolf Set.

4000219F.name: Map (Leyndell, Royal Capital)
4000219F.hint: Capital Outskirts: Found under a monolith near the Outer Wall Phantom Tree Site of Grace. Elden Ring.

100D1F60.name: Raging Wolf Helm
100D1F60.hint: Leyndell, Royal Capital. After obtaining the second to last letter from Volcano Manor, you will be sent to assist Knight Bernahl with assassinating Vargram the Raging Wolf and Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm. On successful invasion, you will receive the full Raging Wolf Set.

1009C4C8.name: Lionel's Gauntlets
1009C4C8.hint: Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church, grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

101B5094.name: Leyndell Knight Armor

101B5030.hint: Chance to drop from Leyndell Knights encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital.
