101A3F88.hint: These gauntlets and other pieces of the Leyndell Soldier Set can be looted as drops from the Leyndell Soldiers scattered around Altus Plateau, and Leyndell Royal Capital.

100D208C.name: Raging Wolf Greaves
100D208C.hint: Leyndell, Royal Capital. After obtaining the second to last letter from Volcano Manor, you will be sent to assist Knight Bernahl with assassinating Vargram the Raging Wolf and Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm. On successful invasion, you will receive the full Raging Wolf Set.

20000FB5.name: Flamedrake Talisman +1
20000FB5.hint: Base talisman: Dropped by the Beastman of Farum Azula in Groveside Cave in Limgrave.  +1 Variation: Found at Leyndell Royal Capital, head up the elevator leading towards the Grand Lift of Rold, on the ground against a column.  +2 Variation: Dropped by the Beastman of Farum Azula in Dragonbarrow Cave in eastern Dragonbarrow.

100160BC.name: Perfumer Sarong
100160BC.hint: The Perfumer Sarong can be looted from Perfumers found through Leyndell, Royal Capital.

101A3F24.name: Erdtree Surcoat
101A3F24.hint: This surcoat and other pieces of the Leyndell Soldier Set can be looted as drops from the Leyndell Soldiers scattered around Altus Plateau, and Leyndell Royal Capital.  Guarding the door, near the Capital Outskirts. Elden Ring Interactive

1004BC1C.name: Duelist Greaves
1004BC1C.hint: The Duelist Set pieces can be dropped as loot from the Duelist enemies located in Leyndell, Royal Capital.  There is an apparent Colosseum on a hill in the southeast area of the city that has two Duelists, one patrolling the path and one at the top. Both of these enemies have a chance to drop all three pieces.

100C5D3C.name: Commoner's Shoes
100C5D3C.hint: Dropped by Commoner enemies found in Stormveil Castle, Leyndell, Royal Capital, and other areas of the map.

02817AC0.name: Greatbow
02817AC0.hint: Chance to drop from Redmane Knight in Fort Gael. .  Chance to drop from a Leyndell Knight wielding it in Altus Plateau, near the Altus Highway Junction Site of Grace.  From chest at the Highway Lookout Tower (Altus Plateau) to the north of the Divine Capital.

00F58390.name: Bolt of Gransax
00F58390.hint: Can be found in Leyndell, Royal Capital, after beating Godfrey, First Elden Lord (Golden Shade): From the Erdtree Sanctuary grace, walk out the western door, take the elevator down, go down the staircase to the walkway, jump down onto the giant spear lodged into the building, and then walk up it  (you should see the Bolt shining near the handle of the giant spear).       Additionally, the spear can be obtained upon first entry of Leyndell, Royal Capital, without having killed the Godfrey shade: From the East Capital Rampart Gate grace, go out the western door, follow the path south to the lift, ride it down, climb up the ladder inside the room ahead, go southwest onto the patio with two Perfumers, jump over the southwest railing onto the walkway below, go west along the pathway until you reach the railing around the giant spear on your left, make a running jump from the broken railing to the roof of the gazebo, make a running jump southwest onto the far right side of the ledge below the spear (this is hard, you need to jump from the right side of the roof and about halfway down—instead of the edge—to have enough height; you can head northwest to the stairs to try again if you miss), jump up the giant spear (carefully, there are several opportunities to fall), collect weapon.       Cannot be acquired in Leyndell, Ashen Capital. You must get it before defeating Maliketh, the Black Blade at Crumbling Farum Azula.

10035C8C.name: Page Trousers
10035C8C.hint: Three are easily found behind the Royal Moongazing Grounds site of grace in Caria Manor.  They are scattered throughout Leyndell, Royal Capital  Tombsward Ruins Underground  Gelmir Hero's Grave

4000230C.name: Sanctified Whetblade
4000230C.hint: Fortified Manor, Leyndell  You can enter the manor by climbing up the dragon's wing to the north-west of the Avenue Balcony grace  At the manor's front doors facing inward, take a left, then a right past the dogs and climb up the wooden structure on the side of the manor on your right, enter through the small doorway past the broken wall. Continue inwards and it will be on your left on a corpse laying on a wall next to an anvil.  Video Location

101C3A90.name: Gilded Foot Soldier Cap
101C3A90.hint: Chance to drop from Leyndell Foot Soldiers found in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

101B50F8.name: Leyndell Knight Gauntlets
101B50F8.hint: Chance to drop from Leyndell Knights encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

100EAE34.name: Upper-Class Robe
100EAE34.hint: Can be found at Leyndell, Royal Capital, at the end of the passageway where you fight a few Perfumers.  Can be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for  2,400 Runes.

20000FFA.name: Ritual Shield Talisman
20000FFA.hint: From the West Capital Rampart site of grace in Leyndell, follow the marble stairway heading South-Southwest, past a Valiant Gargoyle near a Golden Seed and up the stair toward a giant Colloseum, the talisman is at the top of the hill, in front of the door of the Colloseum. Video Location

101A3FEC.name: Leyndell Soldier Greaves
101A3FEC.hint: These greaves and other pieces of the Leyndell Soldier Set can be looted as drops from the Leyndell Soldiers scattered around Altus Plateau, and Leyndell, Royal Capital.

101BEC70.name: Foot Soldier Cap
101BEC70.hint: Dropped by Godrick Foot Soldiers found throughout Limgrave.

1001D4C0.name: Alberich's Pointed Hat
1001D4C0.hint: The entire Alberich's Set can be found in the main hall of the Fortified manor in Leyndell, Royal Capital, near the Fortified Manor, first floor Site of Grace.

1004BAF0.name: Duelist Helm
1004BAF0.hint: The Duelist Set pieces can be dropped as loot from the Duelist enemies located in Leyndell, Royal Capital.  There is an apparent Colosseum on a hill in the southeast area of the city that has two Duelists, one patrolling the path and one at the top. Both of these enemies have a chance to drop all three pieces.  The Rotten Duelist near Ordina Liturgical has a chance of drop this

10015F90.name: Perfumer Hood
10015F90.hint: Chance to drop from Perfumer enemies encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital and the Perfumer's Ruins.

101E5D70.name: High Page Hood
101E5D70.hint: The High Page Hood and High Page Clothes can be farmed from High Pages.  The earliest one that can be found is in Raya Lucaria Academy. From the Church of the Cuckoo site, enter the church and take the shortcut ladder up. On the other side of the room is a long hallway with a High Page at the end.  They can also be found in Leyndell, Royal Capital in various buildings.

101C3AF4.name: Leather-Draped Tabard
101C3AF4.hint: Chance to drop from Leyndell Foot Soldiers found in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

00D63BC0.name: Iron Cleaver
00D63BC0.hint: Castle Morne. Dropped by the Misbegotten creatures using this weapon.  Leyndell, Royal Capital: Chance to drop from the Misbegotten enemies that can be found at behind the big door.  To farm easily: go to Castle Morne and unlock "Behind the Castle" Grace. Warp here. Run west , drop down rocks then off castle. There are 3 sleeping on that ledge and one more in the room to your right with the prisoner spirit. Easy backstabs, farm without any fighting

100D1FC4.name: Raging Wolf Armor
100D1FC4.hint: Leyndell Royal Capital. After obtaining the second to last letter from Volcano Manor, You will be sent to assist Bernahl with an invade in a familiar location. On completion of the invade, You will receive the full Raging Wolf set.

02810590.name: Golem Greatbow
02810590.hint: The Golem Greatbow has a chance to drop from any Golem archer. The Golem Greatbow does not drop from Golems with halberds.  One can be found on the Limgrave Tower Bridge in Stormhill, which can be accessed from Stormveil Castle. Two halberd Golems are also found on the bridge.  Two can be found on the path towards the colosseum in Caelid. This location is only accessible via a lift in the Siofra River that takes the player to the Deep Siofra Well.       These two Golem archers fire magic-imbued explosive arrows and are also the only source of Golem's Magic Arrow.      One can be found next to the top of the Grand Lift of Dectus, in the Altus Plateau. It is accompanied by a single halberd Golem.       If the Grand Lift of Dectus is activated after finding both halves of the Dectus Medallion, the Golems guarding the lift will be non-hostile until the the player initiates combat. (needs confirmation, not sure if the game checks for possession of the medallion or usage of the lift)       One can be found outside the entrance of Castle Morne, at the southern tip of the Weeping Peninsula.  Two can be found in the north-eastern section of the Capital Outskirts, on the hill approaching the northern entrance to Leyndell Royal Capital (Legacy Dungeon).  One can be found in the Mountaintops of the Giants, guarding the tall and narrow path north.

1001D524.name: Alberich's Robe
1001D524.hint: The entire Alberich's Set can be found in the main hall of the Fortified manor in Leyndell, Royal Capital, near the Fortified Manor, first floor Site of Grace.

00E5A510.name: Longhaft Axe
00E5A510.hint: Rare drop from Misbegotten wielding it.  There is an easy to kill one at Castle Morne in Weeping Peninsula. From Beside the Rampart Gaol site of grace, cross the bridge and will be on the left sleeping.  Can be farmed efficiently from two Misbegotten by heading to the farm down the stairs and north from the Windmill Village site of grace.  Can also be dropped by the same enemy in Cave of the Forlorn, south of the minor Erdtree in the Consecrated Snowfield.

100C5C74.name: Commoner's Garb
100C5C74.hint: Dropped by Commoner enemies found in Stormveil Castle, Leyndell, Royal Capital, and other areas of the map.

101E5DD4.name: High Page Clothes
101E5DD4.hint: The High Page Hood and High Page Clothes can be farmed from High Pages.  The earliest one that can be found is in Raya Lucaria Academy. From the Church of the Cuckoo site, enter the church and take the shortcut ladder up. On the other side of the room is a long hallway with a High Page at the end.  They can also be found in Leyndell, Royal Capital in various buildings. Best place to farm for High Page Clothes/Hood is the West Capital Rampart in Leyndell. Head south from grace and drop down the 2nd stairway you see. There is a high page right underneath the stairs, hiding in the corner. Easy farm near the grace.

101BECD4.name: Chain-Draped Tabard
101BECD4.hint: There's a chance for it to drop from Godrick Foot Soldiers.  Some areas where you can find groups of Godrick Foot Soldiers are:       Near Tower of Return, Weeping Peninsula.    Throughout Limgrave.

00A95F60.name: Envoy's Horn
00A95F60.hint: Chance to drop from the Oracle Envoys.       Can be farmed in Leyndell, Royal Capital. They are easily found in the East Capital Rampart area upon first entering the city. Elden Ring    Can be farmed at the Haligtree Canopy Site of Grace. There are three east of the Grace.           The first one after the Grace has a high chance to fall off of the branch and into the void. However, a second one can be found on a much wider branch on the next level directly below it. This branch can be reached by jumping to the corpse on a stack of mushrooms. This is the most efficient way that you can kill one repeatedly and should it not drop anything you can use the map to return to the Grace.             Video Location

00B98C00.name: Envoy's Long Horn
00B98C00.hint: This weapon can be dropped by the Large Oracle Envoy located early on in the East Capital Rampart in Leyndell, Royal Capital.  It can also drop from the same enemies wielding it in Miquella's Haligtree.

2000139C.name: Blessed Dew Talisman
2000139C.hint: Leyndell: Found west of the Divine Bridge Site of Grace, guarded by a Golem.       You can teleport here from the Tower of Return in Weeping Peninsula.     Can also be reached from the Fortified Manor in Leyndell Royal Capital, through a closed door in the ground floor entrance hall and up an elevator.

1009C400.name: Lionel's Helm
1009C400.hint: Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

101CD6D0.name: Omensmirk Mask
101CD6D0.hint: Dropped by a lesser Omenkiller outside of the Lower Capital Church Site of Grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

01EC3FA0.name: Golden Greatshield
01EC3FA0.hint: Drops from Leyndell Knights using the shield on their model (bow wielding knights who switch to the shield for close combat will not drop it). Most of which can be found in and around Leyndell, Royal Capital. One can be found south of the Artist's Shack in Liurnia of the Lakes, this is the earliest available version of that enemy. The droprate for the shield (or anything other the guaranteed Dragon Cult Prayerbook), however, seems to be lower than on the capital knights.

400018BA.name: Barrier of Gold
400018BA.hint: Leyndell, Royal Capital: Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab. Can be found after heading down the stairs and taking the elevator, right after the fight with Godfrey, First Elden Lord (Golden Shade).  From the Erdtree Sanctuary site of grace, head west. Go down the stairs, take the elevator down, and head north down the stairs. Continue northeast and up another set of stairs. The scarab will be here.  Video Location

02628110.name: Misbegotten Shortbow
02628110.hint: Can drop from flying Misbegotten enemies in Castle Morne and Morne Tunnel in Weeping Peninsula.

002E14E0.name: Iron Greatsword
002E14E0.hint: Possible drop from the two large red-maned Misbegotten in Leyndell, Royal Capital, in the ash-covered path leading toward the Forbidden Lands.       Closest site of grace is the Avenue Balcony in Leyndell      Possible drop from the large red-maned Misbegotten in Miquella's Haligtree, north of the Haligtree Town Plaza Site of Grace. This is the most ideal farming spot, as it can still be farmed after burning the Erdtree.

00203230.name: Coded Sword
00203230.hint: Found in upstairs throne room of Fortified Manor, Leyndell Royal Capital. From Fortified Manor, 1st Floor site of grace, head outside the building, turn right, climb the stable roofs to the right and re-enter the second floor of the Fortified Manor. Head towards the Round Table room, and the Coded Sword is on the throne of the Throne Room southwest of the Round Table.  Video Location       This weapon must be acquired before defeating Maliketh, the Black Blade, as it is not accessible in Leyndell, Ashen Capital.

4000191F.name: Blessing of the Erdtree
4000191F.hint: Found at Queens Bedchamber in Leyndell Royal Capital. Video Location

02721170.name: Erdtree Bow
02721170.hint: Chest on the second floor of the building containing the Erdtree Sanctuary site in Leyndell, Royal Capital. From the Erdtree Sanctuary site in Leyndell, Royal Capital, exit the east side of the room. Once outside, climb up the root to the left that circles back into the building's 2nd floor. Once inside, exit the only door and immediately turn left to jump down to a nearby roof. Once on the roof, a broken window can be used to get back inside. After entering the broken window, turn right and the chest is nearby.  Video Location

00D7C260.name: Stormhawk Axe
00D7C260.hint: 2x looted from Nepheli Loux at the Village of the Albinaurics in Western Liurnia of the Lakes.       You must first talk to Nepheli Loux in her first location, and exhaust her father's dialog options and then hers in the round table to get her to move to the pathway under the bridge. This is to get her to move to the location. You can slay her in her first location and get the axes as well. It is also possible to bait the enemies to attack her in her first location, in which she doesn't retaliate against the enemies.      Looted from a dead body in the courtyard with Iron Maidens near Fortified Manor, First Floor at Leyndell, Royal Capital.   Castle Sol: 1x found on a corpse on a wooden awning in the central building of the courtyard. To reach this, head north while hugging the western ramparts from the castle's Main Entrance. Look for a room inside the ramparts near the northern section. This room has several slimes and a ladder. Climb the ladder to get on top of the ramparts and follow it west to a wooden bridge that connects to the central building. Beware the spectral Exile enemies mounted on ballistae on the ramparts, as well as the central building. Once on the central building's roof, jump on top of the cluttered objects draped in cloth in the northeastern section so you can get over the wall onto the awning and collect the axe.  Video Location

101D7374.name: Deathbed Dress
101D7374.hint: Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church site of grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

001F47D0.name: Weathered Straight Sword
001F47D0.hint: Dropped from Commoner enemies in any area.  Near the Secluded Cell grace in Stormveil castle, there is a room full of 10 commoners above the Living Jars that all carry the weapon. Probably the earliest (and most convenient) farming spot to get both the armor set and weapon. Takes around 20-30 seconds to navigate to the room although you won't have to worry about enemies on the way. The room can be cleared quickly (~15-20 seconds if you can one-shot them) as they are all near each other. Teleport back to the Secluded Cell grace and repeat.   Video Location

0021B8D0.name: Cane Sword
0021B8D0.hint: Leyndell, Royal Capital, West Capital Ramparts site of grace: Go south out of the room with the site of grace and down the flight of stairs to the floor underneath, make a complete U-turn in the room with the stairs to find a corpse with the sword.  The item can still be acquired in Leyndell, Ashen Capital. From the Leyndell, Capital of Ash site of grace, head west towards the dragon corpse's wing. Behind the wing, climb inside the broken wall, climb the ladder and keep going until you meet the same flight of stairs. Make a U-turn in the room down the stairs and the sword can be looted from the corpse at the end of the room.

000F4240.name: Dagger
000F4240.hint: Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold for  400 Runes.   Can be dropped by Highwaymen and different types of Foot Soldiers.       Multiple soldiers can be encountered early in the game at the camp east of Warmaster's Shack.

0272ADB0.name: Black Bow
0272ADB0.hint: Found on a corpse on a rooftop, in the area to the north east of the Avenue Balcony site of grace, in the Leyndell, Royal Capital.

00A91140.name: Hammer
00A91140.hint: Found in Leyndell, Royal Capital, in the Fortified Manor. Beside the Sanctified Whetblade.

0114F270.name: Gargoyle's Halberd
0114F270.hint: Dropped by the Valiant Gargoyle enemy near the West Capital Rampart site of Leyndell Royal Capital.  This weapon cannot be acquired after burning the Erdtree  Video Location

020741B0.name: Gravel Stone Seal
020741B0.hint: From the West Capital Rampart site of grace in Leyndell, walk north to the next room with the single guard inside. Jump over the balcony railing to get to the area next to the Fortified Manor with the dragon foot. It is dropped by the Leyndell Knight with the spear, who is supported by an archer Leyndell Knight..

00118C30.name: Erdsteel Dagger
00118C30.hint: Given by Kenneth Haight as a reward for clearing out Fort Haight.   Found NW of the Avenue Balcony site of Leyndell, Royal Capital. Drop down a pit with a Broken Statue and it will be on a corpse.  Video Location

002E6300.name: Knight's Greatsword
002E6300.hint: Dropped by most enemies in the knight archetype such as:       Godrick Knights (throughout Limgrave)    Cuckoo Knights (throughout Liurnia of the Lakes)    Mausoleum Knight    Leyndell Knights (throughout the Altus Plateau, especially in Leyndell, Royal Capital)      An easy-to-farm spectral knight that drops this weapon can be found just outside the Black Knife Catacombs in Liurnia of the Lakes.  Sell Value:   200  Base drop rate is 4% (at 100 Discovery)  Other notes and player tips go here

0160C880.name: Golem's Halberd
0160C880.hint: Possible drop from a Golem wielding this weapon, the earliest respawning one being at Limgrave Tower Bridge Site of Grace.

00B76920.name: Battle Hammer
00B76920.hint: Dropped randomly by hammer-wielding Duelists near the colosseum in Leyndell Royal Capital, accessible from the West Capital Rampart site of grace.   Prior to patch 1.03 was dropped by Grave Warden Duelist in Murkwater Catacombs.  Can't be farmed after beating Maliketh, The Black Blade as the Duelists vanish afterwards.

00F4E750.name: Partisan
00F4E750.hint: Dropped by the heavy Godrick Knight in Fort Haight.       Very low drop rate, but it is a confirmed drop.      Dropped by the Redmane Knight in Fort Gael.  Dropped by Cuckoo Knights by East Raya Lucaria Gate  Dropped by Leyndell Knights in Leyndell, Royal Capital  Dropped by Mausoleum Knights on horseback in Deeproot Depths

015F9000.name: Duelist Greataxe
015F9000.hint: Potential drop In Leyndell near the West Capital Rampart Site of Grace from the Duelist enemies near the colosseum. Follow the path with three trumpet-wielding enemies and a gargoyle. Continue passed them and over a set of stairs underneath a giant root. The enemy that drops this weapon is patrolling a nearby hill. This is not a guaranteed drop from this enemy.  Can't be farmed after beating Maliketh, The Black Blade as the Duelists vanish afterwards.  May drop from the Duelist in Sainted Hero's Grave, but enemy does not respawn once defeated.

0141A7C0.name: Star Fist
0141A7C0.hint: The left side of the colosseum near the West Capital Rampart Site of Grace, in the last opening on a body, in Leyndell, Royal Capital. (Can also be obtained, in the same place, in Leyndell, Ashen Capital.)

20000802.name: Ritual Sword Talisman
20000802.hint: Located in Lux Ruins, in a chest after defeating the boss, Demi-Human Queen Gilika.

80007850.name: Ash of War: Shield Crash
80007850.hint: This Ash of War is dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in Lux Ruins, Altus Plateau.

40001234.name: Unseen Blade
40001234.hint: This Sorcery can be found at the top of the Tower after completing the Mirage Rise puzzle. When you reach at the location, although your map marks there is a tower, you will notice that there is nothing there! However, you will receive a map, called Mirage Riddle. You will have to interact with three Phantom crests.  The first one is next to that initial position, hard to miss.  The second one can be found by continuing to the west, near the rock wall. Enemies will spawn.  The final one, is near the Bower of Bounty site of grace. Starting at the Bower of Bounty site of grace, head directly south to the edge of a cliff. Here a small enemy will spawn. Once you see this enemy, head east along the cliffside. On the left side you will see a strange looking stone which you have to hit in order to reveal the phantom crest. The stone lies before the bridge and will likely have messages surrounding it.. Once you found all three, head to where the tower was supposed to be, to actually find it this time. Climb all the way to the top to find this sorcery, along with Unseen Form and x5 Slumbering Egg.  Elden Ring Interactive

4000123E.name: Unseen Form
4000123E.hint: This Sorcery can be found in Altus Plateau at the top of the Tower after completing the Mirage Rise puzzle. When you reach at the location, although your map marks there is a tower, you will notice that there is nothing there! However, you will receive a map, called Mirage Riddle. You will have to interact with three Phantom crests.  The first one is next to that initial position, hard to miss.  The second one can be found by continuing to the west, near the rock wall. Enemies will spawn.  The final one, is near the Bower of Bounty site of grace. Starting at the Bower of Bounty site of grace, head directly south to the edge of a cliff. Here a small enemy will spawn. Once you see this enemy, head east along the cliffside. On the left side you will see a strange looking stone which you have to hit in order to reveal the phantom crest. The stone lies before the bridge and will likely have messages surrounding it. Once you found all three, head to where the tower was supposed to be, to actually find it this time. Climb all the way to the top to find this sorcery, along with Unseen Blade and x5 Slumbering Egg.Elden Ring Interactive

40002356.name: Outer Order
40002356.hint: Given to the player when talking to Melina in the Minor Erdtree Church

40002494.name: Missionary's Cookbook [4]
40002494.hint: Where to find Missionary's Cookbook [4]  Minor Erdtree Church, Capital area.

0207B6E0.name: Golden Order Seal
0207B6E0.hint: On the dead body of a corpse next to the Minor Erdtree Church Site of Grace in Leyndell Royal Capital.

40002AF8.name: Crimsonspill Crystal Tear
40002AF8.hint: Dropped by Wormface in Altus Plateau. Elden Ring Interactive

40002AFE.name: Speckled Hardtear
40002AFE.hint: Defeat Wormface at Minor Erdtree (Altus Plateau).

20000FBF.name: Boltdrake Talisman +1
20000FBF.hint: Located at Stormveil Castle.  When you reach the main castle grounds where you fight the Lion Guardian, head inside the room with the armored statues, and through the arch doorway, to reach the Limgrave Tower Bridge Site of Grace. Specifically, you'll find the on a body that you can loot, just at the top of the first set of stairs, resting against a pillar on the left side.   Boltdrake Talisman +1: This more-powerful variant of the Boltdrake Talisman can be found in a storage shed inside the Old Altus Tunnel dungeon.   Boltdrake Talisman +2: Found on a corpse hanging off an opening in a tall tower south of the Dragon Temple Rooftop Site of Grace. Reaching this area is a bit complex:       You will first need to head southeast to the large plaza guarded by a stationary Farum Azula Dragon, which is constantly raining red lightning all around the area.    From here, look northeast, then drop down a series of cliffs to the east to reach the opening at the bottom of a large building.    Follow the linear path here to a balcony with a ladder leading up to a terrace. Mind the Banished Knights patrolling the area.    Directly in front of the ladder is a lift building; to your left is a chest with the Dragon Towershield. Take the lift up to a series of slopes leading to a hallway underneath the same bridge you crossed to get to the southeast plaza.    The passage ahead has a Crucible Knight fighting a couple of Beastmen. Fight your way through the hallway (or just run past the enemies) to reach a ladder at the end.    Climb up the ladder to reach an open window where the corpse holding the talisman can be found.      Boltdrake Talisman +2 Video Location, Crumbling Farum Azula

0160EF90.name: Troll's Hammer
0160EF90.hint: Found in a storage shed inside the Old Altus Tunnel dungeon.

015F41E0.name: Great Club
015F41E0.hint: Dropped by the Stonedigger Troll boss in Old Altus Tunnel, The tunnel requires two Stonesword Keys.

10015FF4.name: Perfumer Robe
10015FF4.hint: Looted from the Perfumers found throughout Leyndell, Royal Capital.  Can be farmed in Perfumer's Grotto

100160BC.name: Perfumer Sarong
100160BC.hint: The Perfumer Sarong can be looted from Perfumers found through Leyndell, Royal Capital.

10015F90.name: Perfumer Hood
10015F90.hint: Chance to drop from Perfumer enemies encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital and the Perfumer's Ruins.

00E52FE0.name: Great Omenkiller Cleaver
00E52FE0.hint: Dropped by Omenkiller at Volcano Manor. Video Location, Video Location.  Dropped by Omenkiller boss at Perfumer's Grotto.

01C9EA90.name: Perfumer's Shield
01C9EA90.hint: The Perfumer's Shield Shield can be found at the following location  Can be farmed from Perfumer enemies wielding the shield       Two Perfumer enemies carrying the shield can be found near the Perfumer's Grotto Site of Grace. Go down further into the cave. The Perfumer that stands on the top ledge carries a sword, but one of the two Perfumers that is patrolling the lower area carries the shield. The Perfumer that's sitting by the Giant Miranda Sprout also carries the shield.    Three Depraved Perfumer enemies carrying the shield can be found near the Shaded Castle Inner Gate Site of Grace. Go east, back through the poison ground area, and take the ladder to get on top of the inner castle wall. From the top of the ladder two Depraved Perfumers will be sitting on the ground to the left and one will be patrolling on the right.

20001388.name: Crimson Seed Talisman
20001388.hint: In the first locked imp's room at the beginning of the dungeon in Sainted Hero's Grave, in Altus Plateau.

4000089E.name: Prattling Pate Let's get to it
4000089E.hint: Prattling Pate "Let's Get to It" can be found within Sainted Hero's Grave in Altus Plateau. Found by the entrance of the room with the shadow enemy that, when killed, opens the final door.   Prattling Pate "Hello"  Prattling Pate "Thank you"  Prattling Pate "Apologies"  Prattling Pate "Wonderful"  Prattling Pate "Please help"  Prattling Pate "You're beautiful"  Prattling Pate "My Beloved"

4003D860.name: Leyndell Soldier Ashes
4003D860.hint: Where to Find Leyndell Soldier Ashes  Found in Sainted Hero's Grave in Altus Plateau. After a floor collapsed, make your way back up and retrieve from a corpse.

4003E800.name: Ancient Dragon Knight Kristoff Ashes
4003E800.hint: Dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor boss inside the Sainted Hero’s Grave west of Leyndell, Royal Capital.

8000C4E0.name: Ash of War: Lightning Ram
8000C4E0.hint: It can be found at Altus Plateau, just south of Sainted Hero's Grave. It drops from a Teardrop Scarab in the area. Elden Ring.

20000FA1.name: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman +1
20000FA1.hint: Base talisman: Bestial Sanctum: Found on the bottom level of the structure below the surrounding cliffs.  +1 Variant: Sainted Hero's Grave: Can be found in a locked imp's room, behind a Stonesword Key fog wall (not the first one you encounter; the Crimson Seed Talisman is located behind that one). When you reach the area with the big axes stomping the ground, you need to get on the first one and jump on the ledge on the left wall. There are multiple Putrid Corpses along this path and in the room with the fog doors, alongside a pair of Wraith Callers. Once you've dealt with them and opened the fog door, there are a final pair of Putrids watching over the talisman.    +2 Variant: Crumbling Farum Azula: Looted from a corpse on floating chunk of debris in the northern section, between Dragon Temple Lift and Dragon Temple Rooftop. Video Location

000F6950.name: Black Knife
000F6950.hint: This is a drop from defeating the Black Knife Assassin at the entrance of Sainted Hero's Grave, in Altus Plateau. This boss is directly west of the Rampartside Path site.

007A3910.name: Onyx Lord's Greatsword
007A3910.hint: Dropped by Onyx Lord in the Sealed Tunnel.

400022F8.name: Smithing-Stone Miner's Bell Bearing [2]
400022F8.hint: Found in a chest in the first hidden chamber of the Sealed Tunnel, accessed by hitting the western wall past the Site of Grace. Drop down into the lower section and look to the west to find the chest.

00B93DE0.name: Pickaxe
00B93DE0.hint: Dropped by Miners  Fastest farming route is going to the Limgrave Tunnels, go to the second tunnel that leads to boss that's behind the first elevator shaft. There's a Stakes of Marika nearby. Kill the five Miners in the tunnel then jump down the elevator shaft and die. Respawn at the Stake to reset the Miners. Rinse and repeat. Make sure you pick up your runes between each suicide.

40001B3B.name: Dragonbolt Blessing
40001B3B.hint: Found at Stormcaller Church, inside a chest that's against a wall.

10035B60.name: Page Hood
10035B60.hint: Three are found part way down the stairs from the Royal Moongazing Grounds site of grace in Caria Manor.  They are scattered throughout Leyndell, Royal Capital.  Tombsward Ruins Underground  Gelmir Hero's Grave

400024A9.name: Perfumer's Cookbook [2]
400024A9.hint: Where to find Perfumer's Cookbook [2]  Found on a corpse sitting in a chair on one of the rooftops at The Shaded Castle, in Altus Plateau. From the Shaded Castle Inner Gate Site of Grace, head north and climb up the ladder on your left. Enter the dark library area and look for a ladder up, climb up to find the Cookbook.

10155D88.name: Leather Gloves
10155D88.hint: Murkwater Cave. Drops from Patches if he's killed after pleading for mercy.

10155DEC.name: Leather Boots
10155DEC.hint: Murkwater Cave: Drops from Patches if he's killed after pleading for mercy.

100EB1B8.name: Marais Mask
100EB1B8.hint: Dropped by Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan, a hostile NPC found in the fields west of The Shaded Castle.

10035C8C.name: Page Trousers
10035C8C.hint: Three are easily found behind the Royal Moongazing Grounds site of grace in Caria Manor.  They are scattered throughout Leyndell, Royal Capital  Tombsward Ruins Underground  Gelmir Hero's Grave

10083E28.name: Depraved Perfumer Gloves
10083E28.hint: The Depraved Perfumer Set pieces can be farmed from the Depraved Perfumer enemies located around The Shaded Castle.  The best place to farm this set is in Liurnia of the Lakes near the Village of the Albinaurics Site of Grace. There is one Depraved Perfumer enemy a short distance up the hill to the East.

10083D60.name: Depraved Perfumer Headscarf
10083D60.hint: The Depraved Perfumer Set pieces can be farmed from the Depraved Perfumer enemies located around The Shaded Castle.  The best place to farm this set is in Liurnia of the Lakes near the Village of the Albinaurics Site of Grace. There is one Depraved Perfumer enemy a short distance up the hill to the East.

003010B0.name: Marais Executioner's Sword
003010B0.hint: Dropped by Elemer of the Briar at The Shaded Castle.

100EB21C.name: Marais Robe
100EB21C.hint: Dropped by Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan in the fields west of The Shaded Castle.

10083E8C.name: Depraved Perfumer Trousers
10083E8C.hint: The Depraved Perfumer Set pieces can be farmed from the Depraved Perfumer enemies located around The Shaded Castle.  The best place to farm this set is in Liurnia of the Lakes near the Village of the Albinaurics Site of Grace. There is one Depraved Perfumer enemy a short distance up the hill to the East.

10035BC4.name: Page Garb
10035BC4.hint: Three are easily found behind the Royal Moongazing Grounds site of grace in Caria Manor.  They are scattered throughout Leyndell, Royal Capital  Tombsward Ruins Underground.

10083DC4.name: Depraved Perfumer Robe
10083DC4.hint: Acquire this from the enemy directly up the hill from the site of grace at the Village of the Albinaurics. He is the enemy who wields fire, you may have to kill him a few times to get it.  The Depraved Perfumer Set can also be farmed from the Depraved Perfumer enemies located around The Shaded Castle

0262A820.name: Red Branch Shortbow
0262A820.hint: Leyndell Royal Capital: Drops from a Page on the study, past the group of Oracle Envoys.  Tombsward Ruins: Drops from the 2 Pages in the underground area.  Royal Moongazing Ground: Drops from the 3 Pages in the stairs east from the site of grace

10155D24.name: Leather Armor
10155D24.hint: Murkwater Cave. Drops from Patches if he's killed after pleading for mercy.

00F44B10.name: Spear
00F44B10.hint: A +7 version drops from Patches in Murkwater Cave if he is killed after pleading for mercy.  Can drop from Exile Soldiers that wield it in Stormveil Castle. Near the Rampart Tower Site of Grace, up the wooden stairs is a farmable Castle Guard with a spear.

01E90B50.name: Briar Greatshield
01E90B50.hint: Dropped by Elemer of the Briar at The Shaded Castle.

004CE780.name: Antspur Rapier
004CE780.hint: Dropped by Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan, a hostile NPC found in the fields west of The Shaded Castle.

4000245B.name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [19]
4000245B.hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [19]  Found on the ground inside of the smaller ruined building at Woodfolk Ruins in Altus Plateau.  The cookbook is actually a bit west of the marker on the link, essentially on the tree on the map.

4000190A.name: Wrath of Gold
4000190A.hint: Found in the southernmost section of Woodfolk Ruins. It's the part directly northeast of Altus Tunnel. Among the enemies, there is a staircase that goes down and leads to a chest that contains this Incantation..

8000C60C.name: Ash of War: Golden Slam
8000C60C.hint: Altus Plateau: There's a Teardrop Scarab that spawns inside one of the buildings of the Woodfolk Ruins that's right next to the Minor Erdtree in the area. Defeat it to obtain the ashes.

01EA6AE0.name: Icon Shield
01EA6AE0.hint: Found inside a crumbling building at Woodfolk Ruins. Beware of the enemies inside.

005B8D80.name: Bloody Helice
005B8D80.hint: In the Writheblood Ruins, found in a chest after the boss.

100FDE80.name: Radiant Gold Mask
100FDE80.hint: Altus Plateau: Found on a corpse at the southern tip of the collapsed bridge, North East of Writheblood Ruins, and almost due south of Road of Iniquity Side Path grace. Starting at Road of Iniquity Side Path grace, go west away from the site, then immediately turn south. When you get to the cliff side go west again. Follow the cliff side until you get to the spot where you can jump onto the first broken bridge section. This is past the pit where the gold bugs are. Then head south and jump to the other broken bridge section. The body/mask is at the end of this section, at the end before you fall off. The loot is up on the bridge section, farthest south..

00B9DA20.name: Great Stars
00B9DA20.hint: On a guarded Carriage being towed by two Trolls in Altus Plateau, travelling on the road southwest of the Road of Iniquity Side Path Site of Grace.   Dropped by Magnus the Beast Claw upon defeat.  Video location

20000FD3.name: Pearldrake Talisman +1
20000FD3.hint: Base talisman: Can be found beyond the lowest ("Crumbling Lands") waygate of the Four Belfries. Go through the waygate, then jump down to the north, then jump down to the east (and if you can, use ranged attacks to kill the two beastmen below), then jump down again, then jump down (to the north) one more time.  +1 Variation: Can be found in Wyndham Ruins in the Mt. Gelmir region. The talisman is found inside a chest at the end of the area sealed by an Imp Statue; a Stonesword Key is required.   +2 Variation: Can be found in Miquella's Haligtree. Travel to the Haligtree Town Site of Grace and exit through the northwestern door. Then climb the ladder and turn around to jump southeast across the gap. The talisman will be located on a corpse at the base of a statue, guarded by a Misbegotten Warrior. Video Location

400013A6.name: Tibia's Summons
400013A6.hint: Drops from Tibia Mariner located in Wyndham Ruins. Elden Ring Interactive

10090114.name: All-Knowing Armor
10090114.hint: The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing upon defeat. Sir Gideon is encountered as a boss in Leyndell, Ashen Capital, an alternate version of the Royal Capital accessible only after making significant progress in the story.

10090178.name: All-Knowing Gauntlets
10090178.hint: The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing upon defeat. Sir Gideon is encountered as a boss in Leyndell, Ashen Capital, an alternate version of the Royal Capital accessible only after making significant progress in the story.

20000412.name: Erdtree's Favor +2
20000412.hint: Base talisman:  Fringefolk Hero's Grave: To get there, use two Stonesword Keys on the double Imp Keystone next to the Stranded Graveyard Site of Grace. This will lead to a mini-dungeon with traps. Head down until you see the path narrow on both sides and drop drown at the edge to get access to the secret area. Proceed past the imps and a fire trap to find the item resting at an altar. Two Grafted Scions wait hanging above, so be sure to avoid them when they land and grab it really quickly.  +1 Variant: Subterranean Shunning-Grounds: Can be found in a chest, in the boss room after the boss fight with Mohg, the Omen. You do not have to defeat Mohg to loot the chest. You can acquire this mid-fight.Video Location  +2 Variant: Leyndell, Ashen Capital: Found on top of a branch jutting out of the ground in a large courtyard, guarded by three Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirits. Fast travel to the Forbidden Lands Site of Grace, and take the elevator back up to the city. Exit the west door, then fight past a knight and few soldiers, and continue down the stairs, then take the large wooden elevator down. You will arrive at a landing overlooking the courtyard, where the beasts and this talisman is located. You can avoid the beasts by hugging the left wall.  Video Location

40001918.name: Erdtree Heal
40001918.hint: Can be found in Queen's Bedchamber in Leyndell, Ashen Capital       After igniting the Forge of the Giants and defeating Maliketh, Black Blade of Death in Crumbling Farum Azula, return to Leyndell and it will be in ruins of ash. Travel to the Queen's Bedchamber and it's in the same spot as Blessing of the Erdtree was.

100900B0.name: All-Knowing Helm
100900B0.hint: The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing upon defeat. Sir Gideon is encountered as a boss in Leyndell, Ashen Capital, an alternate version of the Royal Capital accessible only after making significant progress in the story.

100901DC.name: All-Knowing Greaves
100901DC.hint: The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing upon defeat. Sir Gideon is encountered as a boss in Leyndell, Ashen Capital, an alternate version of the Royal Capital accessible only after making significant progress in the story.

200003EA.name: Crimson Amber Medallion +2
200003EA.hint: Base Talisman: Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for  1,500 Runes.   +1 Variant: Found in Volcano Manor. Go to the Prison Town Church Site of Grace, go out and through the little town as if you were progressing through the manor as normal, and use a Stonesword Key to go through the fog gate. An Abductor Virgin is there, but you can easily run up the stairs to the level above, where the talisman is on a dead body. Video Location  +2 Variant, SPOILER WARNING: Can be found just southwest of the Leyndell, Ashen Capital Site of Grace,  by dropping down the open sewer grate to the beam below. Video Location

00A98670.name: Scepter of the All-Knowing
00A98670.hint: Dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing upon defeat. Sir Gideon is encountered as a boss in Leyndell, Ashen Capital, an alternate version of the Royal Capital accessible only after making significant progress in the story.

02817AC0.name: Greatbow
02817AC0.hint: Chance to drop from Redmane Knight in Fort Gael. .  Chance to drop from a Leyndell Knight wielding it in Altus Plateau, near the Altus Highway Junction Site of Grace.  From chest at the Highway Lookout Tower (Altus Plateau) to the north of the Divine Capital.

10027100.name: Guilty Hood
10027100.hint: Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for  500 Runes.  Can be found on a corpse in the sewers north of Avenue Balcony site in Leyndell Royal Capital.  Video Location

100D6DE4.name: Confessor Armor
100D6DE4.hint: Starting Equipment for the Confessor Class.  Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for  1500 Runes.

400021A0.name: Map (Mt. Gelmir)

100D6E48.name: Confessor Gloves
100D6E48.hint: Starting Equipment for the Confessor Class.  Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for  1000 Runes.

100D6EAC.name: Confessor Boots
100D6EAC.hint: Starting Equipment for the Confessor Class.  Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for  1000 Runes.

80009CA4.name: Ash of War: Barrage
80009CA4.hint: Mt. Gelmir: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found in the narrow channel north of Seethewater River.

4000246B.name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [20]
4000246B.hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [20]  Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for  3000 Runes.

100D6D80.name: Confessor Hood
100D6D80.hint: Starting Equipment for the Confessor Class.  Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for  1000 Runes.

01602C40.name: Fallingstar Beast Jaw
01602C40.hint: Dropped by the Full-Grown Fallingstar Beast in Mt. Gelmir.

027286A0.name: Pulley Bow
027286A0.hint: Pulley Bow can be found on a sitting corpse (at the top of a siege tower near Mt. Gelmir campsite. The tower is located to the north of Gelmir Hero's Grave site of Grace)

006C0840.name: Scavenger's Curved Sword
006C0840.hint: Found in Mt. Gelmir, on a corpse near a Grafted Scion across a stone pillar-bridge north west of the First Mt. Gelmmir Campsite site of grace. The corpse closest to the ladder has the blade.

400019C8.name: Golden Vow
400019C8.hint: Default skill of the Golden Halberd.  Limgrave: dropped by Godrick Knight when defeated. Elden Ring.

00E6B680.name: Butchering Knife
00E6B680.hint: Dropped by Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater.       this weapon comes pre-infused with the Sacred enhancement by default, although it has no custom Ash of War on it. If playing with beginnng patches, Anastasia drops a "Standard" Butchering Knife with no Ash of War.    Since it has Sacred affinity but no Ash of War, it seems to be a bug by the programmers but you can revert it to its base Standard affinity by infusing it with any Ash of War and then removing it.

0290E410.name: Pulley Crossbow
0290E410.hint: Found next to the Site of Grace at the Craftsman's Shack.

0010A1D0.name: Great Knife
0010A1D0.hint: Starting equipment for the Bandit class.  Rare drop from Demi-Humans wielding this weapon.       Craftman's Shack: four Demi-Humans hiding in a flock of sheep north of the Site of Grace.     Lakeside Crystal Cave: one Demi-Human hiding in a bush at the start of the dungeon.

10055730.name: Fire Monk Hood
10055730.hint: Pieces of the Fire Monk Set are dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintops of the Giants.

10055794.name: Fire Monk Armor
10055794.hint: Pieces of the Fire Monk Set are dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintops of the Giants.

4000246D.name: Armorer's Cookbook [7]

100557F8.name: Fire Monk Gauntlets

10057F6C.name: Fire Prelate Greaves
10057F6C.hint: Dropped by Fire Prelates.       One can be found in Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir.    One can be found near the giant chain bridge outside the Giants' Mountaintop Catacombs.    One is outside the Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintops of the Giants, nearby Whiteridge Road grace. Mob has 5638 HP total (Non-NG)

10057EA4.name: Fire Prelate Armor
10057EA4.hint: Dropped by Fire Prelate enemies.  The altered version without the red tabard is dropped by one found in Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir.  The non-altered version is dropped by one found in Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintops of the Giants. Drops from Fire Prelate wielding it nearby Whiteridge Road grace. Mob has 5638 HP total (Non-NG)  2nd option is the one outside of Giant's mountaintop catatombs, farmable along with the Thorned Whip.

1005585C.name: Fire Monk Greaves
1005585C.hint: Pieces of the Fire Monk Set are dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintops of the Giants.

10057E40.name: Fire Prelate Helm
10057E40.hint: Dropped by Fire Prelates.  One is found standing before the long, thin bridge in Mountaintops of the Giants, just outside of Giants' Mountaintop Catacombs.  One can be found in Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir.  One is in Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintops of the Giants. Drops from Fire Prelate wielding it nearby Whiteridge Road grace. Mob has 5638 HP total (Non-NG)

10057F08.name: Fire Prelate Gauntlets
10057F08.hint: Dropped by Fire Prelates.  One can be found in Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir.  One is in Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintops of the Giants. Drops from Fire Prelate wielding it nearby, Whiteridge Road grace. Mob has 5638 HP total (Non-NG)

200007E4.name: Fire Scorpion Charm
200007E4.hint: Found up the ramparts on a wooden platform to the west in Fort Laiedd within Mt. Gelmir.

00A93850.name: Monk's Flamemace
00A93850.hint: Drops from Monk enemies wielding it in Liurnia of the Lakes and Mountaintops of the Giants.       A bunch of them are patrolling around Guardian's Garrison      There's one immediately to the left of the Grace in the Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave.

01FB81E0.name: Staff of the Guilty
01FB81E0.hint: Drops only from Thorn Sorcerers wielding blazing staves, not from Thorn Sorcerers wielding smoldering staves.  Fort Laiedd: Can be dropped by the Thorn Sorcerers at Fort Laiedd, though it is rare (2% base).  Guardians' Garrison: There are several Thorn Sorcerers on the slope leading up to the garrison.

015EF3C0.name: Prelate's Inferno Crozier
015EF3C0.hint: Drops from a Fire Prelate wielding it inside Fort Laiedd near Seethewater Terminus Site of Grace. This drop is guaranteed once per playthrough.

10035B60.name: Page Hood
10035B60.hint: Three are found part way down the stairs from the Royal Moongazing Grounds site of grace in Caria Manor.  They are scattered throughout Leyndell, Royal Capital.  Tombsward Ruins Underground  Gelmir Hero's Grave

101ADC2C.name: Gelmir Knight Greaves
101ADC2C.hint: You can loot the entire Gelmir Knight Set in the Gelmir Hero's Grave dungeon from a Gelmir Knight corpse. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.  To find the corpse, head down the first Chariot hallway until you see a pit on either side of the central concrete walkway instead of lava. Drop down into the left pit onto some wooden beams and look for a small window along the walls. Head through this window and down the ladder to find a Bloodhound Knight guarding the corpse.

101ADB64.name: Gelmir Knight Armor
101ADB64.hint: You can loot the entire Gelmir Knight Set in the Gelmir Hero's Grave dungeon from a Gelmir Knight corpse. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.  To find the corpse, head down the first Chariot hallway until you see a pit on either side of the central concrete walkway instead of lava. Drop down into the left pit onto some wooden beams and look for a small window along the walls. Head through this window and down the ladder to find a Bloodhound Knight guarding the corpse.

To find the corpse, head down the first Chariot hallway until you see a pit on either side of the central concrete walkway instead of lava. Drop down into the left pit onto some wooden beams and look for a small window along the walls. Head through this window and down the ladder to find a Bloodhound Knight guarding the corpse.

To find the corpse, head down the first Chariot hallway until you see a pit on either side of the central concrete walkway instead of lava. Drop down into the left pit onto some wooden beams and look for a small window along the walls. Head through this window and down the ladder to find a Bloodhound Knight guarding the corpse.

100C0E54.name: Bloodhound Knight Armor
100C0E54.hint: The entire Bloodhound Knight Set drops in Gelmir Hero's Grave - Mt. Gelmir. Dropped by the Bloodhound Knight guarding the Gelmir Knight Set pickup. The set must then be picked up from the corpse of the Knight.

100C0EB8.name: Bloodhound Knight Gauntlets
100C0EB8.hint: The entire Bloodhound Knight Set drops in Gelmir Hero's Grave - Mt. Gelmir. Dropped by the Bloodhound Knight guarding the Gelmir Knight Set pickup. The set must then be picked up from the corpse of the Knight.

100C0F1C.name: Bloodhound Knight Greaves
100C0F1C.hint: The entire Bloodhound Knight Set drops in Gelmir Hero's Grave - Mt. Gelmir. Dropped by the Bloodhound Knight guarding the Gelmir Knight Set pickup. The set must then be picked up from the corpse of the Knight.

10035C8C.name: Page Trousers
10035C8C.hint: Three are easily found behind the Royal Moongazing Grounds site of grace in Caria Manor.  They are scattered throughout Leyndell, Royal Capital  Tombsward Ruins Underground  Gelmir Hero's Grave

10035BC4.name: Page Garb
10035BC4.hint: Three are easily found behind the Royal Moongazing Grounds site of grace in Caria Manor.  They are scattered throughout Leyndell, Royal Capital  Tombsward Ruins Underground.

006CA480.name: Mantis Blade
006CA480.hint: Dropped by Lesser Cemetery Shade in Gelmir Hero's Grave.  The shade is in the alcove at the same spot you drop down to ride the chariot. This is easily missed.  It is likely a guaranteed drop on the first kill, then it may not drop again.

4003A598.name: Bloodhound Knight Floh
4003A598.hint: Where to Find Bloodhound Knight Floh  Gelmir Hero's Grave (dropped by the Red Wolf of the Champion upon defeat)

100C0DF0.name: Bloodhound Knight Helm
100C0DF0.hint: The entire Bloodhound Knight Set drops in Gelmir Hero's Grave - Mt. Gelmir. Dropped by the Bloodhound Knight guarding the Gelmir Knight Set pickup. The set must then be picked up from the corpse of the Knight.

0262A820.name: Red Branch Shortbow
0262A820.hint: Leyndell Royal Capital: Drops from a Page on the study, past the group of Oracle Envoys.  Tombsward Ruins: Drops from the 2 Pages in the underground area.  Royal Moongazing Ground: Drops from the 3 Pages in the stairs east from the site of grace

00A9D490.name: Ringed Finger
00A9D490.hint: Gelmir Hero's Grave: From the first Chariot hallway, head all the way down, as the path ends you will need to continue down across the lava and turn left at the end of the path to find a room with a chest containing the weapon.

400012D4.name: Roiling Magma
400012D4.hint: Found on a corpse inside the Hermit's Shack in Mt. Gelmir.

40001068.name: Comet Azur
40001068.hint: Hermit Village in Mt. Gelmir: Acquired from Primeval Sorcerer Azur sitting near the cliffs in the northeast.

100F1BF8.name: Errant Sorcerer Manchettes
100F1BF8.hint: Looted off a corpse in Hermit Village, Mt. Gelmir. The corpse is found in a house in the northeast corner of the village..

100F1C5C.name: Errant Sorcerer Boots
100F1C5C.hint: Looted off a corpse in Hermit Village, Mt. Gelmir. The corpse is found in a house in the northeast corner of the village.

4000089F.name: Prattling Pate You're Beautiful
4000089F.hint: Prattling Pate "You're Beautiful" can be found at Hermit Village in Mt. Gelmir, on a corpse on the side of a house in the south side of the village.  Prattling Pate "Hello"  Prattling Pate "Thank you"  Prattling Pate "Apologies"  Prattling Pate "Wonderful"  Prattling Pate "Please help"  Prattling Pate "Let's get to it"  Prattling Pate "My Beloved"

100F1B94.name: Errant Sorcerer Robe
100F1B94.hint: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Errant Sorcerer Robe (Altered) into the non-altered Errant Sorcerer Robe.

100F1B30.name: Hierodas Glintstone Crown
100F1B30.hint: Hermit Village in Mt. Gelmir: Found on a corpse behind a house on the south side of the village.

00116520.name: Bloodstained Dagger
00116520.hint: Rare drop from Demi-Human Chiefs       There is a Demi-Human Chief sleeping before the wooden bridge leading to the Minor Erdtree in the weeping peninsula.    There are 2 of them close to each other in the Hermit Village. A quick way to farm is going to Primeval Sorcerer Azur grace, hugging the wall while going south and there will be one of them isolated. Kill that one and there is one immediately to the side away from the wall.

40002B0A.name: Leaden Hardtear
40002B0A.hint: Drops from Ulcerated Tree Spirit in Mt. Gelmir.

40002B11.name: Cerulean Hidden Tear
40002B11.hint: Mt. Gelmir: Drops from the Ulcerated Tree Spirit at the Minor Erdtree, east of the Road of Iniquity site of grace.

10015FF4.name: Perfumer Robe
10015FF4.hint: Looted from the Perfumers found throughout Leyndell, Royal Capital.  Can be farmed in Perfumer's Grotto

100160BC.name: Perfumer Sarong

101CD798.name: Omenkiller Long Gloves
101CD798.hint: Dropped by an Omenkiller enemy at Perfumer's Ruins, together with Omenkiller Robe and Omenkiller Boots.

101CD734.name: Omenkiller Robe

101CD7FC.name: Omenkiller Boots

10015F90.name: Perfumer Hood
