400024A8.name: Perfumer's Cookbook [1]
400024A8.hint: In the first chest when entering Perfumer's Ruins, NW of Abandoned Coffin site in Altus Plateau. Located in a chest near the table where the Perfume Bottle is located.

200008AC.name: Perfumer's Talisman
200008AC.hint: Perfumer's Ruins - In a chest underground below the stairs in the room with the yellow Giant Poison Flower. The stairs are covered by wooden planks and must be either rolled onto or attacked to reveal.

00C6AB60.name: Family Heads
00C6AB60.hint: Altus Plateau: Dropped by Necromancer Garris at Sage's Cave.

100E30D0.name: Skeletal Mask
100E30D0.hint: The Sage's Cave, in a chest behind an illusory wall.

01DCD650.name: Candletree Wooden Shield
01DCD650.hint: In the Sage's Cave, in a chest behind an illusory wall.

2000177A.name: Concealing Veil
2000177A.hint: Altus Plateau. Dropped by the Black Knife Assassin in Sage's Cave.

10155CC0.name: Black Hood
10155CC0.hint: In the Sage's Cave, in a treasure chest behind an illusory wall.

100E3134.name: Raptor's Black Feathers
100E3134.hint: Inside the Sage's Cave, in a chest behind an illusory wall.

015026B0.name: Raptor Talons
015026B0.hint: Located at Sage's Cave, in one of the chests, behind several secret walls. Sage's Cave is in this location:

40002B13.name: Purifying Crystal Tear
40002B13.hint: Dropped by Eleonora, Violet Bloody Finger at the Second Church of Marika in Altus Plateau.

009959D0.name: Eleonora's Poleblade
009959D0.hint: Obtained by defeating Eleonora, Violet Bloody Finger, at the Second Church of Marika. (You do not have to complete Bloody Finger Hunter Yura's quest line to obtain this weapon).

10113E10.name: Mushroom Head
10113E10.hint: Found in a cavern in Seethewater Cave filled with mushroom people and a Giant Poison Flower.

10113ED8.name: Mushroom Arms
10113ED8.hint: Found in a cavern in Seethewater Cave filled with mushroom people and a Giant Poison Flower. Elden Ring Interactive

10113F3C.name: Mushroom Legs
10113F3C.hint: Found in a cavern in Seethewater Cave filled with mushroom people and a Giant Poison Flower. Elden Ring Interactive

10113E74.name: Mushroom Body
10113E74.hint: Found in a cavern in Seethewater Cave filled with mushroom people and a Giant Poison Flower.

2000087A.name: Kindred of Rot's Exultation
2000087A.hint: Dropped by the Kindred of Rot in Seethewater Cave.

40033450.name: Winged Misbegotten Ashes
40033450.hint: Unsightly Catacombs: Found on a corpse in a pit with 4 Misbegotten enemies, near the end of the catacombs.

40034FA8.name: Perfumer Tricia
40034FA8.hint: Perfumer Tricia and the Misbegotten Warrior can be found at the end of the Unsightly Catacombs, after unlocking the final door at the lowest level. These Catacombs are found beneath the Perfumer's Ruins near the western edge of Mt. Gelmir. The entrance is in the southwest cliff face below the ruins and requires a Stonesword Key to unlock.

4000089A.name: Prattling Pate Apologies
4000089A.hint: Prattling Pate "Apologies" can be found at Unsightly Catacombs in southwestern part of Altus Plateau. Found on a corpse in the back corridor on the level with the lever that controls the final door.  Prattling Pate "Hello"  Prattling Pate "Thank you"  Prattling Pate "Wonderful"  Prattling Pate "Please help"  Prattling Pate "Let's get to it"  Prattling Pate "You're beautiful"  Prattling Pate "My Beloved"

00D63BC0.name: Iron Cleaver
00D63BC0.hint: Castle Morne. Dropped by the Misbegotten creatures using this weapon.  Leyndell, Royal Capital: Chance to drop from the Misbegotten enemies that can be found at behind the big door.  To farm easily: go to Castle Morne and unlock "Behind the Castle" Grace. Warp here. Run west , drop down rocks then off castle. There are 3 sleeping on that ledge and one more in the room to your right with the prisoner spirit. Easy backstabs, farm without any fighting

00E5A510.name: Longhaft Axe
00E5A510.hint: Rare drop from Misbegotten wielding it.  There is an easy to kill one at Castle Morne in Weeping Peninsula. From Beside the Rampart Gaol site of grace, cross the bridge and will be on the left sleeping.  Can be farmed efficiently from two Misbegotten by heading to the farm down the stairs and north from the Windmill Village site of grace.  Can also be dropped by the same enemy in Cave of the Forlorn, south of the minor Erdtree in the Consecrated Snowfield.

02628110.name: Misbegotten Shortbow
02628110.hint: Can drop from flying Misbegotten enemies in Castle Morne and Morne Tunnel in Weeping Peninsula.

01CCD0C0.name: Coil Shield
01CCD0C0.hint: The Coil Shield is located on a body in Volcano Cave, northeast of the Ninth Mt. Gelmir Campsite Site of Grace in Mt. Gelmir. From the cave grace, head into the large open room. From there, take the right-most tunnel (northwest) and follow it to the end. Drop down onto the small cliff below. Turn around and go into the tunnel. The shield will be on a body in the room ahead. Note: There will be an ambush of enemies, so you may want to clear the room first.

029F8A10.name: Jar Cannon
029F8A10.hint: Dropped by the boss Demi-Human Queen Margot at the end of Volcano Cave north of Mt. Gelmir.

40002460.name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [21]
40002460.hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [21]  Can be found Inside the Volcano Manor, going upstairs when you enter the hallway from the lobby, enter the first door to the right, the same one with the corpse with a Perfume Bottle. Follow the path through a room full of Snails and you'll end up with a room with two ways forward - one down a flight of steps, another through an open doorway to your left. Head left first, being wary of Snails that may ambush you and continue until you reach a dead end. The corpse at the end of this passageway has the Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [21] on it, and to the left of it, reveal another hidden door that opens up into a room with the Depraved Perfumer Carmaan Ashes.  Video Location

40002461.name: Missionary's Cookbook [6]
40002461.hint: Where to find Missionary's Cookbook [6]  Volcano Manor Region; From Temple of Eiglay Site of Grace, take the lift up and go outside, follow the path and drop down into the area with the lava and slugs. Cross the rock bridge and continue up the path until you reach a large, open area of lava, and an Abductor Virgin enemy. There are TWO openings in this area. One is a broken window in a tower near the Abductor Virgin, the other is a doorway farther to the West. Jump through the FIRST opening, through the window of the tower into a dark room, climb down the ladder near the door (not the window you just entered through), walk down the stairway to the bottom floor, and the corpse with this cookbook can be found behind a cell door.  Video Location

4000232A.name: My Thanks
4000232A.hint: Dropped at the end of the hallway in Volcano Manor after defeating Rykard. Video Location

1010CD2C.name: Eye Surcoat
1010CD2C.hint: Eye Surcoat can be found on the ground after defeating Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy Boss.

100EA72C.name: Consort's Trousers
100EA72C.hint: Looted from the corpse of Tanith after attacking her and defeating the summoned Tannith's Knight near the Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy site of grace in Volcano Manor, Altus Plateau.    Can be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for  1,500 Runes.

40034BC0.name: Depraved Perfumer Carmaan Ashes
40034BC0.hint: Where to Find Depraved Perfumer Carmaan Ashes  Located on a corpse in Volcano Manor that is near the top of Mt. Gelmir, west of Altus Plateau. Finding these ashes involves beginning the Volcano Manor questline. Once inside the manor talk to Lady Tanith and agree to receive the drawing-room key which opens the doors in the hallway to the right. In the room opposite to a bolted shut door is an illusionary wall that hides the secret passage leading you around the manor's perimeter into the locked room that hides the corpse holding the ashes.  Video Location

40037E88.name: Man-Serpent Ashes
40037E88.hint: Where to Find Man-Serpent Ashes  Located by the Volcano Manor site of grace in the Volcano Manor legacy dungeon on Mt. Gelmir. The ashes can be found in a room on a corpse surrounded by red candles and three enemies inside the large open room with two large sets of stairs, spiral pillars, and a large egg guarded by a man-serpent at the top.  Video Location

00F61FD0.name: Inquisitor's Girandole
00F61FD0.hint: Dropped by the Abductor Virgins Field Boss in Volcano Manor's underground, down from the Subterranean Inquisition Chamber site of grace. Easily reachable once you have the Temple of Eiglay Grace. Video Location

101D24F0.name: Crimson Tear Scarab
101D24F0.hint: On a rocky ledge at Volcano Manor, Altus Plateau.       To reach the Crimson Tear Scarab, start from the Temple of Eiglay site of grace.           Route A: If you have activated the wooden elevator in the tower to the north, ride it to the top. After the elevator reaches the top, exit the room via the doorway to the northeast. Look over the railing to the south; there is a ledge below with a corpse.      Route B: Take the stone lift south of the Temple of Eiglay grace. Walk out to the balcony, and jump down to a rocky ledge to the east. Follow the path past Burning Slugs up to the top. Head northwest to the nearest tower, where an Abductor Virgin appears. Jump into the open window of the tower. Exit the room through a door to the right. Right before the Man-Serpent wielding a burning sword, look over the railing to the south to see a ledge with a corpse.          The Crimson Tear Scarab can be looted from that corpse. Elden Ring Interactive

4000187E.name: Noble Presence
4000187E.hint: Acquired from defeating the Godskin Noble at the Volcano Manor  Video Location

01CC0D70.name: Smoldering Shield
01CC0D70.hint: From the Prison Town Church site of grace, exit the building and turn right, walking west until dropping down onto the rooftop. Immediately turn left, facing south, and safely drop down onto the rocky ground below. Once there, continue downhill to the east, and drop down to a big roof to the southwest. From there, jump to the rocky ground to the northwest, and continue onward to the graveyard. The Smoldering Shield is found here on a corpse.  Video Location

80009C40.name: Ash of War: Through and Through
80009C40.hint: Through and Through can be found on an Invisible Scarab just outside Volcano Manor in the Altus Plateau. Strike the Scarab when the footsteps are near and you will acquire this Ash of War.

40001D60.name: Aspects of the Crucible: Breath
40001D60.hint: By Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy Site of Grace in Volcano Manor: Progress Tanith's quest to the point where she's feasting on Rykard's corpse, then kill her. Tanith's Knight will invade shortly thereafter, and will drop this Aspects of the Crucible: Breath when killed.  Video Location

100C5C10.name: Commoner's Headband
100C5C10.hint: The Commoner's Headband is found on a corpse in Volcano Manor.       After the Temple of Eiglay site of grace, take the elevator up and jump off the outside balcony into the area below. Follow the path past the Abductor Virgin into the window of the manor. Continue until you are on a walkway overlooking the lake the lava lake with Serpent statues on the right side. The Commoner's Headpiece is on a corpse on the head of the second statue.

8000EAC4.name: Ash of War: Royal Knight's Resolve
8000EAC4.hint: From the Temple of Eiglay Grace, exit the northeast door that opens to the west. Enter the small building that only contains a lift, and ride it up. Continue straight across the big hallway northwest. (This requires having unlocked the lift. Take the "long way" from the Temple to the big hallway, past the lava pools, if the lift isn't unlocked.) Continue down into the building to the north; the first room is empty, and the room you enter through a doorway, facing east, looks like a throne room. Go up one flight of stairs on either side, and turn around and continue going up a second flight of stairs to the western door. There will be an imp statue in the next room. Carefully jump down the cages, and be wary of the sorcerer enemy halfway down, and the crawling enemies at the bottom. The Ashes of War are in the room past the door to the northeast.   Video Location tl;dr: Behind the Imp Seal in the hall where various nobles are praying. You can access this area after kiling the Godskin Noble.

01F84D90.name: Gelmir Glintstone Staff
01F84D90.hint: The Gelmir Glintstone Staff is an uncommon drop from the Man-Serpent Sorcerer in the throne room above Volcano Manor.  It is recommended that players use a Silver-Pickled Fowl Foot for each run up to the throne room to boost item discovery from killing enemies as well as unlock the lift leading from the Temple of Eiglay Site of Grace to the throne room. Due to the relatively low drop rate, it may take multiple runs and teleports back to the site of grace to see the staff drop.

200003E9.name: Crimson Amber Medallion +1
200003E9.hint: Base Talisman: Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for  1,500 Runes.   +1 Variant: Found in Volcano Manor. Go to the Prison Town Church Site of Grace, go out and through the little town as if you were progressing through the manor as normal, and use a Stonesword Key to go through the fog gate. An Abductor Virgin is there, but you can easily run up the stairs to the level above, where the talisman is on a dead body. Video Location  +2 Variant, SPOILER WARNING: Can be found just southwest of the Leyndell, Ashen Capital Site of Grace,  by dropping down the open sewer grate to the beam below. Video Location

00E52FE0.name: Great Omenkiller Cleaver
00E52FE0.hint: Dropped by Omenkiller at Volcano Manor. Video Location, Video Location.  Dropped by Omenkiller boss at Perfumer's Grotto.

005BB490.name: Godskin Stitcher
005BB490.hint: Dropped by Godskin Noble at Volcano Manor. Video Location

01FA7070.name: Albinauric Staff
01FA7070.hint: Found in Volcano Manor near the Guest Hall grace. Head left from the grace, then left again, taking the stairs to the next floor. Head outside and take the ladder to your left onto the roof. Head south to the back of the roof and jump off the west side onto a ledge. The Albinauric Staff, along with the Albinauric Mask, is inside a room with an Omenkiller.  Video Location

006B9310.name: Magma Blade
006B9310.hint: Possible drop from Man-Serpent enemies wielding the orange glowing Magma Blade at Volcano Manor.       Two of the Serpents can be easily accessed by going up the wooden elevator outside of the building to the North of the Temple of Eiglay Site of Grace: one enemy down the hallway, the other through the first archway to the right.

01607A60.name: Ghiza's Wheel
01607A60.hint: Reward for killing phantom Inquisitor Ghiza in Volcano Manor.  Video Location

00A84DF0.name: Curved Club
00A84DF0.hint: This weapon can be looted from the club and shield Albinaurics found at Academy Gate Town grace.       A group of Albinaurics wielding Curved Clubs can be found on a fallen bridge section east of this grace, in the direction of the Gate Town Bridge grace. Two of those sitting on the bridge section have the Curved Club and there's another patrolling in a pair further ahead.

0207DDF0.name: Erdtree Seal
0207DDF0.hint: Found on a corpse in a cell near the Omenkiller enemy in the town below the Prison Town Church Site of Grace in Volcano Manor.  Video Location

00B85380.name: Curved Great Club
00B85380.hint: This weapon can be looted from the larger of the Second-Generation Albinaurics found across Liurnia of the Lakes (the gray frog like creatures). There are a number of them located around the Temple Quarter making it an easy spot to farm.

101ED2A0.name: Black Dumpling
101ED2A0.hint: The Black Dumpling Helm can be obtained by killing the First Generation Albinaurics found at Volcano Manor and in the lower Leyndell Royal Capital who wear it.

2000082A.name: Dagger Talisman
2000082A.hint: Start from the waygate that teleports you to the Audience Pathway before Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy. Head back and head upstairs. Use two Stonesword Keys and pass thorough the fog gate. After entering the hanging cage room, turn right and drop down. Follow the path and you will find the Dagger Talisman on a corpse.

0103DB70.name: Serpent-Hunter
0103DB70.hint: Held by a corpse on the left as you enter the boss chamber of Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy.  If the players picks up the Serpent-Hunter in the middle of being summoned. After picking up the spear and getting summoned, a second copy of the Serpent-Hunter would appear at the original location upon returning to their world, allowing you to dual wield the Serpent-Hunters.  This weapon will not be respawned on a New Game Plus. The only way to respawn the weapon is to discard it. After discarding the weapon and reloading your location, the weapon would reappear at its original location provided that Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy was still alive.  If the player manages to beat Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy without picking up the Serpent-Hunter, the weapon disappears.  Video Location

10102CA0.name: Albinauric Mask
10102CA0.hint: Found in Volcano Manor near the Guest Hall grace. Head left from the site of grace, then left again, taking the stairs to the next floor. Head outside and take the ladder to your left onto the roof. Go to the back of the roof and jump off the right side to be taken to a room with the Albinauric Mask.   Video Location

01CA11A0.name: Man-Serpent's Shield
01CA11A0.hint: The Man-Serpent's Shield is an uncommon drop from shield-wielding man-serpents in Volcano Manor.  A place to farm the Man-Serpent's Shield is near the Guest Hall site of grace. Leave the building using the back door, and there's one Man-Serpent patrolling the area (10-second runs).

01D9A200.name: Albinauric Shield
01D9A200.hint: Drops from Albinaurics wielding this shield. There are three on top of the church northwest of the Academy Gate Town Site of Grace.

014FFFA0.name: Bloodhound Claws
014FFFA0.hint: Bloodhound Claws can be dropped by a Lesser Bloodhound Knight in the basement of the Volcano Manor.  Video Location

40002300.name: Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing [1]
40002300.hint: Dropped by Erdtree Burial Watchdog in Wyndham Catacombs.

200007DA.name: Lightning Scorpion Charm
200007DA.hint: Can be found in the Wyndham Catacombs in a room sealed by an Imp Statue, requires a Stonesword Key.   Note: This is not in the underground passage way in the ruins that also takes one Stonesword Key to enter. Make sure you go all the way up the hill through all of the ruins, up past the cathedral-esque building. In the side of the mountain is where you'll find the actual Catacombs

101B5094.name: Leyndell Knight Armor
101B5094.hint: Chance to drop from Leyndell Knights encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital

400024B8.name: Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [1]
400024B8.hint: Where to find Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [1]  Found in Wyndham Catacombs on a body in the room behind the rusted bars in the sewers. Can be reached by going under the raising floor in the room with the spike ceiling.

101B5030.name: Leyndell Knight Helm
101B5030.hint: Chance to drop from Leyndell Knights encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

02817AC0.name: Greatbow
02817AC0.hint: Chance to drop from Redmane Knight in Fort Gael. .  Chance to drop from a Leyndell Knight wielding it in Altus Plateau, near the Altus Highway Junction Site of Grace.  From chest at the Highway Lookout Tower (Altus Plateau) to the north of the Divine Capital.

101B50F8.name: Leyndell Knight Gauntlets
101B50F8.hint: Chance to drop from Leyndell Knights encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

00D5C690.name: Forked Hatchet
00D5C690.hint: Dropped by Imps using this weapon.

01EC3FA0.name: Golden Greatshield
01EC3FA0.hint: Drops from Leyndell Knights using the shield on their model (bow wielding knights who switch to the shield for close combat will not drop it). Most of which can be found in and around Leyndell, Royal Capital. One can be found south of the Artist's Shack in Liurnia of the Lakes, this is the earliest available version of that enemy. The droprate for the shield (or anything other the guaranteed Dragon Cult Prayerbook), however, seems to be lower than on the capital knights.

10108A60.name: Imp Head (Wolf)
10108A60.hint: Drops from Forked Greatsword wielding Wolf-Headed Imps in Catacombs  Minor Erdtree Catacombs: Body laying over a sarcophagus. A quick way to reach it is taking the lift at the beginning of the dungeon down, sending it back up, then dropping down into the room below. From there, head down the rot filled hallway and take the first right. Go straight and in the next room climb up the ladder on the right. The body with the helmet will be straight ahead at the end of the hallway.

10107AC0.name: Imp Head (Cat)
10107AC0.hint: Rare drop from Imps.  Farming: from the Impaler's Catacombs site of grace, run to the imp at the bottom of the stairs, and after killing this one, run back up and kill the one near the top which is now done climbing; you are close to the grace again.

002E6300.name: Knight's Greatsword
002E6300.hint: Dropped by most enemies in the knight archetype such as:       Godrick Knights (throughout Limgrave)    Cuckoo Knights (throughout Liurnia of the Lakes)    Mausoleum Knight    Leyndell Knights (throughout the Altus Plateau, especially in Leyndell, Royal Capital)      An easy-to-farm spectral knight that drops this weapon can be found just outside the Black Knife Catacombs in Liurnia of the Lakes.  Sell Value:   200  Base drop rate is 4% (at 100 Discovery)  Other notes and player tips go here

00F4E750.name: Partisan
00F4E750.hint: Dropped by the heavy Godrick Knight in Fort Haight.       Very low drop rate, but it is a confirmed drop.      Dropped by the Redmane Knight in Fort Gael.  Dropped by Cuckoo Knights by East Raya Lucaria Gate  Dropped by Leyndell Knights in Leyndell, Royal Capital  Dropped by Mausoleum Knights on horseback in Deeproot Depths

20000408.name: Great-Jar's Arsenal
20000408.hint: Where to find Great-Jar's Arsenal:   Reward for completing the The Great-Jar's challenge of defeating three NPC duelists in Dragonbarrow (northern Caelid).  You must kill all three NPC duelists in one life; dying will make it so you have to start from the first duelist again. You can access this area by coming up from Siofra Deep River Well in the underground.       This area can also be accessed by climbing the roots above the large crystal at the bottom of the valley. However, this is most likely unintentional.      Obtaining this talisman while playing online results in player's build being uploaded to the Elden Ring server to be used as randomized Knight of the Great Jar for other players.  When you talk to the Great-Jar, he will only respond with "..."  After talking to him, three red summon signs appear to summon three Knights of the Great-Jar.       In two of the four corners of the "arena", there are narrow rock outcroppings. Crouching or blocking in these spots will often cause the NPCs to fall off of the cliff as they attack. This is especially useful when sequence-breaking into this area with a low-level character.    Consider killing the closer of the two archer golems, as he will shoot arrows at you and disrupt your fights.

0030FB10.name: Gargoyle's Blackblade
0030FB10.hint: Drops from the Black Blade Kindred, who stands in front of the Beastial Sanctum.

40001AB8.name: Bestial Vitality
40001AB8.hint: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the third Deathroot.

40001A9A.name: Stone of Gurranq
40001A9A.hint: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the 6th Deathroot.

40001AAE.name: Gurranq's Beast Claw
40001AAE.hint: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the 8th Deathroot.

01151980.name: Gargoyle's Black Halberd
01151980.hint: Dropped by Black Blade Kindred at the Bestial Sanctum.

00B964F0.name: Beastclaw Greathammer
00B964F0.hint: Gurranq will reward the player with this after turning in their 7th Deathroot.

0010EFF0.name: Cinquedea
0010EFF0.hint: Location: Cinquedea can be found at the bottom of the exterior structure of the Bestial Sanctum, near a broken rat corpse statue.  To reach this spot, go to the west cliff outside the sanctum and travel down a series of roots and platforms. Jump down to the outlying branch and continue downward using the ledges and pillars. You can use Rainbow Stones to figure out where to fall from next.   Once you reach the lowest level, searching this area will grant you this dagger as well as the Dragoncrest Shield Talisman.

20000FA0.name: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman
20000FA0.hint: Base talisman: Bestial Sanctum: Found on the bottom level of the structure below the surrounding cliffs.  +1 Variant: Sainted Hero's Grave: Can be found in a locked imp's room, behind a Stonesword Key fog wall (not the first one you encounter; the Crimson Seed Talisman is located behind that one). When you reach the area with the big axes stomping the ground, you need to get on the first one and jump on the ledge on the left wall. There are multiple Putrid Corpses along this path and in the room with the fog doors, alongside a pair of Wraith Callers. Once you've dealt with them and opened the fog door, there are a final pair of Putrids watching over the talisman.    +2 Variant: Crumbling Farum Azula: Looted from a corpse on floating chunk of debris in the northern section, between Dragon Temple Lift and Dragon Temple Rooftop. Video Location

40001A90.name: Bestial Sling
40001A90.hint: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the second Deathroot.

40001AA4.name: Beast Claw
40001AA4.hint: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the fifth Deathroot.

8000FEB0.name: Ash of War: Beast's Roar
8000FEB0.hint: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the fourth Deathroot.

020768C0.name: Clawmark Seal
020768C0.hint: Given by Gurranq Beast Clergyman after feeding him a Deathroot. Elden Ring

20000FB6.name: Flamedrake Talisman +2
20000FB6.hint: Base talisman: Dropped by the Beastman of Farum Azula in Groveside Cave in Limgrave.  +1 Variation: Found at Leyndell Royal Capital, head up the elevator leading towards the Grand Lift of Rold, on the ground against a column.  +2 Variation: Dropped by the Beastman of Farum Azula in Dragonbarrow Cave in eastern Dragonbarrow.

40002B12.name: Stonebarb Cracked Tear
40002B12.hint: Obtained by defeating the Putrid Avatar near the second Minor Erdtree in Caelid.

200004BA.name: Bull-Goat's Talisman
200004BA.hint: In the back of Dragonbarrow Cave. From the entrance, take a left into the Giant Bear's patrol route. Search that side of the cave to find the talisman at the end, on a corpse.

40002B03.name: Opaline Hardtear
40002B03.hint: Dropped by Putrid Avatar next to the Minor Erdtree north of Fort Faroth in Caelid.

1007EFA4.name: Godskin Apostle Robe
1007EFA4.hint: By defeating the Godskin Apostle at the bottom of the Divine Tower of Caelid.

1007F008.name: Godskin Apostle Bracelets
1007F008.hint: By defeating the Godskin Apostle at the bottom of the Divine Tower of Caelid.

1007F06C.name: Godskin Apostle Trousers
1007F06C.hint: By defeating the Godskin Apostle at the bottom of the Divine Tower of Caelid.

1007EF40.name: Godskin Apostle Hood
1007EF40.hint: The Godskin Apostle Hood Helm can be found by defeating the Godskin Apostle at the bottom of the Divine Tower of Caelid.

003E1A70.name: Godslayer's Greatsword
003E1A70.hint: Divine Tower of Caelid: Found in a chest behind the Godskin Apostle's boss arena after defeating him.

2000049C.name: Clarifying Horn Charm
2000049C.hint: Base talisman: Found on a corpse lying on the stairs leading to the lift going up to the Deep Siofra Well.+1 variant: Found on a corpse in the middle and at the lowest floor of a ruin in Nokron, Eternal City. This is above an earlier area in Siofra River. To get there, head southeast from Ancestral Woods Site of Grace, and follow the brick path until it ends at a cliff. Turn left and follow the cliff edge as far as you can, then carefully drop onto the ruins roof. Follow this raised pathway northeast until you reach a square open platform. Descend carefully, and the talisman is found on a corpse in the center.

01EAE010.name: Spiked Palisade Shield
01EAE010.hint: On dead body under a Golem, west of Deep Siofra Well, Caelid. Video Location

80009E98.name: Ash of War: Rain of Arrows
80009E98.hint: Caelid: Appears at edge of a cliff after you've looted the "Redmane" Painting in Sellia, Town of Sorcery. You'll find it down the cliff on a plateau south east of the Eastern Minor Erdtree in Caelid. This is right below Fort Faroth. The Erdtree is located in the Caelid subregion called Dragonbarrow. Once you've made your way down, walk to the edge (without the pillars) and you'll briefly see the spirit of a painter, he'll vanish and the Ash of War will appear in his place.  If you use the spiritspring here and jump <just past> the spiritspring (on the very edge of its radius), then double jump just before you hit the little jar on the edge of the cliff, you can safely land at the bottom or close to it.  From the Fort Faroth Grace. Head NE and jump down onto the spiritspring at the base of the Erdtree. If you walk SE to the cliff to the right of the pot and broken pot next to each other, there are a series of roots you can jump down to reach this ledge.  There is no need to aggro the strong golem at the West to get this drop, although it can be safely engaged from the top of the last tree before dropping onto the platform. It only drops about 5000 runes and is guarding a corpse with a Rune Arc.

2000041B.name: Radagon's Soreseal
2000041B.hint: Fort Faroth: Found on a corpse by dropping down the opening from the roof and exploring around the wooden walkways. From the Fort Faroth Site of Grace, run into the fort and pass the bats and harpies. Climb up the ladder and make a right, down the scaffolding. Run past the first hole on the floor; jump down the second one. Run northeast, being careful of the rat behind the boxes to the left. Make a running jump where the wall ends, to another platform, where two rats will be waiting. Past them and down the ladder is the talisman.

40001AC2.name: Bestial Constitution
40001AC2.hint: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab along the cliffside northeast of the Minor Erdtree in Dragonbarrow;from Lenne's Rise, on the high ground almost directly west of the Rise and west side of the bridge.

40002209.name: Note: Gateway
40002209.hint: Sold by the Isolated Merchant Dragonbarrow for 1200  Runes.

100D479C.name: Land of Reeds Greaves
100D479C.hint: Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class  Sold by the Isolated Merchant in Dragonbarrow for 1,000  Runes.

100D4738.name: Land of Reeds Gauntlets
100D4738.hint: Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class  Sold by the Isolated Merchant in Dragonbarrow for 1,000  Runes.

400021FC.name: Note: Hidden Cave
400021FC.hint: Sold by Isolated Merchant in northwest Caelid.

100D4670.name: Land of Reeds Helm
100D4670.hint: Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class.  Sold by the Isolated Merchant in Dragonbarrow for 1,000  Runes.

80009E34.name: Ash of War: Sky Shot
80009E34.hint: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found on the cliffs northwest of the Isolated Merchant's Shack in Dragonbarrow.

400022F4.name: Gravity Stone Peddler's Bell Bearing
400022F4.hint: Dropped by the Bell Bearing Hunter that spawns at the Isolated Merchant's Shack in Dragonbarrow. Like the other spawn locations he will only spawn at night. He will spawn right outside the shack where the merchant usually sits.

100D46D4.name: Land of Reeds Armor
100D46D4.hint: Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class.  Sold by the Isolated Merchant in Dragonbarrow for 1,500  Runes.

016F2060.name: Beast-Repellent Torch
016F2060.hint: Sold by the Isolated Merchant in Dragonbarrow for  1200 Runes.

01409650.name: Spiked Caestus
01409650.hint: Sold by the Isolated Merchant in Dragonbarrow for 4,000  Runes.  To get these early from Gate Front: Follow the road East, cross the bridge, then take the left road at the intersection and follow it all the way to Third Church of Marika. (Grab Wondrous Physick to save yourself some time). Behind the church in some bushes is a teleporter, take it to go to Bestial Sanctum. From the Sanctum head South, cross the bridge with a dragon, then go further South for a checkpoint at Fort Faroth (later you can grab Radagon Soreseal here and kill the big dragon outside with your cestus for 90k with a golden foot. From Fort Faroth simply go West and slightly North, following the road all the way to Isolated Merchant Shack.

800138E4.name: Ash of War: Bloodhound's Step
800138E4.hint: Dropped by a Night's Cavalry at the bridge in front of the Lenne's Rise tower, in Dragonbarrow.

10055730.name: Fire Monk Hood
10055730.hint: Pieces of the Fire Monk Set are dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintops of the Giants.

10055794.name: Fire Monk Armor
10055794.hint: Pieces of the Fire Monk Set are dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintops of the Giants.

100A12E8.name: Vagabond Knight Gauntlets
100A12E8.hint: A Starting Equipment Piece for the Vagabond Class.  Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 1,000  Runes.

100A1284.name: Vagabond Knight Armor
100A1284.hint: A Starting Equipment Piece for the Vagabond Class.   Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 1,500  Runes.

400024CF.name: Missionary's Cookbook [7]
400024CF.hint: Where to find Missionary's Cookbook [7]  Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 7,500  Runes. This Nomadic Merchant can be found in the Mountaintops of the Giants, south of Stargazer's Ruins. Players can reach his location by riding west of the ruins and following the cliffs around to the underside of the southern bridge.

100557F8.name: Fire Monk Gauntlets
100557F8.hint: Pieces of the Fire Monk Set are dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintops of the Giants.

40002B0C.name: Crimsonwhorl Bubbletear
40002B0C.hint: Mountaintops of the Giants: Start at the Foot of the Forge site of grace and move to the most north-eastern part of that mountain, past the pot-throwing trolls and the giant Fingercreeper. The bubbletear is at the end of a narrow passage heading west from this point, along the northern cliff. Beware that the passage is infested with small Fingercreepers.

100A1220.name: Vagabond Knight Helm
100A1220.hint: A Starting Equipment Piece for the Vagabond Class.  Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 1,000  Runes.

80002C24.name: Ash of War: Prelate's Charge
80002C24.hint: In Mountaintops of the Giants. South of Whiteridge Road Grace. Inside a Fire Monk campsite, look for the scarab hanging on a tree. Elden Ring Interactive.

1005585C.name: Fire Monk Greaves
1005585C.hint: Pieces of the Fire Monk Set are dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintops of the Giants.

100A134C.name: Vagabond Knight Greaves
100A134C.hint: A Starting Equipment Piece for the Vagabond Class.  Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 1,000  Runes.

002FC290.name: Helphen's Steeple
002FC290.hint: Dropped by a Tibia Mariner on a ledge South of Castle Sol and North West of Snow Valley Ruins Overlook.

8000ECB8.name: Ash of War: Seppuku
8000ECB8.hint: On the frozen lake east of the Freezing Lake site of grace in the Mountaintops of The Giants, dropped by an invisible scarab.

4000132E.name: Briars of Punishment
4000132E.hint: Can be found at the leftmost dead tree next to three Thorn Sorcerers just before the long stone bridge with the Golem Archer at the end in the Mountaintops of the Giants region.

00A93850.name: Monk's Flamemace
00A93850.hint: Drops from Monk enemies wielding it in Liurnia of the Lakes and Mountaintops of the Giants.       A bunch of them are patrolling around Guardian's Garrison      There's one immediately to the left of the Grace in the Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave.

01FB81E0.name: Staff of the Guilty
01FB81E0.hint: Drops only from Thorn Sorcerers wielding blazing staves, not from Thorn Sorcerers wielding smoldering staves.  Fort Laiedd: Can be dropped by the Thorn Sorcerers at Fort Laiedd, though it is rare (2% base).  Guardians' Garrison: There are several Thorn Sorcerers on the slope leading up to the garrison.

007B2370.name: Monk's Flameblade
007B2370.hint: Dropped by Fire Monks.       In Mountaintops of the Giants, Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave. From the site of grace, go down the stairs to the left. Avoid the first Fire Monk located immediately down the stairs and proceed  to the right through a hidden path. Jump down and avoid or kill the imps with the golden light and then proceed forward. The Fire Monk that can drop the Flameblade is to the right in the corríddor with the flame trap. You can use Margit’s Shackle to disarm the trap.

10030E6C.name: Banished Knight Greaves
10030E6C.hint: Location: Stormveil Castle  Chance for it to be looted off the Banished Knight enemies that you've killed.  Dropped from the wandering Banished Knight at Cathedral of Dragon Communion

10030E08.name: Banished Knight Gauntlets
10030E08.hint: Dropped from the Banished Knights in Stormveil Castle.  Dropped from the wandering Banished Knight at Cathedral of Dragon Communion

200003F3.name: Cerulean Amber Medallion +1
200003F3.hint: Base Talisman: Lakeside Crystal Cave: After defeating the Bloodhound Knight.  +1 Variant: Castle Sol: Found on a corpse hanging by a wooden ledge above the southern walls of the castle. This area is accessed by climbing a ladder behind the church in the southeast and following the walls west. Beware the very powerful dual sword knight guarding the area. He can teleport behind you and perform long combos.  +2 Variant: Lunar Estate Ruins: Found in a treasure chest in an underground room northwest of the ruins. Look for an Imp Statue pressed up against the wall. This requires one Stonesword Key. The stairs are also concealed by an illusory floor. Simply hit the floor next to the Imp Statue to reveal the stairs.

10030D40.name: Banished Knight Helm
10030D40.hint: Dropped by the wandering Banished Knight at Cathedral of Dragon Communion (Altered, Red hood), and the one standing by the cliff, to the west.

01424400.name: Veteran's Prosthesis
01424400.hint: Dropped by Commander Niall upon defeat at Castle Sol in the Mountaintops of the Giants.

10030DA4.name: Banished Knight Armor
10030DA4.hint: Chance to drop from two specific spectral Banished Knights located in Castle Sol that can be seen wearing the unaltered cloaked armor.    The northern one can be easily farmed by starting from the Castle Sol Rooftop site of grace and running south to the elevator. The Banished Knight can be shot with ranged weapons from here causing it to teleport to the player. The same can be achieved by shooting an arrow through the arrow slit in the grace platform (west side), although the knight doesn't always teleport when shooting him from this spot.  The southern one can be reached from the Church of the Eclipse site of grace by exiting through the church to the left, turning right outside, and heading up the ladder to the catwalks. After following the catwalk past the exile soldier and around the small tower, the Banished Knight can be found just past the ladder leading down. It is recommended that the player jump onto the lower roof next to the catwalk and tower, and bait the red-eyed Banished Knight into teleporting onto the small wooden catwalk extension of the roof; then the player can roll or jump to the walkway the Banished Knight was just standing on. The Banished Knight will slowly walk towards the player, then fall to its death onto the ground below, saving the player a good deal of trouble. Then the player walk down the walkway and make their way over to the loot, which will be in a corner, behind a tombstone.   Dropped from all other Banished Knights. They can be found in Stormveil Castle, Cathedral of Dragon Communion, Crumbling Farum Azula, and Castle Sol.

00D7C260.name: Stormhawk Axe
00D7C260.hint: 2x looted from Nepheli Loux at the Village of the Albinaurics in Western Liurnia of the Lakes.       You must first talk to Nepheli Loux in her first location, and exhaust her father's dialog options and then hers in the round table to get her to move to the pathway under the bridge. This is to get her to move to the location. You can slay her in her first location and get the axes as well. It is also possible to bait the enemies to attack her in her first location, in which she doesn't retaliate against the enemies.      Looted from a dead body in the courtyard with Iron Maidens near Fortified Manor, First Floor at Leyndell, Royal Capital.   Castle Sol: 1x found on a corpse on a wooden awning in the central building of the courtyard. To reach this, head north while hugging the western ramparts from the castle's Main Entrance. Look for a room inside the ramparts near the northern section. This room has several slimes and a ladder. Climb the ladder to get on top of the ramparts and follow it west to a wooden bridge that connects to the central building. Beware the spectral Exile enemies mounted on ballistae on the ramparts, as well as the central building. Once on the central building's roof, jump on top of the cluttered objects draped in cloth in the northeastern section so you can get over the wall onto the awning and collect the axe.  Video Location

006C5660.name: Eclipse Shotel
006C5660.hint: Castle Sol: Found at the altar of the church in the southeast section of the castle.

002EFF40.name: Banished Knight's Greatsword
002EFF40.hint: Chance for it to be looted off the Banished Knight enemies that you've killed.

01131DB0.name: Banished Knight's Halberd
01131DB0.hint: Location: Stormveil Castle.  Chance for it to be looted off the Banished Knight enemies that you've killed.       Farming guide available on the Banished Knight article.      Edgar the Revenger drops a Banished Knight's Halberd upgraded to +8 with the Spinning Strikes Ash of War installed, upon his defeat at Castle Morne or the Revenger's Shack.

01D97AF0.name: Banished Knight's Shield
01D97AF0.hint: Chance for it to be looted off of a Banished Knight wielding one of these shields.       Farming guide available on the Banished Knight Page.

8000FF14.name: Ash of War: Troll's Roar
8000FF14.hint: Can be found on the top of the big rock just south east the Church of Repose (in Mountaintops of the Giants), accessible via the spirit spring further south from the Giant Crow.

400022FD.name: Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing [3]
400022FD.hint: Found in a corpse just outside the First Church of Marika in Mountaintops of the Giants.It is right in front of the Entrance. Since it is snowy the white glowing item is hard to spot.

100D4E40.name: Okina Mask
100D4E40.hint: Dropped by Bloody Finger Okina at Mountaintops of the Giants.

400021A4.name: Map (Mountaintops of the Giants, East)
400021A4.hint: Mountaintops of the Giants: Found at the altar. You can arrive by walking on the chain from the enemy encampment.

0089F080.name: Rivers of Blood
0089F080.hint: Dropped by Bloody Finger Okina   Okina invades near the Church of Repose, found in the Eastern region of Mountaintops of the Giants.

00E704A0.name: Gargoyle's Black Axe
00E704A0.hint: Dropped by Black Blade Kindred at the Mountaintops of the Giants.

100EB604.name: Official's Attire
100EB604.hint: From the Forbidden Lands site of grace, turn back and head towards the elevator. Face southwest before activating the elevator, and then watch for an opening to jump off into. The Official's Attire is on the corpse in this hidden hallway, alongside Blade of Calling.

0011B340.name: Blade of Calling
0011B340.hint: From the Forbidden Lands site of grace, turn back and head towards the elevator. Face southwest before activating the elevator, and then watch for an opening to jump off into. The Blade of Calling is on the table in the room at the end of this hall.

0099F610.name: Gargoyle's Black Blades
0099F610.hint: Dropped by Black Blade Kindred at the Forbidden Lands just before Mountaintops of the Giants.

800057E4.name: Ash of War: Phantom Slash
800057E4.hint: Dropped by a Night's Cavalry northeast the Forbidden Lands Grace in the Forbidden Lands. Elden Ring.

10066968.name: Vulgar Militia Gauntlets
10066968.hint: Around the Bestial Sanctum and Farum Greatbridge sites of grace.

400021A3.name: Map (Mountaintops of the Giants, West)
400021A3.hint: Go up the Grand Lift of Rold from Leyndell, along the path.

100668A0.name: Vulgar Militia Helm

0114A450.name: Vulgar Militia Shotel

0113B9F0.name: Vulgar Militia Saw
0113B9F0.hint: Dropped by enemies wielding this weapon near the Bestial Sanctum in Greyoll's Dragonbarrow.       Example farming route

Mob has 5638 HP total (Non-NG)  2nd option is the one outside of Giant's mountaintop catatombs, farmable along with the Thorned Whip.

101053B0.name: Zamor Mask

400017AC.name: Flame, Protect Me
400017AC.hint: Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave: Found on a corpse inside a sealed room near the beginning, in front of the Site of Grace. The room requires one Stonesword Key to unlock.

10057E40.name: Fire Prelate Helm
10057E40.hint: Dropped by Fire Prelates.  One is found standing before the long, thin bridge in Mountaintops of the Giants, just outside of Giants' Mountaintop Catacombs.  One can be found in Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir.  One is in Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintops of the Giants. Drops from Fire Prelate wielding it nearby Whiteridge Road grace. Mob has 5638 HP total (Non-NG)

101054DC.name: Zamor Legwraps
101054DC.hint: Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave: The entire set is dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor Boss at the end of this dungeon.

00B9B310.name: Cranial Vessel Candlestand
00B9B310.hint: Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave: Found on a corpse at the end of a large hall locked behind an Imp Statue. This hall is directly above the room with the flamethrower pillar.

10057F08.name: Fire Prelate Gauntlets
10057F08.hint: Dropped by Fire Prelates.  One can be found in Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir.  One is in Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintops of the Giants. Drops from Fire Prelate wielding it nearby, Whiteridge Road grace. Mob has 5638 HP total (Non-NG)

02071AA0.name: Giant's Seal
02071AA0.hint: Inside Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave.  In the large hall with the Troll, drop down from either side of the platform into a room with a Fire Prelate. Defeat it and check the right side of the room for a corpse holding the seal.  Alternatively, you can reach this room by descending the lift and sending it back up. Pull the lever in the alcove to the right and then enter the small space in the raised lift to descend further down. In the next hall, sprint past the Lesser Burial Watchdog and turn left. Climb the ladder at the end of this path.

007AD550.name: Zamor Curved Sword
007AD550.hint: Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave: Dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor boss found at the end of the dungeon.

003D3010.name: Watchdog's Greatsword
003D3010.hint: Dropped by the sword wielding Watchdogs in the Mountaintops of the Giants.  Giants' Mountaintop Catacombs: This dungeon is located East past the Zamor Ruins grace. Follow the normal progression path until you see a group of  enemies and a Fire Prelate. Then double back to your right to find the entrance.Once you enter the dungeon, you will eventually come across a lift. Take the lift down, and then trigger the lift but quickly get off. Another lift will rise up from underneath and by taking that new lift down, you will enter the area with Two Watchdogs as well as other various enemies. The second Watchdog can drop it.  Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave: This dungeon can be reached by heading West of the Giants Grave Post site of Grace (just past the guardians garrison), and jumping over a small ravine.After entering the Dungeon heading down a short flight of stairs, a Fire Monk will approach from your right. Head right down the hall where the Fire Monk approached from and peer over the windows.  There will be a place to drop down. The Watchdog enemy in this room must be led into the light before defeating, but note that it enters a Vulnerable State after entering the light.  Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs: One sword-wielding Watchdog can be found guarding the Imp Head (Elder), which has a chance to drop the sword.

40002301.name: Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing [2]
40002301.hint: Dropped by Ulcerated Tree Spirit in Giants' Mountaintop Catacombs. See it on the Elden Ring.

400376B8.name: Fire Monk Ashes
400376B8.hint: Where to Find Fire Monk Ashes  Looted from a chest in the Giants' Mountaintop Catacombs:  Descend the first lift you find and then step on the plate again to send it back up. When fully raised, there is a second platform on the lift that will take you to the lowest levels of the catacombs. Continue through this path past two frost breath traps. The spell is found in a chest behind the second trap.

10057F6C.name: Fire Prelate Greaves

01EA91F0.hint: Dropped by mini-boss NPC Chief Guardian Arghanthy inside Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintops of the Giants.

40001072.name: Founding Rain of Stars
40001072.hint: Inside a chest within Heretical Rise, in Mountaintops of the Giants. Players have to access the location via an invisible bridge starting from the other side of the ravine, and advance following a white mist that indicates the safe path (which is significantly easier to see at night). The safe path starts straight out then you have to go left and curve back towards the tower going upwards. The left path starts a little more than halfway from where you started.

100CF850.name: Marionette Soldier Birdhelm
100CF850.hint: The Marionette Soldier Birdhelm Helm is dropped from Avionette Soldiers  Two can be found just next to the Sellia Under-Stair Site of Grace. One is on top of some small ruins and another on top of a branch north from grace.  Several of them are located in Altus Tunnel.

40002AFF.name: Crimson Bubbletear

40002AFD.name: Cerulean Crystal Tear (2)
40002AFD.hint: One dropped by the Erdtree Avatar that resides in Liurnia of the Lakes.  One dropped by the Erdtree Avatar guarding the Minor Erdtree (Mountaintops East).
