40001860.name: Black Flame Ritual
40001860.hint: Spiritcaller Cave: Dropped by the Spirit-Caller Snail that summoned the Godskin Apostle & Godskin Noble in a consecutive boss encounter.

100D4F08.name: White Reed Gauntlets
100D4F08.hint: Spiritcaller's Cave in the Mountaintops of the Giants: Found on a corpse in a long cavern filled with spirit wolves. The White Reed Armor and White Reed Greaves can also be found on this corpse.

100D4F6C.name: White Reed Greaves
100D4F6C.hint: Spiritcaller's Cave in the Mountaintops of the Giants: Found on a corpse in a long cavern filled with spirit wolves. The White Reed Armor and White Reed Gauntlets can also be found on this corpse.

100D4EA4.name: White Reed Armor
100D4EA4.hint: Spiritcaller's Cave in the Mountaintops of the Giants: Found on a corpse in a long cavern filled with spirit wolves. The White Reed Gauntlets and White Reed Greaves can also be found on this corpse.

200013B0.name: Godskin Swaddling Cloth
200013B0.hint: Spiritcaller Cave: Dropped by the Spirit-Caller Snail that summons the Godskin Apostle and Godskin Noble in a consecutive boss encounter.

40002345.name: Fancy Spin
40002345.hint: Obtained from summoning the Spirit Jellyfish Ashes beside another Spirit Jellyfish within the Stargazer's Ruins

00F5F8C0.name: Death Ritual Spear
00F5F8C0.hint: Dropped by the Death Rite Bird fought in the Mountaintops of the Giants.

20000C08.name: Primal Glintstone Blade
20000C08.hint: Stargazer's Ruins in Mountaintops of the Giants: Found in a chest in an underground area near the center of the ruins. The entrance is sealed by a barrier and there is a talking Jellyfish outside who is looking for her sister. Summon your Spirit Jellyfish that you acquired at the beginning of the game to unlock the seal.

10186A00.name: Greathood
10186A00.hint: Given as a reward for solving the puzzle of the Sorcerer Painting. Travel north-west from the Stargazer's Ruins to the bridge, leading north. At the center of the bridge, on the east side, is a lip with a ghost sitting in a chair. Speak to the ghost of the painter to receive the Greathood.

4000113A.name: Zamor Ice Storm
4000113A.hint: Default skill for the Zamor Curved Sword.

400022F9.name: Smithing-Stone Miner's Bell Bearing [3]
400022F9.hint: The bell bearing is found in Zamor Ruins in the Mountaintops of the Giants area. The chest is in a cellar at the very SW tip of the ruins, down one flight of stairs. From the Zamor Ruins grace site, head straight south using Torrent to jump the cliff, past a white bird, then it's just east after passing the tallest building ruin. Standing on the west cliff, it can be obtained with stealth by sneaking behind the guard.

01317B20.name: Thorned Whip
01317B20.hint: Possible drop from Fire Prelate wielding it north of Giants' Mountaintop Catacombs entrance (northeast of  Zamor Ruins, just before the long narrow bridge).

10038270.name: Night's Cavalry Helm
10038270.hint: You can find the Night's Cavalry Set within the Consecrated Snowfield: From the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace at night, look southwest and there will be a caravan being pulled by two giants and two Night's Cavalry escorts. Kill both the escorts to receive the armor alongside an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone. See the location in the Elden Ring Map

10038338.name: Night's Cavalry Gauntlets
10038338.hint: You can find the Night's Cavalry Set within the Consecrated Snowfield: From the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace at night, look southwest and there will be a caravan being pulled by two giants and two Night's Cavalry escorts. Kill both the escorts to receive the armor alongside an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone. See the location in the Elden Ring Map

20000489.name: Stalwart Horn Charm +1
20000489.hint: Base talisman: Uld Palace Ruins in northeastern Liurnia of the Lakes: Go to the Mausoleum Compound and head north up the incline, then turn West as soon as you pass the horizontal rocks to your left. Proceed forward to the large vertical rock formation. There will be a smaller vertical rock formation on your right. Walk around the larger formation counter-clockwise until you see a hole in the wall. Go through it and you will find the talisman on a corpse to your left overhanging a cliff.+1 variant: Can be found in the southwestern area of Consecrated Snowfield, southeast of Yelough Anix Tunnel entrance. Alternatively, go straight southwest from the Inner Consecrated Snowfield Site of Grace. It is located on a corpse slumped over a log, and is guarded by Ancestral Follower and Ancestral Follower Shaman whose singing can be heard once you are nearby.

101A8D44.name: Mausoleum Surcoat
101A8D44.hint: Mausoleum Soldier Set pieces drop from Mausoleum Soldiers. They can be found patrolling areas around some of the Wandering Mausoleums.  An easy spot to farm this set is east of the East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes. Several groups of 3 or 4 Mausoleum Soldiers are patrolling around this Wandering Mausoleum.

029095F0.name: Heavy Crossbow
029095F0.hint: Drops from any Godrick Soldier, Raya Lucaria Soldier, Radahn Soldier, Mausoleum Soldier, Leyndell Soldier, or Haligtree Soldier that wields it.

1000C3B4.name: Kaiden Armor
1000C3B4.hint: Dropped by Kaiden Sellswords found in Limgrave.

1000C47C.name: Kaiden Trousers
1000C47C.hint: Dropped by Kaiden Sellswords found in Limgrave.

101E8480.name: Rotten Duelist Helm
101E8480.hint: Dropped by a Rotten Duelist in the Consecrated Snowfield. From the site of grace, head west to reach an open graveyard with a Rotten Duelist. He drops the Rotten Duelist Helm as well as the Rotten Battle Hammer.

1000C350.name: Kaiden Helm
1000C350.hint: East of Limgrave's lake. He is alongside a group of slaves.

1000C418.name: Kaiden Gauntlets
1000C418.hint: Dropped by Kaiden Sellswords found in Limgrave.

4000245D.name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [23]
4000245D.hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [23]Found in Consecrated Snowfield: From the Consecrated Snowfield Site of Grace make your way directly north until you reach three noblemen in the middle of the road. A few feet in front of the trio will be the corpse of a nobleman holding a torch. The cookbook will be on said corpse.

400021AA.name: Map (Consecrated Snowfield)
400021AA.hint: Map for all of Consecrated Snowfield: find it by following the road north past the snowstorm until you go down and cross a frozen river, then you will spot the map pillar ahead. Elden Ring.

1003839C.name: Night's Cavalry Greaves
1003839C.hint: You can find the Night's Cavalry Set within the Consecrated Snowfield: From the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace at night, look southwest and there will be a caravan being pulled by two giants and two Night's Cavalry escorts. Kill both the escorts to receive the armor alongside an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone. See the location in the Elden Ring Map

101B9F7C.name: Mausoleum Knight Greaves
101B9F7C.hint: Mausoleum Knight Set pieces can be farmed from the Mausoleum Knights, typically found in Liurnia of the Lakes. The easiest one to farm is directly outside the Black Knife Catacombs entrance, which can be reset quickly with the site of grace.  Other possible locations include:       Near the Weeping Peninsula Walking Mausoleum.

1004E32C.name: Sanguine Noble Waistcloth
1004E32C.hint: The entire Noble Robe Set is dropped by Sanguine Noble NPC invasion in west Mountaintops of The Giants. Includes Sanguine Noble Hood, Sanguine Noble Robe and Sanguine Noble Waistcloth.

101E85AC.name: Rotten Duelist Greaves
101E85AC.hint: The Rotten Duelist Greaves Leg Armor can be found by killing a Rotten Duelist that's facing the cliff edge located a little northwest of Ordina, Liturgical Town which is located in the northern part of the Consecrated Snowfields. Elden Ring Interactive

101A8E0C.name: Mausoleum Greaves
101A8E0C.hint: Mausoleum Soldier Set pieces drop from Mausoleum Soldiers. They can be found patrolling areas around some of the Wandering Mausoleums.  An easy spot to farm this set is east of the East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes. Several groups of 3 or 4 Mausoleum Soldiers are patrolling around this Wandering Mausoleum.

016ED240.name: St. Trina's Torch
016ED240.hint: Consecrated Snowfield: Directly North-East from the Consecrated Snowfield site of grace in a Carriage.  Consecrated Snowfield: Looted from the treasure chest in the Carriage in the south-eastern portion of Consecrated Ground in the northern lands. See it on the Elden Ring Map.  Take note that another Carriage is nearby with a chest containing the Flowing Curved Sword.

101B9EB4.name: Mausoleum Knight Armor
101B9EB4.hint: Typically found in Liurnia of the Lakes. The easiest one to farm is directly outside the Black Knife Catacombs entrance, which can be reset quickly with the site of grace.  Near the Walking Mausoleum in Weeping Peninsula.

101A8DA8.name: Mausoleum Gauntlets
101A8DA8.hint: Mausoleum Soldier Set pieces drop from Mausoleum Soldiers. They can be found patrolling areas around some of the Wandering Mausoleums.  An easy spot to farm this set is east of the East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes. Several groups of 3 or 4 Mausoleum Soldiers are patrolling around this Wandering Mausoleum.

101B9F18.name: Mausoleum Knight Gauntlets
101B9F18.hint: Mausoleum Knight Set pieces can be farmed from the Mausoleum Knights, typically found in Liurnia of the Lakes. The easiest one to farm is directly outside the Black Knife Catacombs entrance, which can be reset quickly with the site of grace.  Other possible locations include:       Near the Weeping Peninsula Walking Mausoleum.

1004E200.name: Sanguine Noble Hood
1004E200.hint: The entire Noble Robe Set is dropped by Sanguine Noble (NPC) invasion in west Mountaintops of The Giants. Includes Sanguine Noble Hood, Sanguine Noble Robe and Sanguine Noble Waistcloth.

101C8914.name: Bloodsoaked Tabard
101C8914.hint: The Bloodsoaked Tabard drops from Mausoleum Foot Soldiers.  They can be found south of Apostate Derelict around the nearby Wandering Mausoleum. They are in groups with Mausoleum Soldiers and Mausoleum Knights and can be identified by the horns they carry.

100382D4.name: Night's Cavalry Armor
100382D4.hint: You can find the Night's Cavalry Set within the Consecrated Snowfield: From the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace at night, look southwest and there will be a caravan being pulled by two giants and two Night's Cavalry escorts. Kill both the escorts to receive the armor alongside an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone. See the location in the Elden Ring Map

006BBA20.name: Flowing Curved Sword
006BBA20.hint: Consecrated Snowfield: Southwest of the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace two Trolls are pulling a Carriage with a chest containing the Flowing Curved Sword. The Carriage is protected at night by two Night Cavalry. See it on the.

1004E264.name: Sanguine Noble Robe
1004E264.hint: The entire Noble Robe Set is dropped by Sanguine Noble NPC invasion in southwest Consecrated Snowfield. Includes Sanguine Noble Hood, Sanguine Noble Robe and Sanguine Noble Waistcloth.

007A6020.name: Dismounter
007A6020.hint: Dropped by any Kaiden Sellsword around the map.  A good place to farm is the Kaiden camp south of the Murkwater Coast grace. There are 3 Sellswords on foot and 2 running around on horses near the front of the camp. There is a third one patrolling the road near Agheel lake North.

001F20C0.name: Lordsworn's Straight Sword
001F20C0.hint: May be dropped by Godrick Soldier in Gatefront Ruins.  Can be dropped by the headless, undead Soldier at Fourth Church of Marika.  The earliest and easiest grinding spot for this is the Gatefront Ruins, not just for this sword, but all of the weapons that the soldiers use excluding their spear.

002E6300.name: Knight's Greatsword
002E6300.hint: Dropped by most enemies in the knight archetype such as:       Godrick Knights (throughout Limgrave)    Cuckoo Knights (throughout Liurnia of the Lakes)    Mausoleum Knight    Leyndell Knights (throughout the Altus Plateau, especially in Leyndell, Royal Capital)      An easy-to-farm spectral knight that drops this weapon can be found just outside the Black Knife Catacombs in Liurnia of the Lakes.  Sell Value:   200  Base drop rate is 4% (at 100 Discovery)  Other notes and player tips go here

00BA4F50.name: Rotten Battle Hammer
00BA4F50.hint: Guaranteed drop from a Rotten Duelist enemy in the stone coffins northwest of the Consecrated Snowfield Site of Grace.

01EBF180.name: Eclipse Crest Greatshield
01EBF180.hint: Chance to drop from Mausoleum Knights wielding it in Liurnia of the Lakes   Better farmed from the Knight in front of Black Knife Catacombs.

01DB0190.name: Brass Shield
01DB0190.hint: Dropped by Godrick Soldiers seen to be carrying it. (In 231 kills, 2 dropped. Approx. 0.8%)  Dropped by Raya Lucaria Soldiers seen to be carrying it.  An easy early location to farm begins at the “Gatefront” Site of Grace in the western part of main Limgrave, just north of the forest and just before Stormgate. Once you spawn in, turn around to face south east. There will be four Brass Shield carrying Godrick Soldiers in the Gatefront Ruins area that should be relatively easy to farm. Two are in a small fenced in area to the right of the road. One is on the road, carrying a horn. The last one is sitting next to a fire nearby.   Nearly all the Raya Lucaria Soldiers who are gathered outside Raya Lucaria Academy are carrying one, making it a good place to farm for it if you missed getting it earlier.

01613DB0.name: Rotten Greataxe
01613DB0.hint: Dropped by Rotten Duelist to the north of Ordina, Liturgical Town.

40002480.name: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [8]
40002480.hint: Where to find Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [8]  Found in the Consecrated Snowfield region, Southwest of Albinauric's Rise. Can be reached from the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace. There will be 3 School of Graven Mages encircling a corpse with the Cookbook.

20000BB9.name: Graven-Mass Talisman
20000BB9.hint: Found in a chest atop Albinauric Rise, in the east of the Consecrated Snowfield.

40001392.name: Explosive Ghostflame
40001392.hint: Drops from a Death Rite Bird southeast Apostate Derelict in the Consecrated Snowfield. It's a clearing in the frozen river, and you must go there at night.

01D9F020.name: Silver Mirrorshield
01D9F020.hint: Found in the northern area of Consecrated Snowfield, inside the Apostate Derelict destroyed church.

00305ED0.name: Golden Order Greatsword
00305ED0.hint: Dropped by Misbegotten Crusader in the Cave of the Forlorn.

10108E48.name: Imp Head (Elder)
10108E48.hint: The Imp Head (Elder)  can be found inside the Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs. In a room on the second floor, guarded by a Lesser Burial Watchdog.

101E84E4.name: Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak
101E84E4.hint: Dropped by the boss of Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs in Consecrated Snowfield, Putrid Grave Warden Duelist.

40002305.name: Ghost-Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing [3]
40002305.hint: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: Found on a grave in the western section of the graveyard in the northeast of the city.From the Haligtree Roots Site of Grace, go back up the northeastern elevator into the church and head out through the door in front of you. From there, turn left and make your way down, fighting your way through the many Lesser Kindred of Rot in the area. The Bell Bearing will be at the end of the area, surrounded by graves on the cliffside.Alternatively you can enter the same church from the Drainage Canal Site of Grace. Exit to the east and turn left, walking on the tree branch. Drop down to the right onto the brace, then to the left onto another branch, and then drop down to the balcony below. From there drop down into the church and exit northeast to the graveyard where the Bell Bearing is.  Video location, Halligtree

40036718.name: Cleanrot Knight Finlay Ashes
40036718.hint: Where to Find Cleanrot Knight Finlay Ashes In Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree, start at the Prayer Room site of grace. Go through the northern door and and continue in that direction, fighting past several enemies, until you reach a small stairway leading up.After going up the stairway and defeating the enemies, look right (east), and peer down to see a sort of archway. Further north of the archway, you should see a gazebo. (The room with the chest will be near the gazebo.)Jump down onto the archway, then face north again and jump to reach the area where the gazebo is. Once in the center of the gazebo, face west, and you'll see a room with a Cleanrot Knight. -- this is the room with the chest in it. Video Location

100F918C.name: Traveler's Boots
100F918C.hint: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: The entire Traveler's Set is found deep underground in a side room with a large orange flower, adjacent to the Haligtree Roots site of grace.       This area is accessed by taking the lift from the large building in the northeast.

101BC628.name: Haligtree Knight Gauntlets
101BC628.hint: Haligtree Knights drop the Haligtree Knight Armor, Haligtree Knight Gauntlets, and Haligtree Knight Greaves. They can be found in the latter areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

101BC5C4.name: Haligtree Knight Armor
101BC5C4.hint: Haligtree Knights drop the Haligtree Knight Armor, Haligtree Knight Gauntlets, and Haligtree Knight Greaves. They can be found in the latter areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

101AB51C.name: Haligtree Greaves
101AB51C.hint: Haligtree Soldiers drop all pieces of the set. They are located throughout all areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

101CAFC0.name: Sacred Crown Helm
101CAFC0.hint: Drops from the Haligtree Foot Soldiers just outside of the Elphael Inner Wall site of Grace.  Video Location

101AB3F0.name: Haligtree Helm
101AB3F0.hint: Haligtree Soldiers drop all pieces of the set. They are located throughout all areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

02817AC0.name: Greatbow
02817AC0.hint: Chance to drop from Redmane Knight in Fort Gael. .  Chance to drop from a Leyndell Knight wielding it in Altus Plateau, near the Altus Highway Junction Site of Grace.  From chest at the Highway Lookout Tower (Altus Plateau) to the north of the Divine Capital.

100F90C4.name: Traveler's Clothes
100F90C4.hint: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: The entire Traveler's Set is found deep underground in a side room with a large orange flower, adjacent to the Haligtree Roots site of grace.       This area is accessed by taking the lift from the large building in the northeast.

0112CF90.name: Pest's Glaive
0112CF90.hint: Drops from Lesser Kindred of Rot (Pests).       Two  can be easily farmed in front of the Church of the Plague.    Eleven can be found inside the Grand Cloister.

4003E418.name: Haligtree Soldier Ashes
4003E418.hint: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: Found under a large decorative chalice in the northern edge of the city.  Video Location

101BC560.name: Haligtree Knight Helm
101BC560.hint: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: Looted from a corpse located near the Elphael Inner Wall site of grace. It is in the room at the top of the ladder directly adjacent to the grace site. Video Location

100F9128.name: Traveler's Manchettes
100F9128.hint: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: The entire Traveler's Set is found deep underground in a side room with a large orange flower, adjacent to the Haligtree Roots site of grace.       This area is accessed by taking the lift from the large building in the northeast.

101AB4B8.name: Haligtree Gauntlets
101AB4B8.hint: Haligtree Soldiers drop all pieces of the set. They are located throughout all areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

101BC68C.name: Haligtree Knight Greaves
101BC68C.hint: Haligtree Knights drop the Haligtree Knight Armor, Haligtree Knight Gauntlets, and Haligtree Knight Greaves. They can be found in the latter areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

101CB024.name: Ivory-Draped Tabard
101CB024.hint: Chance to drop from Haligtree Foot Soldiers in Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.       There are 2 Foot Soldiers & 2 Haligtree Soldiers just next to the Prayer Room site of grace

101AB454.name: Haligtree Crest Surcoat
101AB454.hint: Haligtree Soldiers drop all pieces of the set. They are located throughout all areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

00227C20.name: Rotten Crystal Sword
00227C20.hint: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: Found in a chest by the inner wall guarded by 3 Lesser Crystallians. From the Elphael Inner Wall site of grace, head down the steps and jump up on the rubble to your left. You can engage the Lesser Crystallians one by one by luring them over the rubble and into the hallway. Video Location

00F69500.name: Rotten Crystal Spear
00F69500.hint: Can be dropped by Lesser Crystalian enemies located within Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree       2 of them can be found in the room just next to the Elphael Inner Wall site of grace.           A consistent strategy is to lure one of them out with any throwable item, projectile weapon or spell, then use a striking-type weapon of your choice to fish for backstabs, followed with a charged heavy attack as they rise from the ground. After several critical or heavy blows the Lesser Crystalian will crack and become easy to stunlock with regular attacks.            Best way to farm is to go to the one at the Elphael Inner Wall, use the Fallingstar Beast Jaw +9 Weapon Art and kill it without passing over the tree root and aggroing the spearmen. Takes a few tries to get the drop, but no skill required.

200004C5.name: Marika's Soreseal
200004C5.hint: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: Found on an altar in a sealed room in the southeast lower levels. This room requires a Stonesword Key to unlock.   From the Prayer Room Site of Grace, move through the door to the north, and cross over to the walkway that has the Erdtree Avatar. Head to the southern end of the walkway, then jump down the western side, jumping down once again to reach the sealed door.  Alternatively, if you're feeling up for it, from the Elphael Inner Wall Site of Grace: leave the area through the eastern door and head down the ladder to the southeast. After going through the arch, turn right and follow the path, circling the city until you get to the imp statue. Be careful of enemies along the way, and inside the room as you pick up the talisman.  Video Location

002191C0.name: Miquellan Knight's Sword
002191C0.hint: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: Found atop a bell tower. From the Prayer Room site of grace, walk forward into the Haligtree. Not far from the Prayer Room, you will see a Haligtree Soldier sitting down. Before the soldier is a ledge to the right you can walk out on, attached to a tower. Walk on this connector all the way to the tower. Drop down on the tower's ledge, and walk this outer rim to the opposite side. There will be a ladder that takes you up to the sword.  Alternatively, if you've already unlocked the Haligtree Roots site of grace, simply take the elevator in the adjacent room with the Scarlet Aeonia bloom (not the one in Malenia's boss room). After the elevator stops, get out, walk around the tower and find the ladder. It will take you up to the sword.   Video Location

01FBA8F0.name: Rotten Crystal Staff
01FBA8F0.hint: Dropped by the Lesser Crystalian mage in the first section of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree  Dropped by the Lesser Crystalian mage guarded by 2 Lesser Crystalian Lancers, just next to the Elphael Inner Wall Site of Grace

20000FA3.name: Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman
20000FA3.hint: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: Found in a chest on an elevated platform inside the large building in the northeast, guarded by several Pests. Video LocationThis platform can be reached by heading through the eastern exit from the Drainage Channel Site of Grace, and then navigating across the branches and concrete beams to reach the roof of the building. (See roof below)While there are many branches and beams to traverse, the path is fairly linear. Once on the roof, you'll see two holes in the roof's surface and peering through the hole, you'll see joists where you can land on.Land on the joists (you can go through either hole), and immediately shield, as you'll be attacked by pests. Make your way over the western end of the room (where the pests are attacking from) where the chest is located.

40001A2D.name: Triple Rings of Light
40001A2D.hint: Elphael, Brace of The Haligtree: From the Prayer Room grace, head out onto the eastern walkway and drop down one level by using the roofs on the right. There is a sealed treasure room just under the Prayer Room that requires a Stonesword Key to unlock. The chest containing the spell is inside.  Video Location

002E6300.name: Knight's Greatsword
002E6300.hint: Dropped by most enemies in the knight archetype such as:       Godrick Knights (throughout Limgrave)    Cuckoo Knights (throughout Liurnia of the Lakes)    Mausoleum Knight    Leyndell Knights (throughout the Altus Plateau, especially in Leyndell, Royal Capital)      An easy-to-farm spectral knight that drops this weapon can be found just outside the Black Knife Catacombs in Liurnia of the Lakes.  Sell Value:   200  Base drop rate is 4% (at 100 Discovery)  Other notes and player tips go here

01EC8DC0.name: Haligtree Crest Greatshield
01EC8DC0.hint: Has a 4% base chance to drop from one specific Haligtree Knight in the graveyard beside the church at the bottom of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree. All other Haligtree Knights, regardless if they wield this Shield, will not drop it.       To reach the Knight, go to the Drainage Channel Site of Grace, head outside and follow the roots on your left. Drop down onto the first support beam (a flying buttress) that slopes down to the right. Halfway down the buttress, there is a branch to the left that you need to drop down to. Cross the branch and jump/fall onto another buttress. From here, you can fall to the ground directly while taking some fall damage, or jump to the church balcony first and drop from there. The knight can be found sitting underneath the buttress near it's base.    Alternatively, from the Haligtree Roots Site of Grace, turn around and go up the elevator. Once you reach the top, run straight until you're outside the Church. Then turn right, and right again once you get past the corner of the building to find the knight.

40037AA0.name: Blackflame Monk Amon Ashes
40037AA0.hint: The Blackflame Monk Amon Ashes can be found in the following location  Dropped by the Stray Mimic Tear boss located in the Hidden Path to the Haligtree. This boss is in the secret catacombs underneath the large staircase in the main hall, accessible by navigating a series of invisible walkways. See the dungeon page for details on how to reach the boss.

20000FAC.name: Spelldrake Talisman +2
20000FAC.hint: Base talisman: Acquired by defeating Runebear at the end of the Earthbore Cave in the Weeping Peninsula.  Spelldrake Talisman +1: Sellia, Town of Sorcery: Found in a small room in the northwest section of town, right under the balcony containing the Staff of Loss. This room is initially sealed by a barrier that can be dispelled by lighting a brazier atop a tower in the southwest of town.  Spelldrake Talisman +2: Found in the secret catacombs underneath the Hidden Path to the Haligtree by turning right just before the Stray Mimic Tear's boss door, following the corridor up and taking the lift. The talisman can be found on a corpse in an alcove at the top. See the location's page for details on how to get to the catacombs.

2000044C.name: Silver Scarab
2000044C.hint: Found in a chest in Hidden Path to the Haligtree. In the large central room, there is a broken section of railing. There, you can drop down to an invisible platform, and walk to a small room. The chest is past an Illusory Wall, behind the Grave Glovewort (9).  Tip for finding the way on the invisible bridge: Use either glowing stones, throwing knives, or arrows (fire or shining work the best).

1010EFF0.name: Octopus Head
1010EFF0.hint: The Octopus Head Helm can be obtained by killing Land Octopuses (Not to be confused with Giant Land Octopuses).        Twelve Land Octopuses can be found South of Saintsbridge Site of Grace , in a small lake close to Iron Fist Alexander's first encounter.      A few Land Octopuses can be found South-West of the Temple Quarter Site of Grace in Liurnia of the Lakes.     North of the Siofra River Bank Site of Grace, near the large pillar on the map, there are several Giant Land Octopuses, and many of the smaller Land Octopuses.

10050910.name: Guardian Mask
10050910.hint: Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.       An area dense with Guardians can be found by starting at the Dragonbarrow Fork site of grace, and working your way uphill towards the Minor Erdtree. Guardians are encountered in small groups and more come up from the ground, making it a good place to farm the set.    Chance it drops from one of the multiple Erdtree Guardians at the minor tree in Weeping Peninsula.

100509D8.name: Guardian Bracers
100509D8.hint: Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.       An area dense with Guardians can be found by starting at the Dragonbarrow Fork site of grace, and working your way uphill towards the Minor Erdtree. Guardians are encountered in small groups and more come up from the ground, making it a good place to farm the set.    Chance it drops from one of the multiple Erdtree Guardians at the minor tree in Weeping Peninsula.

10050A3C.name: Guardian Greaves
10050A3C.hint: Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.       An area dense with Guardians can be found starting at the Dragonbarrow Fork site of grace, and working your way uphill towards the Minor Erdtree. Guardians are encountered in small groups and more come up from the ground, making it a good place to farm the set.    Chance it drops from one of the multiple Erdtree Guardians at the minor tree in Weeping Peninsula.

10050D5C.name: Guardian Garb
10050D5C.hint: Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.  An area dense with Guardians can be found by starting at the Dragonbarrow Fork site of grace, and working your way uphill towards the Minor Erdtree. Guardians are encountered in small groups and more come up from the ground, making it a good place to farm the set.  Chance it drops from one of the multiple Erdtree Guardians at the minor tree in Weeping Peninsula.

40002B05.name: Thorny Cracked Tear
40002B05.hint: Dropped by the Putrid Avatar at the Minor Erdtree in the Consecrated Snowfield, east of Ordina, Liturgical Town.

40002B09.name: Ruptured Crystal Tear (2)
40002B09.hint: Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar that resides in Liurnia of the Lakes.  Dropped by the Putrid Avatar at the Minor Erdtree in the Consecrated Snowfield, east of Ordina, Liturgical Town.

01145630.name: Guardian's Swordspear
01145630.hint: Dropped by Erdtree Guardians.  A good place to farm this is around Minor Erdtree Church in Altus Plateau. There are 6 guardians around the church.

20000FD4.name: Pearldrake Talisman +2
20000FD4.hint: Base talisman: Can be found beyond the lowest ("Crumbling Lands") waygate of the Four Belfries. Go through the waygate, then jump down to the north, then jump down to the east (and if you can, use ranged attacks to kill the two beastmen below), then jump down again, then jump down (to the north) one more time.  +1 Variation: Can be found in Wyndham Ruins in the Mt. Gelmir region. The talisman is found inside a chest at the end of the area sealed by an Imp Statue; a Stonesword Key is required.   +2 Variation: Can be found in Miquella's Haligtree. Travel to the Haligtree Town Site of Grace and exit through the northwestern door. Then climb the ladder and turn around to jump southeast across the gap. The talisman will be located on a corpse at the base of a statue, guarded by a Misbegotten Warrior. Video Location

00D63BC0.name: Iron Cleaver
00D63BC0.hint: Castle Morne. Dropped by the Misbegotten creatures using this weapon.  Leyndell, Royal Capital: Chance to drop from the Misbegotten enemies that can be found at behind the big door.  To farm easily: go to Castle Morne and unlock "Behind the Castle" Grace. Warp here. Run west , drop down rocks then off castle. There are 3 sleeping on that ledge and one more in the room to your right with the prisoner spirit. Easy backstabs, farm without any fighting

00E5A510.name: Longhaft Axe
00E5A510.hint: Rare drop from Misbegotten wielding it.  There is an easy to kill one at Castle Morne in Weeping Peninsula. From Beside the Rampart Gaol site of grace, cross the bridge and will be on the left sleeping.  Can be farmed efficiently from two Misbegotten by heading to the farm down the stairs and north from the Windmill Village site of grace.  Can also be dropped by the same enemy in Cave of the Forlorn, south of the minor Erdtree in the Consecrated Snowfield.

400343F0.name: Oracle Envoy Ashes
400343F0.hint: Where to Find Oracle Envoy Ashes  Miquella's Haligtree near Haligtree Town site of grace  From the Haligtree Town site of grace, ascend the eastern ladder and run up the large branch past the scarlet rot flowers and avoiding the bubbles from the Giant Envoy behind you. Jump down to the left to a small branch from some fungi.  From there approach and kill the Giant Envoy that was above you.  Then continue upwards to the east where one Giant Envoy, one large Envoy, and two envoys guard the ashes.  Video Location

00B98C00.name: Envoy's Long Horn
00B98C00.hint: This weapon can be dropped by the Large Oracle Envoy located early on in the East Capital Rampart in Leyndell, Royal Capital.  It can also drop from the same enemies wielding it in Miquella's Haligtree.

02628110.name: Misbegotten Shortbow
02628110.hint: Can drop from flying Misbegotten enemies in Castle Morne and Morne Tunnel in Weeping Peninsula.

002E14E0.name: Iron Greatsword
002E14E0.hint: Possible drop from the two large red-maned Misbegotten in Leyndell, Royal Capital, in the ash-covered path leading toward the Forbidden Lands.       Closest site of grace is the Avenue Balcony in Leyndell      Possible drop from the large red-maned Misbegotten in Miquella's Haligtree, north of the Haligtree Town Plaza Site of Grace. This is the most ideal farming spot, as it can still be farmed after burning the Erdtree.

4000111D.name: Loretta's Mastery
4000111D.hint: Dropped by Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree upon defeat. Video Location

100C8320.name: Envoy Crown
100C8320.hint: Miquella's Haligtree. Southeast of the Haligtree Canopy site of grace. (At the top of the branch that the Giant Ants patrol, on a corpse behind an Oracle Envoy Giant.) Video Location

200003FE.name: Viridian Amber Medallion +2
200003FE.hint: Base talisman: Tombsward Cave, a small dungeon in the Weeping Peninsula: Located southeast of the Fourth Church of Marika. The medallion is obtained after defeating the boss, Miranda the Blighted Bloom.+1 Variant: Altus Plateau, south of the Outer Wall Battleground Site of Grace: You will hear Margit whisper, "I see you, Tarnished..."  to you before appearing on the road. Defeat him again and it will drop.  +2 Variant: Miquella's Haligtree: The closest site of grace is the Haligtree Town Plaza. Go south towards the roof with a dead body on it. For reference, the dead body is two stories above the talisman. Continue southeast, and jump down once. Jump across the gap, and then do an immediate 180 turn and make a running jump into the building below. It'll be in a chest guarded by Scarlet Rot Zombies. Video location

4000089D.name: Prattling Pate My Beloved
4000089D.hint: Pratting Pate "My Beloved" can be found on Miquella's Haligtree, east from the Haligtree Canopy Site of Grace. It is two branches down from the Grace site.  Video Location  Prattling Pate "Hello"  Prattling Pate "Thank you"  Prattling Pate "Apologies"  Prattling Pate "Wonderful"  Prattling Pate "Please help"  Prattling Pate "Let's get to it"  Prattling Pate "You're beautiful"

015F68F0.name: Envoy's Greathorn
015F68F0.hint: Dropped by Giant Oracle Envoy. They are found in Miquella's Haligtree.   Beginning at Haligtree Canopy Site of Grace, head up the branch in front of you and take a left towards the three Oracle Envoys. Immediately after passing the second Oracle Envoy, turn right and jump off the mushroom that leads to another branch containing a large Oracle Envoy. Run past this enemy until you reach a cluster of mushrooms. Jump from here, down to the large branch containing the patrolling giant ants. Sneak past or fight your way through them (if you reset the area and immediately head along through this route, once you jump down onto the large branch, you should only have to deal with one Giant Ant) and head up the branch. This will take you directly to a lone Giant Oracle Envoy.  Alternative route can be taken from Haligree Town Site of Grace: go back and up the ladder, run up the wide branch, jump down from the third cluster of mushrooms onto the narrow branch to the left and then go left again to the first Envoy. Three timed rolls are needed for this part. Flask of Wondrous Physick with Opaline Hardtear and Opaline Bubbletear combined with Lord's Divine Fortification are a tremendous help. Up the branch with first Giant Oracle Envoy is the second one grouped with a Large Oracle Envoy and two Oracle Envoy's.

01142F20.name: Loretta's War Sickle
01142F20.hint: Dropped by Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree upon defeat. Video Location

80014C08.name: Ash of War: White Shadow's Lure
80014C08.hint: Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab in the Consecrated Snowfield, northwest of the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace between the grace and Ordina, Liturgical Town. The scarab leaves glowing white tracks in the snow and is chased wherever it goes by a pack of five wolves.

1003AA48.name: Blue Silver Bracelets
1003AA48.hint: Albinauric Wolfback Archers found in the Consecrated Snowfield, as well as the Ordina Gaol, drop the Blue Silver Set pieces.  One that is easily farmed can be found shortly north of the Consecrated Snowfield site of grace.  Three Albuinaric Archers can be found southwest of the Ordina, Lurtigical Town Site of Grace on some rock outcrops.

1002BFE8.name: Black Knife Gauntlets
1002BFE8.hint: The full set is found on a corpse under an archway behind Ordina, Liturgical Town in Consecrated Snowfield.

1002C04C.name: Black Knife Greaves
1002C04C.hint: The full set is found on a corpse under an archway behind Ordina, Liturgical Town in Consecrated Snowfield..

1002BF20.name: Black Knife Hood
1002BF20.hint: The full set is found on a corpse under an archway behind Ordina, Liturgical Town in Consecrated Snowfield.

1003A980.name: Blue Silver Mail Hood
1003A980.hint: Albinauric Wolfback Archers found in the Consecrated Snowfield, as well as the Ordina Gaol, drop the Blue Silver Set pieces.  One that is easily farmed can be found shortly north of the Consecrated Snowfield site of grace.

1002BF84.name: Black Knife Armor
1002BF84.hint: The full set is found on a corpse under an archway behind Ordina, Liturgical Town in Consecrated Snowfield.

1003AAAC.name: Blue Silver Mail Skirt
1003AAAC.hint: Albinauric Wolfback Archers found in the Consecrated Snowfield, as well as the Ordina Gaol, drop the Blue Silver Set pieces.  One that is easily farmed can be found shortly north of the Consecrated Snowfield site of grace.

1003A9E4.name: Blue Silver Mail Armor
1003A9E4.hint: Albinauric Wolfback Archers found in the Consecrated Snowfield, as well as the Ordina Gaol, drop the Blue Silver Set pieces.  One that is easily farmed can be found shortly north of the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace.

002E14E0.name: Iron Greatsword
002E14E0.hint: Possible drop from the two large red-maned Misbegotten in Leyndell, Royal Capital, in the ash-covered path leading toward the Forbidden Lands.       Closest site of grace is the Avenue Balcony in Leyndell      Possible drop from the large red-maned Misbegotten in Miquella's Haligtree, north of the Haligtree Town Plaza Site of Grace. This is the most ideal farming spot, as it can still be farmed after burning the Erdtree.

00A84DF0.name: Curved Club
00A84DF0.hint: This weapon can be looted from the club and shield Albinaurics found at Academy Gate Town grace.       A group of Albinaurics wielding Curved Clubs can be found on a fallen bridge section east of this grace, in the direction of the Gate Town Bridge grace. Two of those sitting on the bridge section have the Curved Club and there's another patrolling in a pair further ahead.

00B85380.name: Curved Great Club
00B85380.hint: This weapon can be looted from the larger of the Second-Generation Albinaurics found across Liurnia of the Lakes (the gray frog like creatures). There are a number of them located around the Temple Quarter making it an easy spot to farm.

0271C350.name: Albinauric Bow
0271C350.hint: Dropped by Albinauric Wolfback Archers around the Consecrated Snowfield.       At least four Albinauric Archers can be found south-southwest of the Ordina, Liturgical Town sight of grace. One can be found riding a wolf; three can be found seated near each other.      They can also drop from the stationary rooftop Albinauric Archers inside the Ordina Evergaol.

01D9A200.name: Albinauric Shield
01D9A200.hint: Drops from Albinaurics wielding this shield. There are three on top of the church northwest of the Academy Gate Town Site of Grace.

40001C8F.name: Unendurable Frenzy
40001C8F.hint: Yelough Anix Ruins: Found in a chest inside an underground treasure room in the central section of the ruins.        In a four walled ruins on the western side. Reachable by double jumping with Torrent from the central building with the sleeping giant.

4000125D.name: Meteorite of Astel
4000125D.hint: Consecrated Snowfield: Dropped by Astel, Stars of Darkness, found within Yelough Anix Tunnel.

40000820.name: Blasphemous Claw
40000820.hint: The Blasphemous Claw is dropped by Recusant Bernahl upon defeat at Crumbling Farum Azula.  Video Location

40002302.name: Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing [3]
40002302.hint: Can be found next to a lake in Crumbling Farum Azula. From the Tempest-Facing Balcony Grace, go southwest back through the church and take the elevator on the other side of it. Turn left and hug the wall until you get to an area with the aforementioned lake below. The item is under a gazebo next to the lake. Elden Ring.

40038270.name: Azula Beastman Ashes
40038270.hint: Where to Find Azula Beastman Ashes   Crumbling Farum Azula: Found at the bottom level of the Dragon Temple. Begin at the Dragon Temple grace site, then jump down to the west onto the stairs. Do not go up the stairs; turn east and jump down again. There is an entrance door to the east with stairs going up which leads to a crypt with several sarcophagi and two enemies. One static, one patrolling. The ashes can be found on the furthest sarcophagus in the back. Video Location

80005654.name: Ash of War: Black Flame Tornado
80005654.hint: Crumbling Farum Azula: Dropped by the Godskin Duo Boss inside the Dragon Temple area. Elden Ring.  Video Location

10030E6C.name: Banished Knight Greaves
10030E6C.hint: Location: Stormveil Castle  Chance for it to be looted off the Banished Knight enemies that you've killed.  Dropped from the wandering Banished Knight at Cathedral of Dragon Communion

1000EB8C.name: Drake Knight Greaves
1000EB8C.hint: You can find the Drake Knight Set in Crumbling Farum Azula.   Travel to the Beside The Great Bridge site of grace and go in the opposite direction of the boss room. Go through the building and outside onto the balcony. From here, drop down to the Beastman with the big cleaver. Go along the bridge and call up the elevator. Ride the Elevator down and go Outside. The Drake Knight Set is on the left in a big chest.

1003F868.name: Malformed Dragon Gauntlets
1003F868.hint: Dropped by the Draconic Tree Sentinel in Crumbling Farum Azula.

400022FE.name: Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing [4]
400022FE.hint: Crumbling Farum Azula: On a corpse at the edge of the cliffs by the Tempest-Facing Balcony site of grace. Video Location

400024BA.name: Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [4]
400024BA.hint: Where to find Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [4]  Can be acquired at Crumbling Farum Azula. From the Dragon Temple Lift site of Grace, do not take the lift. Instead head out into the undead courtyard and keep right. There is a series of collapsed archways and crumbled tower pieces stretching to the west to traverse. Platform over the tower pieces, and then pick up this book inside an enclosed area at the end. Two undead beastmen will attack you when you pick up the cookbook. Video Location

10030E08.name: Banished Knight Gauntlets
10030E08.hint: Dropped from the Banished Knights in Stormveil Castle.  Dropped from the wandering Banished Knight at Cathedral of Dragon Communion

1003F804.name: Malformed Dragon Armor
1003F804.hint: The Malformed Dragon Armor Chest Armor can be obtained from killing the Tree Sentinel up the stairs from the Beside the Great Bridge site of grace.

100AFCE4.name: Beast Champion Armor
100AFCE4.hint: Drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. If not killed before, he will eventually invade you at Crumbling Farum Azula, dropping the entire set with an altered version of the chest piece.  You can get this armor piece early by killing Knight Bernahl when you first encounter him at Warmaster's Shack.

400022FF.name: Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing [5]
400022FF.hint: Found in a small church in Crumbling Farum Azula right before the Beside the Great Bridge Grace. Video location  If you have the elevator shortcut from the Grace, Beside the Great Bridge take the elevator back down, then take every right possible and it will be on a corpse next to the altar.  From the Dragon Temple Rooftop Site of Grace, drop down to the red rooftops and head east (right), then move south past that bird, running off the side (instead of using ladder) and head to the dragon, be wary of its red lightning and the birds... From the dragon head west (there is a Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone to the east), take a breather at the sleeping beast, run past the standing beast and across the columns of the broken down building, Now head east (right) into the building, in front of that beast by the altar will be the Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing [5]. Head south of that room(right) then east (left), pass the greatsword wielding beast into the room where an elevator to the northwest will take you to Beside the Great Bridge Grace.

1000EAC4.name: Drake Knight Armor
1000EAC4.hint: You can find the Drake Knight Set in Crumbling Farum Azula.  Travel to the Beside The Great Bridge site of grace and go in the opposite direction of the boss room. Go through the building and outside onto the balcony. From here drop down to the Beastman with the big cleaver. Go along the bridge and call up the elevator. Ride the Elevator down and go Outside. The Drake Knight Set is on the left in a big chest.

20000FC0.name: Boltdrake Talisman +2
20000FC0.hint: Located at Stormveil Castle.  When you reach the main castle grounds where you fight the Lion Guardian, head inside the room with the armored statues, and through the arch doorway, to reach the Limgrave Tower Bridge Site of Grace. Specifically, you'll find the on a body that you can loot, just at the top of the first set of stairs, resting against a pillar on the left side.   Boltdrake Talisman +1: This more-powerful variant of the Boltdrake Talisman can be found in a storage shed inside the Old Altus Tunnel dungeon.   Boltdrake Talisman +2: Found on a corpse hanging off an opening in a tall tower south of the Dragon Temple Rooftop Site of Grace. Reaching this area is a bit complex:       You will first need to head southeast to the large plaza guarded by a stationary Farum Azula Dragon, which is constantly raining red lightning all around the area.    From here, look northeast, then drop down a series of cliffs to the east to reach the opening at the bottom of a large building.    Follow the linear path here to a balcony with a ladder leading up to a terrace. Mind the Banished Knights patrolling the area.    Directly in front of the ladder is a lift building; to your left is a chest with the Dragon Towershield. Take the lift up to a series of slopes leading to a hallway underneath the same bridge you crossed to get to the southeast plaza.    The passage ahead has a Crucible Knight fighting a couple of Beastmen. Fight your way through the hallway (or just run past the enemies) to reach a ladder at the end.    Climb up the ladder to reach an open window where the corpse holding the talisman can be found.      Boltdrake Talisman +2 Video Location, Crumbling Farum Azula

00BA2840.name: Devourer's Scepter
00BA2840.hint: Dropped by Knight/Recusant Bernahl when defeated. You will find him at Warmaster's Shack or in Crumbling Farum Azula when he invades you. Video Location

40001EDF.name: Golden Lightning Fortification
40001EDF.hint: Crumbling Farum Azula: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found by the cliffs south of the fountain plaza. This area is located in the upper level after ascending the Dragon Temple Lift.  Video Location

100AFD48.name: Beast Champion Gauntlets
100AFD48.hint: Drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. If not killed before, he will eventually invade you at Crumbling Farum Azula, dropping the entire set with an altered version of the chest piece.

400022FA.name: Smithing-Stone Miner's Bell Bearing [4]
400022FA.hint: Crumbling Farum Azula: Dropped by the Godskin Duo inside the Dragon Temple area upon defeat.

1000EB28.name: Drake Knight Gauntlets
1000EB28.hint: You can find the Drake Knight Set in Crumbling Farum Azula.   Travel to the Beside The Great Bridge site of grace and go in the opposite direction of the boss room. Go through the building and outside onto the balcony. From here, drop down to the Beastman with the big cleaver. Go along the bridge and call up the elevator. Ride the Elevator down and go Outside. The Drake Knight Set is on the left in a big chest.

20000FA2.name: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman +2
20000FA2.hint: Base talisman: Bestial Sanctum: Found on the bottom level of the structure below the surrounding cliffs.  +1 Variant: Sainted Hero's Grave: Can be found in a locked imp's room, behind a Stonesword Key fog wall (not the first one you encounter; the Crimson Seed Talisman is located behind that one). When you reach the area with the big axes stomping the ground, you need to get on the first one and jump on the ledge on the left wall. There are multiple Putrid Corpses along this path and in the room with the fog doors, alongside a pair of Wraith Callers. Once you've dealt with them and opened the fog door, there are a final pair of Putrids watching over the talisman.    +2 Variant: Crumbling Farum Azula: Looted from a corpse on floating chunk of debris in the northern section, between Dragon Temple Lift and Dragon Temple Rooftop. Video Location

1003F7A0.name: Malformed Dragon Helm
1003F7A0.hint: Dropped by the Draconic Tree Sentinel in Crumbling Farum Azula.

1003F8CC.name: Malformed Dragon Greaves
1003F8CC.hint: Dropped by the Draconic Tree Sentinel in Crumbling Farum Azula.

100AFDAC.name: Beast Champion Greaves
100AFDAC.hint: Drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. If not killed before, he will eventually invade you at Crumbling Farum Azula, dropping the entire set with an altered version of the chest piece.

10030D40.name: Banished Knight Helm
10030D40.hint: Dropped by the wandering Banished Knight at Cathedral of Dragon Communion (Altered, Red hood), and the one standing by the cliff, to the west.

100AFC80.name: Beast Champion Helm
100AFC80.hint: Drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. If not killed before, he will eventually invade you at Crumbling Farum Azula, dropping the entire set with an altered version of the chest piece.

20000BF4.name: Old Lord's Talisman
20000BF4.hint: Found in a chest in Crumbling Farum Azula.The chest is inside a rotunda on the east edge of the Dragon Temple Rooftop area. This area is accessed by heading north from the Great Bridge and entering the building there. Exit onto the balcony on the right, and take the ladder nearby down to the walkway leading to the rotunda. Beware as the chest is surrounded by Beastmen and, if you've killed Rykard in the Volcano Manor, you will also be invaded by Recusant Bernahl on the walkway.

00222E00.name: Warhawk's Talon
00222E00.hint: Can be found in Stormveil Castle as drop by defeating Warhawks. There are four immediately out the door from the Rampart Tower grace. Video Location

1000EA60.name: Drake Knight Helm
1000EA60.hint: You can find the Drake Knight Set in Crumbling Farum Azula.  Travel to the Beside The Great Bridge site of grace and go in the opposite direction of the boss room. Go through the building and outside onto the balcony. From here, drop to the Beastman with the big cleaver. Go along the bridge and call up the elevator. Ride the Elevator down and go Outside. The Drake Knight Set is on the left in a big chest.

10030DA4.name: Banished Knight Armor
10030DA4.hint: Chance to drop from two specific spectral Banished Knights located in Castle Sol that can be seen wearing the unaltered cloaked armor.    The northern one can be easily farmed by starting from the Castle Sol Rooftop site of grace and running south to the elevator. The Banished Knight can be shot with ranged weapons from here causing it to teleport to the player. The same can be achieved by shooting an arrow through the arrow slit in the grace platform (west side), although the knight doesn't always teleport when shooting him from this spot.  The southern one can be reached from the Church of the Eclipse site of grace by exiting through the church to the left, turning right outside, and heading up the ladder to the catwalks. After following the catwalk past the exile soldier and around the small tower, the Banished Knight can be found just past the ladder leading down. It is recommended that the player jump onto the lower roof next to the catwalk and tower, and bait the red-eyed Banished Knight into teleporting onto the small wooden catwalk extension of the roof; then the player can roll or jump to the walkway the Banished Knight was just standing on. The Banished Knight will slowly walk towards the player, then fall to its death onto the ground below, saving the player a good deal of trouble. Then the player walk down the walkway and make their way over to the loot, which will be in a corner, behind a tombstone.   Dropped from all other Banished Knights. They can be found in Stormveil Castle, Cathedral of Dragon Communion, Crumbling Farum Azula, and Castle Sol.

002EFF40.name: Banished Knight's Greatsword
002EFF40.hint: Chance for it to be looted off the Banished Knight enemies that you've killed.

01131DB0.name: Banished Knight's Halberd
01131DB0.hint: Location: Stormveil Castle.  Chance for it to be looted off the Banished Knight enemies that you've killed.       Farming guide available on the Banished Knight article.      Edgar the Revenger drops a Banished Knight's Halberd upgraded to +8 with the Spinning Strikes Ash of War installed, upon his defeat at Castle Morne or the Revenger's Shack.

01E84800.name: Dragon Towershield
01E84800.hint: From the Dragon Temple Rooftop site of grace in Crumbling Farum Azula, drop down and go down the ladder to the south. Continue all the way to the south until reach an open area where a lightning dragon is or was. To the southeast is a small gazebo and just north of the gazebo is an area you can drop down to. Drop all the way down to the northeast until you reach a building. Progress through the building and go up the ladder outside. At the east edge of this area is a chest containing the Dragon Towershield, guarded by a Banished Knight. Video Location

01D97AF0.name: Banished Knight's Shield
01D97AF0.hint: Chance for it to be looted off of a Banished Knight wielding one of these shields.       Farming guide available on the Banished Knight Page.

006AF6D0.name: Beastman's Curved Sword
006AF6D0.hint: The Beastman's Curved Sword has a chance to drop from any Azula Beastman carrying this weapon.  7 beastmen carrying this weapon can be found near the Crumbling Beast Grave Site of Grace in Crumbling Farum Azula. Turn right after leaving the room with the grace, the beastmen will be in two rooms ahead. Four of the beastmen are eating and do not respond unless the player attacks or walks near their head.

01CAADE0.name: Beastman's Jar-Shield
01CAADE0.hint: The Beastman's Jar-Shield Shield has a chance to drop from any Azula Beastman carrying this shield.  One beastman with this shield can be found in the room just next to the Crumbling Beast Grave Depths grace in Crumbling Farum Azula.

007B4A80.name: Beastman's Cleaver
007B4A80.hint: The Beastman's Cleaver has a chance to drop from any Azula Beastman carrying this weapon.  One appears on the bottom ledge of secluded group of flying debris in Crumbling Farum Azula only reachable via a Waygate at The Four Belfries. You can reach this area without needing to fight any bosses if you take the backroad leading to Liurnia of the Lakes, allowing you to get this weapon early.  Two found near the Dragon Temple Lift grace in Crumbling Farum Azula. From the grace, take the lift down and take a right to reach some stairs. One can be found by going right when facing the stairs and jumping across the floating pillar. Another can be found by taking those stairs down.  One near the Beside the Great Bridge grace in Crumbling Farum Azula. From the grace, take the lift down and through the passage to the right. This beastman has more hp than the previous ones.

10033450.name: Briar Helm
10033450.hint: Purchased from the Enia in Roundtable Hold after defeating Elemer of the Briar in The Shaded Castle.

10033518.name: Briar Gauntlets
10033518.hint: Purchased from the Enia in Roundtable Hold after defeating Elemer of the Briar in The Shaded Castle

10044624.name: Royal Knight Armor
10044624.hint: Can be bought from Finger Reader Enia, at Roundtable Hold after defeating Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree for  6,000.

10044688.name: Royal Knight Gauntlets
10044688.hint: Can be brought from Finger Reader Enia, at Roundtable Hold after defeating Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree for  4,000.

10070544.name: Elden Lord Armor
10070544.hint: Available from Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Godfrey, First Elden Lord and Hoarah Loux, Warrior.

10075364.name: Lord of Blood's Robe
10075364.hint: This becomes available for purchase for 20,000 Runes from Enia after you defeat Mohg, Lord of Blood.

40001108.name: Rennala's Full Moon
40001108.hint: Obtained when unlocking the Remembrance of The Full Moon Queen's power by handing it over to Enia at Roundtable Hold.

40001770.name: Catch Flame
40001770.hint: Starting equipment for the Prophet class.  Sold by Brother Corhyn at the Roundtable Hold for 600

40001842.name: Black Flame
40001842.hint: This incantation is unlocked for purchase after giving a Godskin Prayerbook to Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows.   Location: Stormveil Castle  Nearest Site of Grace: Liftside Chamber  From the liftside chamber exit into the courtyard and head due South hugging the rightside wall until you see a set of stairs that goes underground. You'll find a room that is guarded by four Rats, and ahead, is a doorway that is blocked by a white fog. To dispel this, you will need to use a Stonesword Key on the Imp Statue. You'll find a stock room upon unlocking the doorway, the room has a treasure chest where the book is.

40001874.name: Black Flame's Protection
40001874.hint: Received from Gideon Ofnir, after selecting the "about the secret medallion" dialogue option. In order for this question to appear, you will first need Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left) and Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right). The dialogue option is unlocked upon reaching Miquella's Haligtree.  If not received by Gideon Ofnir, it can be purchased at Twin Maiden Husks after defeating Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing.

40001900.name: Rejection
40001900.hint: Sold by Brother Corhyn at the Roundtable Hold for 1,500

40001914.name: Urgent Heal
40001914.hint: Starting equipment for the Confessor Class.  Sold by Brother Corhyn at the Roundtable Hold for 1,000

40001915.name: Heal
40001915.hint: Starting equipment for the Prophet Class  Sold by Brother Corhyn at the Roundtable Hold for 1,500

40001916.name: Great Heal
40001916.hint: Sold by Brother Corhyn  for 9000 runes after he moves to Altus Plateau.

40001917.name: Lord's Heal
40001917.hint: Purchased from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows (8,000 runes) after giving either of them the Two Fingers' Prayerbook.

40001928.name: Cure Poison

4000186A.hint: This incantation is unlocked for purchase after giving a Godskin Prayerbook to Brother Corhyn or  Miriel, Pastor of Vows.   Location: Stormveil Castle  Nearest Site of Grace: Liftside Chamber  From the arch doorway exiting to the courtyard, head straight into the area with all the enemies and hug the right side and you'll see a set of stairs that goes underground.  You'll find a room that is guarded by four Giant Rats, and ahead, is a doorway that is blocked by a white fog. To dispel this, you will need to use a Stonesword Key on the Imp Statue. You'll find a stock room upon unlocking the doorway, which has a treasure chest holding the Godskin Prayerbook, and another chest holding the Godslayer's Seal.

20000411.name: Erdtree's Favor +1
20000411.hint: Base talisman:  Fringefolk Hero's Grave: To get there, use two Stonesword Keys on the double Imp Keystone next to the Stranded Graveyard Site of Grace. This will lead to a mini-dungeon with traps. Head down until you see the path narrow on both sides and drop drown at the edge to get access to the secret area. Proceed past the imps and a fire trap to find the item resting at an altar. Two Grafted Scions wait hanging above, so be sure to avoid them when they land and grab it really quickly.  +1 Variant: Subterranean Shunning-Grounds: Can be found in a chest, in the boss room after the boss fight with Mohg, the Omen. You do not have to defeat Mohg to loot the chest. You can acquire this mid-fight.Video Location  +2 Variant: Leyndell, Ashen Capital: Found on top of a branch jutting out of the ground in a large courtyard, guarded by three Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirits. Fast travel to the Forbidden Lands Site of Grace, and take the elevator back up to the city. Exit the west door, then fight past a knight and few soldiers, and continue down the stairs, then take the large wooden elevator down. You will arrive at a landing overlooking the courtyard, where the beasts and this talisman is located. You can avoid the beasts by hugging the left wall.  Video Location

1003D090.name: Nomadic Merchant's Chapeau
1003D090.hint: In the hidden tunnels behind the altar in Mohg, the Omen's boss room at the Cathedral of the Forsaken Site of Grace in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds below Leyndell, Royal Capital.  After opening the secret passage behind the altar and taking the stairs down, after crossing the narrow fallen rafter, directly to the left is a tent and in the far corner you can find Nomadic Merchant's Chapeau and the full Nomadic Merchant's Set.   To get access to the set, you need to aggro the enemy walking around close by and lead it next to the tent and have it use its frenzy attack to break the tent.

1003D0F4.name: Nomadic Merchant's Finery
1003D0F4.hint: In the hidden tunnels behind the altar in Mohg, the Omen's boss room at the Cathedral of the Forsaken Site of Grace in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds below Leyndell, Royal Capital.   After opening the secret passage behind the altar and taking the stairs down, crossing the narrow fallen rafter directly to the left is a tent and in the far corner you can find Nomadic Merchant's Finery and the full Nomadic Merchant's Set.   To get access to the set, you need to aggro the enemy walking around close by and lead it next to the tent and have it use its frenzy attack to break the tent.

4000220A.name: Note: Miquella's Needle
4000220A.hint: From the Cathedral of the Forsaken site of grace, made available after defeating Mohg, The Omen, attack the altar at the front of the boss room. It should lower itself revealing a new area. Continue through here until you are forced to parkour downwards using stone coffins as platforms. Near the bottom you will see a corpse that has an item on it. Carefully reach this platform and there will be an open area with more bodies and a tent. The Note can be looted off the ground after tent is destroyed. You can do that in 2 ways:- Around the corner is a shambling Nomad. Lure him out to the tent and get him to destroy it with his Inescapable Frenzy attack.- Quit-out while standing very close to tent and it will be destroyed after loading up.  Video Location

1003D1BC.name: Nomadic Merchant's Trousers
1003D1BC.hint: In the hidden tunnels behind the altar in Mohg, the Omen's boss room at the Cathedral of the Forsaken Site of Grace in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds below Leyndell, Royal Capital.  After opening the secret passage, behind the altar and taking the stairs down, after crossing the narrow fallen rafter, directly to the left is a tent and in the far corner you can find Nomadic Merchant's Chapeau and the full Nomadic Merchant's Set.   To get access to the set, you need to aggro the enemy walking around close by and lead it next to the tent and have it use its frenzy attack to break the tent.

400024E1.name: Frenzied's Cookbook [2]
400024E1.hint: Frenzied’s Cookbook [2] Is found nearest to the Cathedral of the Forsaken Site of Grace in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds below Leyndell, Royal Capital. Behind the altar in Mohg, the Omen's boss room is a hidden path which can be opened by attacking the altar behind the chest after the boss fight. Following the the hidden path, there are stairs down and will lead to collapsed rafters that you can cross; you can cross the path and follow the stairs down for a safer route, or drop directly below on second set of collapsed rafters. On the second set of rafters, you will need to drop down to the lowest set of them, and you will find Frenzied's Cookbook [2] on a sitting corpse.

4000189C.name: Bloodflame Talons
4000189C.hint: Dropped by Mohg, the Omen in Forsaken Depths, Subterranean Shunning-Grounds, under Leyndell.  Shunning Grounds Video Location

40001C84.name: Inescapable Frenzy
40001C84.hint: After making your way past Subterranean Shunning-Grounds and defeating Mohg, The Omen, attack the altar at the front of the boss room. It should lower revealing a new area. Continue through here until you are forced to platform downwards using stone coffins as platforms. Near the bottom you will see a corpse that has Inescapable Frenzy on it.  Shunning Grounds, Video Location

01EA43D0.name: Fingerprint Stone Shield
01EA43D0.hint: The Fingerprint Stone Shield Shield can be found at the following location:Cathedral of the Forsaken.IMPORTANT: Before you start, you must first defeat Morgott, the Omen King; otherwise a seal will be blocking the final area before the shield.NOTE: This needs 3 platforming jumps down that are a bit difficult.After defeating Mohg - The Omen in the Cathedral of the Forsaken you can roll/attack the altar behind the chest and it will move down out of the way revealing a path. The area after Mohg contains a large vertical shaft. After descending the shaft to a certain point, the only way to descend further is by dropping down to various tiny graves sticking out of the walls.Shunning Grounds, Video Location

80005334.name: Ash of War: Golden Land
80005334.hint: Can be found in Deeproot Depths, from the Great Waterfall Crest site of grace, head up a small incline to the South. The scarab is in front of two ants near some shrubbery. Fittingly, it is behind the Erdtree Avatar who drops the Staff of the Avatar.  Video Location

101A8D44.name: Mausoleum Surcoat
101A8D44.hint: Mausoleum Soldier Set pieces drop from Mausoleum Soldiers. They can be found patrolling areas around some of the Wandering Mausoleums.  An easy spot to farm this set is east of the East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes. Several groups of 3 or 4 Mausoleum Soldiers are patrolling around this Wandering Mausoleum.

029095F0.name: Heavy Crossbow
029095F0.hint: Drops from any Godrick Soldier, Raya Lucaria Soldier, Radahn Soldier, Mausoleum Soldier, Leyndell Soldier, or Haligtree Soldier that wields it.

1008B358.name: Crucible Gauntlets
1008B358.hint: The whole Crucible Axe Set is dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis.  The whole set is found in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind a Boss: Crucible Knight Siluria.

400021A9.name: Map (Deeproot Depths)
400021A9.hint: Can be found on a corpse in a gazebo amid the destroyed ruins. Elden Ring. Video Location

101B9F7C.name: Mausoleum Knight Greaves
101B9F7C.hint: Mausoleum Knight Set pieces can be farmed from the Mausoleum Knights, typically found in Liurnia of the Lakes. The easiest one to farm is directly outside the Black Knife Catacombs entrance, which can be reset quickly with the site of grace.  Other possible locations include:       Near the Weeping Peninsula Walking Mausoleum.

1008B6DC.name: Crucible Tree Armor
1008B6DC.hint: The whole set is found in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind a Boss: Crucible Knight Siluria.

101A8E0C.name: Mausoleum Greaves
101A8E0C.hint: Mausoleum Soldier Set pieces drop from Mausoleum Soldiers. They can be found patrolling areas around some of the Wandering Mausoleums.  An easy spot to farm this set is east of the East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes. Several groups of 3 or 4 Mausoleum Soldiers are patrolling around this Wandering Mausoleum.

200004A7.name: Prince of Death's Cyst
200004A7.hint: Deeproot Depths: Dropped by a Lesser Runebear, in a cave behind a waterfall northeast of the Deeproot Depths Site of Grace.  This fight can be cheesed fairly easily using ranged weapons or spells. From the Across the Roots site of grace, head down the large tree branch going southwest until you reach the next separate large tree branch. Head southeast and then east as the branch curves, then drop down onto another branch going south. You should find a hole that will take you into a cave area that is above where the runebear sleeps. From here, none of the runebear's melee attacks can reach you.        Several players have experienced a bug in which the talisman does not drop from the runebear. The above method has the highest success rate for obtaining the talisman.

101B9EB4.name: Mausoleum Knight Armor
101B9EB4.hint: Typically found in Liurnia of the Lakes. The easiest one to farm is directly outside the Black Knife Catacombs entrance, which can be reset quickly with the site of grace.  Near the Walking Mausoleum in Weeping Peninsula.

101A8DA8.name: Mausoleum Gauntlets
101A8DA8.hint: Mausoleum Soldier Set pieces drop from Mausoleum Soldiers. They can be found patrolling areas around some of the Wandering Mausoleums.  An easy spot to farm this set is east of the East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes. Several groups of 3 or 4 Mausoleum Soldiers are patrolling around this Wandering Mausoleum.

101B9F18.name: Mausoleum Knight Gauntlets
101B9F18.hint: Mausoleum Knight Set pieces can be farmed from the Mausoleum Knights, typically found in Liurnia of the Lakes. The easiest one to farm is directly outside the Black Knife Catacombs entrance, which can be reset quickly with the site of grace.  Other possible locations include:       Near the Weeping Peninsula Walking Mausoleum.

4003E030.name: Mausoleum Soldier Ashes
4003E030.hint: Where to Find Mausoleum Soldier Ashes  Located at the base of a small dead tree at the edge of a cliff in the Deeproot Depths.From the The Nameless Eternal City site of grace located in the Deeproot Depths, go north until you reach the Mausoleum. From there, go north toward the cliff and follow the edge until you reach the northmost location possible.  Video Location

1008B678.name: Crucible Tree Helm
1008B678.hint: The whole set is found in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind a Boss: Crucible Knight Siluria.

1008B3BC.name: Crucible Greaves
1008B3BC.hint: The whole Crucible Axe Set is dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis.  The whole set is found in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind a Boss: Crucible Knight Siluria.

4000139C.name: Fia's Mist
4000139C.hint: Obtained by defeating Fia's Champions in Deeproot Depths. After unlocking the Across the Roots Grace, head north and defeat the boss.  Video Location

800055F0.name: Ash of War: Vacuum Slice
800055F0.hint: Inside the ruined temple surrounded by waterfalls Southwest from the Across the Roots site of grace at the bottom level in Deeproot Depths.  Video Location

016116A0.name: Rotten Staff
016116A0.hint: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: Dropped by the Putrid Avatar patrolling the ring walkway in the east. To reach this walkway, head out of the Prayer Room Site of Grace and jump onto the second buttress (concrete beam) connecting to a tower. Descend the tower and use the ledges on the bottom to reach the ring walkway. Video Location  Additional drop, at patch 1.05 the other Putrid Avatar in Elphael (near the Inner Walls Site of Grace) can drop the weapon.

40001A40.name: Elden Stars
40001A40.hint: Where to find Elden Stars:In the Deeproot Depths, head west from the Great Waterfall Crest grace until you reach some roots. From there look to the north-west to see a root going up to a cave and follow it. Note that this is a different entrance than the one where the remains containing the spell is visible (with the ledge below it with two ants).Enter the cave and fight through the packs of Giant Ants until the end and  you'll find Elden Stars on a body facing the cave exit.

01600530.name: Staff of the Avatar
01600530.hint: Drops from the Erdtree Avatar you encounter near the Great Waterfall Crest site of grace.       To reach the area, you can either:           Defeat the Valiant Gargoyle duo boss in the Siofra Aqueduct, then lie down on the coffin at the back of the arena.      Pass through two consecutive hidden walls in the Frenzied Flame Proscription, then carefully descend down the roots and cliffs to the ground.            After entering the Deeproot Depths, Video Location

0103B460.name: Siluria's Tree
0103B460.hint: Siluria's Tree can drop from Crucible Knight Siluria in Deeproot Depths.   Video Location

01FA4960.name: Prince of Death's Staff
01FA4960.hint: From The Nameless Eternal City site of grace in Deeproot Depths, head east and you'll see a root ramp and a series rooftops forming a ramp. Go up either one, and at the very first intersection, drop down to the left and continue upward. The branch will turn left and lead to the top of a tower. The staff is in that tower.  Video Location

001F20C0.name: Lordsworn's Straight Sword
001F20C0.hint: May be dropped by Godrick Soldier in Gatefront Ruins.  Can be dropped by the headless, undead Soldier at Fourth Church of Marika.  The earliest and easiest grinding spot for this is the Gatefront Ruins, not just for this sword, but all of the weapons that the soldiers use excluding their spear.

002E6300.name: Knight's Greatsword
002E6300.hint: Dropped by most enemies in the knight archetype such as:       Godrick Knights (throughout Limgrave)    Cuckoo Knights (throughout Liurnia of the Lakes)    Mausoleum Knight    Leyndell Knights (throughout the Altus Plateau, especially in Leyndell, Royal Capital)      An easy-to-farm spectral knight that drops this weapon can be found just outside the Black Knife Catacombs in Liurnia of the Lakes.  Sell Value:   200  Base drop rate is 4% (at 100 Discovery)  Other notes and player tips go here

01EBF180.name: Eclipse Crest Greatshield
01EBF180.hint: Chance to drop from Mausoleum Knights wielding it in Liurnia of the Lakes   Better farmed from the Knight in front of Black Knife Catacombs.

01DB0190.name: Brass Shield
01DB0190.hint: Dropped by Godrick Soldiers seen to be carrying it. (In 231 kills, 2 dropped. Approx. 0.8%)  Dropped by Raya Lucaria Soldiers seen to be carrying it.  An easy early location to farm begins at the “Gatefront” Site of Grace in the western part of main Limgrave, just north of the forest and just before Stormgate. Once you spawn in, turn around to face south east. There will be four Brass Shield carrying Godrick Soldiers in the Gatefront Ruins area that should be relatively easy to farm. Two are in a small fenced in area to the right of the road. One is on the road, carrying a horn. The last one is sitting next to a fire nearby.   Nearly all the Raya Lucaria Soldiers who are gathered outside Raya Lucaria Academy are carrying one, making it a good place to farm for it if you missed getting it earlier.

0112CF90.name: Pest's Glaive
0112CF90.hint: Drops from Lesser Kindred of Rot (Pests).       Two  can be easily farmed in front of the Church of the Plague.    Eleven can be found inside the Grand Cloister.

00107AC0.name: Scorpion's Stinger
00107AC0.hint: Found in the Lake of Rot. Cross the swamp and go through the entrance with large statues on either side to reach the Grand Cloister Site of Grace. Use the ledges to drop down to the bottom, and head straight ahead (westward) and you'll find the dagger in a chest.  Video Location

40033068.name: Ancestral Follower Ashes
40033068.hint: Where to Find Ancestral Follower Ashes  Dropped by Ancestor Spirit. Video Location

400021A7.name: Map (Siofra River)
400021A7.hint: Found next to the staircase leading up to Hallowhorn Grounds. Elden Ring.  Video Location

0271EA60.name: Horn Bow
0271EA60.hint: Found on a corpse in Siofra River near Siofra River Bank Site of Grace, under the stairs leading to Hallowhorn Grounds. Video Location

20000493.name: Immunizing Horn Charm +1
20000493.hint: Base talisman: Found on one of the corpses in an ant nest in Ainsel River.  +1 Variant: Found in the Lake of Rot, as a guaranteed item drop from the Ancestral Follower southeast of the Lake of Rot Shoreside Site of Grace.

400021A6.name: Map (Lake of Rot)
400021A6.hint: Found on a corpse by the water's edge at Lake of Rot, by the Lake Rot Shoreside Site of Grace.

400024AD.name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [22]
400024AD.hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [22]  Found in a chest in a ruin in the western section of the Lake of Rot.

101EAB90.name: Mushroom Crown
101EAB90.hint: Found on a corpse hanging off the top of a column in the southeastern corner of the Lake of Rot. Climb the fallen pillar leading to a rocky outcropping, south of the ruin, to reach it.

002ED830.name: Alabaster Lord's Sword
002ED830.hint: Awarded upon killing Alabaster Lord in the Lake of Rot. You have to raise the platforms to get up to him by stepping on the buttons around the swamp. There are two buttons that are next to small columns or obelisks. Once you get raised on the platform, take on the long and narrow path, after a few meters you will be greeted by this enemy. Kill him to obtain the Alabaster Lord's Sword. Note: If Alabaster Lord dies after you die the sword will not drop.  Awarded upon killing Alabaster Lord in Yelough Anix Tunnel.
