Below shows where the platform activation is at.  You will know it it the correct one if it lifts you up with it.  It has a ladder to climb down from it on the South West corner.

008A65B0.name: Dragonscale Blade
008A65B0.hint: Drops from Dragonkin Soldier in the Lake of Rot.

400024AF.name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [24]
400024AF.hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [24]  Mohgwyn Palace: Found on a corpse by the edge of the cliffs southeast of the blood marsh. From the Palace Approach Ledge-Road Site of Grace, head north down into the blood swamp, hugging the left wall. Once you reach a large open area, you should see a Golden Tree on a ledge above you, jump onto this rock and you will see a giant crow enemy, the corpse where this cookbook is found is resting on the cliff nearby.  Video Location

100A616C.name: War Surgeon Trousers
100A616C.hint: Dropped by killing one of three Nameless White Mask NPC invaders in the Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum area of Siofra River, northwest of the Palace Approach Ledge-Road site of grace, in the blood filled lake. This one can be found adjacent to the Giant Crow enemy near the blood filled lake drop off. Elden Ring Interactive

100A6108.name: War Surgeon Gloves
100A6108.hint: Dropped by killing one of three Nameless White Mask NPC invaders in the Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum area of Siofra River, northwest of the Palace Approach Ledge-Road site of grace, in the blood filled lake. This one can be found adjacent to the Giant Crow enemy near the blood filled lake drop off. Elden Ring Interactive

100A60A4.name: War Surgeon Gown
100A60A4.hint: Dropped by killing one of three Nameless White Mask NPC invaders in the Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum area of Siofra River, northwest of the Palace Approach Ledge-Road site of grace, in the blood filled lake. This one can be found adjacent to the Giant Crow enemy near the blood filled lake drop off.  After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter War Surgeon Gown (Altered) into non-altered War Surgeon Gown.

20000FCA.name: Haligdrake Talisman +2
20000FCA.hint: Travel to the Seaside Ruins Site of Grace. Walk south a short distance along the edge of the cliff (just past the crumbling archway). Look down toward the beach below and look for the windstream. Hop on Torrent and simply walk off the edge. Travel north until you see a small cave opening in the cliff face.  Travel to the The First Step Site of Grace. and make your way down the cliff to the east (should lead to an area with bats and crucifixes). Continue south east towards a bunch of crumbling pillars. Line yourself up with the pillar that is standing on the beach. Then, run or walk off of the edge of the cliff and land on a small ledge on said pillar (do not jump as you will be blocked by the ledge at the same level as the cliff). Then, safely hop down to the beach and the entrance to the cave is on the bottom of the cliff. Haligdrake Talisman +1:  Leyndell Catacombs: Found on a corpse next to a Lesser Spirit-caller Snail. From the Leyndell Catacombs site of grace, head up the elevator in the southeast to find a room with 3 spirit crossbowmen. Look under the arch next to the stairs for an illusory wall. Hit it to dispel the illusion, and then hit the wall on the left to dispel another illusion. The corpse and snail are found in here.Haligdrake Talisman +2: Looted off a body in Mohgwyn Palace, found in a small cluster of graves near a watchful Giant Crow perched up high.

40001C2A.name: Swarm of Flies
40001C2A.hint: Found on a corpse along the east wall (in a shallow cave) of the Mohgwyn Palace blood marsh, directly north from the Palace Approach Ledge-Road Site of Grace.  Video Location

00A84DF0.name: Curved Club
00A84DF0.hint: This weapon can be looted from the club and shield Albinaurics found at Academy Gate Town grace.       A group of Albinaurics wielding Curved Clubs can be found on a fallen bridge section east of this grace, in the direction of the Gate Town Bridge grace. Two of those sitting on the bridge section have the Curved Club and there's another patrolling in a pair further ahead.

00B85380.name: Curved Great Club
00B85380.hint: This weapon can be looted from the larger of the Second-Generation Albinaurics found across Liurnia of the Lakes (the gray frog like creatures). There are a number of them located around the Temple Quarter making it an easy spot to farm.

100A6040.name: White Mask
100A6040.hint: Dropped by killing one of the three Nameless White Mask NPC invaders in the Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum area, northwest of the Palace Approach Ledge-Road site of grace, in the blood-filled lake. The one that drops it can be found adjacent to the Giant Crow enemy near the lake exit from the tunnel. Elden Ring Interactive

01D9A200.name: Albinauric Shield
01D9A200.hint: Drops from Albinaurics wielding this shield. There are three on top of the church northwest of the Academy Gate Town Site of Grace.

400021A8.name: Map (Mohgwyn Palace)
400021A8.hint: Found soon after accessing the staircase to Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum, in the underground of Mohgwyn Palace. It is past a group of blood Albinaurics that summon giant skeletons. Elden Ring.  Video Location

80002A30.name: Ash of War: Blood Tax
80002A30.hint: Found in the Mohgwyn Dynasty area in a small cave, at the eastern edge of the blood lake with four blood albinaurics that appear after killing the beetle. Elden Ring Interactive  Video Location

10047504.name: Nox Swordstress Armor
10047504.hint: Pieces of the Nox Swordstress Set are dropped by the Nox Swordstresses found in Nokron and Nokstella.  Three can be found in relatively close proximity to the Nokstella, Eternal City site of grace. One up the stairs in a side room, and 2 in the river riding Giant Ants.

10047888.name: Night Maiden Twin Crown
10047888.hint: Pieces of the Night Maiden Set are dropped by Night Maiden enemies found in Nokron and Nokstella.  Two can be found in the Night's Sacred Ground area in the church with the large Sphere Silver Tear. Once this building's shortcut is opened, these two can be easily farmed by resetting at the Night's Sacred Ground site of grace.

40032898.name: Mimic Tear Ashes
40032898.hint: Where to Find Mimic Tear Ashes  Found in a chest locked behind an imp statue door in Night's Sacred Ground. Video Location

10046CD0.name: Nox Monk Hood
10046CD0.hint: Can be looted from the two pairs of Nox Monks in Nokstella, Eternal City north of the Nokstella, Eternal City Site of Grace.

10046D98.name: Nox Bracelets
10046D98.hint: Dropped from Nox Monk, Nox Swordstress, and Night Maiden enemies in Nokron and Nokstella.

10046DFC.name: Nox Greaves
10046DFC.hint: Dropped from Nox Monk, Nox Swordstress, and Night Maiden enemies in Nokron and Nokstella.

100474A0.name: Nox Swordstress Crown
100474A0.hint: Can be dropped by the Nox Swordstresses found in Nokron and Nokstella.  Three can be found in relatively close proximity to the Nokstella, Eternal City site of grace. One up the stairs in a side room, and 2 in the river riding Giant Ants.

4000230E.name: Black Whetblade
4000230E.hint: Found on a corpse slumped in front of an altar in Night's Sacred Ground. Video Location

10046D34.name: Nox Monk Armor
10046D34.hint: Can drop from the two pairs of Nox Monks in Nokstella, Eternal City. However, note that the Nox Swordstress & Nox Priest boss found in Sellia, Town of Sorcery will not drop the set.

100478EC.name: Night Maiden Armor
100478EC.hint: Pieces of the Night Maiden Set are dropped by Night Maiden enemies found in Nokron and Nokstella.  Two can be found in the Night's Sacred Ground area in the church with the large Silver Sphere. Once this building's shortcut is opened, these two can be easily farmed by resetting at the Night's Sacred Ground site of grace.

00A9AD80.name: Nox Flowing Hammer
00A9AD80.hint: From the Night Sacred Ground Site of Grace in Nokron, go up the stairs to your right. You should find yourself in a room with two Night Maidens and a Sphere Silver Tear. Slay these enemies, then ascend a ladder to the back right of the room. Go down the path to the right of the altar to where you see a Fanged Imp Statue Fog Wall. Turn right about halfway down the hallway and you should see a Roof Path out a window with a single Silver Tear. Head to the shingled section of the roof to find a single, unbarred window. Jump through that window to find the Nox Flowing Hammer.  Video Location

10047504.name: Nox Swordstress Armor
10047504.hint: Pieces of the Nox Swordstress Set are dropped by the Nox Swordstresses found in Nokron and Nokstella.  Three can be found in relatively close proximity to the Nokstella, Eternal City site of grace. One up the stairs in a side room, and 2 in the river riding Giant Ants.

10047888.name: Night Maiden Twin Crown
10047888.hint: Pieces of the Night Maiden Set are dropped by Night Maiden enemies found in Nokron and Nokstella.  Two can be found in the Night's Sacred Ground area in the church with the large Sphere Silver Tear. Once this building's shortcut is opened, these two can be easily farmed by resetting at the Night's Sacred Ground site of grace.

10049444.name: Fur Raiment
10049444.hint: All pieces of the Fur Set drop from Ancestral Follower enemies.  The pieces will drop off both the spectral and normal enemies of this type.  They can easily be found in Ruined Labyrinth and Mausoleum Compound areas of Liurnia of the Lakes.  You will have a hard time missing them, and vice-versa, in Siofra River.  Video Location

40002303.name: Ghost-Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing [1]
40002303.hint: Found on a corpse lying at the base of a gazebo in Nokron, Eternal City. Video Location

10046CD0.name: Nox Monk Hood
10046CD0.hint: Can be looted from the two pairs of Nox Monks in Nokstella, Eternal City north of the Nokstella, Eternal City Site of Grace.

100493E0.name: Great Horned Headband
100493E0.hint: All pieces of the Fur Set drop from Ancestral Follower enemies.  The pieces will drop off both the spectral and normal enemies of this type.  They can easily be found in Ruined Labyrinth and Mausoleum Compound areas of Liurnia of the Lakes.

1004982C.name: Shaman Furs
1004982C.hint: The chest piece can be looted off of the Ancestral Follower Shaman in the Ancestral Woods area of Siofra River.

10046D98.name: Nox Bracelets
10046D98.hint: Dropped from Nox Monk, Nox Swordstress, and Night Maiden enemies in Nokron and Nokstella.

10046DFC.name: Nox Greaves
10046DFC.hint: Dropped from Nox Monk, Nox Swordstress, and Night Maiden enemies in Nokron and Nokstella.

100498F4.name: Shaman Leggings
100498F4.hint: The leggings can be looted off of the Ancestral Follower Shaman in the Ancestral Woods area of Siofra River.

1004950C.name: Fur Leggings
1004950C.hint: All pieces of the Fur Set drop from Ancestral Follower enemies.  The pieces will drop off both the spectral and normal enemies of this type.  They can easily be found in Ruined Labyrinth and Mausoleum Compound areas of Liurnia of the Lakes.  You will have a hard time missing them, and vice-versa, in Siofra River.

2000049D.name: Clarifying Horn Charm +1
2000049D.hint: Base talisman: Found on a corpse lying on the stairs leading to the lift going up to the Deep Siofra Well.+1 variant: Found on a corpse in the middle and at the lowest floor of a ruin in Nokron, Eternal City. This is above an earlier area in Siofra River. To get there, head southeast from Ancestral Woods Site of Grace, and follow the brick path until it ends at a cliff. Turn left and follow the cliff edge as far as you can, then carefully drop onto the ruins roof. Follow this raised pathway northeast until you reach a square open platform. Descend carefully, and the talisman is found on a corpse in the center.

100474A0.name: Nox Swordstress Crown
100474A0.hint: Can be dropped by the Nox Swordstresses found in Nokron and Nokstella.  Three can be found in relatively close proximity to the Nokstella, Eternal City site of grace. One up the stairs in a side room, and 2 in the river riding Giant Ants.

200004B1.name: Mottled Necklace +1
200004B1.hint: Base talisman: Found at the very edge of the ruined bridge leading to Nokron, Eternal City. This area is accessible via waygate at The Four Belfries through the waygate labeled "night sky unceasing".  +1 Version - Can be found on a corpse on top of some ruined arches overlooking Hallowhorn Grounds in Nokron, Eternal City. From the stairway leading up to the Hallowhorn Grounds, circle around the left side of the structure and follow the inclines uphill as much as possible. You should eventually be able to get on top of the Hallowhorn Grounds structure.

10046D34.name: Nox Monk Armor
10046D34.hint: Can drop from the two pairs of Nox Monks in Nokstella, Eternal City. However, note that the Nox Swordstress & Nox Priest boss found in Sellia, Town of Sorcery will not drop the set.

100497C8.name: Shining Horned Headband
100497C8.hint: Guaranteed drop from a particular Ancestral Follower Shaman, which can be found singing in the smaller ruins with the corpse of a moose north-east of the Ancestral Woods site of grace, west of the Hollowhorn Grounds in Siofra River  The Ancestral Woods area is only available after gaining access to Nokron, Eternal City.

40000BB8.name: Ancestral Infant's Head
40000BB8.hint: Found in a chest guarded by an Ancestral Follower in a submerged ruin in Nokron, Eternal City. Video Location

200004B0.name: Mottled Necklace
200004B0.hint: Base talisman: Found at the very edge of the ruined bridge leading to Nokron, Eternal City. This area is accessible via waygate at The Four Belfries through the waygate labeled "night sky unceasing".  +1 Version - Can be found on a corpse on top of some ruined arches overlooking Hallowhorn Grounds in Nokron, Eternal City. From the stairway leading up to the Hallowhorn Grounds, circle around the left side of the structure and follow the inclines uphill as much as possible. You should eventually be able to get on top of the Hallowhorn Grounds structure.

100478EC.name: Night Maiden Armor
100478EC.hint: Pieces of the Night Maiden Set are dropped by Night Maiden enemies found in Nokron and Nokstella.  Two can be found in the Night's Sacred Ground area in the church with the large Silver Sphere. Once this building's shortcut is opened, these two can be easily farmed by resetting at the Night's Sacred Ground site of grace.

80009DD0.name: Ash of War: Enchanted Shot
80009DD0.hint: Dropped by a Teardrop Beetle hiding behind a rock near a brazier in Nokron, Eternal City. This is directly north of the Ancestral Woods site of grace, near two singing enemies. Elden Ring. Video Location

4003C8C0.name: Greatshield Soldier Ashes
4003C8C0.hint: Where to Find Greatshield Soldier Ashes  Found on a corpse in a graveyard in Nokron, Eternal City guarded by a Fallen Hawks Soldier.  Video Location

00D614B0.name: Jawbone Axe
00D614B0.hint: Can be dropped by Ancestral Follower.  Best place to get this weapon is west of ruined Labyrinth grace, 5 enemies very close to the site.

016EF950.name: Ghostflame Torch
016EF950.hint: Ghostflame Torch can be found on a body at Nokron, Eternal City. To find it, you must start from the beginning of Nokron, Eternal City, entering from the Meteorite Crater. Once you get to the first set of roofs in Nokron, you will see a derelict tower off to the right of the roof ramp. You will need to jump from the ramp to the tower to reach the torch. There is no other way to reach the Ghostflame Torch if you proceed to the lower roof platforms of Nokron. There is no way back up except to start over from the Crater again. Video Location

0099CF00.name: Gargoyle's Twinblade
0099CF00.hint: Dropped by Valiant Gargoyle (Twinblade) when both bosses are defeated.

1010A1D0.name: Silver Tear Mask
1010A1D0.hint: Dropped by the Mimic Tear boss in Nokron, Eternal City.  Video Location

00B74210.name: Greathorn Hammer
00B74210.hint: Dropped by Ancestral Follower located in Siofra River. Elden Ring  Directly northeast of the Ancestral Woods grace there are two easy to farm Ancestral Followers patroling below the singing one.

01EB7C50.name: Inverted Hawk Towershield
01EB7C50.hint: Dropped by Fallen Hawks Soldiers which carry this greatshield.       Six of them are found just outside the Nokron, Eternal City Grace. Only the soldiers which appear to be wielding no weapons carry the shield. They'll take it out when attacked.

00F66DF0.name: Iron Spear
00F66DF0.hint: Dropped by Fallen Hawks Soldiers that wield it.       Several soldiers wielding the spear can be found near the Nokron, Eternal City Site of Grace: three of them grouped behind the church, one more in the left-hand-side graveyard, and one to the left of the path leading to the Mimic Tear Site of Grace.

10047504.name: Nox Swordstress Armor
10047504.hint: Pieces of the Nox Swordstress Set are dropped by the Nox Swordstresses found in Nokron and Nokstella.  Three can be found in relatively close proximity to the Nokstella, Eternal City site of grace. One up the stairs in a side room, and 2 in the river riding Giant Ants.

10047888.name: Night Maiden Twin Crown
10047888.hint: Pieces of the Night Maiden Set are dropped by Night Maiden enemies found in Nokron and Nokstella.  Two can be found in the Night's Sacred Ground area in the church with the large Sphere Silver Tear. Once this building's shortcut is opened, these two can be easily farmed by resetting at the Night's Sacred Ground site of grace.

20000474.name: Moon of Nokstella
20000474.hint: Found in a chest underneath a massive throne in Nokstella, Eternal City.  The chest is in the highest room of the city, guarded by two mimic tears and a Nox warrior.  Video Location

40002304.name: Ghost-Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing [2]
40002304.hint: Found in a chest guarded by several Silver Tears with shields in the corner of a small room in Nokstella, Eternal City.  Video Location

10046CD0.name: Nox Monk Hood
10046CD0.hint: Can be looted from the two pairs of Nox Monks in Nokstella, Eternal City north of the Nokstella, Eternal City Site of Grace.

10046D98.name: Nox Bracelets
10046D98.hint: Dropped from Nox Monk, Nox Swordstress, and Night Maiden enemies in Nokron and Nokstella.

10046DFC.name: Nox Greaves
10046DFC.hint: Dropped from Nox Monk, Nox Swordstress, and Night Maiden enemies in Nokron and Nokstella.

400324B0.name: Nightmaiden & Swordstress Puppets
400324B0.hint: Where to Find Nightmaiden & Swordstress Puppets  Found in a chest locked behind an imp statue in Nokstella, Eternal City protected by two Nox Monks.  Video Location

4003CCA8.name: Archer Ashes
4003CCA8.hint: Where to Find Archer Ashes  Found on a corpse tucked behind a building in Nokstella, Eternal City, to the left after going up the stairs with the exploding Silver Tears.

100474A0.name: Nox Swordstress Crown
100474A0.hint: Can be dropped by the Nox Swordstresses found in Nokron and Nokstella.  Three can be found in relatively close proximity to the Nokstella, Eternal City site of grace. One up the stairs in a side room, and 2 in the river riding Giant Ants.

10046D34.name: Nox Monk Armor
10046D34.hint: Can drop from the two pairs of Nox Monks in Nokstella, Eternal City. However, note that the Nox Swordstress & Nox Priest boss found in Sellia, Town of Sorcery will not drop the set.

100478EC.name: Night Maiden Armor
100478EC.hint: Pieces of the Night Maiden Set are dropped by Night Maiden enemies found in Nokron and Nokstella.  Two can be found in the Night's Sacred Ground area in the church with the large Silver Sphere. Once this building's shortcut is opened, these two can be easily farmed by resetting at the Night's Sacred Ground site of grace.

01EBA360.name: Ant's Skull Plate
01EBA360.hint: The Ant's Skull Plate Shield can be found in a chest in a small room in Nokstella, Eternal City. Head West from the Eternal City Site of Grace, and up the first set of stairs. Make a left before the large arch, into the room with a Nox Swordstress facing a large chest. The shield is in a smaller chest to the right of it.Elden Ring Interactive Here  Video Location

40002357.name: Inner Order
40002357.hint: Given to players when talking to D's twin brother at the Siofra Aqueduct

40002493.name: Missionary's Cookbook [5]
40002493.hint: Where to find Missionary's Cookbook [5]  Found on a corpse in a circular section of the Siofra Aqueduct. From the Aqueduct-Facing Cliffs Site of Grace, head northeast out onto the cliff, drop down onto the diagonal beam and down the circular building. Across the bridge towards the southwest is a Crucible Knight enemy, the room behind him is where this cookbook is located. Video Location

40001A7C.name: Order Healing
40001A7C.hint: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found in the middle of a circular section of the Siofra Aqueduct. Accessible only after unlocking upper areas of Siofra Aqueduct. See it on the Elden Ring Interactive.  Fast travel to the Aqueduct-Facing Cliffs Site of Grace and follow the path east until you have to jump down a narrow walkway to cross into circular buildings. Head to the right and you will find the scarab inside the hanging building.  Video Location

0030ACF0.name: Gargoyle's Greatsword
0030ACF0.hint: Dropped by the Valiant Gargoyle in Siofra Aqueduct when both bosses are defeated.

01E8BD30.name: Crucible Hornshield
01E8BD30.hint: Dropped by the Lesser Crucible Knight patrolling the bridges of the Siofra Aqueduct. Elden Ring Interactive  Potential drop from the Lesser Crucible Knight found after the Rampart Tower bonfire. Travel towards the birds, and jump off the pillar towards some rocks. The Knight will be at the bottom of the cliffs.

10049444.name: Fur Raiment
10049444.hint: All pieces of the Fur Set drop from Ancestral Follower enemies.  The pieces will drop off both the spectral and normal enemies of this type.  They can easily be found in Ruined Labyrinth and Mausoleum Compound areas of Liurnia of the Lakes.  You will have a hard time missing them, and vice-versa, in Siofra River.  Video Location

100493E0.name: Great Horned Headband
100493E0.hint: All pieces of the Fur Set drop from Ancestral Follower enemies.  The pieces will drop off both the spectral and normal enemies of this type.  They can easily be found in Ruined Labyrinth and Mausoleum Compound areas of Liurnia of the Lakes.

4000246F.name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [18]
4000246F.hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [18]  Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Siofra River for 6000 Runes.  Video Location

4000245E.name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [17]
4000245E.hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [17]  Can be purchased from the Abandoned Merchant in Siofra River for 1000 Runes.

1004950C.name: Fur Leggings
1004950C.hint: All pieces of the Fur Set drop from Ancestral Follower enemies.  The pieces will drop off both the spectral and normal enemies of this type.  They can easily be found in Ruined Labyrinth and Mausoleum Compound areas of Liurnia of the Lakes.  You will have a hard time missing them, and vice-versa, in Siofra River.

200004C4.name: Marika's Scarseal
200004C4.hint: Found on a corpse at the base of the waterfall found at the highest level of Siofra River. From the Worshipper's Woods Site of Grace, head south and up the broken pillar to the top of the ruin. On top of this ruin is a waypoint that takes you to the area with the waterfall. Once you get there, head north north west till you see the Dragonkin Soldier in the lake. Head around to your right along the cliff to the waterfall under the arches, where you will find the talisman. You can collect this talisman without waking the boss.

1010EFF0.name: Octopus Head
1010EFF0.hint: The Octopus Head Helm can be obtained by killing Land Octopuses (Not to be confused with Giant Land Octopuses).        Twelve Land Octopuses can be found South of Saintsbridge Site of Grace , in a small lake close to Iron Fist Alexander's first encounter.      A few Land Octopuses can be found South-West of the Temple Quarter Site of Grace in Liurnia of the Lakes.     North of the Siofra River Bank Site of Grace, near the large pillar on the map, there are several Giant Land Octopuses, and many of the smaller Land Octopuses.

00D614B0.name: Jawbone Axe
00D614B0.hint: Can be dropped by Ancestral Follower.  Best place to get this weapon is west of ruined Labyrinth grace, 5 enemies very close to the site.

400013F6.name: Great Oracular Bubble
400013F6.hint: From the Worshippers’ Woods site of grace in Siofra River, travel south until you find a toppled pillar you can walk up with a ghostly archer on it, at the top there will be a waygate you can use. After this, move forward into an archway to the right of another collapsed pillar, the Teardrop beetle is in a room full of claymen. Elden Ring Ineractive  Video Location

400013EC.name: Oracle Bubbles
400013EC.hint: Can be found by killing one of the Teardrop Scarab on top of a broken statue in the first structure.  From the Siofra River Well Depths site of grace. Go straight from the spawn northeast to the lit ruins. Follow the northern stairs two flights, then the eastern stairs one flight. Stick to the right as the grass path wraps around. When it comes back above where you entered, jump up on the wall section, and you will see a path above to the other side of the wall. Go down and up and now follow the path onto the platform you could see from the grass. Drop down to the ledge before you get to the floor and the scarab is there.  Video Location

80002CEC.name: Ash of War: Square Off
80002CEC.hint: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found at the edge of the western cliff in front of a large waterfall North-Northwest of the Worshippers' Woods site of grace in Siofra River. Video Location

006B1DE0.name: Shotel
006B1DE0.hint: Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Siofra River for  2500 Runes. Video Location

0114CB60.name: Dragon Halberd
0114CB60.hint: Dropped by the Dragonkin Soldier boss in Siofra River. This Dragonkin Soldier can be accessed by a portal directly south on the map of the Worshipper's Woods on ruins being led up to by a collapsed pillar with an archer sitting atop.

00B74210.name: Greathorn Hammer
00B74210.hint: Dropped by Ancestral Follower located in Siofra River. Elden Ring  Directly northeast of the Ancestral Woods grace there are two easy to farm Ancestral Followers patroling below the singing one.

01DDE7C0.name: Inverted Hawk Heater Shield
01DDE7C0.hint: Siofra River. Southeast of Siofra River Bank site, up a hill and past 3 enemies on a body. The base of the hill is right next to the stairs to Hallowhorn Grounds.  Video Location

00F49930.name: Clayman's Harpoon
00F49930.hint: Dropped by Clayman at Uhl Palace Ruins, Siofra River or Ainsel River  Video Location

10108290.name: Imp Head (Long-Tongued)
10108290.hint: Chance to drop from imps found in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds:       From the Underground Roadside site of grace, go south through the shortcut door. This room has long-tongued Imps that can drop the Imp Head (Long-Tongued) hiding everywhere above the sewer pipes.

40000866.name: Mohg's Shackle
40000866.hint: Leyndell Royal Capital: Found all the way down in Subterranean Shunning-Grounds, guarded by 2 Giant Crayfish.  Video location

40001978.name: Shadow Bait
40001978.hint: Can be found on a corpse at Subterranean Shunning-Grounds, after going through the pipe room to a room with the corpse sitting at the center, next to a not-very-well-hidden Omen ready to strike. Elden Ring Interactive  Video Location

100EB280.name: Bloodsoaked Manchettes
100EB280.hint: The Bloodsoaked Manchettes can be looted from the ground in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds.  From the Underground Roadside site of grace, head into the main tunnel, turn left, and take out the first Omen. The Bloodsoaked Mask and Bloodsoaked Manchettes are on the ground on the right side of the tunnel shortly after the enemy.  Video Location

400320C8.name: Nomad Ashes
400320C8.hint: Where to Find Nomad Ashes  Nomad Ashes can be found on a corpse hanging off a ledge in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds beneath the Royal Capital. To reach it, start at the Underground Roadside site of grace, take a left onto the main path and continue to the end where you will see two large enemies praying at statue. (This is past a shortcut gate that needs to be opened first.) Turn right here to reach an open area, and immediately drop to your left. Follow the winding stairs down, then right to go through some hallways. If you keep moving in the same direction you will eventually reach the corpse past some basilisks.  Video Location

40000BC2.name: Omen Bairn
40000BC2.hint: The Omen Bairn is looted off of an Omen enemy in the Underground Roadside in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds beneath Leyndell, Capital City. If you have the shortcuts unlocked from the site of grace, he is located after going through the first two doors past the site and then down the ladder.  Shunning Grounds, Video Location

100EB5A0.name: Bloodsoaked Mask
100EB5A0.hint: The Bloodsoaked Mask Helm can be looted from the ground in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds.  From the Underground Roadside site of grace, head into the main tunnel, turn left, and take out the first Omen. The Bloodsoaked Mask and Bloodsoaked Manchettes are on the ground on the right side of the tunnel shortly after the enemy.   Video Location

00E508D0.name: Warped Axe
00E508D0.hint: Has a chance to drop from Omens  wielding this weapon. (4.00% chance)  Can drop from the Omen in the Cliffbottom Catacombs.  Can drop from the Omens near the "Abandoned Coffin" Site of Grace on the Altus Plateau.       An easy way to farm here is to pop a Silver-Pickled Fowl Foot and approach the first axe Omen by advancing Northeast between the coffin carriages. Clear that first mob who tries to jump on you, run back rest, and do it again as many times as you can before the Item Discovery effect wears off.      Two Omens wielding this axe can be found near the Underground Roadside Site of Grace in Subterranean Shunning-Grounds.

007AFC60.name: Omen Cleaver
007AFC60.hint: Has a chance to drop from Omen enemies wielding it. (4.00% chance)  You can find one at the heavily guarded courtyard in Stormveil Castle. The nearest checkpoint is the Liftside Chamber site of grace.  If the dog is interfering with your farming attempts, equip Beast-Repellent Torch to deal with it.

10049444.name: Fur Raiment
10049444.hint: All pieces of the Fur Set drop from Ancestral Follower enemies.  The pieces will drop off both the spectral and normal enemies of this type.  They can easily be found in Ruined Labyrinth and Mausoleum Compound areas of Liurnia of the Lakes.  You will have a hard time missing them, and vice-versa, in Siofra River.  Video Location

40036330.name: Clayman Ashes
40036330.hint: Where to Find Clayman Ashes  Located on a corpse in Ainsel River, Lake of Liurnia which is south from the Uhl Palace Ruins. Easiest way to reach these is ashes is while doing Ranni's questline (the portal you enter from Renna's Rise will take you near the ashes). After entering Ainsel River proceed south along the tunnel entering into the next main room with enemies, proceed southwest while hugging the edge until you reach the waterfall, it can be found on a corpse on the right side of the ledge.  Video Location

100493E0.name: Great Horned Headband
100493E0.hint: All pieces of the Fur Set drop from Ancestral Follower enemies.  The pieces will drop off both the spectral and normal enemies of this type.  They can easily be found in Ruined Labyrinth and Mausoleum Compound areas of Liurnia of the Lakes.

1004950C.name: Fur Leggings
1004950C.hint: All pieces of the Fur Set drop from Ancestral Follower enemies.  The pieces will drop off both the spectral and normal enemies of this type.  They can easily be found in Ruined Labyrinth and Mausoleum Compound areas of Liurnia of the Lakes.  You will have a hard time missing them, and vice-versa, in Siofra River.

00D614B0.name: Jawbone Axe
00D614B0.hint: Can be dropped by Ancestral Follower.  Best place to get this weapon is west of ruined Labyrinth grace, 5 enemies very close to the site.

006BE130.name: Wing of Astel
006BE130.hint: Found in a small chest at the top of the ruins in southern Uhl Palace Ruins. Can only be reached if you have access to the northern section of Ainsel River, by following the river east from northern Uhl Palace Ruins. From the Nokstella, Eternal City Site of Grace, look east at the waterfall and go forward, climbing up the ladder you see on your right. Go through the door and up the watery path, hugging the right wall, you'll encounter an ant enemy along the way and through the tunnel you'll see a T-Posing enemy with a scythe at the cliff. Continue hugging the right wall, and drop down safely down the ledges and up the path where the chest is located on the walkway behind the Malformed Star enemy. Be careful of the spells it fires at you, so you don't get knocked off the walkway.  Video Location

00B74210.name: Greathorn Hammer
00B74210.hint: Dropped by Ancestral Follower located in Siofra River. Elden Ring  Directly northeast of the Ancestral Woods grace there are two easy to farm Ancestral Followers patroling below the singing one.

00F49930.name: Clayman's Harpoon
00F49930.hint: Dropped by Clayman at Uhl Palace Ruins, Siofra River or Ainsel River  Video Location

10111700.name: Jar
10111700.hint: Given to the player by Iron Fist Alexander. Follow his questline until you find him in Mt. Gelmir near Seethewater Terminus. Completing his dialogue here will award the player with the Jar.

40002344.name: Triumphant Delight
40002344.hint: Obtained after you help Iron Fist Alexander get unstuck from the ground in Stormhill

200004CE.name: Warrior Jar Shard
200004CE.hint: Drops from Iron Fist Alexander when you kill him without completing his questline.

200004CF.name: Shard of Alexander
200004CF.hint: Drops from Iron Fist Alexander after completing his questline. Video Location

200008A2.name: Companion Jar
200008A2.hint: Given by Jar Bairn upon completing his questline. After he mentions going on a journey to become a Warrior Jar, give him Alexander's Innards, exhaust his dialogue, then reload the area. The talisman is found where he was once seated.

4000232D.name: My Lord
4000232D.hint: Given by Boc The Seamster if you allow him to call you lord (Requires giving him the Gold Sewing Needle, and reaching the Altus Plateau)

10029874.name: Blaidd's Armor
10029874.hint: Following Ranni's questline, after she is given the Dark Moon Ring, return to Ranni's Rise and you will hear Blaidd talking to himself in front of the tower. When he finishes his dialogue he will turn hostile, and defeating him will grant the player Blaidd's Armor, Blaidd's Gauntlets, and Blaidd's Greaves (as well as the Royal Greatsword).  Video Location

1002993C.name: Blaidd's Greaves
1002993C.hint: Following Ranni's questline, after she is given the Dark Moon Ring, return to Ranni's Rise and you will hear Blaidd talking to himself in front of the tower. When he finishes his dialogue he will turn hostile, and defeating him will grant the player Blaidd's Armor, Blaidd's Gauntlets, and Blaidd's Greaves (as well as the Royal Greatsword).

100298D8.name: Blaidd's Gauntlets
100298D8.hint: Following Ranni's questline, after she is given the Dark Moon Ring, return to Ranni's Rise and you will hear Blaidd talking to himself in front of the tower. When he finishes his dialogue he will turn hostile, and defeating him will grant the player Blaidd's Armor, Blaidd's Gauntlets, and Blaidd's Greaves (as well as the Royal Greatsword).  Video Location

003DF360.name: Royal Greatsword
003DF360.hint: Obtainable at the end of Ranni's questline; Blaidd will spawn in front of Ranni's Rise tower. Best him in combat for a final time to obtain this weapon along with his armor set.  Video Location

80013948.name: Ash of War: Raptor of the Mists
80013948.hint: Found after aiding Bloody Finger Hunter Yura in defeating his target in Raya Lucaria. Video Location

10024B1C.name: Ronin's Greaves
10024B1C.hint: Acquired by following Yura's questline., or by meeting with the Three Fingers and going to the spot where Shabiri was.

10024AB8.name: Ronin's Gauntlets
10024AB8.hint: Acquired by following Yura's questline , or by meeting with the Three Fingers and going to the spot where Shabiri was.

10024A54.name: Ronin's Armor
10024A54.hint: Acquired by following Yura's questline and eventually defeating Shabriri.. , or by meeting with the Three Fingers and going to the spot where Shabiri was.

100249F0.name: Iron Kasa
100249F0.hint: Acquired by following Yura's questline , or by meeting with the Three Fingers and going to the spot where Shabriri was.

00897B50.name: Nagakiba
00897B50.hint: Dropped by Bloody Finger Hunter Yura to the north of Murkwater Cave or in his camp near Seaside Ruins Site of Grace.  Can also be obtained by completing Bloody Finger Hunter Yura's questline at the Second Church of Marika allowing you to also obtain Eleonora's Poleblade and Purifying Crystal Tear.       If his questline is progressed too far without killing Eleonora (to the point where his body is taken by Shabriri), the Nagakiba can be found in one of the prior locations the player saw Yura: 1. at Yura's camp north-east of the Seaside Ruins Site of Grace, 2. at the underpass below the Murkwater Coast Site of Grace, or 3. on the edge of the bridge a little way away from the Main Academy Gate Site of Grace.      If killed by the Zamor Ruins site of grace, you can loot the Ronin Armor set from him and the weapon will be found in his usual spot just north of Murkwater Cave or it can be found south of the Dragon Burnt Ruins under the broken structure.

10092824.name: Twinned Armor
10092824.hint: Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D, Hunter of the Dead.   Obtained at end of D, Hunter of the Dead's questline.

10092888.name: Twinned Gauntlets
10092888.hint: Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D, Hunter of the Dead.   Obtained at end of D, Hunter of the Dead's questline.

100928EC.name: Twinned Greaves
100928EC.hint: Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D, Hunter of the Dead.   Obtained at end of D, Hunter of the Dead's questline.

100927C0.name: Twinned Helm
100927C0.hint: Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D, Hunter of the Dead.   Obtained at the end of D, Hunter of the Dead's questline.

001FE410.name: Inseparable Sword
001FE410.hint: Prince of Death's Throne, after giving D's brother D's Twinned Armour. You must have killed Lichdragon Fortissax in Fia's Dream and received the Mending Rune of Death.

00118C30.name: Erdsteel Dagger
00118C30.hint: Given by Kenneth Haight as a reward for clearing out Fort Haight.   Found NW of the Avenue Balcony site of Leyndell, Royal Capital. Drop down a pit with a Broken Statue and it will be on a corpse.  Video Location

20000406.name: Arsenal Charm
20000406.hint: Given by Nepheli Loux, who's at the Roundtable Hold.  Her initial location is inside a room near the Secluded Cell Site of Grace in Stormveil Castle. It's near the golden fog door that leads to Godrick the Grafted. When you find her, you must exhaust her dialogue so that she tells you that you can call her via a summoning sign to help you battle Godrick.  Nepheli moves to the Roundtable Hold after defeating Godrick, and you can find her at the northeast side, inside the library. Simply speak to her and she'll give you the talisman.   Altus Tunnel: In the second cavern, head through the tunnel in the south to find a wooden balcony overlooking a pit. Drop down on the left side to an overgrown root below. Follow the root going upwards to reach an upper balcony above where you can loot the talisman from a corpse.

00D7C260.name: Stormhawk Axe
00D7C260.hint: 2x looted from Nepheli Loux at the Village of the Albinaurics in Western Liurnia of the Lakes.       You must first talk to Nepheli Loux in her first location, and exhaust her father's dialog options and then hers in the round table to get her to move to the pathway under the bridge. This is to get her to move to the location. You can slay her in her first location and get the axes as well. It is also possible to bait the enemies to attack her in her first location, in which she doesn't retaliate against the enemies.      Looted from a dead body in the courtyard with Iron Maidens near Fortified Manor, First Floor at Leyndell, Royal Capital.   Castle Sol: 1x found on a corpse on a wooden awning in the central building of the courtyard. To reach this, head north while hugging the western ramparts from the castle's Main Entrance. Look for a room inside the ramparts near the northern section. This room has several slimes and a ladder. Climb the ladder to get on top of the ramparts and follow it west to a wooden bridge that connects to the central building. Beware the spectral Exile enemies mounted on ballistae on the ramparts, as well as the central building. Once on the central building's roof, jump on top of the cluttered objects draped in cloth in the northeastern section so you can get over the wall onto the awning and collect the axe.  Video Location

40002338.name: Calm Down!
40002338.hint: Obtained from returning to Patches in Murkwater Cave after being ensnared by his chest

40002348.name: Patches' Crouch
40002348.hint: Obtained from Patches after he returns to Murkwater Cave from The Shaded Castle and surrenders the fight

40002490.name: Missionary's Cookbook [2]
40002490.hint: Where to find Missionary's Cookbook [2]  Sold by Patches at Murkwater Cave after he sets up shop Video Location       Patches will drop a bell if killed, which can be given to the twin husk maidens at the round table to purchase said book.

4000233A.name: Extreme Repentance
4000233A.hint: Obtained by befriending Patches, then fighting him once more and letting him take you to low health

4000233B.name: Grovel for Mercy
4000233B.hint: Obtained from Patches after he surrenders for the first time at Murkwater Cave

10155D88.name: Leather Gloves
10155D88.hint: Murkwater Cave. Drops from Patches if he's killed after pleading for mercy.

10155DEC.name: Leather Boots
10155DEC.hint: Murkwater Cave: Drops from Patches if he's killed after pleading for mercy.

0131A230.name: Magma Whip Candlestick
0131A230.hint: Rewarded by Patches in Volcano Manor after completing his assassination quest, Great Horned Tragoth, for him.  This MUST be done before killing Rykard, it is lost otherwise.  Video Location

10155D24.name: Leather Armor
10155D24.hint: Murkwater Cave. Drops from Patches if he's killed after pleading for mercy.

000F9060.name: Parrying Dagger
000F9060.hint: Sold by Patches at Murkwater Cave for  1600 Runes after he sets up shop. Video Location  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Patches' Bell Bearing.

4000085C.name: Margit's Shackle
4000085C.hint: Can be purchased from Patches for  5000 Runes in Murkwater Cave.  After he becomes available as a merchant. Or it can be purchased from the Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold, after giving them Patches's Bell Bearing. Video Location

01DCAF40.name: Horse Crest Wooden Shield
01DCAF40.hint: Sold by Patches at Murkwater Cave for  1000 Runes after he sets up shop Video Location  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Patches' Bell Bearing

4000232B.name: Curtsy
4000232B.hint: Given by Roderika after becoming a spirit tuner, leveling a spirit to at least +4 and talking to her after

4000234B.name: Sitting Sideways
4000234B.hint: Given by Roderika in Stormhill Shack

400399E0.name: Spirit Jellyfish Ashes
400399E0.hint: Limgrave: In Stormhill Shack there's a woman with a red hood named Roderika that will give you x1 Spirit Jellyfish Ashes by talking to her several times.

100B4AA0.name: Crimson Hood
100B4AA0.hint: Stormveil Castle: It is found where the Chrysalids' Memento was initially found atop the pile of bodies of Roderika's people, in a room adjacent to a Grafted Scion mini-boss. Roderika's questline must be completed and spirit tuning must be unlocked for this item to appear.

004CC070.name: Rogier's Rapier
004CC070.hint: Given at +8 by Sorcerer Rogier at the balcony in Roundtable Hold after defeating Godrick the Grafted.

40002339.name: Nod In Thought
40002339.hint: Given by Sorceress Sellen if you agree to become her apprentice

100E5844.name: Eccentric's Armor
100E5844.hint: This armor piece is obtained as part of a set after the defeat of Witch-Hunter Jerren. This could be done as part of Sorceress Sellen's questline. Players will be given the option to side with Sellen or Jerren in Raya Lucaria Academy.

100CB9D0.name: Witch's Glintstone Crown
100CB9D0.hint: Obtained at the end of Sorceress Sellen's Questline.        If you sided with Sellen, the crown will be on the floor right next to her in her final form in the Raya Lucaria Academy library.    If you sided with Witch-Hunter Jerren, the crown will drop upon defeating Sellen.

1008DE50.name: Azur's Manchettes
1008DE50.hint: After completing Sorceress Sellen's Questline and siding with her towards the end, return to Primeval Sorecerer Azur's location. Azur's Glintstone Manchettes will be on the floor where Azur used to be, along with the rest of the set.

1008DDEC.name: Azur's Glintstone Robe
1008DDEC.hint: After completing Sorceress Sellen's Questline, return to Primeval Sorcerer Azur's location. Azur's Glintstone Robe will be on the floor where Azur used to be, along with the rest of the set.

1008DA68.name: Lusat's Manchettes
1008DA68.hint: All three armor pieces can be found after completing Sorceress Sellen's questline and siding with Sellen, return to Lusat's location in the Sellia Hideaway. The entire set will be on the ground where he used to be.

100E58A8.name: Eccentric's Manchettes
100E58A8.hint: This armor piece is obtained as part of a set after the defeat of Witch-Hunter Jerren. This could be done as part of Sorceress Sellen's questline. Players will be given the option to side with Sellen or Jerren in Raya Lucaria Academy.

1008DACC.name: Old Sorcerer's Legwraps
1008DACC.hint: Old Sorcerer's Legwraps can be found after completing Sorceress Sellen's Questline, return to Lusat's location in the Sellia Hideaway. The legwraps will be there, along with the rest of his set, for the taking.

100E590C.name: Eccentric's Breeches
100E590C.hint: This armor piece is obtained as part of a set after the defeat of Witch-Hunter Jerren. This could be done as part of Sorceress Sellen's questline. Players will be given the option to side with Sellen or Jerren in Raya Lucaria Academy.

100E57E0.name: Eccentric's Hood
100E57E0.hint: This armor piece is obtained as part of a set after the defeat of Witch-Hunter Jerren. This could be done as part of Sorceress Sellen's questline. Players will be given the option to side with Sellen or Jerren in Raya Lucaria Academy.

1008DA04.name: Lusat's Robe
1008DA04.hint: All three armor pieces can be found after completing Sorceress Sellen's questline and siding with Sellen, return to Lusat's location in the Sellia Hideaway. The entire set will be on the ground where he used to occupy.

1008DD88.name: Azur's Glintstone Crown
1008DD88.hint: After completing Sorceress Sellen's Questline and siding with her towards the end, return to Primeval Sorecerer Azur's location. Azur's Glintstone Crown will be on the floor where Azur used to be, along with the rest of the set.

001053B0.name: Glintstone Kris
001053B0.hint: Rewarded to players for progressing through the Sorceress Sellen questline and siding with her.

1008D9A0.name: Lusat's Glintstone Crown
1008D9A0.hint: Lusat's Glintstone Crown can be found after completing Sorceress Sellen's Questline, return to Lusat's location in the Sellia Hideaway. The legwraps will be there, along with the rest of his set for the taking.

40002342.name: Bravo!
40002342.hint: Obtained by interacting with the message beneath where White Mask Varre was originally, after defeating your first demigod and before talking to him at Rose Church

00A8C320.name: Varre's Bouquet
00A8C320.hint: Found at the Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum, right before the Dynasty Mausoleum Midpoint site of grace. It is received from White Mask Varré after invading him and depleting his dialogue.   Video Location

10097644.name: Corhyn's Robe
10097644.hint: Obtained from Brother Corhyn, alongside a Flail and Corhyn's Bell Bearing, in Leyndell, Ashen Capital, at the end of Goldmask's questline. Exhaust his dialogue, the reload the area to find the items.       If you offered him the Tonic of Forgetfulness while he's at the bridge near the Stargazer's Ruins, he will remain at that spot. Return to the area after finishing Crumbling Farum Azula, and pick up these items from where he was.    If you didn't complete the Law of Regression puzzle of the questline before reaching Crumbling Farum Azula, these items will be found where he was last seen.    These items are also obtained by killing him after he leaves the Roundtable Hold.

40002351.name: Prayer
40002351.hint: Obtained when meeting Brother Corhyn for the first time at Roundtable Hold

40002358.name: Golden Order Totality
40002358.hint: Given by Goldmask after telling him the solution to the riddle.

100FDF48.name: Gold Bracelets
100FDF48.hint: Gold Bracelets can be found on Goldmask's body after the completion of Brother Corhyn's questline. Head south from the Ashen Capital site of grace and go down the small path in the direction of the colosseum. Go past the plant enemies and stick to the left and you will find Goldmask. Loot the rune from him, and reset the area and return to find the rest of his set on his body.

100FDEE4.name: Goldmask's Rags
100FDEE4.hint: Goldmask's Rags can all be found on Goldmask's body after the completion of Brother Corhyn's questline. Head south from the Ashen Capital site of grace and go down the small path in the direction of the colosseum. Go past the plant enemies and stick to the left and you will find Goldmask. Loot the rune from him, and reset the area and return to find his set (Except for the Helmet) on his body.

100FDFAC.name: Gold Waistwrap
100FDFAC.hint: Gold Waistwrap can be found on Goldmask's body after the completion of Brother Corhyn's questline. Head south from the Ashen Capital site of grace and go down the small path in the direction of the colosseum. Go past the plant enemies and stick to the left and you will find Goldmask. Look the rune from him, and reset the area and return to find the rest of his set on his body.

1009EEF8.name: Diallos's Mask
1009EEF8.hint: Found upon completion of Diallos's questline.  Can also be gained by killing Diallos in North Liurnia of the Lakes.

4000234D.name: Spread Out
4000234D.hint: Obtained by buying Boiled Prawn from Blackguard Big Boggart

100D9878.name: Blackguard's Iron Mask
100D9878.hint: Dropped by the merchant Blackguard Big Boggart upon defeat.   Dropped by the merchant Blackguard Big Boggart at the end of his questline.

100ECE3C.name: Omen Greaves
100ECE3C.hint: The Omen Set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds at the Leyndell Royal Capital.

100ECDD8.name: Omen Gauntlets
100ECDD8.hint: The Omen Set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds at the Leyndell Royal Capital.

100ECD10.name: Omen Helm
100ECD10.hint: The Omen Set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds at the Leyndell Royal Capital.

100ECD74.name: Omen Armor
100ECD74.hint: The Omen Set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds at Leyndell Royal Capital.

003037C0.name: Sword of Milos
003037C0.hint: Dropped by killing Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds if you choose to kill him here.  Dropped by Dung Eater (NPC Invader) in the Capital Outskirts moat. He can be found in this location after releasing his corporeal body from his cell in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds and then reading his message at the Roundtable Hold.       If the sword is dropped and lost (i.e. if the Tarnished is killed by the giant death crab before picking it up) it can still be acquired by killing Dung Eater's corporeal body in the Sewer Gaol (where he will now be tied to a chair), he will not drop the sword if you complete his questline.

101D9A20.name: Fia's Hood
101D9A20.hint: Complete Fia's Questline, and defeat Lichdragon Fortissax. After the battle, you will be transported back to the Deeproot Depths, and Fia's Hood and Fia's Robe can be picked up at the base of Godwyn's corpse.

101D9A84.name: Fia's Robe
101D9A84.hint: Complete Fia's Questline, and defeat Lichdragon Fortissax. After the battle, Fia's Robe will be where she lays, along with her Helm - Fia's Hood.

80002B5C.name: Ash of War: Spinning Strikes
80002B5C.hint: When killed either at Castle Morne, or when he invades  at the Revenger's Shack, Edgar drops a Banished Knight's Halberd +8 with the Spinning Strikes Ash of War attached. The ash of war can be extracted from the weapon.

40002332.name: As You Wish
40002332.hint: Given by Hyetta when given a Shabriri Grape at Church of Irith

02082C10.name: Frenzied Flame Seal
02082C10.hint: Received at the end of Hyetta's questline.

40031CE0.name: Latenna the Albinauric
40031CE0.hint: Where to Find Latenna the Albinauric  Liurnia of the Lakes, Slumbering Wolf's Shack, found at the end of Lakeside Crystal Cave upon defeating the boss.  In order for Latenna to be friendly and become a spirit, one has to have the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right), given to the player by Albus  at the Village of the Albinaurics.  Alternatively, Latenna may be found dead if one progressed too far and missed out her quest. For this instance, one can still obtain her spirit ashes at the same location by simply picking up the item, but her quest would no longer be doable.

20000438.name: Stargazer Heirloom
20000438.hint: Found on a body lying at the top of the Divine Tower of Liurnia.  You will need the Carian Inverted Statue in order to obtain this talisman.  Video Location

20001784.name: Carian Filigreed Crest
20001784.hint: Purchased from War Counselor Iji as part of Blaidd's questline.        After killing the Bloodhound Knight Darriwil for Blaidd, the player can tell War Counselor Iji that Blaidd sent them. Iji will then stock the item.    Becomes available to purchase from War Counselor Iji after talking to Ranni and her servants at Ranni's Rise for the the first time.      Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after offering Iji's Bell Bearing

100F6A7C.name: Snow Witch Skirt
100F6A7C.hint: Found in a chest on the upper floor of Renna's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.  Video Location

100F69B4.name: Snow Witch Robe
100F69B4.hint: Found in a chest on the upper floor of Renna's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.  Video Location

002F2650.name: Dark Moon Greatsword
002F2650.hint: Found below the Cathedral of Manus Celes after giving Ranni the Dark Moon Ring.  You obtain the Ring by progressing Ranni's Quest, which is complex and requires you to do quite a lot of content.  Video Location

1013DA08.name: Iji's Mirrorhelm
1013DA08.hint: After the player confronts Blaidd during Ranni's questline, War Counselor Iji will have new dialogue available. Upon exhausting that and returning to the area again, his corpse can be found near his usual spot at the Road to the Manor grace site. Upon his anvil, the player will find Iji's Mirrorhelm as well as Iji's Bell Bearing.  Video Location

100DE698.name: Mask of Confidence
100DE698.hint: Found on a corpse laying on the walls of the secret area of the Carian Study Hall unlocked using the Carian Inverted Statue.  Video Location

100F6950.name: Snow Witch Hat
100F6950.hint: Found in a chest on the upper floor of Renna's Rise during the course of Ranni's questline.  Video Location

200017AC.name: Daedicar's Woe
200017AC.hint: Received at the end of Rya's quest. Rya will still drop the talisman even if you gave her the Tonic of Forgetfulness: after completing the manor questlines, she'll be in the drawing room. Exhaust her dialogues, rest, and go back to her location. She will be gone, and the talisman will be dropped on the floor.  Video Location

40001130.name: Glintstone Icecrag
40001130.hint: Sold by Preceptor Seluvis for 7500   at Seluvis's Rise  Can be obtained post-mortem via Seluvis's Bell Bearing. (from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold)

40001144.name: Freezing Mist
40001144.hint: Can be bought from Preceptor Seluvis for 6,000 Runes. Seluvis is located in Seluvis's Rise, inside the Three Sisters region of Liurnia of the Lakes.       Before Seluvis will sell you Sorceries, you must progress in his quest line. The choices you make do not matter.    Alternatively, giving Ranni the Fingerslayer Blade causes Seluvis's death, or the player could simply attack him. He drops Seluvis's Bell Bearing, and the spell can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at Roundtable Hold after offering the bearing to them.

40001220.name: Carian Retaliation
40001220.hint: Sold by Preceptor Seluvis for 9000  at Seluvis' Rise  Can be obtained post-mortem via Seluvis's Bell Bearing. (from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold)

40040358.name: Jarwight Puppet
40040358.hint: Where to Find Jarwight Puppet  Can be bought from Seluvis' body in Seluvis's Rise for Starlight Shards after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.If Seluvis' secret room is discovered beforehand, he will allow you to purchase one of his puppets.  Video Location

100DE3DC.name: Preceptor's Trousers
100DE3DC.hint: Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline. Elden Ring Interactive

100DE378.name: Preceptor's Gloves
100DE378.hint: Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline. Elden Ring Interactive  Video Location

400010CD.name: Carian Phalanx
400010CD.hint: Sold by Preceptor Seluvis at Seluvis's Rise, after completing steps of his questline.  Can be obtained post-mortem via Seluvis's Bell Bearing. (from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold)

4003FB88.name: Finger Maiden Therolina Puppet
4003FB88.hint: Where to Find Finger Maiden Therolina Puppet  Can be bought from Preceptor Seluvis in Seluvis's Rise for 2 Starlight Shards, or received for free after confronting him.  Video Location

4003F3B8.name: Nepheli Loux Puppet
4003F3B8.hint: Where to Find Nepheli Loux Puppet  Can be collected in Caria Manor from Pidia if Nepheli Loux drank Seluvis's Potion. After advancing Ranni's questline to the point where you give her the Fingerslayer Blade and she departs from Ranni's Rise, Seluvis will die. Now when you head down to revisit Pidia you will hear him pleading for his life from the puppets. After you arrive you'll find his corpse in the middle of three standing puppets (can't be attacked). His corpse has this puppet and Pidia's Ball Bearing. However if Nepheli didn't drink the potion, Dolores the Sleeping Arrow Puppet will be found instead.

4003FF70.name: Dolores the Sleeping Arrow Puppet
4003FF70.hint: Where to Find Dolores the Sleeping Arrow Puppet  Can be chosen from Preceptor Seluvis after finding his puppet collection in a hidden basement within the region, and having chosen to give Seluvis's Potion to Nepheli Loux.       If you chose a different puppet at the time, then you can purchase this one from him for 5 Star Shards afterwards.This shop is still available if you interact with his body should he die.      If Seluvis's Potion is given to anyone else other than Nepheli Loux then you can find this Spirit Ashes on the body of  Pidia after progressing Ranni's questline far enough for Seluvis to perish resulting in the puppets Pidia were given by Seluvis to turn against him. His corpse can be looted for this Ash and Pidia's Bell Bearing.

100DE314.name: Preceptor's Long Gown
100DE314.hint: Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.  Video Location

100DE2B0.name: Preceptor's Big Hat
100DE2B0.hint: Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.  Video Location

4003F7A0.name: Dung Eater Puppet
4003F7A0.hint: Where to Find Dung Eater Puppet   Sold by Seluvis after using Seluvis's Potion on the Dung Eater. Costs 5 Starlight Shards.

200007D0.name: Magic Scorpion Charm
200007D0.hint: Obtained by giving Preceptor Seluvis the Amber Starlight after Seluvis tells you about his scheme.  Cannot be obtained after Seluvius' death (which occurs when the Fingerslayer Blade is given to Ranni the Witch)       This makes it the only Scorpion Charm you can lock yourself out of getting in a playthrough.

40001216.name: Thops's Barrier
40001216.hint: In Church of Irith: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab after delivering the spare Academy Glintstone Key to Thops. Reload the area after delivering the key to spawn the scarab.

40002355.name: Erudition
40002355.hint: Give Thops the Academy Glintstone Key (Used to gain access to Converted Towers)

80007918.name: Ash of War: Thops's Barrier
80007918.hint: In Church of Irith: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab after delivering the spare Academy Glintstone Key to Thops. Reload the area after delivering the key to spawn the scarab.

4000102C.name: Starlight
4000102C.hint: Starlight can be learned from Thops at the Church of Irith for  2500 Runes.    Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Thops's Bell Bearing

01FA9780.name: Academy Glintstone Staff
01FA9780.hint: Looted from Thops's body.       You must give him the Academy Glintstone Key first.    Once he has it, fast travel to the Schoolhouse Classroom site of grace of Raya Lucaria Academy, you'll find him dead outside the room. Go outside and turn right, you'll find him, sitting in a chair.    He also drops this if you kill him, instead of giving the key.      Alternatively, it has a chance to be dropped by any of the Glintstone Sorcerers inside Raya Lucaria Academy.

20000821.name: Rotten Winged Sword Insignia
20000821.hint: Earned after choosing to assist Millicent and successfully defeat her sisters.

2000042E.name: Prosthesis-Wearer Heirloom
2000042E.hint: Finish the sidequest given by Gowry in Caelid, then return to Millicent to receive the talisman.

200004E2.name: Millicent's Prosthesis
200004E2.hint: Can be obtained by killing Millicent at the Windmill Heights Site of Grace after killing the Godskin Apostle there. This is the absolute earliest it can be obtained.  Killing her at any point after this will also make her drop this talisman, including when you are given the choice at the end of her questline between aiding or challenging her, and choose to challenge her. Upon killing her, you will automatically receive this talisman.  If you chose to aid her at the end of her quest line and successfully fend of her sisters, she will drop the Rotten Winged Sword Insignia instead and this talisman can no longer be obtained during this playthrough until a new NG+ cycle is started.

20000BEA.name: Flock's Canvas Talisman
20000BEA.hint: Drops from Gowry after you kill him, only if he is crying about Millicent's death.  Completing Millicent's entire quest line, by slaying or helping her at the end, will put Gowry in the "crying" state.Killing her earlier will also get Gowry into this state.

20001770.name: Crepus's Vial
20001770.hint: Dropped by Rileigh the Idle, the enemy you kill during the second assassination task in the Volcano Manor questline.  Video Location

100EA72C.name: Consort's Trousers
100EA72C.hint: Looted from the corpse of Tanith after attacking her and defeating the summoned Tannith's Knight near the Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy site of grace in Volcano Manor, Altus Plateau.    Can be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for  1,500 Runes.

400012CA.name: Gelmir's Fury
400012CA.hint: Given by Recusant Bernahl at Volcano Manor after completing his request.   Video Location

200013A6.name: Taker's Cameo
200013A6.hint: Awarded by Tanith at Volcano Manor, after completing the third letter quest. This requires you to visit the Mountaintops of the Giants, to invade and defeat Juno Hoslow, Knight of Blood.   Juno Hoslow's invade rune can be found in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants, east of Shack of the Lofty.  Video Location

400012C0.name: Magma Shot
400012C0.hint: Rewarded by Tanith for completing Volcano Manor's first assassination quest.  Found in Drawing Room of Volcano Manner if first assassination quest is done after dissolving the faction by defeating Rykard  Video Location

100EA664.name: Consort's Robe
100EA664.hint: Looted from the corpse of Tanith after attacking her and defeating the summoned Tannith's Knight near the Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy Site of Grace in Volcano Manor, Altus Plateau.

100EA600.name: Consort's Mask
100EA600.hint: Looted from the corpse of Tanith after attacking her and defeating the summoned Tannith's Knight near the Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy site of grace in Volcano Manor, Altus Plateau.

008A8CC0.name: Serpentbone Blade
008A8CC0.hint: Given as a reward for completing the second letter quest in Volcano Manor from Tanith.  Video Location.

40001AB8.name: Bestial Vitality
40001AB8.hint: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the third Deathroot.

40001A9A.name: Stone of Gurranq
40001A9A.hint: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the 6th Deathroot.

40001AAE.name: Gurranq's Beast Claw
40001AAE.hint: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the 8th Deathroot.

00B964F0.name: Beastclaw Greathammer
00B964F0.hint: Gurranq will reward the player with this after turning in their 7th Deathroot.

40001A90.name: Bestial Sling
40001A90.hint: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the second Deathroot.

40001AA4.name: Beast Claw
40001AA4.hint: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the fifth Deathroot.

8000FEB0.name: Ash of War: Beast's Roar
8000FEB0.hint: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the fourth Deathroot.

020768C0.name: Clawmark Seal
020768C0.hint: Given by Gurranq Beast Clergyman after feeding him a Deathroot. Elden Ring
